summary: Carnage is a multiplayer vehicle creation/destruction-based game where players must try to dominate an arena with their personalised carnage vehicle. With an array of weapons to suite any playstyle, only your enemies can stop you now.

name: Castle Crashers: Blacksmith Pack
summary: Shrouded in mystery and in purple, the Blacksmith is ready to step out of legend and enter the fray. Hammer your opponents with this new playable character and 5 additional new weapons.

name: Castle Crashers: Pink Knight Pack
summary: Born out of popular demand, rumor, and Tom Fulp's Beard, the Pink Knight is ready to bring the love in. Add the playable Pink Knight plus 5 additional weapons in Castle Crashers: Pink Knight Pack, a DLC for Castle Crashers.

name: Cast Piercer
summary: Stop time, teleport, control your enemies and escape a sky high facility. Cast Piercer is a 2D stealth platformer set in a dystopian future where the Cast Wars have created a world of chaos which only you can fix.

name: Caveblazers: Together
summary: Caveblazers Together is an online multiplayer mod for Caveblazers - team up with up to 3 friends on your adventures!

name: Carnival and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - Winter and Gingerbread Man
summary: A cold winter has hit Carcassonne. The citizens waste very little time before preparing hot beverages and sweet pastries. Life around Carcassonne slows down. Occasionally, the people catch a glimpse of a new character, the gingerbread man.

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - Inns & Cathedrals
summary: With the Inns & Cathedrals expansion, Carcassonne's content has been expanded for even more tactical play and competitiveness. With a new meeple and "special" tiles, this expansion will give your game a new twist for even more fun.

summary: Welcome to the prologue to Car Trader Simulator. Here you will learn all the most important in mechanics and economics in the game and you will play your first mission.

summary: Case Kovacs: Agent 228 is a very short and intriguing mini game telling the story of Elizabeth Kovacs, the missing woman from the game NoseBound.

name: Carrier Battles WW2: Admiral of the Fleet
summary: A real-time WW2 naval warfare simulation game on tactical level, Admiral of Fleet features 20 scenarios covering the naval battles between carriers in the early stage of the war, from December 1941 to the end of 1942.

name: Car Tehc
summary: You may not know much about cars, it doesn't matter. We don't want you to unscrew thousands of screws like other games. We offer to you, a fun car repair simulation with simple mechanics.

name: Cafe Simulator
summary: Cafe Simulator is an cafe business simulation game. Destruc-Build-Design the best cafe in the world!

name: Carma
summary: Out drive your friends in fast, arcade-style vehicle combat, using power-ups, killstreaks, and the environment to smash your foes! Battle across a miniature world, avoiding dangers and earning the gods favour to level up and unlock a wide range of customisables to help you stand out from the crowd.

name: Cassius
summary: Cassius is a first-person story-driven puzzle game exploring the mysteries of Blackhaven Hall, a sprawling historically accurate colonial estate evacuated at the height of the American Revolution. Journey back to the 1781 and decode the dark secrets lurking behind America's founding.

name: Carte Primus
summary:
A collection of five card games:

- Cribbage
- Gin Rummy
- Hearts
- Pinochle
- Pitch

name: Carpoon
summary: What happens when you fuse a harpoon gun to a tow truck? Twin-stick car harpooning arcade party action! Harpoon and reel cars in, then tow them into the recycling crusher before time runs out and while watching out for other hazards.

name: Cab Ride
summary: Drive a train, forever, through a dreamlike land. Transport passengers to their destination. Watch the world go by. Listen to chilled out chiptune music.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season Six
summary: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War - Season 6 reveals more than just Adler's counterattack against Stitch. Fight through Adler's broken memories in one of three new Multiplayer maps, and explore mysterious new World War 2 bunkers uncovered throughout Verdansk. Grab your gear and get ready for Season 6.

name: Canyon Bomber
summary: Canyon Bomber is the a port of the arcade game of the same name, rewritten in color and with a different visual style for the Atari 2600. The player and an opponent fly a blimp or biplane over a canyon full of numbered, circular rocks, arranged in layers. The player does not control the flight of vehicles, but only presses a button to drop bombs which destroy rocks and give points. Each rock is labeled with the points given for destroying it. As the number of rocks is reduced, it becomes harder to hit them without missing. The third time a player drops a bomb without hitting a rock, the game is over.

name: Catsploration
summary: In order to save your family, you must venture from home to find and return a dragon’s egg. Catsploration is a high fantasy adventure with narrative and 3D platforming elements.

name: Cards Matching Memory Game
summary: Do you like memory games? Looking for a fun way for brain training and a way to improve your memory? Check out Cards Matching Memory Game.

name: Catching a Ride
summary: Drive at night seeing the road only through the light of other cars, in this tiny adventure about feeling lost, and making friends along the way.

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow Alter
summary:
This is a hack of Aria of Sorrow that changes most part of the map, and the aim is to give completely new experience to players.

Changes

Most of the map redone. Some new puzzles added. Added a new area like Nest of Evil in PoR.
Some of the weapons, armors and accessories are changed. Example: Valmanway and Excarlibur.
Changed some items. Example: Mina’s Charm, work like magic ticket and can be used without consuming it. Talk to Mina to acquire this.
Most of souls are slightly easier to acquire.
Bug fixes to original game, including shop giltch and death warp.
Soma’s status are changed. Julius is greatly strengthened. The aim is that Julius is super and can be used very easily.

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow - Genya Arikado Hack
summary:
This is a hack that replaces Soma Cruz with Genya Arikado from Aria of Sorrow. There are a number of other changes as well, such as elements from symphony of the night being carried over like the following:

The Alastor Soul has been replaced with the fully leveled Sword Familiar
The Imp Soul has been replaced with the Devil Familiar
The Flying Armor Soul has been replaced with the Faerie Familiar
The Devil Soul has been replaced with the stone Gargoyle/Demon Alucard form from SOTN
The Final Guard Soul has been replaced with the Alucard Shield
And

The Balmung sword has been replaced with a weaponized version of the Sword Familiar fully leveled

name: Cape's Escape Game 4th Room
summary: Cape's Escape Game 4th Room is a short adventure game in the Cape's Escape series, which you can complete in an hour or so. Solve the mystery and escape from the Japanese hot springs inn.

name: Capture the Flag 1
summary: A casual, family friendly capture the flag multiplayer game that brings nostalgia to anyone who played the team based game as a child. Who would've thought that back-to-back juking and defensive play would be so fun! Add to your Wishlist now & be ready for some satisfyingly amusing 5v5 action!

name: Castle Siege
summary: An asymmetric 1v1 tower defense/offense multiplayer game set in a fantasy medieval setting. Attack or defend the castle. Level up, and use magical spell cards to gain an advantage.

name: Cade Prime
summary: Cade Prime is the DoD's most advanced android. Bad Dudes have placed him inside of the Mainframe. Can You help him solve challenging puzzles in order to escape ?

name: Calluna
summary: Calluna is a small adventure game about the Norwegian composer and violinist Ole Bull. In Calluna, you can play as Ole Bull in four independent adventures as young, old, rich, and poor. Walk the streets of Bergen, Paris, and Cairo in first-person and explore a semi-open world filled with interactive items, townspeople, and collectibles. Solve quests based on historical events and follow Ole Bull’s dream of fame and glory.

name: Cat Capacity
summary: A crazy cat lady simulator.

name: Caves Of Mars
summary: Caves of Mars is a new 2D sci-fi action adventure space shooter game set in the mysterious caves of the planet Mars. Your mission is to navigate your spacecraft through 100 procedurally generated levels, battle against and destroy enemies and alien lifeforms and collect as many gems as possible.

name: Castlevania: Rondo of Ruin
summary: Castlevania Rondo of Ruin is a Castlevania Portrait of Ruin romhack aiming to modify most of the games content. There is a new story, new items, sprites, weapons, music, and most of the games areas are modified in both small and big ways. Set 5 years after the events of Symphony of the Night, join Richter Belmont, Maria Renard and their companions as they work to unravel what has caused Castlevania’s early return to the world of humans.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Dissonance - A Juste Story Mode Hack
summary: Castlevania Dawn of Dissonance is a Castlevania Dawn of Sorrow romhack aiming to modify most of the games content. There is a new story, new items, sprites, weapons, music, and most of the castle was modified in both small and big ways. Set 8 years after his last adventure, join Juste Belmont and his companions as they work to unravel the plot of the Bartley family.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow No Required Touch Screen
summary: This patch makes several changes to Dawn of Sorrow so that you can complete the game without needing to use the touch screen for anything.

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Ghosts 'n Goblins
summary: Add Ghosts 'n Goblins to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

name: Camp Palut
summary: Camp Palut is a spooky-cute sapphic visual novel with magic, mystery, and a glimpse of the supernatural. Featuring four different love interests with multiple endings, and separate but interlocking stories that lead to a thrilling conclusion.

name: Casual Challenge Players' Club
summary: If you like anime and pool, then this game is for you. Play the story mode or have fun playing with your friends and family.

name: Cargo: TD on Rails
summary: Arm and defend your train in this real-time strategy tower defense game. After you make a fast delivery upgrade your weapons and do more dangerous missions.

name: Cat Interstellar: Episode II
summary: A short story inspired by Robert Heinlein's: Starship Trooper

name: Car Wash TD: Tower Defense
summary: A simple one-of-a-kind tower defense game where you need to wash cars before they reach the end of the road. Create mazes. Upgrade your towers. Wash all sorts of cars, trucks, boats, and planes.

name: Castle of Shikigami 2
summary: Castle of Shikigami 2 is the second installment of the dramatic shooter that gained popularity in the arcades, Castle of Shikigami. Players choose one of seven (+1?) characters, each with different unique abilities, and use their shots, special Shikigami attack, and bombs to destroy the enemy. The unique backgrounds of each character are intricately intertwined, creating an interesting storyline for the shooter.

name: Cadavers for Dinner
summary:
Boukenmeshi features character designs from Takehito Harada. Harada is character designer for the Disgaea franchise, as well as Labyrinth of Refrain and The Witch and the Hundred Knights. Players will gather food and materials from the dungeon as they go, cooking new, weird, and delicious dishes to improve their stats and grow stronger.

The game will incorporate a character generation feature, and involve a party of four characters. Various jobs are available to the party. These include Swordsman, Cook (who can improve the quality and diversity of rations), and even the “Unemployed” Job, which sounds like a Dark Souls-style Deprived character.

Boukenmeshi will also involve survival-game mechanics. This will involve managing the party’s calorie and water intake. Players can cook food while in camp, but also eat ingredients while fighting in strategic battles. These confer status effects and benefits from the consumption.

name: Castle of Shikigami: Evolution
summary: Shikigami is back, more aggresive and more challenging than ever before. Can you hold out against this new onslaught of ruthless foes? You'll need all your wits about you to solve this case!

name: Castle Explorer: The Dark Below
summary:
The dragon has increased its defence, added more traps, hired new monsters to keep its treasure safe from intruders.
Are you brave enough to challenge the dread castle, defeat evil monsters, discover new items and loot every treasure from the dragon's lair?

name: Castaway on a Weird Island
summary: Your boat is wrecked! Now you are a Castaway on a Weird Island! Castaway is a combination rogue-like and deduction game. Use your clues to deduce the safest path to freedom, or take a risk and fight your way off the island. Many strange creatures block your way, and much treasure is to be found! Castaway on a Weird Island features over 100,000 puzzles and a Game Centre leaderboard.

name: Cards of Terra
summary: Cards of Terra is a single-player card game. It combines light solitaire-like card play with the in-depth mechanics of collectible card games. You play as an alien princess stranded in an unfriendly fantasy realm. Luckily, our heroine has psi-powers which she can use to make enemies fight each other. Drag-and-drop enemy cards and remove them from your path to salvation.

name: Cards! MonkeyBox 2
summary:
Lush forests, wild oceans and howling caves. Hot air balloons, cats and deadly deserts.
Swipe your way through a dangerous world. Your fate lies in a deck of cards. Cards! is a story driven puzzle adventure specifically designed with mobile in mind. Simple to start and easy to get lost in. Cards! MonkeyBox 2 is entry #2 of the MonkeyBox Series - a series of playful, experimental, handcrafted titles.

name: Caramella Girls
summary: Caramella Girls is a music game that put your rhythmic skills to the test. It's based on rhythm, speed, finger sensitivity and memory. The song Caramelldansen itself have became a huge success on youtube with more then 30.000 different dance moves made of fans all around the world. Learning to play the game is very simple. Just copy the Caramella Girls dance moves by tapping the buttons in sync with the icons on the beat bar on top. Miss a move and you'll lose power. When no power is left the game is over. Tap bonus stars to fill up your power again.

name: Captain Temporium
summary: Captain Temporium is a classic fast paced shoot 'em all up style arcade game. Now only you can save our history and future. Take control of her time machine and fight the endless onslaught!

name: Carrom Pool: Disc Game
summary:
Carrom Disc Pool is an easy-to-play multiplayer board game. Pot all your pieces before your opponent. Can you become the best at this Carrom Board game?

With simple gameplay, smooth controls and great physics, travel around the world and play against worthy opponents. Are you up for the challenge?

This game has multiple popular variants across the globe. Some to the most famous ones are Korona, Couronne, Bob, Crokinole, Pichenotte and Pitchnut.

Customise your pieces with a huge variety of unlock-able items! Show off your style to players from all over the world!

name: Cats & Soup
summary:
Looking for a cute cat game?
Here is a peaceful animal forest where cats boil their delicious soup!
An idle relaxing cat game perfect for cat moms and dads.

name: CarX Rally
summary:
Join the exciting rally races and become a CarX Rally legend!
Experience realistic physics and car damage in dynamic rally races. Download CarX Rally for free and open up a world of extreme racing.

name: Cato the Cat
summary: Take care of Cato using a match 3 mechanic and don't let him get away. The player needs to take care of Cato, a very smart cat, through a match 3 mechanic to prevent Cato from running away. Feed, hydrate and of course play a lot with Cato so he won't run away. Play to relax or to get the best scores.

name: Castle Craft: World War
summary:
In Castle Craft, the real-time PVP strategy game, it is your skills that decide the outcome of a battle.
Form different types of armies by deploying Commanders and units to catch the opponent off guard.

Show your strategic skills.
Counter your opponents by responding to their strategies with diverse and dynamic gameplay.
Freely choose Commanders and units with different mechanisms to win.

You can level up your Commander and unit cards to make them stronger.

Always go for new strategies.
Don't forget to scout the enemy base. Find out what your opponent is doing and respond by expanding your base and adding unit cards with a special strategy for victory.

Try your own comp in the meta that is constantly changing.
Create armies with different commanders and units each time to test out your strategy.
Astonish players around the world with your creativity.

Rise to the top and become the best.
Experience many battles to become the best conqueror and achieve rewards given to conquerors.
Accomplish Expedition Missions that change every season and earn additional rewards.

Join a Guild to share your strategies and battle records.
Compete with other guilds with your guild members.
Share strategies while competing with others and earn fame.
Obtain gifts and victory rewards given daily and watch your Guild grow.

Now is the time to become the best conqueror with your brilliant mind.
Play the game now and show how you will conquer!

name: Capital Island
summary: Play as a Door-to-Door seller in Capital Island, a trade/management game. Capital Island is waiting for you! Now, go knock on some doors...

name: Caylus
summary: Caylus is a strategy oriented, German-style board game with a mix of building, producing, planning, and bargaining - without direct conflict or dice-rolling mechanics.

name: Cataline HD
summary: Blast your way through the embroidered world of Cataline HD! Set in a world made entirely of fabric, wool and yarn, this physics-based puzzler lets you play as Cataline the ginger cat, who has to fly and land safely in a fish bowl to catch a meal. Launch her from a thimble and knitting needles - just let her fly and fall into a fish bowl.

name: CardWarden
summary:
The CardWarden allows you to create, import and play card games on your iPad!
Now you can take entire boxes of cards with you wherever you go.

name: Cartoon Roach: Fun Ninja Game
summary: Gross, roaches! Cartoon Roach: Fun Ninja Game is an action arcade game for kids. Compete alongside your friends as you battle the most powerful roaches from the cartoon world, all with a tap of your finger. Battle against 10 of the most powerful cartoon roaches like Konoha Ninja Roach, Spartan Roach, Living Dead Roach and more! Make sure that you don’t smash one of the good roaches like the Medic or the game is over! Compare your scores on leaderboards and social media. How many roaches can you squash? Start playing Cartoon Roach to find out!

name: Candy Boo: Esports Edition
summary:
Become a Mobile Esports star by playing the Candy Boo: Esports Edition. Compete against thousands of other Candy Boo competitors around the world and win real money and prizes!

This special tournament edition of Candy Boo is powered by the Megafans skill-gaming platform. Test your skills against the best and crush the tournament leaderboard.

name: Cage-Face: Case 1 - The Mine
summary: Escape from the mine tunnels while hunted by an unstoppable beast and slowly being affected by a mysterious illness.

name: Cadulium
summary: Maia is being followed, and she doesn't know why. Cadulium is a science fiction mystery adventure video game with action elements.

name: Card Guardians
summary:
Welcome to the world of Valentia! Build your deck of cards and prepare for strategic CCG battles against monsters and the Guardians of Chaos.
In Card Guardians, you need to win battles against monsters and build a battle card deck to defeat the Guardians of Chaos. Choose the hero of your RPG adventure, create CCG battle strategies, and discover various unexplored realms throughout the Valentia. And beware of dangers! There are dungeons, castles, forests, and deserts that harbor dangerous enemies, with the difficulty of roguelike games.
Restore peace to Valentia and become the master duel of the deck of battle cards. Download Card Guardians now and explore a roguelike world with dangers and epic stories!

name: Cartoon Basketball
summary:
Let's play cartoon Basketball!
In this basketball game you need to throw the basketball quickly to score as many points as possible.

name: Cartographers
summary: Experience the fascination of this tactical flip & write game from the Roll Player universe now as an app. Cartographers is a tactical legendary game featuring 3 different modes with varying degrees of randomness. Compete with players from all over the world via weekly high score lists. Collect achievements and become the most legendary cartographer of all time.

name: Cat Jumper
summary:
This game is a little difficult and requires memory , simulation and distance calculation from jump. This game has checkpoints but it doesn't seem to have it.
in this game you will be a cat and if you fall into water, you will be disturbed by shark and the shark brought you to staring point again and again. so be careful.

name: Catan
summary:
Catan is a handheld implementation of a board game Settlers of Catan. There is a flat board with the game world divided on a number of hexagons. The goal of the game is to reach ten Victory points that are earned by having settlements, point cards and some other conditions, however there could be other goals in this version. Every turn players can either build roads, settlements and cities or expand onto over territories, which also produce different resources needed for construction. Resources could be either purchased for Settlement cards or traded with other players.

The N-Gage version, besides the traditional board game rules, also features a multi-stage tournament and a quest-mode with a number of different objectives, like building the longest road or having the largest army, by the end of the game, or reaching ten points under a certain amount of turns. Most of the in-game actions are decided by the roll of dice and it is done automatically. There are ten different computer characters who has their own portraits and things they say during the game, if you are playing alone. Of course, there's a multiplayer option for up to four players as well. Also there's a short tutorial to grasp the strategy basics.

name: Cafe in the Clouds
summary:
Cafe in the Clouds is bite-sized visual novel with point-and-click elements. The game features wholesome WLW content and a bonus ending for getting a 5-star dish!

When townsfolk are troubled by their daily lives, their imaginations run free as strange dreams envelop them in an uneasy sleep. Those with particularly vexing dreams may seek the mysterious assistance of dream eaters with hopes of having their anxieties eaten away. Entering the worrisome dreams of afflicted clients, Somnia and Remerie investigate the roots of their clients' torment, hoping to create a dish out of the materialized anxieties.

name: Cabbage
summary:
A virtual pet breeding and raising game for the 64DD that was being developed by Shigesato Itoi, Shigeru Miyamoto and Pokémon producer Tsunekazu Ishihara.

In the game, you raised and cared for an unspecified creature. The game used the 64DD's internal clock so the creature and the world it was in would continue to grow and change, even when the game wasn't being played.

It was also intended that the creature could be transferred to a Game Boy cartridge so players could continue to care for the creature on the move. Expansion kits for the game were also planned, although it was unclear how these would have been distributed.

The game was discussed a number of times during 64DD development, and a playable version of the game was planned to be shown at Nintendo Spaceworld 2000, but it never appeared. In an interview, Shigeru Miyamoto stated that the game had been dropped due to the team being busy with other projects.

It is believed that several of the game's ideas were later used in Animal Crossing and Nintendogs.

name: Cactus Out of Place
summary:
Control a cactus in a pot, collect all stars, reactivate the rocket, and save your kin.

Enjoy the beautiful and breathtaking scenery in a desert valley. Explore several interesting monuments and try to relax from frustration the cactus will surely provide.

name: Capture the Pixel
summary: A tiny but crazy global multiplayer CTF shooting game.

name: Car's Empire
summary: Racing action game local multiplayer where you have to destroy a toy store & collect more points than the other player

name: Capeless Heroes
summary: Fight fires, be a real hero.

name: Carl
summary: Carl is an atmospheric psychological survival-horror game that takes place in an abandoned house taken over by a slasher villain. Don't let Carl get you.

name: Captain's Big Day
summary: A day in the life of a hard-working pirate

name: Cardinal Ramship Pirate
summary: You have descended into Bordered Space in pursuit of the famed Big Golden Chest. The area has many guardians but you have a time crystal and a pirate ramship...

summary: A party game for coping people

name: Can You Beat the Square?
summary: Are you ready to beat the square? Grab a friend and try it!

name: Cache-Cache
summary:
Cache-Cache is a co-op puzzle game for two, played on two screens.

Explore a 3D diorama together
Interact with playful digital toys
Find 7 hidden characters

name: Cat Walker Simulator
summary: Don't tell me you never think of walking a cat!! A cute 2 player cooperative game.

name: Cautionary Tale
summary: A parable about agency, and how three people choose to navigate it.

name: Captain Hookfoot
summary: A small point-and-click puzzle/adventure game made by a group of college students

name: Candypink
summary: A perfectly normal cooking game.

name: Carpet Diem
summary: Come and pick up dead bodies

name: Can A Cute Ghost Story Be Spooky?
summary: A parody HORROR Halloween game!

name: Campus Life
summary: In Campus Life you’ll create your own college freshman. Experience the hardships of college in this amusing and engaging life sim game. Study hard and party even harder. Join a fraternity to meet new interesting individuals. It is entirely up to you how your academic career will progress!

name: Castaway
summary: A little project made by 4 friends.

name: Candy Cutter
summary: Collect candy around eery suburbs while a killer is looking for you!

name: Car Game
summary: a short piece of postcard-ware about dreams and automobiles

name: Cathy's Crafts: Platinum Edition
summary: Cathy is chasing the dreams of others instead of her own. Should she stay and run the family hardware store or join her boyfriend in New York and become an art buyer?

name: Candied Carols
summary: A wintry, magical holiday romance
