summary: Two cats who want to see each other explode. One bomb to end it all. One winner.

name: Cats n Wires
summary:
reconnect wires to save your cats

from this mysterious world!

name: Cat Train
summary: An idle way to save cats and make happiness. Rescue stray cats! With your train. Cat Train is an idle game where you rescue lost cats with your train and drop them off at Cat Cafes. 100 different pet types to collect, each with their own personality. Saving pets, making happiness!

name: Candy Scabs
summary: It's the Void's birthday! Bring candy and presents, or else...!!

name: Cats are Assholes
summary: Cats are Assholes is a shelter simulation game made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 40. All you have to do is to take great care of your beloved stray cats. If you fail, they will eat you, plain and simple. Make sure the fridge and the bowls are always full of fish, empty the litter boxes, buy extra equipment and upgrade your existing fridge capacity. Be sure to use Mark, your grandson, as often as possible! That's basically how you do multi-tasking in this house.

name: Cart Farmer
summary: Farm the sharecart. Cart Farmer is a SHARECART1000 compatible adventure game. It was made over 48 hours for Teacart1k game jam. You're a lonely farmer who watches over a modest plot of land. One day you notice your grounds seem to be controlled by forces outside your universe...

name: CardioCasino
summary: Where slots define your childhood.

name: Candy Coven
summary: A cute "Metroidvania" where you defend yourself with candy. Are you the chosen one?

name: Campfire
summary: Relax, & play guitar or djembe around the campfire. 1-2 players.

name: Cat Dance
summary: tap dance like you mean it

name: Cannon
summary: Cannon is a platform game featuring one bullet, and one button to play. This cannon has only one way to get around.

name: Cards and Castles 2
summary: Collectible cards spring to life in this wacky Tactical CCG. Assemble a deck to challenge your friends and rivals, and engage in glorious CARD BATTLES! Will you choose fearsome dragons, or the deadly squirrels?

name: Calm Horizon
summary: In this calm sailing adventure, you'll use different navigation techniques to find the island Mystico. You'll get hints from different island villagers or debris you find along your journey. Use the sun, stars and your guts to find the right way around this vast ocean to find your next goal. But you could also just sail in one direction and take a few deep breaths to relax for a few minutes.

name: Candied Violets
summary: Candied Violets is a role playing game full of cooperation and fun. Roll to generate your woodland characters and try not to set anything on fire. Share your triumphs and your failures with those you love, and maybe a nice cup of tea!

name: Cat & Potat!
summary: Cat & Potat! is an action game featuring hand-drawn assets, smooth animation and an original score.

name: Castle & Myosotis
summary: Castle & Myosotis is a visual novel about gods, destiny, war between two nations, and an undecided pair of lovers.

name: Cairn
summary: Go on a ritual hike with your mother in Cairn, a ruminant poem-game.

name: Cats on Mars
summary: Play a dancing space cat in this pixel rhythm RPG!

name: Candles
summary: Candles, a 2D RPG inspired puzzle game. Take control of Jane as you uncover her house for what it truly is.

name: Capiophobia
summary: 2D point and click horror game.

name: Carpocalypse
summary: Fast-paced endless runner with various cars on a post-apocalyptic road.

name: Capacocha
summary: Local Multiplayer Ball Game !

name: Captain Explosion
summary: A platform shooter with explosions and non-stop action!

name: CastleClysmic
summary: A 1-4 player local multiplayer game

name: Cars vs. TNT
summary: Drive with A/D. Speed up and slow down with W/S. Don't explode, and make it to the finish quickly! Cars vs. TNT is an arcade racing game that was made in 1 hour 45 minutes. Your high score will be saved to the local device.

name: Castle Life
summary: Castle Life - A game about castle defense, in which the player accumulates money, buys archers and swordsmen for defense, improves his castle, collects gold, calls for rockfalls and fights off catapults.

name: Catch it!
summary: Collect strawberries and beware of bombs! 3 difficulty levels and other modes are waiting for you!

name: Cactus McCoy and the Curse of Thorns
summary:
A treasure hunter for hire, with a curse on his soul, and a bounty on his head.

The ancient Curse of Thorns has taken hold of its latest victim, a man now known across the Wild West as Cactus McCoy. It all started when McCoy was hired by Hex Hatfield to find the Thorned Emerald. Unaware of the jewel's curse, McCoy was transformed into a walking, talking, brawling cactus. Now it is a race against time to bring the Thorned Emerald back to its proper home before Cactus McCoy is turned to a lifeless stone cactus.

This platforming brawler game will have you wielding tons of weapons as you traverse a strange Wild West world of hidden treasures and seemingly endless enemigos. Can you become the toughest Cactus in town, and break the ancient Curse of Thorns?

name: Call to Victory
summary: Call to Victory is a World War II themed first person shooter game. It was developed in 6 days for the TGMBRJAM 5th edition.

name: Cannon Momento
summary: A cannon that will fire at any moment!! Try to avoid the cannon balls by jumping at the correct time.

name: Call of Gruty WWII
summary: Call of Gruty WWII is a cancelled action shooter game featuring zombies during World War II.

name: Cake Cat
summary: Be a cat! Eat cake! Avoid donuts!

name: Cactus Mayhem
summary: Survive against waves of furry enemies.

name: Cafe Space Angel
summary: What on earth is this place... Cafe Space Angel?

name: Catapult
summary: What does a hungry cat do to get some food? Go to the moon of course.

name: Catty Shack
summary:
The cats that live in your cat shelter have run away, and you'll need to meet their ridiculous demands before they'll follow you home again.
Also, you are a ghost.

name: Cat Nap
summary: Be a cat, get pet, take a nap.

name: Catana
summary: Guide Catana as he masters the attacks that will save not only the monastery but also the world beyond it. With point-and-click simplicity, you'll create matches that eliminate groups of enemies, unleash powerful special attacks and take down crafty bosses.

name: Captain's Room
summary: Search the oceans for mystical artifacts.

name: Can You Escape: Deluxe
summary:
Can You Escape - Deluxe a long-awaited sequel for legendary Can You Escape game has been released!
Are you ready to take your room escape experience to a whole new level?
This brand new escape game is all about cracking codes, discovering secret hints and items, finding answers to riddles and puzzles and most important - escaping from all the rooms.
If you are looking for a real adventure and you are ready to put yourself to a test then download this free and popular puzzle game now!

name: Can You Escape: Island
summary: If you think that this island is deserted, then you are mistaken. You were thrown on the island shore after surviving a terrible shipwreck. Now you need to find a way to get out from this island. In this Escape game you'll have to wade through the wild jungle inhabited by predators, ancient temples full of deadly traps, abandoned pirate fort and many more. Solve puzzles, find secret items and then you'll have a chance to get out from this island alive. Each level is a unique location - so don't think it'll be an easy journey for you.

name: Can You Hear the Echo?
summary: a poetry twine game about my gender

name: Car Drawing Game
summary: A 2D Physics Drawing Puzzle o-o

name: Cat Boy's Stellar Journey
summary: Join cat boy as he travels through the stars on his way to meet his sister. Along the way, relax at a hot spring and pick flowers in a meadow. Cat Boy's Stellar Journey is a tiny adventure game about traveling and the things we leave behind...

name: Catfishing Cuties
summary: Catfish to collect a bunch of fish dates!

name: Cappuchino Spoontforce Deluxe VI: Girl of the Boiling Fury
summary: Wrath of the coffee cup girl

name: Captain Alexia
summary: if only you could read to the monsters

name: Capacity
summary: Is your friend worth saving from the evil castle?

name: Can You Escape 2
summary:
You're browsing the web in search of a new apartment. There are a lot of offers, but you can't find anything that suits your taste. Then you see a bunch of amazing offers with the same real estate agent's phone number. You dial the number and the agent instantly schedules an appointment in an hour.
Little did you know that this will be an adventure. You'll have to solve puzzles, break the codes and use your logic to escape from each room!

name: Cat Stories: New Year
summary: A small interactive hidden objects game about a cat who slept through everything and now has to prepare for the New Year in the shortest possible time while the owner is not at home. Puzzles, mini-games and a festive mood await you.

name: Campaign Antietam
summary: Many battles preceded and followed, but none would be so costly on both sides as Antietam. No more would citizen soldiers populate both armies. Rather, they would now be known as professional veterans. For the Confederacy, the brilliance of Robert E. Lee would be needed to keep the southern army alive. Opposing him, a series of union generals would be tried. Many would fail. In the end, George McClellan would be called upon, a second time, to save the Union. Will he succeed, or will Lee lead southern armies to victory?

name: Campaign Gettysburg
summary: It is the crossroad of the War between the States. July 1, 1863, dawns hot and bright in southeastern Pennsylvania. General Lee had slipped behind the Union Armies, which were moving south to engage them in what many believed, then and now, to be the climactic battle of the American Civil War.

name: Cat of Khronos
summary: Use four-dimensional space-time thinking and time travel ability to eat the fish within the specified time and return to the original position, while avoiding the guards' pursuit.

name: Car Detailing Simulator
summary: In Car Detailing Simulator, you have the chance to renew and restore shine to any car, commissioned by demanding customers! A good and well-kept car can be the pride of every car owner! Clean, polish and admire your car creations in this highly realistic game where every detail counts!

name: Cast-n-Blast
summary: A top-down arena shooter about a mage who wants to be best of the best

name: Cards with Personalities
summary: A singleplayer deckbuilding game full of charm.

name: Castle Watch VR
summary: An asymmetrical PC vs VR multiplayer game with archery and magic.

name: Cards +1
summary: Minimalist puzzle card game completely free and without ads.

name: Castle Defense
summary: Tiny strategy game about defending a castle. Please read the description on the game page

name: Cards of the Bog
summary: Strategic deckbuilder inspired by Into the Breach!

name: Cat Architect
summary: Help Cat Architect to rebuild his world!

name: Can You Save the World?
summary: Help against the Coronavirus Pandemic !

name: Castle Morihisa
summary: Castle Morihisa is a roguelike strategic deck-builder. You need to build up your deck through constant battles, acquire powerful talents, and wield the power of the Fallen Heroes to unveil the truth behind the rebellion in Castle Morihisa. When facing difficulties, you could also ask for assistance from the Sengoku fallen heroes with different skills, which could give you an edge during the battles.

name: Cake Clicker
summary: A Fun Little Idle Game, Bake And Sell Them To Make Money!

name: Capsule Lock
summary: Puzzle adventure game with eye candy graphic style. Can you solve all of the 48 puzzles ?

name: Campfire
summary: a small camp fire, for getting away.

name: Cats and Coins
summary: A retro-styled platform game in which you have to collect all coins to unlock the exit. You can make your own levels!

name: C.A.L.O.R.I.E.S. 9000
summary: Cats Always Lunch Over Risky Immeasurable Enormous Sandwiches

name: Cat or Ice Cream?
summary: Think you can tell the difference?

name: Cave Story MD
summary: This is a rewrite/port of the popular freeware game Cave Story for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis.

name: Cathedrals' Treasures
summary: Learn about Cathedral Acoustics with Kunnuth the gargoyle

name: Call of the Winter Monarch
summary: Hand painted puzzle game set in the dead of winter.

name: Cashand Case
summary: Cashand Case is a mystery and investigative game, in the visual novel style, where the player is a detective hired to investigate the murder of a mobster head of a wealthy family during the 60's. The main idea of the game is to investigate the mansion and surroundings, where the player must look for clues, solve puzzles and talk to suspects. With each passing day, another murder can happen and the number of leads may increase as well.

name: Capricious
summary: Capricious is an adventure puzzle-platformer game about the adventures of C-137. The multiverse has collapsed, objects form other dimensions are everywhere and gravity keeps shifting. Collect all the shards and find the exit on your journey to set the universe right and save your world.

name: Captain Rixot: Lost on Enceladus
summary: DOS style retro platformer.

name: Catroom Drama: Case 1
summary: Catroom Drama Episode 1 - The Eager Eater

name: Catroom Drama: Case 2
summary: Catroom Drama Episode 2 - The Great Poop Off

name: Candies in the Snow
summary: A coming of age story about old memories and new beginnings.

name: Candy Wrapper
summary: 20 Levels of Screen-Wrapping Arcade Action!

name: Caterwaul
summary: It's the summer of 80-something, and a kitty band's dreaming of making it big

name: Carrot
summary: 20 minutes long. Point and click your way through a short story which involves a magnifying glass, strawberries, flowers, unicorns and a carrot.

name: Cardlock
summary: Deckbuilding Meets Tactics Roguelike!

name: Cart Crawlers
summary: A TF2 themed rouge lite. Similar in gameplay to Nuclear Throne.

name: Caravella's Critical Crisis
summary: A game inside a game inside a flashback inside a podcast inside an alternate timeline.

name: Can't Sleep
summary: Looks like you have a visitor here tonight

name: Catching Fairies
summary: A short VN for NaNoRenO 2021

name: Catnip
summary: A groovy feline rhythmn game for the 2019 Epic MegaJam

name: Cain
summary: A downloadable game for Windows, Mac & Linux

name: Cafe Crawlers
summary: Fantasy Hipster Barista Simulator

name: Cake Kills Candy
summary: Proceduraly Generated Platform Shooter Arcade Game

name: Calm Forest
summary:
Calm Forest is a short horror story about looking for the way home.

Will you find it?

name: Castle Rush
summary: Pick up fast your brick's !

name: Casadastra
summary: Tread with see-through plan into the ocean of the night.

name: Canine Cravings
summary: Cooperate (or sabotage) each other with these 2 adorable tug-of-war puppies!

name: Cave Story's Secret Santa
summary: After Balrog recovers the Christmas presents that were stolen by Chaba, the cowardly Mimiga named Santa must sneak into every house and return the missing packages. Be the Mimiga Who Saves Christmas!

name: Cats Love Heat
summary: Yet another hardcore platformer about cats but this time their goals are realistic

name: Catch Hina
summary: Hina needs you! Help her reach Nitori in this game that screams kawaii!

name: Candle Prick
summary: Puzzle game about using your enemies as extensions of yourself

name: Cat Box Paradox
summary: A fast paced retro platform game, you must think fast as you run, jump and swap colour, making your way through 8 floors of challenging and amusing colour changing mayhem.

name: Cartoon Network: Trick or Treat Beat!
summary: It is Halloween! Time to scare people and demand sweets! Choose a character and together with a character from Cartoon Networks go to people's houses to demand candies! Collect as many candies as you can. The more candies you collect, the more points you will get!

name: Can't Let Go
summary: Can't Let Go is a 2d narrative platformer. Connect with the heart and mind of the protagonist and help them work through a tough part of their life with simple timing-based gameplay.

name: Call of Saregnar
summary: Call of Saregnar is a nod to the era of party-based RPGs from the 90's. Follow an intriguing story with interesting characters in a unique low-fantasy medieval setting. Enjoy a lush handcrafted 3D world that just begs to be explored. The graphics are charmingly old-school with billboard trees and a low-poly 3D world. All the characters are photographs and frame sequences of real actors, that you can interact with, see them in the world, and fight with. The combat system is a turn-based hex grid affair with many tactical options.

name: Calamity
summary: Conundrums mixed within the deteriorating setting of one of Earth's last thriving cities - City 17. Explore a hidden story twist in the climax of the mod, and enjoy every minute of the exploration and fighting. Thank you for downloading.

name: Call of the Sea: Journey Edition
summary:
Call of the Sea is a first-person adventure puzzle game set in the 1930's that tells the story of Norah, a woman on the trail of her missing husband's expedition. The search takes place on a strange but beautiful island in the South Pacific, filled with secrets waiting to be unearthed. It’s an otherworldly tale of mystery, adventure, and self-discovery.

The Journey Edition of Call of the Sea includes:
- Game: Call of the Sea
- Box Collector
- Billet De Voyage
- 2 Photographies
- Concept Art
- 3 x Lithographies
- Disque Vinyle
- Poster
-Artbook

name: Cantrip
summary: Battle, build your deck and earn new cards in this roguelite where your hand is your health: if you get hit when you don't have any cards, it's game over. If you prevail, however, you get to draft new cards for your deck before moving on to the next fight.

name: Canyon Defense
summary: A free web browser tower defense game.

name: Capybara Spa
summary: Build your own capybara spa in this cute point and click simulation game! Grow fruits, craft soaps and clean towels to pamper the capybaras during their visit. Furnish the mountain with gardens, baths and decorations to design the best capybara spa!

name: Caduceus
summary:
Two-player competitive snake. Eat the food to make the snake big before times run out.
Do not let the snake hit the wall or itself or each other. Try to have the biggest snake!

name: Cat Tower
summary:
In Cat Tower, your grandmother has gone on a trip around the globe and has trusted you with taking care of her kittens. But you know what they say: "One is never enough!"

Play with them, feed them and love them!

name: Calm Down, Will
summary: Explore most haunted places everyone is sick of, the looping hallway and the abandoned hospital. Play Timmy to discover the boring truth. But when Angry Will goes there, the dark secret will be revealed. Of curse, Will is neither a family killer nor an investigative journalist.

name: Cartoon Tower Defense
summary: Prepare for intense and epic battles in this Tower Defense game with many different sceneries and toon characters. Upgrade your archers, enjoy magics, spells, super arrows and other power-ups, and defend your fortresses from barbarians. With its simple yet very addictive gameplay and its superb realization, Cartoon Tower Defense will offer you many hours of pure joy. Get Ready!

name: Cape's Escape Game 5th Room
summary: Cape's Escape Game 5th Room is a short adventure game in the Cape's Escape series, which you can complete in an hour or so. Solve the mystery and breakout from the escape game of Cape's dreams.

name: Castle of the Red Prince
summary: Castle of the Red Prince is a small text adventure with a different perspective on how locations can work in a parser game.

name: Catalypse
summary:
Catalypse is an arcade, side scrolling shooter with a sci-fi theme.
Players pilot a small space fighter through five stages collecting four types of power-ups including a spread-shot weapon, a large laser beam and ricocheting laser.

name: Camp Wars
summary: First-person shooter, science fantasy. Slime Weapons. No deaths.

name: Carrier Commander
summary: Advance from Commander to Fleet Admiral while in charge of the USS Nimitz (CVN-68) - a supercarrier of the United States Navy, and the lead ship of her class. Manage your Carrier's Assets and Resources to defend yourself from enemy engagements and advance your Naval Career. 15 Levels of challenge!

name: Cataplexy
summary: Waking up at night, the main character realizes that he cannot move. A terrible sense of panic gradually overtakes his mind, and the imagination begins to paint frightening pictures.

name: Catch them!
summary: Catch them is the simplest and exciting game that will help develop your attentiveness. You have to play as a hen catching different fruit and avoid uneatable food.

name: Captain U
summary: Welcome to this new, yet familiar, universe. You are now known as Captain U and you are here to locate the missing princess! Equipped with this universe's legendary weapon, the PowerPad, you will utilize your unique powers to find the princess and save the universe! Adventure through 9 challenging levels and explore some familiar areas with a new twist! Utilize your new founded PowerPad Powers to create or move platforms or defeat enemies. Play on the big screen or the small screen - switch between screens during game play. Try to get the highest score possible!

name: Card Storm Idle
summary: Card Storm Idle is an incremental game with both idle and active play-styles. Research and craft card deсks to earn as many resources as possible! Build up your power and see how far you can get. Bring the card storm down on monsters!

name: Castaway
summary: Stranded on a mysterious island, it is up to you to restore peace to its villagers. Become a powerful warrior - growing your powers and abilities through over 50 quests across a distinct and visually stylized world. Discover and raise loyal pets that will fight by your side in this unique action RPG. Customize your appearance as you gain new armor and weapons from wooden sticks to elemental swords.

name: Castle Escape
summary: 'Castle Escape' is a 2D action Metroidvania with a brutal combat system. Discover the dark secrets, find treasures, and explore dangerous dungeons. Fight your way through the cursed castle, find treasures, upgrade skills, execute the damned souls and unravel the mystery of this once mighty castle.

name: Cat Town
summary: Become a leader who leads the cat herd, build your base, upgrade your buildings, resist bad weather, cultivate better offspring, resist the plunder of wild animals, lie down and roll the cat in a relaxed atmosphere, or become a person to enjoy the scenery

name: Cattenburg
summary: Lead a party of cats on adventures in a beautifully illustrated and original card combat game.

name: Card Adventure
summary: Explore a uniquely generated world, fight monsters with cards and build up a kingdom.

name: Cat Swap Tiles
summary: Help a little but brave kitten - to find his friend on an extraordinary journey through some stunning, yet dangerous and challenging places, all gathered in this relaxing swapping puzzle game. No score, no timer and no pressure.

name: Cats of War
summary:
Welcome to a world where CATastrophic events are about to happen - War is coming!
Pick your cat and go up against your friends in epic tank battles across the world.

name: Cat Adventure
summary: Cat Adventure is a side scrolling game. In the game you will find the most difficult levels and the most dangerous traps!!! If you like challenging and colorful platformers, then don't pass up this game. Playing as a funny cat, you have to go through many interesting and difficult levels!

name: Canvas of a Rainy Day
summary:
It will rain today. It rains all the time these days.
This is a story of protagonist who delivers a painting tool to another person who draws a paining.

name: Cave Crawler
summary: Cave Crawler is a short, 2D side-scrolling action platformer. Explore caves filled with interesting enemies and fun platforming challenges.

name: Cat and Fish
summary: You are a brave cat who got lost in the forest in search of food. You have to collect all the food, while getting out of the forest alive. Be careful, because the forest is full of various traps and obstacles!

name: Cards Infinity
summary: Play Cards Infinity, an endless card game with zero ads and purchases.

name: Card Escape: Plane Crash
summary: There was a disaster, your plane crashed into the very center of the forest. And now we need to get out healthy. You will find a lot of cards with different effects, both negative and positive. Survive...

name: Cats and Jigsaws
summary: This is a cats-themed 2D jigsaw puzzle that includes a level challenge mode and a daily challenge mode. All you have to do is assembling the cats in different squares into a whole according to the needs. In addition, a diary feature has been added. Enjoy the healing effect brought by the cute cats!

name: Car Tuning Simulator
summary: Car Tuning Simulator is designed so that you can create, modify and paint your own, luxury car, and then go to the track to test it in action!

name: Calice
summary:
Calice, presented to you by the independent development team Ra:8bit Studio.
Bring everyone the excitement of rhythm games.
Dive into a world composed of all kinds of music - a journey awaits.

Game Features
- Masterfully made original music
- Attractively crafted charts
- Attractively assembled animated backgrounds

name: Catnight
summary: Catnight is an online multiplayer third-person perspective game that will heat up any party. You will not only fight with your opponents and the enormous amount of furry bullets in the air, but you will also need to survive special gameplay circumstances, which will make every match more dynamic and funnier.

name: Cardstock
summary: Craft a powerful deck and dive into battle against monsters in turn-based combat combined with isometric tile movement. Explore a freshly generated Crypt in every run, ensuring each playthrough will be a unique test of skill!

name: Casual Pixel Warrior
summary: Survive the waves! Buy weapons and ammo! Unlock new stages! Purchase companions! Solve daily quests and get rewards! Casual Pixel Warrior is a wave shooter where your endurance to last an infinite fight depends on your skill, unlocked weapons and purchased ammo.

name: CatNab
summary: The cat's outta the bag! That's why we're bringing a barrel. Compete for high scores by nabbing as many cats as you can.

name: Castle of Secrets
summary: The Castle with Secrets - a game with a deep and mysterious storyline, beautiful 3D environments with intricately hand-drawn 2D characters, unique gameplay and mechanics, will immerse you in a fairy tale of reality and mystery. How will this fairy tale end? It's your call.

name: Can You Escape
summary: A physics based puzzle, clicker & small automation game. Figure out how to escape, because no-one is coming to help you...

name: Castlepoint
summary: Castlepoint, an immersive fantasy & medieval strategy game similar to chess and old-style action-based real time strategy games. Conquer enemy areas, without allowing them to enter yours!

name: Catherine Ragnor and the Legend of the Flying Dutchman
summary: After falling victim to a curse, Captain Hendrick van der Decken of the Flying Dutchman is doomed to sail the seas for eternity. However, a chance encounter with another cursed pirate shows him a chance to find salvation. Play this thrilling Match3 adventure and help Captain van Decken.

name: Cattails: Wildwood Story
summary: Lead your colony of cats into the mysterious Wildwood. Stalk prey to find food, defend your new home from dark intruders, and discover fresh herbs & ancient treasures. Build a thriving town for all cats to call home. Get to know the residents, fall in love, and raise a litter of kittens!

name: Cards of Patience
summary: Cards of Patience combines solitaire-like gameplay with RPG and roguelite elements. Choose your hero and fight against a variety of enemies by destroying all their cards. Use different levelable spells and equip yourself with powerful items and potions.

name: Casual Pro Wrestling
summary: Casual Pro Wrestling is a professional wrestling game with an emphasis on fun. It blends intuitive controls inspired by genre classics with ragdoll physics for added fun and drama. It features couch and online multiplayer and offers a plethora of possibilities for customization.

name: Camelot: Wrath of the Green Knight
summary: Camelot: Home of King Arthur’s court… and intrigue! When the Lady of the Lake goes missing, her husband the Green Knight blames King Arthur, threatening the peace of Camelot for all…

name: Catellite-609: Feline Space Adventure
summary: Help the cats find alien friends! By exploring space using "Catellite-609" cats will be able to: build rooms, upgrade "Catellite-609" facilities, and develop a cat crew. Enjoy a unique space adventure!

name: Casino Tycoon Simulator
summary: Upgrade your casino and become millionaire! Manage your Slots, BlackJacks, Roullettes, and many more. Protect your casino against thieves and cheaters.Want more? jump into mining market or build your dream nightclub!

name: Carnage Offering
summary: In 2527 in a dystopian world, Jake, an engineer and bounty hunter, travels to the far reaches of the universe through a wormhole. With the help of his friend Roy, Jake's goal is to exterminate the replicator robots that threaten the Confederate planets.

name: Cat Clicker
summary: The Ultimate Cat Clicking Experience

name: Cannon Canines
summary: Cannon Canines is a 3D, mini-tank driving, action-adventure game! Play as a Cannon Canine, and join a crew of freedom-fighting animals in the Pawpad Isles in order to free your friends from a tyrannical megacorporation!

name: Captain Jackson
summary: Dynamic 2D retro, pixel-art, shooter. Fly fast, shoot accurately. Fight back the Rivanirs invasion. You are the Captain Jackson, you are their Doom.

name: Catoise
summary: Make portals and levitate objects to solve puzzles - help Catoise get back home after a shopping trip in space ends in a crash landing. Collect parts of the damaged ship scattered across this strange planet. Meet friendly and unfriendly animal characters along the way.

name: Captain Diarrhea and the Shartening
summary: A top-down action shooter/sprayer. Use gross and weird movement mechanics and abilities. Enact revenge on the black military division that abducted you and made you the way that you are. BRING FORTH THE SHARTENING.

name: Carnage Cross
summary: Start your engines in the vehicular combat game Carnage Cross, with seven playable drivers, nine levels, and an arsenal of weapons, specials and rogue-like abilities at your disposal in story or skirmish modes, your hi-octane skills will uncover secrets of the mysterious and destructive contest.

name: Cartels
summary: Cartels is a tactical hardcore multiplayer first person shooter taking place in 1980s Colombia. Experience a variety of intense objective focused versus and cooperative game modes where a single bullet is often enough to win the fight.

name: Call For Backup
summary: Defend USA in a post-apocalyptic war against ghouls and commies. While some are in control of combat drones, one person becomes the commander. Ground forces rely on the commander's air support, but he can’t see the battlefield. Communication is crucial! Single-player campaign included!

name: Calamity Eliminator
summary: Calamity Eliminator is an anime-styled roguelike single-player deck-building game.You play as a member of the Existence Management Company, using the Calamity Eliminator to lead pioneers and Valkyries to save the day on a planet that has been struck by disaster.

name: Caveman Hunt
summary: Caveman hunt - hunt dinosaurs of the ancient world in this platformer with shooter elements. Shoot dinosaurs from primitive times to gain as much meat as possible for your tribe

name: Capelord: Bounty Hunters
summary: Capelord:Bounty Hunter is a multiplayer lateral action shooter for up to 4 players, play campaign missions alone or as a team, compete against other players for loot by defeating the area boss.

name: Cardow!
summary: Cardow! is a simple strategy card game. It combines a card game with turn-based strategy games. Build your way to your opponent and use your deck wisely. It depends not only on the strength of your cards, but also on your tactical skills.

name: Candy Match 3
summary: Introducing Candy Match 3 with unique candies, even more wonderful combinations, challenging game modes and fun!

name: Cat Fish Island
summary: A relaxing adventure of island fishing. Collect wood and fish to build and bait the most amazing fishing rod the world has ever seen. Start your adventure to catch the mythical fish of legend thought to be only an old tale by the island's inhabitants.

name: CannonBall
summary: Cannonball allows you to play an enhanced version of Yu Suzuki's seminal arcade racer, OutRun, on a variety of systems.

name: Catafalque
summary: Catafalque is a first-person survival horror game. Inspired by the masterpieces of the PSOne era, this is a love letter to games of yore. The game is portrayed through simple yet detailed retro graphics carefully arranged with the complexity and depth of modern games, mixed with hardcore and unforgiving, yet fair, mechanics. Explore the unfamiliar world around you, filled with details and secrets to uncover, while engaging in rewarding exploration to uncover the deep lore of this wicked universe.

name: Capcom Fighting Collection
summary: Capcom Fighting Collection is a compilation of arcade versions of ten fighting games originally developed and published by Capcom. It adds new features to the original games such as online play with rollback netcode, training and spectator modes, save states, concept art, design documents, and a music player.

name: Cat Detective Albert Wilde
summary: Cat Detective Albert Wilde is a comedy game, a genre-bending noirish sci-fi mystery set in a fictional version of New York in the 1930's featuring atmospheric black & white vintage visuals, and loveable anthropomorphic characters. Players must muddle their way through a murder mystery that's messier than a fresh hairball, with a captivating voice-over and at least one joke about cat nipples (they have six!).

name: Castle of Alchemists
summary: In Castle of Alchemists, a tower defense/top-down action hybrid game with amazing pixel art graphics, play as the Bellator, alchemically enhanced defender, to fight against invaders from other worlds. Delve into the castle, set your traps, equip powerful weapons and gears, and reclaim the castle piece by piece.

name: Cafe Owner Simulator
summary: Renovate, equip and restore the shine of the food truck that belonged to your father. Create recipes, cook the food and serve customers across an entire city. Customize and upgrade your food truck to reach more customers and expand your menu.

name: Captain Soda
summary: Captain Soda is a charming soda-themed arcade arena shooter about refreshing chemical warfare. Wield weaponized soft drinks to defend earth from waves of invading aliens!

name: Canceled! Super Puzzles Dream
summary: Puzzles move onto the next level with ‘Super Puzzle Dream’, a mix between classic jigsaw and a ‘Tetris’-style dynamic mechanic. Two levels of play, 'senior' and 'junior', guarantee hours of entertainment for all. Become an expert and finish the puzzles in the shortest possible time and you will find yourself amongst the best in the world on the online leaderboard. You can also play with friends and family in the one-on-one split-screen competition mode. Your rival won't make it easy for you!

name: Castle Wars
summary: Castlewars is a turn based card game where your goal is to be the first to build a 100 story castle, you also win by destroying your opponents castle.

name: Candle Knight
summary: Wield your flame to overcome menacing creatures lurking in the shadows of a ruined castle, use the dynamic difficulty system to your advantage, traverse challenging platforming sections and solve cryptic puzzles inside surreal paintings in this 2.5D action adventure platformer.

name: Cat Follow Me
summary: Cat Action Adventure! Find lost cats in the forest and bring them home!

name: Call of Senpai: Waifu Warfare
summary: Take control of the beautiful Miki, and explore the area from the ocean coast, to the deep jungle. Advance through the storyline and fight through various challenges for the title of main waifu and 5 million dollars.

name: Californication
summary: Game inspired by the "Californication" video clip by Red Hot Chili Peppers.

name: Captain CigArrr
summary: Captain CigArrr is a third-person naval combat game where the player has to focus on completing objectives and killing enemies on different maps.

name: Candy Maker
summary: The player will have to lead a difficult life in the production of unusual substances, namely, funny sweets, their sale, laundering dirty money into clean ones. It will also be possible to purchase various goods. But remember, there is a mafia in the game

name: Catacombs of the Yokai
summary: Catacombs of the Yokai is an indie single player psychological survival horror game in which you must explore the twisted depths of randomly generated catacombs filled with enemies inspired by Japanese/Taiwanese urban legends and myths.

name: Campground Owner
summary: Become a campground owner. Manage your camping, have guests, count money.

name: Casino Resort Tower
summary: Casino Resort Tower is a simulation game where you build and manage a casino hotel skyscraper from the ground up. While trying to solve the problems caused by troublesome customers with a CEO that dreams about a luxury office.

name: Castle in the Sky: Clash of Sky Palace
summary: Uncompromising survival & Fantasy World Exploration: You play as Rain, a martial artist who enter a fantasy and unxplored world full of flying rocks, gemstones and surprises. combat with troops that match your survival style. Fight your way out as you unravel the mysteries of this flying island.

name: Camping Builder
summary: Build the camping of your dreams on a tropical island. Discover the secrets of this beautiful, wild place. Work in harmony with nature and the island will reward you, but ignore the rules and be ready to face the consequences.

name: Candy Monsters
summary: Candy Monsters is a match 3 game! Allowing you to make different matches !Create bombs with various effects !Use bats to crush the candy! with more than 500 levels, super fun and challenging! game with over 200 hours of game play! distract and call your friends to have fun! play now

name: Candela
summary: Manipulate colors and conquer challenging puzzles in this mysterious 2D platformer set in a post-apocalyptic world. Explore the overworld, uncover hidden secrets, and bring light to this dark, desolate land

name: Cage: Open
summary:
Konno Teppei suddenly loses consciousness on his way home from work in the evening. He wakes up surrounded by ruins and old buildings. He, along with several other men, are in an abandoned amusement park.

An announcement suddenly informs them that the game is about to begin. The rules are very simple. For 8 days, the participants will continue their normal lives during the daytime. But once night falls, they will be forced into the old amusement park as the setting for their struggle to obtain a coin that will win them fifty million yen.

name: Cage-Face: Case 2 - The Sewer
summary: Find your way out of the sewers while fighting off an unstoppable monster and slowly succumbing to a mysterious illness.

name: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal: Submarines & Torpedo Alley Scenario
summary: Play with submarines and enjoy a new scenario.

name: Cast
summary: Applauding, the cast is ready. Lighting, the shadow is sneaky. Tabing, the final is blurry. Ending, the future is dizzy.

name: Cassiodora
summary: Cassiodora is a medieval fantasy game inspired by classic shoot 'em up with unique mechanics and epic boss fights. Save the princess Cassiodora by yourself or with up to 2 friends on the same screen.

name: Call of Snakes
summary:
Now is the time to show your ability.
Save the armies and make an army force to defeat an enemy forces.
Call Of Snakes is One of the army wars series.
Call Of Snakes is a shooting game combined with the snake-style game rules.
Don't miss out on an brandnew experience.

name: CastleOfDuck
summary: Evil turtle troops invade a peaceful Ducky planet. Valiant ducky heroes are preparing castle defense against invasion of Turtle troops. Get ready for battle to save Ducky Planet by helping duckies out.

name: Cat Museum
summary: Immerse yourself in the bizarre art style and the surreal world of Cat Museum, a 2D side-scrolling puzzle-adventure game. Solve the strange puzzles with your mischievous cat, and unveil the truth behind the mysterious museum.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - Collection 1
summary:
Redeploying with an arsenal of content unlike any in franchise history, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3’s first downloadable “Collection” arrives stockpiled with not only four Multiplayer/Survival Mode Maps, but two Special Ops Missions—the first time Call of Duty has ever made Special Ops downloadable online.

Armed with just this one content pack, players can choose between heading to a militarized Central Park in Liberation, destroying scenic vistas in a seaside Italian getaway in Piazza, raining glass on New York passersby from 70-stories-up in Overwatch, and battling beside a downed Air Force One in Black Box.

As if that breadth of multiplayer variety wasn’t enough, fans of Special Ops can hop aboard snowmobiles to infiltrate a diamond mine in Black Ice or head to India, where Negotiator will leave the fate of hostages in their hands.

In a class of its own with half-a-dozen forms of content, Modern Warfare 3’s first downloadable “Collection” offers a range of combat and co-op the likes of which has never been seen before.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - Collection 2
summary: The second Modern Warfare 3 DLC Collection launches with all-new Multiplayer/Survival Mode Maps, Special Ops Missions and the debut of Face Off maps. Totally new to the franchise, Face Off distills all the fun and intensity of multiplayer into a new breed of 1 vs. 1 and 2 vs. 2 close combat. In addition to this all-new game-play experience, Collection 2 deploys with 3 multiplayer maps and 2 Special Ops Missions (Iron Clad and Kill Switch), offering fans new venues to test their Multiplayer and Special Ops skills.

name: Can You Escape?
summary: Can you escape is a 2D flat design, challenging, physics-based platformer game. You're a small bouncing ball that must escape from red ojects. You will discover all sorts of physics features; such as a sea of tiny blocks, blocks moving like elevators, falling ones, bouncing ones... You’ll find yourself fully immersed, trying to control your speed in order to escape.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - Collection 3: Chaos Pack
summary: With its third DLC Collection, Modern Warfare 3 drops a combat-heavy care package of Special Ops Chaos mode, 4 new Special Ops missions (Arctic Recon, Light 'Em Up, Special Delivery, and Vertigo), and 3 Face Off maps (Intersection, U-Turn, and Vortex) for the ultimate trifecta in solo and co-op gameplay. High-altitude Special Ops challenges put tactical skills to the test, with players navigating armed drones above a Russian destroyer and evading RPGs from the roof of a helicopter-swarmed hotel. Upping the ante further, Face Off firefights pit players head-to-head on a six-lane stretch of desert highway, at an abandoned crossroads near a New York overpass, and near the path of a violent tornado.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3 - Collection 4: Final Assault
summary: Saluting Modern Warfare 3's Season of Content, the fourth and final DLC collection deploys with five all-new Multiplayer Maps. Surrounded by mountains, "Gulch" sends combatants into a forgotten mining town with only mine shafts and equipment sheds for cover. The Jersey coast awaits in "Boardwalk," where fun in the sun means facing enemies on the beach. Players must earn their sea legs in "Off Shore" and "Decommission," where deadly oceanic oil rigs and a maze of rotting ocean liners provide the perfect setting for shoreline-based combat. Rounding out the collection is a trip to New Orleans’ war-torn French Quarter, where "Parish" pits players against one another amid the city's rubble.

name: Candylight
summary: A spooky themed non-combative RPG with visual novel elements.

name: Case Clicker
summary: CaseClicker is an incremental clicker game based around csgo and the jackpot/skin community. The goal is to open cases and get rich.

name: Casting Hearts
summary:
Casting hearts is a long-distance visual novel about magic, anxiety, and connection.

It's your girlfriend's birthday, but you can't meet up in person. Try to make the best of things so that the night can still be a magical one.

name: Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions
summary: "Captain Velvet Meteor: The Jump+ Dimensions" is a Tactical Adventure game. Our gameplay is divided between free-roaming exploration segments and strategic battles with light puzzle & stealth elements.

name: Cataclysm: Bright Nights
summary: Cataclysm: Bright Nights is an open source fork of Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead. Bright Nights emphasizes game balance and interesting combat with heavier sci-fi aspects over grounded realism focused simulation of Cataclysm:DDA. Additionally Bright Nights contains a lot of rebalanced and reworked game mechanics, optimizations and Quality of Life features to make gameplay more fluid and enjoyable.

name: Card Girl Army
summary: Card Girl Army is a cartoon-style turn-based card game. Each card has different skills and attributes, players need to collect more cards to grow their team.

name: CannonBall
summary: "CannonBall" is a casual shooting game that trains the nerve reflex ability. Operate the mouse to rotate the turret, shoot bullets to hit the ball, and pass the level within a limited number of times!

name: Capture Creatures
summary: Welcome to the Capture Mansion, home of Capture Creatures. Here you can fill your collection and explore the mansion, all while risking your deck. No matter how skilled you are, there's a place for you in the Capture Mansion. Remember, whether you win or lose, just try to have fun!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Hot Rod Remastered
summary: Hot Rod Remastered DLC is a remastered version of Petard Games DLC for Car Mechanic Simulator 2018 and it includes 5 cars

name: Casebook 1899: The Leipzig Murders
summary: Leipzig 1899 - A German city on the threshold of the 20th century characterised by industrialisation, progress and innovation. But the darker sides include theft, robbery and murder. Detective Joseph Kreiser takes up the fight against crime.

name: Cactus Simulator: Bofete Stories
summary: Your mission, and your pleasure too and sometimes your angry reason, is to touch infinitely a cactus, something that you can't do in real life. Click without hurt yourself with the nails and discover the Bofete Stories. Your assistant will wear gloves, no worries.

name: Café Stella and the Reaper's Butterflies
summary: Takamine Kousei was living a carefree college life until, one day, he tragically died in an accident. But then, the bizarre happened: Takamine Kousei opened his eyes again. And what's more, when he woke up, it was the morning of the very day, he had died.

name: Catharsis
summary: Descend deep in the dungeons of Catharsis to reclaim what you've lost. Dive into this First Person Dungeon Crawler featuring a grim aesthetic with a heavy focus on character growth, exploration and customization!

name: Cat Adventure 2
summary: Do you love complex platform games with beautiful graphics? Then the game Cat Adventure 2 will be a real find for you. In this game you will face the most difficult traps and obstacles that you will encounter on the way. Pass the most difficult levels and rush to victory in this game!

name: Castillo: Shattered Mirror
summary: Castillo Shattered Mirrors is a Gothic FPS and Collectathon. Battle legions of the undead in your quest to defeat Dracula with an arsenal of mythical weaponry. Enter dimensional gates through Dracula's castle and decide which worlds to enter, shards to collect, and bosses to defeat.

name: C.A.P.S.: Cyber Animal Planet Survival
summary: A top-down shooter, where in a post-apocalyptic world called Eltopia, our surviving heroes must save the world by facing terrible enemies that mutated in the collapse. Explore a world full of challenges, collect rewards and defeat bosses on your way.

name: Car Driver Ultimate
summary: Drifting an airport bus on a runway? That’s only one of the exciting things awaiting you here! Dive into a huge location with lots of cool stuff to do, discover a race track, an off-road area and more!

name: Capoeira Legends: Path to Freedom - Chapter 1
summary:
Capoeira Legends is a Brazilian video game developed by Donsoft Entertainment and released in 2009.

The game takes place on the outskirts of Rio de Janeiro, during the year 1828, showing the life of blacks, Indians and whites in the mocambos. Capoeira is a martial art shown as the tool used for the liberation of slaves.

The game's protagonist, Gunga Za, is the protector of Mocambo das Estrelas, whose task is to protect his fortified settlement from rulers and farmers who support slavery.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Karl Heinz Schneider Mission
summary: Karl Heinz Schneider is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Taro Misaki Mission
summary: Taro Misaki is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Hikaru Matsuyama Mission
summary: Hikaru Matsuyama is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Carve Snowboarding
summary:
The creator of 1080 Snowboarding is back with an all new snowboarding experience! Hit the slopes and encounter realistic arcade snowboarding like never before.
There's plenty of gear to find while you make your way through the mountain. Unlock new boards, gloves, and even mixtapes to explore the mountain in style! You can also chill in your cabin to check out your gear and load out for your next run.

name: Card Girl Army II
summary: Card Girl Army II is a cartoon-style turn-based card game. Each card has different abilities and attributes. In the game, you can choose different formations to fight, and the formation can increase the attributes of the cards. Players need to collect more cards to grow their team.

name: Catan
summary: The 2007 Xbox Live Arcade release of Catan, developed by Big Huge Games.

name: CatMxn: Chapter 1
summary: A random guy is thrown into the role as a feline champion. Harnessing the primal power of cats, he must face terrifying trials with his new found powers. This leads him to hunting down cat killers on the dark web.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator: Pocket Edition 2
summary:
Car Mechanic Simulator Pocket Edition 2 challenges players to repair, paint, tune and drive cars. Find classic, unique cars in the new Barn Find module and Junkyard module. Game also includes car auctions where old cars are available for resale or purchased for your collection!

Each mission offers its own unique challenge of varying difficulty and time constraints to meet. Additional tools are available for purchase if needed. You can eventually upgrade your garage to include specific equipment such as lacquer sprayer or a parts warehouse.

name: Camae
summary: Help Camae get his colors back in this action puzzle adventure game. Fight to earn experience to improve your skills and solve a lots of hidden puzzles to get items that will help you on your adventure

name: Castan
summary: Explore an open post-apocalyptic city, delving into buildings and businesses where mutated creatures run rampant, few survivors still operate in reclaimed buildings. Working to pay the mafia will be no easy task, as diving into the dangerous contaminated World to make a profit is a death sentence.

name: Cat Powered UFO
summary: Cat Powered UFO is a blend of turn-based RPG combat and old-school Zelda top-down action. Collect cats, visit crazy dimensions, and be a jerk to NPCs. Find combos of "Illegal bonuses" to break the combat system! Cat Powered UFO is a quirky and light-hearted game with a self-aware sense of humor.

name: Cargo Bridge 2
summary:
Cargo Bridge is back. Build bridges and test your construction skills — Now with more levels, more bridge connections, more cargo and more fun!
Design a blueprint of a bridge and test it when you are done! The game's workers will then try to cross your masterpiece to pick up cargo from the other side of the valley and bring it back. Your goal is to collect all items in each level.

name: Car Mechanic Manager 2023
summary: Car Mechanic Manager is a tycoon management game that lets you manage your own car mechanic business! Build, expand and modernize your car workshop to maintain a good reputation and attract more customers. Manage your business efficiently and destroy the competition!

name: Cat Nips
summary: Cat Nips is a game about a cat eating people to escape an office. This cat will need to sneak past guards, cameras and other dangers in order to escape.

name: Cartomancy Anthology
summary: The Cartomancy Anthology is a virtual tarot deck of 22 games from 22 teams that replicate the actions and experiences of tarot readings by shuffling and drawing cards. Pull a single game, or a spread of three, for a digital reading. Launch and complete each game to collect all the cards and complete your virtual tarot deck!

name: Call of Senpai: Waifu Warfare 2
summary: Take control of Maria, a girl with Ukrainian roots. Explore the open world, complete "GTA-like" quests, your friends and handlers to earn points and qualify for the main "Call of Senpai" tournament. and your friends and handlers to score points and qualify for the main Call of Senpai tournament.

name: Casual Coins
summary: Welcome to Casual Coins. Collect virtual in-game coins for fun in this simple plinko-style arcade game, featuring a satisfying coin-collecting experience with calming gameplay.

name: Catchee
summary:
The simple, happy musical catch em up!
Catch as many Catchables as you can in this happy little musical Catch-Em-Up! Multiply your points with spin flips and go for perfects to max out your score! Play offline too!
Free, addictive, fast gameplay with challenging perfects, loads of songs and Catchee themes to unlock!

name: Camel Up
summary: Witness the craziest camel race of all time, as things really go topsy-turvy when camels stack up and entire pyramids turn upside down. As members of Egyptian high society, you gather in the desert with one simple goal: to gain the most money by backing the right camel to win a leg or even the entire race. However, in this race, it’s not just the lucky ones who can beat the odds. Reading the dynamics of the race and having a good sense of timing is just as important when it comes to backing the right camels and taking the victory.

name: Castle Raid 2
summary:
Castle Raid is back, bigger and more challenging than ever before! In this unique tug-of-war you once again fight to defend your castle against the enemy’s hoard. Get ready to enter the magical world of noble knights and sage wizards, dragons and assassins, and set out on a new epic adventure. Fight your way through the snow covered lands of the Frozen Plains and the beautiful open fields of the Greenlands. Learn the ways of your new enemy, the Reavers - You’ll be seeing a lot of them.
Castle Raid 2 features tons of new exhilarating content guaranteed to knock your socks off. Play against your friend on the same device or take on the challenge of completing the game in campaign mode. With 20 new battlefields, three difficulty modes, gladiator and time challenges, 9 unit classes to choose from and upgrade, you’ll be sure to have a great time!

name: Calm Colors
summary:
In the game you will find 200 low poly illustrations to fill (animals, nature, origami and more), solo mode with hours of soothing gameplay, up to 4 players local co-op mode, a simple and enjoyable way to reduce anxiety and train mindfulness

Discover your inner artist by playing Calm Colors.

name: Captain Sabertooth and the Trials by Fire
summary:
The Captain Sabertooth story follows the adventures of Tiny, in his quest to earn a place on the crew of Captain Sabertooth’s ship, the Dark Lady. Tiny desperately wants to become a pirate but finds it increasingly hard to get the pirates to take him seriously. The Captain and his pirates are hard to impress...

Tiny is challenged in everything from deck-scrubbing to treasure hunts, but makes a new friend in Raven, an Indian girl who stowed away on the Captain’s ship, Tiny sets out to win over the crew of the Dark Lady and earn his place on the ship.

name: Castle of White Night
summary: You play as an adventurer and need to defeat 100 twisted souls to remove the curse in the castle.

name: Castle Raid
summary: Castle Raid is an action packed fantasy strategy game set in medieval times. Challenge your friends and enemies in intense and exciting 5-8 minutes battles or conquer the kingdom by taking all thrones. You have to be smart and strike hard to crush your opponent's castle, but don't forget to defend your own!

name: Cargo Rush
summary: Train enthusiasts, fans of train games, and anyone who likes challenging puzzles, give CargoRush a try! A unique game where you decide whether you can become the CargoRush Master.

name: Castleparts
summary: Classic castle building and cannon shooting strategy is back, but better. Strategically place your walls and shoot the weak points of your opponent. Cast spells to defend yourself or crush your enemies. Convert crystals to gold to supercharge your energy and win!

name: Camper Van Simulator
summary: Get out of your house and begin the adventure today. Feel the summer breeze and prepare for a fun ride!

name: Camp Buddy: Scoutmaster Season
summary: Camp Buddy: Scoutmaster Season is a boys love visual novel that features the adventures of Scoutmaster Yoshinori Nagira proceeding the events of 'Camp Buddy' during the off-season.

name: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest
summary: A Tiger Electronics handheld interpretation of Castlevania II: Simon's Quest. It is similar to the Simon's Quest LCD watch game, but has greater depth.

name: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest
summary: A Tiger Electronics' watch version of Castlevania II: Simon's Quest. The gameplay barely resembles the original from Simon's Quest, so it could be considered a separate game. It was preceded by a more in-depth version in LCD handheld format. It was released in 1988.

name: Castlevania: Symphony of the Night
summary: A simplified version of Castlevania: Symphony of the Night on a Tiger Electronics handheld system. It was released in 1998.

name: Casper
summary: A handheld game based on the movie Casper.

name: Catgirl & Doggirl Cafe
summary: Reborn in a fantasy world you have chosen to open a Japanese-style family restaurant. Instead of buying ingredients, you spend your money rescuing 2 animal-eared girls from a disgusting slaver! Enjoy a heartwarming story of blossoming romance at the Catgirl & Doggirl Cafe.

name: Car Parking Simulator
summary: Drift and Park in Amazing Cars! Maneuver long Buses and make Freight Truck Deliveries! Show your Parking and Driving Skills in 50 Epic Missions at the Multi-Level Parking Lot!

name: Call of DOOM: Black Warfare - Brutal Edition
summary:
MORE Realistic. MORE Tactical. MORE Aggressive. -- Fight the DOOM with Call of Duty weapons. "CALL OF DOOM:BLACK WARFARE"

Players can fight DOOM monsters with high quality firearms imported from the Call of duty universe. Enjoy the greatest violence based on Brutal DOOM.

name: Call of DOOM: Black Warfare - Vanilla Edition
summary:
MORE Realistic. MORE Tactical. MORE Aggressive. -- Fight the DOOM with Call of Duty weapons. "CALL OF DOOM:BLACK WARFARE"

Players can fight DOOM monsters with high quality firearms imported from the Call of duty universe. Vanilla version with no changes to monsters and decorations.

name: Caver
summary: Explore the vast underground world of Caver! Mine, craft, build, farm with up to 8 friends in this compelling action-packed adventure.

name: Calcium Chaos: Derailed
summary: Go on a journey by train to stop the evil necromancer and his skeleton army. Explore, upgrade your train and fight the skeletons with your abnormal weapons in this comical Twin-Stick Adventure game.

name: Cats Love Boxes
summary: Help Fofiño and Lily to move the boxes around in this co-op puzzle adventure.

name: Cactus Cowboy: Plants at War
summary: When the bug army attacked Cacti Island, the Cacti Army deployed you into battle. Together with your comrade Emilio, you fight many battles in the trenches, cities, and woods of Cacti Island, unraveling the story behind the backstabbing attack of the bug army.

name: Cartographer
summary: Cartographer is a turn-based game, where you decide how the world map looks. Build the map to build the world! The combat system is very simple and each enemy has its own attack pattern, which you can learn and exploit to defeat them in glorious turn-based battle!

name: CarX Drift Racing Online: Hit the Wall
summary: Have you ever thought how much damage your car can take?

name: Caution
summary: Caution is a platform game about a caution sign that performs its function masterfully, until a garbageman hijacks it and puts it in a garbage truck. The sign, which in turn, has sworn revenge against the nefarious garbageman.

name: Catch Me!
summary: Compete against your friends in this chaotic 4-player platformer and win the most action loaded game of tag ever! Chase your friends around offices, subways and many other places. Use interactables to change the world and take advantage of the chaos.

name: Catch the Yeti!
summary: Catch the Yeti! is a puzzle game set in a snowy forest where you try to catch, the yeti! Your goal is to corner the yeti by shaking snow off the trees.

name: Castle Dice
summary: Roll & collect resources on your way to building the best kingdom in the land! You have 7 years to train Villagers and build Castle parts, earning you VP. The player with the most VP wins! Play again and again to improve your score and unlock secret characters that you've met throughout your journey. Fun for all ages!

name: Castleclysm TD
summary:
So there's a big Castle, a bunch of really angry peasants, a very irresponsible King, and some out-of-place Magic Casters. Come on! How bad could it be?

Play as one of the Magic Casters and follow their tales of drama, comedy, and mayhem. Deal with mobs of angry peasants that all wish to destroy the Castle... with you inside! It's castleclysm! Do everything you can! Defend yourself with the Castle's many valuable objects - treasure chests, chandeliers, the King's throne and more - or conjure your many crowd sweeping spells to rid the hall of different types of intruders that want you gone! Can you survive the perpetual mayhem known as Castleclysm?

name: Call of Duty: Devil's Brigade
summary: Call of Duty: Devil's Brigade was a canceled third-person shooter for the Xbox 360, PS3 and PC developed by Underground Development. The game was set in World War II, focusing on Italy. In the game, the D-Pad was used to direct orders to the player's squad. These commands were: Assault, Barrage, Hold the line, and Form Up. One screen also showed the player giving a squad member the order to stealth kill an enemy soldier.

name: Cartoon Racing Ultimate
summary:
Take the control of your Cartoon Car, on no less than 20 different tracks!
Improve your experience on each track and increases your XP! Don't forget that: "Without control, Power is nothing!", avoid the Tornadoes! Get as max Rockets and aim well!

name: Castle of Cards
summary:
Relax and build the nicest, the tallest, the most perfect house of cards you can imagine.
You have two 52 cards decks to build (or try to do so) the house of cards of your dreams.
With a perfect balance of realism and simplification it is easy to pick but hard to master.
Pick a scenario from a growing a list to build your Castle of Cards!

name: Call of Antia
summary: Call of Antia is a brand new type of match-3 RPG game. In this unique RPG game, the classic match-3 puzzle will be used to inspire the potential of the dragons and heroes as they charge into the enemies fearlessly. Are you ready? Let's reveal the secret of Antia!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
summary: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II drops players into an unprecedented global conflict that features the return of the iconic Operators of Task Force 141.

name: Cauldron
summary: Plague rages across the land, taking countless souls. Herbs and prayers grant no salvation. Conclusion draws near, there must be some dark power behind this disease. Suspected by most, Malbordus the Death Druid, and his hellish magical cauldron must be standing behind all this. This wouldn't be the first time he'd boil a devastating pestilence. A hero must rise, who'll seek out Malbordus at the very depth of his dungeon, and sends him to hell, along with his cursed cauldron...

name: Cake Match Charm: Pop and jam
summary: Cake Match is a beautiful & fun match 3 game, it is very easy to play: just swipe the cakes to connect 3 or more of the same type before time runs out.

name: Captain Sabertooth: New Adventures
summary: A pirate game that will keep children occupied for hours, with challenges large and small in an exciting and varied universe.

name: Card-Jitsu
summary: Card-Jitsu is an unreleased mobile game based on the Club Penguin mini-game "Card-Jitsu". A prototype build of the game was found in 2023 as a part of the TestFlight teraleaks.

name: Candlelight
summary: Ed broke the curfew to visit his friends in order to find out the truth of his granddaughter's disappearance, but the truth was far more terrible than he thought.

name: Cardmon
summary: Cardmon is a new adventure inspired in old monster-catching games. Jump in and explore the Tojo region while trying to catch all the Cardmon. Defeat every carder and become the Regional Cardmaster in this aestethic world!

name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Dubbed Edition
Castlevania: Spectral Interlude
summary: Castlevania: Spectral Interlude is an action-adventure platform game with elements of RPG. It merges well known elements of classic games with some new ideas. It tells a new story which tries to remain consistent with the canon of original franchise and explains why Belmonts disappeared for many years.

name: CandyRain
summary: CandyRain is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named Minazuki and features simple dream worlds, some light-hearted and others utterly disturbing in tone and theme. Effects are called Candy in the game.

name: Case #1472
summary: A mysterious woman is sitting in front of you. Who is she? And who are you? And why are you both there? Case #1472 is mystery thriller information digging interrogation game where there are more things going on than what meets the eye, but are you able to unravel what has happened?

name: Caterpillar
summary: In the world of shadows, guide the caterpillar through forests and fields, dungeons and mountains, where enemies and obstacles await you. Eat flowers, defeat enemies, and clear your path to keep going.

name: Carnage in Space: Crucible
summary: A fast-paced sci-fi action-platormer/beat-em-up with multiple characters and customization for replayability. Features both adjustable difficulty settings and intense post-game challenges for players of all skill levels.

name: Carrot: Pancakes and Waffles
summary: a slice of life game where you live a peaceful day in a whimsical hand-painted coastal town

name: Cabinet of Curiosities VR
summary: This is a fully immersive and interactive VR Experience set in a Victorian style Cabinet of Curiosities room, full of hundreds of highly detailed 3D scanned objects from the natural world, that can be picked up, examined, and explored like a museum without restrictions.

name: C.A.R.L.
summary: C.A.R.L. is a retro puzzle-platformer in which players take on the role of a lost robot in a mysterious factory to uncover the secrets within its walls and thwart the plans of its mastermind proprietor.

name: Captcha Kills
summary: A crossover between Among-us and the Turing Test manifested in a battle royal in which you're to weaponize your own speech with the goal of deceiving others into believing you're dialog is artificially generated and not an imposter of sentient origins. Hide amongst the AI and become the last human.

name: Cats in Hell
summary: Cats in Hell is an English fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 4. You play as a cat and explore Hell. The goal of the game is to explore and obtain new skills. Equipping skills doesn't erase the effect of the previous one. This means that all effects can be equipped at the same time.

name: Caff Roulette
summary: A russian roulette game for the Playdate

name: Cat World
summary: A tiny epic adventure for Playdate

name: Catch the thief
summary: A Mobware minigame for Playdate

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Game of the Year Edition
summary: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Game of the Year Edition released only in Japan.

name: Cannonhead Clash
summary: You play as one of two Cannonheads - Player 1 is red, Player 2 is blue. Your goal is simple- hit the other player with one of your bombs to knock them into the water! The terrain can be destroyed by your bombs, too. Keep that in mind!

name: CamGirls Inc
summary: CamGirls Inc – an exciting simulator where you have to become the owner of an advertising agency that cooperates with models from online chats. The user opens his own business and can invite the most beautiful girls to his own team to do online broadcasts. In order to sign a contract with cute and charming girls, you must first conduct an interview, as well as collect a portfolio of potential participants. The most charming, outstanding and cute beauties will go on streams. There can be many viewers and fans to earn money. Therefore, bringing income to the campaign owner, who at that moment simply watches what is happening is the main target.

name: Castle Greyrot
summary: Castle Greyrot is a challenging boss-rush rogue-lite turn-based RPG that revolves around killing brutal bosses, a lot. Train your party members to overcome the horrors of Castle Greyrot and its unending curse... If you can!

name: Cave VR
summary: Cave is the original VR puzzle game, looking for a journey of exploration in the ancient mysterious cave ruins, the ruins of the ancient inhabitants are from the exit ruins in layers, and the horse-hunting treasure hunt on the road seems to imply on.

name: Cazzarion: Demon Hunting
summary: Demons are troubling here. Kill the brood of evil and send it back to hell. Standard weapons (Assault Rifle, Shotgun) and special weapons (BoomShot, Reaper, ....) are available. As opponents, the demons of hell are fighting against you. Choose your weapon and shoot ("Groarrr.....BOOOOOM")

name: Canterz Paranormies
summary: Canterz Paranormies is a 2D Top Down survival horror game based on the story of the most renowned paranormal investigation team of the US called "Canterz Paranormies" who got a request from the owner of the Texas Haunted house to investigate it for the paranormal evidence.

name: Castle Reborn
summary: "Castle Reborn" - old school 2D slasher. In this game you slash your enemies, dodge attacks and use the ancient magic against monsters. Try to survive in a mysterious castle, that is getting more and more dangerous.

name: Carter Story
summary: Carter's Story is a RogueLike game with random elements combined with action adventures, where you try to randomly pick up equipment and fight enemies, and eventually get the trial of growth.

name: Candy Eaters Tournament
summary: Candy Eaters Tournament is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season One
summary: Prepare to rise on a new front – Vanguard heats up in the Pacific with a new Battle Pass and new weapons, Operators, maps, and more. Plus, all Vanguard owners get 24 hours of exclusive access to Call of Duty: Warzone Pacific’s new map, Caldera.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season Two
summary: Ready for a massive free content drop? Join Captain Butcher and Task Force Yeti in discovering the greatest threat to the world: Nebula V. Eradicate or harness this weapon in Warzone, prove your elite skills in Vanguard Multiplayer, or enter all-new areas in the Dark Aether to face a deceptive force in Zombies. Prepare for some heavy weaponry.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard - Season Three
summary: The third season for Vanguard and Warzone is known as Classified Arms. Learn about prototype weaponry, updated Points of Interest on Caldera, S.O.T.F Harpy, and what Titans will make an impact during Operation Monarch…

name: Camega
summary: The Camega is a handheld device released by H&B. It is a media player, digital camera and handheld video game console, with 15 built-in Sega Mega Drive games.

name: Cataphract OI
summary: Cataphract OI is an experimental turn-based RPG escort mission made in RPG Maker 2000.

name: Cangaço
summary:
What about praying for protection? Or slanging to curse your enemies? In Cangaço, an RTT with RPG elements, featuring 3 single-player campaigns, online multiplayer, and custom maps, faith will make all the difference.

Choose a hero and take control of your group in a story full of bloody battles between Cangaceiros (outlaws) and Volantes (the police) in the convoluted backlands in the late 19th century. Pick your side, equip your group and eliminate all menaces with weapons, power-ups, and sacred amulets.

Surviving in Cangaço is no easy task! To overcome the challenges, you'll need to plan the best combat strategy and manage the best combination of skills, attributes and equipment, besides collecting supplies such as water, liquor, sugar-cane bars, etc...

name: Card Shop Tycoon
summary: Card Shop Tycoon is a trading card shop simulator game where you earn money and build your card shop tycoon business.

name: Captain America: Super Soldier
summary: The Nintendo DS port of Captain America: Super Soldier.

name: Captain Planet and the Planeteers
summary: Fight real ecological threats through nine levels of deadly pollution. Five eco-heroes summon Earth, Fire, Wind, Water and Heart to defend our planet from destruction! With magic energy, they combine forces to summon Captain Planet, the champion crusader for Earth safety!

name: Cave Buster
summary: Underground action platformer with a silly alien.

name: Cartridge the Tiger
summary: Cartridge the Tiger is a Super Nintendo inspired platformer with an in-game level editor, easy-to-use mod support using C#, and Steam Workshop integration.

name: Car Racing Trials
summary: What better way to try out the newest, high performance cars than to take them for a drive on a race track?

name: Car Destroyer
summary: Car Destroyer is a pixel racing arena that will make you fight in ruthless wastelands.

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Talvisota
summary: The Talvisota expansion for CtA - GoH offers Finland and the unique northern fighting between 1939 and 1945, including a vast array of weaponry and unique game mechanics. The return of classic skirmishes also expands the Eastern Front with huge, replayable battles with a menacing, revamped AI.

name: Cato: Buttered Cat
summary: Buttered cat paradox puzzle platformer game

name: Catastrophe
summary: Catastrophe is survival horror dungeon crawler. Try not to get lost in the labyrinth as you choose to slay the dungeon's inhabitants or sneak past as many as you can.

name: Casino Golf
summary: Beat 50 levels and feel the adrenaline like in a casino! Place a bet and put the ball in the hole. You can increase the multiplier by playing the "VaBanque" with all your money.

name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium
summary: Capcom is taking you back to the stadium with another collection of your favorite classic hits! Come see what's changed, and what's completely new, in Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium!

name: Cat Lovescapes
summary: Sneak Black cat through the house and help him reach his forbidden love!

name: Cactu-sama 2
summary: A cute puzzle game about a small cactus that is looking for its kouhai in the desert.

name: Cafe Tsuku: Is the order a Heart?
summary: A new healing action cafe management game from the circle "Maguro no Osashimi".

name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Savage Bees
summary: Add CA2S: Savage Bees to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: The Speed Rumbler to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: 1943 Kai - Midway Kaisen - to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up! Players: 1-2 Player Co-Op Genre: Shooter Versions: Japanese

summary: Get a great deal on 30 additional Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium titles with the Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium Bundle 1. As a special bonus, you'll get Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Gan Sumoku!

name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Gan Sumoku
summary: Add CA2S: Gan Sumoku to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Capcom Sports Club to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: A.K.A Vampire Savior: The Lord of Vampire to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Mega Man 2 - The Power Fighters to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Super Puzzle Fighter II Turbo to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Street Fighter Alpha 2
summary: Add CA2S: Street Fighter Alpha 2 to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Mega Man - The Power Battle to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Three Wonders to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: A.K.A The King of Dragons to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: A.K.A Block Block to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: A.K.A Knights of the Round
summary: Add CA2S: A.K.A Knights of the Round to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Saturday Night Slam Masters to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Eco Fighters to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!

summary: Add CA2S: Pnickies to your Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium game line-up!
