Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Car Parking Madness School Drive Mechanic Car Games Simulator 2023
summary: What is the most difficult element in driving a car? parking? you are absolutely right. In game you will be able to improve your parking skill. In the game you will be able to find many parking options with varying degrees of difficulty.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Carlos Bara
summary: Carlos Bara is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Jun Misugi
summary: Jun Misugi is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Kojiro Hyuga
summary: Kojiro Hyuga is now available as a new playable character in Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions.

name: Caverns of Toros
summary: Caverns of toros is an arcade platform game.

name: Camper Van Simulator 2
summary: Experience a summer getaway of your lifetime! Drive and park awesome cars, campers, bike and other vehicles!

name: Cave Heroes
summary: Lead a party of Cave Heroes to explore dungeons, battle monsters and defeat tough archdemons. Build your village, collect loot, rescue pets and much more in this idle RPG.

name: Carcassonne: The Official Board Game - Traders & Builders
summary: It's all about commerce and construction with the Traders & Builders expansion.

name: Carbon Steel
summary: "Carbon Steel" is an experimental puzzle horror game, where you conduct unethical research in a hastily rebuilt laboratory. Work out how to operate miscellaneous machines, cross-check data tables and procure general anaesthesia. The difference between life and death can be any overlooked detail.

name: Castlevania: Contra Mode
summary: Castlevania: Contra Mode is a Contra themed rom hack for Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia. Just like Contra, the game difficulty increases the more you progress to another level.

name: Car Puzzle for Toddlers and Kids
summary: This puzzle game is extremely easy to use and was tailored with great care to be played by children of all ages. It contains various difficulty-settings for entertaining a wide range of age-groups. Balloons and Bubbles can be popped at the end of each pu…

name: Candy Creeps
summary: Play as Elma and Harper, two tweens who may or may not have inadvertently summoned the evil Pumpking, who has swiped the whole neighborhood's Halloween candy and hidden it inside his army of tiny, adorable decorative gourds. Smash the pumpkins to find candy, then chow down. Once you're turbo-charged with sugar, transform into a costume-clad avenger and bash the Pumpking until he explodes! Master four unique levels and go for a high score in one- and two-player modes.

name: CarX Street
summary: Get behind the wheel and explore the large city and its surroundings, from busy city streets to spiral mountain roads and mesmerizing coastal highways. Drift, speed, traffic; be the best & challenge other players in real network races.

name: CanVerse
summary:
Play hyper-realistic backgammon, checkers & chess with more board games coming soon.

Choose to take on your friends or computer competitors, with different levels of difficulty.

Local & online gameplay, with online support for 2 players & 62 spectators, with voice chat.

Welcome to CanVerse, the future of shared hyper-realistic tabletop gaming.

name: Catacombs of the Damned
summary: Catacombs of the damned! is a first person shooter / dungeon crawler where you navigate 10 floors of a randomly generated dungeon dispatching monsters with your magic fireballs whilst collecting as much loot as possible.

name: Caveman.
summary:
Jump and dodge all the random spikes that get in your way! Very challenging game.
Collect as many coins as you can, through the world of the caveman jumper! Jump as many times as you want and dodge all the random spikes that get in your way to become the best of the best!
As you progress through the game more and more spikes will get in your way, but as the difficulty increases also the reward for every coin you collect. if you get as higher and higher the coins you get will increase, making you rich and rich, by the second!
You can then buy more characters with the coins you collect, at the game shop!, all these characters will have certain abilities that make the game experience unique.some can change the gravity, and others the coins you get, can you buy them all?!

name: Car Detailing Simulator: Track Day
summary: Car Detailing Simulator: Track Day allows you to test your all cars on the racing track!

name: Call of Cthulhu: The Darkness Within Book 1
summary:
Call of Cthulhu: Darkness Within is an adventure game inspired by the writings of H. P. Lovecraft developed for mobile phones. The game takes place in Cairo in the 1930s. The protagonist is a student of a professor who gets a letter from his teacher asking him to come to Cairo ASAP as he has uncovered something extraordinary and fears that he is in danger. Balthazar Carter arrives only to find that his professor had gone insane and the expedition is put on hold. The new director is known to be interested in the occult and doesn't take kindly to Balthazar's curiosity. Being an expert in old Religions, players will need to help Balthazar uncover what happened to the professor, what was the find as well as the mysteries of an ancient religion which worships the god Cthulhu.

The game plays out as a point-and-click adventure, but instead of a mouse interface, players control the protagonist directly with him walking to the direction key players have pressed. Players are hinted when they're close to usable objects or people and can trigger a menu where they can choose what they want to do with the objects. Players can pick up and use items and during their adventures they will see a lot of cutscenes of what's going on in the city. Players switch to a top-down view when traveling through the city. The buildings players have access to are indicated with an icon.

name: Causality Effect
summary: What if everything that went wrong on “A Red Letter Day” was not caused by what you thought? What if your teleport ripped a hole in space and time? Now you must travel through time to correct the events and set right your past.

name: Carrion Fields
summary:
Carrion Fields is a text based adventure mud with 20,000+ rooms. Find the 150+ automated quests. When you finally reach hero there will still be many challenges for you to face from fighting the Ancient Dragons to challenging Tiamat herself!

Roleplaying, Player Killing.

name: Cario 3
summary: Cario continues his dangerous ride. Help him get as far as possible and get the highest score possible. Good luck on your journey!

name: Catch the Dragon
summary:
"Catch the Dragon" is the first game from LDLC VR Studio. It uses the technology of free roaming, offering a much more immersive experience than traditional virtual reality. Each player has a virtual reality headset and a PC in a backpack. They can interact and move freely throughout the game.

The game is played with 2 teams of 2 to 3 players. The team of Norse gods from the Order faces off against the team of demonic forces from Chaos.
Each player chooses their playing style between the mage and their magic staff, or the archer and their evil bow. Both teams have a common goal: to get the dragon's strength as many times as possible without being neutralized by the enemy's force.

name: Carols in July
summary: Carols in July is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on hhgregg.

name: Cannon Fodder
summary: Side-view artillery game for classic mac by John Barnett

name: Candy Crush Saga Ticket Model
summary: Candy Crush Saga Ticket Model is a video redemption, touch screen arcade machine based on the super addictive and phenomenally popular mobile/facebook app.

name: Calliope Mori's Underworld Tour 2022
summary: Calliope Mori takes her first break in millennia and goes golfing with her good friend Kureiji Ollie!

name: Calling of my Nightingales
summary: A Yume Nikki fangame for Dream Diary Jam 3. Tristan is stuck in his room for unknown reasons. In his dream world he can meet individuals known as Nightingales.

name: Caution
summary:
A small project for the Dream Diary Jam #3. You play as Chui, who's trying to complete an essay while sleep deprived. The main goal is to explore and collect effects and items. There is also a collectible currency called Muns, which can be used to purchase items in the dream world.

There are two bars displayed on the top-left corner of the screen: ZZZ's; which act as a life bar for the player character that depletes when the player runs into a hazard in the dream world, and PRG which represents how much of the essays been written and increases each time the player works at the table.

name: Cautious V
summary: Explore weird spaces as a mysterious robed figure.

name: Cairo ShootOut!
summary: A shooting gallery style game, except instead of aiming with a cursor, players must line their shots up with the scope at the bottom of the screen. Also includes a small puzzle element.

name: Capybara
summary:
Capybara is a 22-level Boom-compatible (cl9)"speed slaughtermap" community project, consisting bizzare visual designs, unconventional combat designs and some challenging slaughtery gameplay. In this project everybody needs to finish making the maps within 24 hours and only have 4 days to work on them, note that this is not a strict rule.

Majority of the maps are playtested with DSDA-Doom or Gzdoom, however note that you might suffer from unexpected lags in some grandiose slaughter situations. (a.k.a lots, lots of monsters)

name: Cauli's Night
summary: Play as Cauli as you explore your farm late at night. Find items! Read books! Get inspired!

name: Cario 4
summary: Cario continues his dangerous ride. Help him get as far as possible and get the highest score possible. Good luck on your journey!

name: Call of Dragons
summary: Call of Dragons is an MMO fantasy conquest game from the creators of Rise of Kingdoms, offering an incredible strategic combat experience.

name: Catrophy Trail
summary: Catrophy Trail is a light-hearted physics adventure game where you use teamwork and wits to solve physics-based puzzles, gather valuable loot, and collect gear for future expeditions.

name: Car Factory Tycoon
summary:
Follow in the footsteps of America's greatest "Captains of industry" and build a massive car empire.
Beat the competition by building new factories in time, attracting the best car designers and by selling cars through a strong dealer network.
Use the changing market to your advantage to outsmart the competition and grow into the best car tycoon

name: Carmageddon
summary: Cancelled Gizmondo port of Carmageddon.

name: Cat Life
summary: Cat Life is an adventure and survival solo game, allowing you to explore a vast open world as a cat. A series of quests will lead you to solve the mysteries of this island, if you manage to face all its dangers!

name: Cars Toon: Tokyo Mater
summary: Mater takes a pit stop to tow a broken down car home and ends up in Japan. While there, he is challenged to a "drift" race through the streets of Tokyo all the way to the top of Tokyo Tower. Will he win the race? He will need some pretty slick "modifications" and a little help from his friend Lightning "Dragon" McQueen.

name: Can You Make It?
summary: Crank it till you make it!

name: Cartoon Wars
summary: Cartoon Wars is a tower defence game, where you have a castle and different kinds of units you can send out. In every level there is an opposing castle on the other side of the map that sends out enemies and that you have to destroy to win the level. Between levels you can upgrade your units and unlock new ones by spending gold and gems earned through the levels.

name: Cars vs Train
summary: The Cars vs Train is a simulation-adventure game, where horsepower is measured to another level. Your mission is not to allow the train to reach its destination before you in order to prevent danger.

name: Caladria Chronicles Volume 2
summary: After the Otori twins, Tsubasa and Shou, end up getting kidnapped by some Nephrine forces, that's when their plan is starting to surface. Things get even more intense as other Caladrians, like Nerisu's group and the princess of Tamarin, Tokino Miyanohara, get involved.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Norway Reserve
summary:
Pack your angling gear, tread the paths of trolls, and tell your own tale in the vast and tranquil Norwegian countryside - steeped in local folklore.

Trollsporet Nature Reserve awaits!

name: Cats Puzzle
summary: This is a cat puzzle game for all ages. It's a fun game that will improve your reasoning and intellectual ability.

name: .Cat Nincat Dinogotchi
summary:
Bundle!
.Cat + Nincat + Dinogotchi

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow - Reprise
summary: Reprise is a roguelike mod for Aria of Sorrow which allows for endless randomized gameplay, along with extensive rebalancing and new features! Rooms, enemies, items, and shop are randomized, along with custom content and modifications. Mod is still in development but is almost feature complete at this point.

name: CallOfTree
summary: Fisrt Person Shooting Game And Beautiful scenery. The story is about a bad god named Gideon tormented humans and a tree that couldn't stand summoned a warrior from another world in a chaotic situation due to the war of the gods The trees are all unique, so you can easily find trees to interact with

name: Carlos the Taco
summary: Buenos dias dear Amigo! My name is Taco Carlos and I need your help!Some Gringo, kidnapped my bride right from the wedding! Only you can track them down and bring back my beloved!

name: Cannon Dancer: Osman
summary: Cannon Dancer (also known as Osman) is an action jump & run adventure with a Persian-Arabian flair. Control the Cannon Dancer Kirin, an acrobatic, highly skilled martial arts fighter, and fight your way through several stages while defeating enemy forces.

name: Capybara Madness
summary: Capybara Madness is 3D Ragdoll Physics Based Platform Adventure Game.

name: CatWalk
summary: Cat Walk is a cat fashion game. Wear the right clothes to themed parties and get insider info on what clothing styles each company likes. It's not all sunshine and rainbows, you've got to earn enough FishCoins to pay your debt at the end of each week.

name: Cat Snack Bar
summary: Cat Snack Bar is a Simulation game developed by Treeplla.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Mercedes-Benz Remastered DLC
summary: Mercedes-Benz Remastered includes 5 licensed Mercedes-Benz cars: Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Gullwing (W198), Mercedes-Benz 560 SEC (W126), Mercedes-Benz 500E (W124), Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG (C197), Mercedes-Benz 280 SL Pagoda (W113).

name: Cats the Commander
summary:
Easy to play for anyone! Super cute and hyper RPG!
Beginners are welcome!
Of course game freaks and children are also welcome!
Let cats take over this world!!

name: Cathode's Journey
summary:
Cathode the TV Cat traverses polychrome fields of light while the Infinite Spiral shifts and twists in endless ways. Dancing in the timeless space around you the Neon Butterfly flirts, ever out of reach, only to transport you to the next level - if you dare!
Cathode's Journey is an experimental audio-visual indie game. There is no distinction between music or sound effect; your actions play a part in a duet, which is also a playful duel. Time and speed is elastic, controlled by how well you manage to collect jewels and avoid obstacles.

name: Catch Bus
summary: We've all been there. Your bus comes and it's a race to the bus stop. Play 3 levels of difficulty in catching the bus! Run!!

name: Candy Adventure HD
summary:
Forgive us, can not give you a bottle of drink. But to believe that we can give you a different experience
Go into the Candy Adventure, We will give you a cool summer.

name: Caribbean Rhythms Lite
summary:
Play your favorites songs in this amazing caribbean percussion kit.
Conga, timbal and bongo!
Real and cool sound, everything you need.
Enjoy!

name: Car Factory Simulator
summary:
Especially for fans of economic strategies, we made this game. An automobile factory is at your disposal. To be precise, you start with an empty factory and you will have to build it already.
It will be necessary to start with the installation of the first workshops - stamping and welding, where body parts will be manufactured. Next, the body will need to be assembled and painted. By the way, you can also choose the color of the car yourself.
At the same time, you will have to adjust the release of the suspension, as well as the motor. After that, in a special workshop, combine these components.
Next, you will need to install the seats and dashboard and check the build quality. That's all this and much more, the players will have to organize in their car factory.
We have been working on this game for a very long time and tried to do everything so that you like it.
We will gladly respond to your feedback and wishes. The game is constantly evolving and improving, including thanks to our players.

name: Cats Are Jerks
summary:
Want to swat birds out of the sky? Of course you do. Cause you're a cat. And cats are jerks.
Tap once to jump into the air. While in the air, tap again to punch birds right in the face! Avoid the Jetpack Dog or he'll punch YOU in the face. Cause sometimes dogs are jerks too.

name: Cannon Basket HD
summary:
Cannon Basket provides you a unique game play where you need to control the cannon direction with the help of your finger.
To the power release the touch and try harder to score more in the basket.
The interesting part of the game is that the basket will change its position at every level and becomes harder & harder to score more...! You have to shot the maximum of 25 levels of the game to become a Cannon Master and unlock Free Throws Mode!

name: Catchy Chips
summary:
Chips are falling from the sky! Catch them all to fill up the packets. Sounds easy? You wish! Avoid collecting the burnt chips or it’s game over!
Play through the levels and collect all the stars or play classic mode and set a new high score! You can play offline too!

name: Card Games: Solitaire and more
summary:
Do you like playing cards for fun or do you enjoy a tough competition?
Card Games is a collection of games played with one (or two) deck(s) of cards that meets both needs.
Relax while you play
Solitaire,
Freecell or
Pyramid (a Solitaire like game).
Join a table, and compete against other players on
Koltsina and Xeri game

name: Cat Tiles: Matching Puzzle
summary:
Welcome to Cat Tiles! Get calm in a super relaxing match-3 puzzle game experience!
Unwind yourself by dressing up and interacting with cute kittens!
Decorate rooms to create a chill-out space for relaxation!
An endless array of new cats to meet and new rooms to explore!
Cat Tiles features relaxing match 3 puzzle, combined with the fun of playing with cats and room decorating.

name: Castle Capture Topkapi
summary: Multiplayer, medieval archery. Numerous characters, and classes to choose from. Use a bow or crossbow to snipe at your enemies or throw an axe for high damage. Use a sword, axe, hammer, mace, or fists for close combat. Exact copies of real-world castles, including Topkapi Palace.

name: Car Parking 2
summary: Car Parking 2- Meet the continuation of the first part! Get behind the wheel of the same cars and get to the finish line in the shortest possible time!

name: Car Parking Multiplayer
summary: Realistic Driving Physics, Stunning Views, Car Tuning and Customization, and Millions of Fans Worldwide

name: CapsuleToy
summary:
CapsuleToy is a toy capsule (also known as gashapon, gasha, gacha) collection game. You collect many many sweet toys from the toy capsule machine, and organizing them in your little room, take a photo and share with friends.
Have you ever tried empty out a toy capsule machine and get all the fancy prizes in it? In CapsuleToy you can do it!
There are 4 sets of toys in the machine, make your choice and drop the coin into the machine, you will be surprised by what you get! You can also sell the toys you don't like to retain some money.

name: Campus Romance 101
summary:
Your college years are all about romance!
Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Candy Arkanoid
summary: Candy Arkanoid is more than just a simple arcade game - it also includes role-playing elements, allowing players to level up their candy Arkanoid and customize its abilities So why wait? Satisfy your sweet tooth and soon blast your way through the candy cosmos!

name: Caves of Lore
summary: Engage in tactical grid-based combat in this classic-styled fantasy CRPG.

name: Car For Sale Simulator 2023
summary: Car for sale simulator 2023 game in detail, you can buy and sell vehicles in the town and you can sell more vehicles by establishing a vehicle gallery and developing your company.

name: Canyon Miner: Minecart Rush
summary: Get ready for the seat of your pants wild ride of your life - on a minecart! Navigate through the Old Mine as you search for Gems! This isn't the friendliest mine though. Bottomless pits, sharp hanging rocks, and giant Bats and Spiders make this one challenging run. Can you handle the pressure? Can you fill your pockets? Gamecenter lets you compete for high scores.

name: Carta Nostra
summary: Carta Nostra is an educational virtual reality game, a compelling interactive narrative dealing with the theme of the Mafia. You will have a pack of cards to defeat the mafia, each card will have positive or negative consequences throughout the city. Make your choice and play the card!

name: CardSurvival: Tropical Island
summary:
Card Survival: Tropical Island is a card-based survival experience from the creators of Card Quest.
Experience what life would be like if you were stranded on a desert island, all in a card format.
Explore, craft tools and manage your needs in order to survive in this hostile environment.

name: Caroline's Camera - Rhythm Game
summary:
Caroline finds a new part-time job!
The newspaper office is now in crisis as they have no photographer. We are counting on you, trainee photographer Caroline!
From the development team of "Caroline's Work", the new game "Caroline's Camera".
Pick up the rhythm of photographing, press the shutter in the righting timing, and snap an brilliant shot. Take better picutres to hit the headlines. Save them and share with others.

name: Capitals Battle
summary: Capitals is a free and addictive social word game. Play against your friends to spell the best words and expand your territory. Use strategy to defend your capital and knock out your opponent’s!

name: Cardboard Football Club
summary: Cardboard Football Club Premium is a highly addictive skill-based soccer game. Combining outstanding gameplay, colorful graphics, great audio effects and local multiplayer.

name: Cake5
summary: Cake5 team members need your help! CC, GBM, Taro, Brownie, and Rainbow - have been sent on a mission far from home by the Sweet Queen and Dr. Puff to find the lost sweet taste that's gone missing from the Sweet Planet. Help the Cake5 team explore the Universe and visit magic ovens on distant worlds, asking them for clues and fragments of the magic recipe stolen from Sweet Planet by the Crystal Fox. Help Cakes complete their mission and find the sweet taste.

name: Card Brawl: Dungeon Slayer
summary:
Magical spires have risen across the land causing discord and chaos... No longer a mere shopkeeper, the fate of Aragonia now lies in your hands...
Choose your path in procedurally generated dungeons and employ unique strategies with each playthrough! Slay your way to the Elite Boss at the end of each dungeon to unlock new cards for your collection and carve your name in history as the top ranked card brawler across Aragonia! Immerse yourself in a turn-based Roguelike CCG like no other, where you must randomly draft cards as you progress through each spire, testing the limits of your wit and skill with each battle.
Collect powerful cards to create epic combos, wield masterful strategies by unlocking mighty heroes and their unique skills, gear up heroes with legendary equipment and turn the tides of battle across PvE and PvP by unleashing a well-timed spell! In Card Brawl you draft cards as you progress making each level more interesting than the last!
What are you waiting for? Install Card Brawl for FREE to experience the mayhem of roguelike card battles and join the millions of players around the world in the Arena to forge your legacy!

name: Call of Mini: Zombies 2
summary:
The sequel to Call of Mini: Zombies.

Secondary weapons and a combo system are here. Fight off hordes of zombies and take on powerful bosses to save the world again!

name: Captain Tsubasa: Zero - Showdown! Miracle Shoot
Cat 2048 Story
summary:
Cat 2048 Story is an addictive digital game, puzzle game.
Join the cats and get to the tile, they are the 2048's multiple, they are growing step by step. Swipe to move all tiles. When two tiles with the same cat face touch, they merge into a upgrade one. You can choose different type to enjoy. Adventure or time model for you explore.

name: Castlevania Chronicles II: Simon's Quest
summary:
A fanmade remake of Castlevania 2: Simon's Quest is offering a whole new way to play the most infamous entry in Konami's classic vampire-hunting series.

Back in 1995, Konami released Castlevania Chronicles on PS1, which remade and remixed the original Castlevania for then-modern standards. Now, in 2023, the fan studio WarMachine has released Castlevania Chronicles 2: Simon's Quest, which takes the same approach for the divisive NES sequel.

This remake takes the bones of Simon's Quest to craft a whole new game. You still explore an open-ended overworld, get hints from NPCs, and explore dungeon-style mansions to acquire key items. But the world has been remixed, the mansions have been completely revamped, and the old currency system has been completely revamped.

name: Castlevania: Specter of Sorrow
summary: Specter Knight is now in Dawn of Sorrow! Start a game in Specter Mode to slice and dice your way through the castle using Specter Knight’s diagonal slash while engaging in mini-platforming challenges! Many rooms are tweaked for Specter Knight’s movement and there’s little secrets all around the place to allow for 100% map completion.

name: Caverns of Mars: Recharged
summary: Race through caverns while blasting away enemies and terrain to reach the depths of Mars in this reimagining of the 1981 classic.

name: Cargo Bridge
summary:
The most popular game Cargo Bridge from Limex Games becomes available to millions of our fans on the iPad in 2011. In Cargo Bridge your goal is to build bridges within each one of 24 levels, that allows your little workers to move heavy cargo (which include crates, safes, and even elephants) from one side of a valley to the other.
With every level, the difficulty increases. You have to build bridges across larger gaps, up and down inclines, and around obstacles in your path. You are also given access to new building materials. If you want to have a break from game levels, just enter the Challenge mode. Use money collected in game levels to build the longest bridge you can.

name: Cats War
summary: Cats War is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter. You have to play as a cat who wants to take revenge on the ducks for their bad deeds! You have deadly fists, a bat and even a pistol in your arsenal! Punish all ducks and collect all flowers.

name: Car Factory Driver
summary: In Car Factory Driver you have to take on every driving job. Deliver parts using Trucks, Vans and Fork Lifts!

name: Catacombs: The Beginning
summary: Catacombs: The Beginning - is an excellent 3D shooter where you have to survive in the catacombs overfull of various monsters.

name: Candy Adventure
summary: Forgive us, can not give you a bottle of drink. But to believe that we can give you a different experience.

name: Castle Rush
summary:
You are having war as your neighboring country has been stealing things from your motherland.
You have to slide, drop and create box sets to fill up your inventory, show your power and make the enemy's army to change sides and win this battle!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Progear
summary: Add Progear to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Battle Circuit
summary: Add Battle Circuit to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Powered Gear - Strategic Variant Armor Equipment
summary: Add Powered Gear - Strategic Variant Armor Equipment - to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 05: Raika Koshiba
summary: Set including Fighter "Raika Koshiba" and sleeves.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 04: Urara Haneyama
summary: Set including Fighter "Urara Haneyama" and sleeves.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Additional Deck D-TD03: Raika Koshiba - Skyfall Executors
summary: This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD03.

name: Candyman: Be My Victim Demake
summary: Play as Candyman & eviscerate anyone that dares to say your name 5 times in front of a mirror in this NES demake.

name: Cartoon Network TKO
summary: Cartoon Network TKO (Titanic Kungfubot Offensive) was a crossover fighting game, which featured Total Drama Action, produced by Cartoon Network.

name: Cats in Heat: Summer Fling
summary: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 catgirls during mating season - plenty of choices, comedy, and sex in exciting adventure!

name: Castle Rathbone
summary:
Text Adventure that appeared as a type-in program in issue 17 of Your Spectrum magazine. It also appeared on that month's cover-mounted Digi-Tape, already typed up and ready to play.

The plot is that you have to help three members of the Your Spectrum team escape from the confines of Castle Rathbone, the mythical place where Your Spectrum magazine is created. There are four escape routes, one for each of the team members and one for you, and you can't use an escape route meant for one member for another. Commands are entered in the usual text adventure style, by entering them in via keyboard.

name: CatDog Puzzle
summary: CatDog Puzzle - slide puzzle game. You need solve the puzzle as fast as you can.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 02
summary:
Gear up for Season 02 in Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty Warzone 2.0 and have you and your squad be victorious when the mist clears.
Resurgence Mode returns on a new battleground in Warzone 2.0 starting in Season 02.

name: Cafon Street
summary:
After a long wait the official game of "Cafon Street" is now available for your iPhone, iPad, iPod!
In Messina the uncle Lillo in his Apecar is scattering pieces everywhere!
Harry up! help Mimmo and Stellario to collect all the lost items! but look at all the obstacles that you will find all the road long; fortunately your souped up motor will allow you to make jumps and double jumps to avoid piles of garbage and even Santino riding his green moto!

name: Cards Against Humanity Lab
summary: Welcome to the Cards Against Humanity Lab! This solo version of the game helps us figure out which cards are fan-favorites and which cards are real stinkers when we update the game and release new expansions every year.

name: Castle Crumble
summary: Where physics allows you to have fun with a blast! Your goal is clear - castles must fall. Become a hero in far fantasylands. With powerful explosives and mystical spells, crash forts from Ancient, Medieval, Aztec and other times. Aim to win!

name: Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring the Legend of Zelda - Octavo's Ode
summary: Octavo's Ode is a free update for Cadence of Hyrule that introduces a new mode, also called Octavo's Ode, wherein Octavo is added as a playable character. Additionally, Dungeon Mode allows players to play through single dungeons without an overworld in a similar fashion to the classic Crypt of the NecroDancer.

name: Cadence of Hyrule: Crypt of the NecroDancer Featuring the Legend of Zelda - Melody Pack
summary:
Listen to even more remixed versions of classic Legend of Zelda series tunes as you move to the beat with the Melody Pack DLC. A total of 39 additional tunes from 3 different artists are included!

With the Melody Pack you can designate which character and area will feature certain songs from both the original soundtrack and new remixes. Play through this rhythmic adventure to the beat of your own drum!

name: Can't Escape the Backrooms
summary: Can't Escape the Backrooms is a horror game that you can play single player or with up to 4 friends. Explore numerous treacherous and dangerous levels, avoid contact with evil entities, and do whatever it takes to find your way out!

name: Captain Disaster and the Two Worlds of Riskara
summary: A new Captain Disaster adventure; this time he is more of a hero than a disaster! ... Or is he? A point and click adventure game with cartoony graphics, epic storyline and more bad jokes than you can possibly imagine. Buy this game. It is your destiny...

name: Captain Blacksword
summary: Become the infamous pirate Captain Blacksword and stab your way through three beautiful 8-bit islands in search of the pieces to a magical compass!

name: Caverns
summary: Explore the randomized cave systems, find a wide selection of items, collect rare ores and master the quick platformer gameplay of "Caverns"! The endless mines offer deadly dangers arround every corner!

name: Cafe Simulator
summary: Build and decorate your shop, diversify your products through alliances, and make the right investments to expand your business.

name: Cave Raider
summary: Cave Raider - A top-down game where the player controls the character, dodging the walking dead, collecting the wandering souls of girls and playing otherworldly games to get further.

name: Catacombs: The Asper Case
summary: In 1804, doorman Philibert Asper's body was found in the Catacombs of Paris. His death remains unsolved to this day. This VR experience takes you 20 feet underground to uncover the truth about his demise. Find out what lurks in the darkness, but make no mistake, spirits never come alone.

name: Car Rental Simulator
summary: Open a rental car at the legendary American Route 66. Fulfill your dreams, meet the needs of your customers, compete with your competitors.

name: Cartastrophe
summary: In Cartastrophe, the goal is to collect shopping carts and bring them back to the store. But be careful, they are hard to control and could send you hurling at a car! Find your own path and avoid obstacles.

name: Castillo: The Nine Circles
summary: Embark on a journey through the nine circles of Hell, using unique abilities and weapons to defeat enemies and solve puzzles in this retro FPS inspired by 90's classics. Explore Dracula's origins on his quest to restore balance to the multiverse.

name: Camellia VR
summary: 'Camelia VR' is a VR content where you can take a walk in the Jeju Dongbaek dongsan to the Meonmulkkak. You can take a walk there with a virtual guide and listen to the explanation of nature and cultural relics. And you can meet other users and talk with them in the Meonmulkkak.

name: Card Nova Hyper
summary: Card Nova Hyper is a deckbuilder card battler with both a story and a roguelike mode. Get new cards, strategize new decks, and power up to the point clothes explode! But can you beat the almighty Queen?

name: Cat Dash Go
summary: Cat Dash Go is a High-Stakes Precision Platformer where the only thing you can do is Dash. Play as a kitty that loves to collect shiny things! Find true significance in material possession by dashing to the top!

name: Causal Nexus
summary: Create your abilities, destroy your opponents, go as far as you can in this roguelite arcade shooter. Full solo experience with our regular challenges or show them who's the best with the special leaderboard challenges. Do your worst, embrace the infinity.

name: Candyboy
summary: Make it through Halloween in this NES inspired, candy filled adventure!

name: Cats and Sokoban: Mimi's Scratcher
summary: Move boxes, jump on everything in sight, Mimi loves challenges like jumping long distances. Help her reach her scratcher!

name: Candy Tycoon
summary: Do you want to manage your own candy brand? Compete with other candy brands around the world by selling different candies in your own built store. Reach more customers by customizing your store and improving your confectionery. Remember, more customers means more revenue!

name: Cakez TD
summary: Get ready to Level up, train Skills, craft Items and build your perfect team to counter smart hordes of enemies. In this 2D Tower Defense game your Skills will be tested to the Limit!

name: Call of the Abyss
summary: Call of the Abyss is a rogue-like card game inspired by anime such as Made in Abyss. You have a long way to go, descending into the abyss. Explore the depths of this world, defeat mysterious enemies and find unexplainable things.

name: Castle Wars 2
summary: Sequel to the popular flash card game CastleWars.

name: Castle Cannon
summary: Try to take the other castle down with your big blaster cannon! Aim and shoot at the other caste and buy some upgrades to defend your own castle!

name: Catching Spirits
summary: Catching Spirits, the 2D brawler game that will break the balance in your friendship. Launch yourself into a frantic 3-player chase and fight to defend the colors of one of the three great Tribes of Creation, Destruction or Preservation. Welcome to the fight!!!

name: Catagaia
summary: You don't know who you are, you don't know what you are, you just know that something compels you to get to the literal bottom of this world. Spirits and alien landscapes surround you as you get deeper in this under-earth, try to survive and to make sense of it all.

name: Cat's Request
summary: Cat's Request is a fantastic point-and-click adventure in which you play as Ash the alien cat and his virtual assistant.

name: Cat + Dog
summary: Control the cat and dog at the same time so they can collect their favourite snacks. The cat loves fish and the dog wants bones! The cat must not touch the bones and the dog must not touch the fish. A relaxing puzzle game with Sokoban elements.

name: Castle Of Plague
summary: Fight against different enemis in various chapter. Improve your charater's level and determine your best strategy with the money you earn by killing enemies. Will you use your money for a better weapon, or will you spend it for magic potions? Be ready and prepared for the boss!

name: Cape of Storms
summary: The main goal of "Cape of Storms" is to portray the horrors of sailing into the unknown. The fears and the insecurities of the Portuguese will take the form of monsters as they demonize the player.

name: CarKour
summary: A new experience in car-related games based on the principle of Parkour , as it focuses on driving and controlling skill to pass a map consisting of seven levels of difficulty !!!! .The real challenge begins at the fourth level :) ,so it was not mentioned in the demo or screenshots .

name: CargoRun
summary: Cargo Run is a fun platformer 3d Third Person game where you have to pass through different obstacles to get to your goal.

name: Camphor
summary: A short 'bitsy poem' about my feelings towards fireflies. Made in the span of around 2 hours on a whim on the 9th of February, 2023. Plays for 30 seconds to a minute. Inspired by a recent listen to 'The Campfire Headphase' by Boards of Canada. You play as a worm in a forest swerving through rocks and trees to see fireflies.

name: Cargo Truck Simulator 2023
summary: Become a master truck driver by performing cargo missions in this truck game.

name: Castle Battle: The Game
summary: Castle Battle: The Game is a Castle online game. In it, the player chooses to ally themselves with the Crown Knights or Skeleton Warriors and defend the respective side's main residence from attacking forces.

name: Capcom Arcade 2nd Stadium: Muscle Bomber - The Body Explosion
Castle Destroyers
summary: Gather resources, build, power up and battle. Choose between two different teams in Castle Destroyers, build your castle with your teammates and attack the enemy. No stopping until you destroy the other side!

name: Carpet Kitty
summary: Help Kitty “quality test” carpets in the carpet factory by shredding as many as you possibly can! Collect coins and diamonds to unlock various kitties and dress them up in amazing ways!

name: Cake Kingdom Story
summary:
Cake Kingdom Story is a fun and challenging match 3 puzzle game!
Swap and match many cute cake to gain points. Collect as many cakes as possible before you run out of moves!
Defeat the Evil witch!

name: Castle Warriors
summary: Castle Warriors is a rogue lite auto battler with a strategy twist. Build your army one card at a time from over fifty units!

name: CalmLine
summary: Overcome levels with the help of various tools and your mind. Are you sure it's easy?

name: Castle Kingdom Wars
summary: Make your own strategy to beat your enemies. Characters have different skills so you can defeat your enemy with different tactics. Knight, swordsman, archer, skeleton, mage, catapult and much more hero are ready to fight for you.

name: Carnage Offering Tower Defense
summary: The replicator robots are back! It's 2528. The machines are increasingly infecting the planets with genetically modified monsters. Challenge them and try to stop the onslaught. Upgrade buildings and heroes, mine resources, discover technology and fight to save humanity!

name: Captain MaCaw 2
summary: We're not in Guadeloupe anymore Capn'! Captain MaCaw 2 is a Sci-Fi flip screen retro platform adventure game with pixel art graphics and old school chip tunes!

name: Cartoonite
summary: Choose your favorite vehicle from an infinite number of possibilities. Have fun crashing into objects to collect resources and build your own world. Show your friends what you've built and do stunts with them.

name: Carnivalé: Cenzo's Adventure
summary: A cancelled Nintendo 64 game based on a movie.

name: Calisteo
summary:
Explore fantastic fantasy worlds where you will have to master your skills as a match-3 expert to guide your character through a maze of puzzles of to unlock the key to overcome the dangers that lie ahead!
Calisteo is new kind of match-3 game that pits your matching your skills against increasingly difficult levels combined with the puzzle solving prowess needed to overcome the perils that block your path. Use your cunning and quick reflexes to unlock the doors and enter fantastic new worlds.

name: Cannibal Cookout: Lines
summary: This is a sister game to the hugely popular Cannibal Cookout. Lines is a super addictive, simple, yet challenging puzzle game. Remove Cannibal Cookout themed pieces from the board by lining up five pieces of the same colour in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction. Earn gold and skulls that can be transferred straight into Cannibal Cookout and spent at the General Store. Testing wits and reflexes, more pieces are added after every move, forcing you to think ahead to stop the board from filling up. Use special power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Canine
summary: Canine is a PSX style horror game about a boy looking for his dog, kidnapped by an evil corporation that runs experiments with pets.

name: CastleDefense: RaiseArcher
summary: A simple RPG-type defense game! After equipping a secondary weapon from level 5, the fun begins!

name: Cartoon Rage
summary: Gather up to 8 friends in this friendship-strengthening game! Solve puzzles, think together, and beat all levels while having a lot of fun! Meet new obstacles and gameplay mechanics as you progress throughout the game until you reach the ultimate puzzles!

name: Catan: Console Edition Deluxe
summary: Acquire resources, master new strategies, and build your settlements across a board that comes to life. Challenge friends in your living room or play against smart & dynamic AI to become the winning Catanian, then take these skills online with full cross-play compatibility! Take your challenge to the next level with the Deluxe edition which includes 5 previous Catan World Championship board layouts.

name: Cannon Rats
summary: An action game by Gameloft.

name: Cave Ranger
summary: When the Bitty Gang steals the town's livelihood and takes it underground, a lone, brave cowboy must come to the rescue. Cave Ranger is an 8-bit inspired, retro platform game. Rescue sheep, fight outlaws, and face down dangerous critters. With a whip and pistol at his disposal, the cave ranger must traverse old mines, water reservoirs, and even a saw mill! It is a lighthearted, laid back western, full of platformer fun.

name: Cats Fighters
summary: Cats Fighters is an epic game of free fight girls fighting in bikinis in the best beaches in the world, playing the world of women's wrestling or if you prefer can depute in his quick fight mode, ye dispute a fight training, fight against 12 amazing girls and feel the power in your fists, performs amazing special attacks, improve your fighter and skills.

name: Captain Meow
summary: FPS RPG Action Adventure

name: Cats Hidden in Italy
summary: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across Italy in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: CardShark
summary: CardShark is a roguelike card-battler game in which you take the role of a young daring shark, seeking adventure. Battle your way through each floor of a dangerous dungeon in an endeavour to reach the bottom...

name: Cats Hidden in Paris
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in Paris, France in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Capybara Hotel
summary: Welcome to Capybara Hotel! As a newly hired employee, your mission is to find the capybaras that are hidden around the hotel. Explore each area of the hotel, using your observation skills to discover where the capybaras have hidden.

name: Cavimilation
summary: Cavimilation is a 2D shooter/platformer throwback to classic high score chasing games with the addition of modern roguelike elements. Explore an endless procedurally generated cave filled with treasure and monsters, where every mistake takes its toll and where every bullet counts.

name: Cat Forest: Healing Camp
summary:
Have you dreamed of escaping from ordinary life and just go farming?

Become the owner of the campsite and run your own camp.
Collect various cat visitors,
and make your own healing camp.

name: Cache Grabbers
summary: Cache Grabbers is a chill first-person cartography puzzle game. Navigate through 30 levels in a strange environment, using only your compass, metal detector and shovel to find and grab the cache — and maybe even a way to escape.

name: Call of Duty: Vietnam
summary:
Call of Duty: Vietnam is a cancelled installment of the Call of Duty series that was under development by Sledgehammer Games. It was stated to be taking place in the 1960s and 1970s, in Cambodia, Vietnam and Laos.

The game was planned to be in the action/adventure genre and would've been the first third-person only Call of Duty game. After eight months of development, the game had up to 15 minutes playable, at which point Activision offered Sledgehammer the opportunity to help Infinity Ward in the development of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3.

name: Catchy Cheese
summary:
Eat all the cheese you can before running out of moves in this clever little endless puzzler.
Discover awesome characters and unleash power-ups as you progress.

name: Castlevania: Seal of the Eclipse
summary: A Castlevania fan-game.

name: Catloons
summary: Float to mew heights in this wacky endless floater! Avoid the angry clouds while picking up coins to unlock new Catloons. Collect power ups to help you float even higher!

name: Carrom Friends
summary: Carrom Friends sports game is a sport-based tabletop & carrom board game.

name: Care
summary: A game about going on a walk and taking care of your plants.

name: Cards Against Online
summary: Cards Against Online is a webversion of the game Cards Against Humanity.

name: Call of Duty: Warchest
summary: A bundle that contains Call of Duty, its expansion Call of Duty: United Offensive, and Call of Duty 2.

name: Call of Duty: Ghosts - Digital Hardened Edition
summary:
Buy the Call of Duty: Ghosts Digital Hardened Edition and enhance your multiplayer experience with a digital download of Call of Duty: Ghosts and an assortment of bonus digital content, including:

• Call of Duty: Ghosts Season Pass: Get four epic DLC Map Packs*, each delivering a collection of fresh Call of Duty: Ghosts multiplayer content. Plus, you'll receive the Team Leader digital content pack, a Season Pass-bonus that includes a unique MP character head, weapon camo, reticle, player patch, player card and player background, playable in-game upon purchase.
• Digital Hardened Edition In-Game Item Pack: Stand out from the crowd with a unique in-game player patch, player card & player background, a collection of content only available in the Digital Hardened Edition.
• Ghosts Insignia Pack: Show your enemies what you stand for with an in-game Ghosts insignia player patch, player card & player background.

name: Captain the Looper
summary: Captain the Looper is a wave action-shooter game where you take control of Captain The Looper and defend planet Earth from invading aliens. With the help of the entire planet, you must successfully protect humanity.

name: Cantirium: God Slayer
summary: A colorful metroidvania made in pixel art, where we have to help a cat girl save the whole world from inevitable death, and at the same time challenge the gods themselves!

name: Can Your Pet 2: Returns
summary: Can Your Pet? is Cute Chick twist ending game. Your cute pet is waiting for you.

name: Cafe Battle
summary: Café Battle is a cute, but exciting game for 2 players. In this game, there are two adorable witches who want to own their Café. Your tasks are to align with the cute witches, battle your friends & family, and acquire customers as many as possible to win! Swipe your finger to hurl magic balls and leverage 10 unique magic spells to battle your friends & family and to acquire more customers! Adorable roles, exciting battles, and 2 player mode are the three reasons you should play it with your friends & family now!

name: Carve Jr.
summary: Hit the slopes like never before in the all new Carve Jr! This pint sized prequel packs a punch! Use the crank to perform pinpoint accurate, death defying, nonstop gnar action. Chain tricks together to fight your way up the leaderboard and prove your salt. Just don’t let those pesky trees, rocks, and narc skiers be a buzzkill!

name: Calm Falls
summary: Calm Falls is the first released game from Kelven and might be the first german Silent Hill inspired RPG-Maker game.

name: Calm Falls Remaster
summary: Calm Falls Remaster is a remastered version of Kelven's first game Calm Falls. The game stays mostly true to the original but changes the battle system and enhanced the graphical presentation.

name: Calm Falls 2
summary: Calm Falls 2 is the sequel to Kelven's first game Calm Falls. Despite being set in the same town and using the same title, the story is not directly connected and both can be played as an standalone game.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 9
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 11
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 10
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: CandyMouse
summary: With the progress of the times, more and more funny games enter into our life, but I want to ask a question, do you still remember Tom & Jerry on the black and white TV in the old times?

name: Captain Wayne: Vacation Desperation
summary: Captain Wayne is an intense, fast-action Retro Shooter about a sailor with a Shotgun for an arm!! With a cartoony, hand-drawn art style and gory gameplay, you'll have to mow down enemies through 8 action-packed levels to take back what's yours.

name: Cat Tales: Premium Edition
summary: Get on the dragon and fly on an adventure! Run around the flowery meadow with the little cute kitties. Travel on the back of big cats. Grab a magic umbrella and admire the meadows and fields from above. Discover more than 30 themes with fairy tale characters and animals. Play with colors and painting tools.

name: CandyCraft
summary: You want to have a journey to a peaceful and sweet country? Too bad! If you want Candyland to be peaceful, you will have to be strong and defeat all those dangerous creatures. Explore many biomes, tame pets and dragons, fight monsters and bosses, trade with the gingerbread villagers and travel through massive dungeons.

name: Castle Rush Zombies
summary: Castle Rush Zombies is a tower defense game about defending your own castle during a zombie apocalypse. You'll need to build your economy to produce supplies to ensure good defense

name: Cadleiu
summary: "Everything here is destined to die without leaving a trace."Cadleiu is a movement shooter with robust melee mechanics and character progression, featuring permadeath and procedurally generated environments.

name: Car Racing: High on Fuel
summary:
The Ultimate Fast paced Intense Arcade Racing game set in streets of Trip Island with 60 Unique Tracks specifically designed for a high Adrenaline rush is finally here!
Race with 10 High Speed Cars, take them from Stock to Street Monsters.

name: Cat Cafe: Dessert Panic
summary: Cat Cafe Dessert Panic! Is an action-adventure game where you, as Pera, are the waitress at a cafe for cats. The cats are excited to eat, and they'll do anything to get in your way. Do not drop the desserts or it's game over!

name: Captain Dodger: The Hidden Cargo
summary: After clearing the port and killing his enemies, Captain Dodger enters the pirate ship. Avoid their traps and try to unlock all the doors. Be careful though. The pirates have made it pretty tough to navigate their ship hull. Who knows what kind of cargo they might hide in there. Time to unravel the mystery.

name: Castelo Negro
summary: Castelo Negro is a text-based adventure developed by PISC where you need to find a portal to the black castle and get treasures.

name: Can Your Lemon
summary: 'Can Your Lemon?' is a cute simulation game where your lemon is waiting for you!

name: CatSacks
summary: CatSacks is a cozy hidden object game of fuzzy friends with a little twist of Rube Goldbergesque puzzle solving fun. Click, slide, & spin objects to find hidden cats & other animals in four catastical worlds. Cat finds lovingly voiced by my real life kitties & friend's floofs!

name: Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal
summary:
Learn World War II history with a classic hex-and-counter digital war game covering the naval-air battles of the Pacific War, in the South Pacific and Central Pacific in 1942-1943.

Carrier Battles 4 Guadalcanal is a classic hex-and-counter war game covering the naval-air battles during the Pacific War in 1942-1943.

name: Candy's Town
summary:
This time, sweetheart Candy will show her talent of being a mayor. She is just a kid, but she never disappoints people. See~ owing to her great effort, this place becomes fantastic. A little girl may harbor big power, yes, that's Candy.

In this game, she is a nice doctor, young in age, but expert in medical skill; she is a brave firefighter, so putting out a fire and saving people are a piece of cake; she is a righteous policewoman, catching the thief easily with her unique skill. Well, the little mayor may be a super hero, but not a superhuman. Sometimes she is terribly busy and that's why she needs a warmhearted partner like you.

name: Castle of Deceit
summary: Castle of Deceit is a first-person shooting battle game that takes place on an alien planet. You will play the leading role in finding the weak truth in the quagmire of lies and make your decision to find your lover.

name: Causeway
summary: Create intricate and satisfying road systems in tiny utopian cities Causeway is a minimalist road building sim where you help futuristic hover vehicles find their destinations by building roadways to connect different highways. Get ready to build the roadways of the future!

name: Cave Swing
summary:
Falling into a cave is never fun, but things quickly change when you discover that the cave is full of diamonds!
Swing from side to side and collect as many diamonds as possible. Unlock awesome characters with unique abilities, but whatever you do, do not hit the cave walls.

name: Castle of Illusion Starring Mickey Mouse
summary:
To save his girlfriend Minnie from the wicked witch Mizrabel, Mickey must venture into the Castle of Illusion. Crossing six levels (including a magical forest, a toy land and a candy world), he must collect the gems of the rainbow in order to confront and defeat the witch.

Each level features unique obstacles, enemies and a final boss. The enemies can be defeated by jumping on top of them. An alternative way is to pick up objects lying around (like rocks in the forest or blue balls in the toy level) and throwing them at the enemies. Mickey's ability to pick up things and carry them around also leads to some sort of puzzle-oriented gameplay. By placing objects in the right spot and jumping off of them, he can get to areas that are otherwise out of reach. In some levels, he also has to collect keys to open doors. A unique type of object is the treasure chest - by jumping on top of one or throwing it, Mickey gets access to its contents, which might include extra lives, a health power-up or coins to collect for points.

name: Cannelé & Nomnom: Defective Agency
summary: Cannelé & Nomnom: Defective Agency is a fantasy comedy interactive fiction game. Players follow an amnesic individual who hires a duo of disastrous detectives in order to investigate three mysteries.

name: Can't Live Without Electricity
summary: Can't Live Without Electricity is a 3D relaxing puzzle game in which you supply electricity by connecting houses to power plants.

name: Cat Game
summary: This is a zen like game where you have your tea, enjoy the game soundtracks and be with your kittens. Find the differences between them...

name: Cat Pong!
summary:
A cat is traced, linked and put out.
Prettily, a very refreshing puzzle game appeared.
The operation is easy, but the game is deep.

name: Cat Cafe 101
summary: You aim to collect 101 cats. You can also collect the cafe’s food recipes and furniture! They'll come to the cat cafe if you buy canned cat food and give it to a cat.

name: Cars
summary: Play as Lightning McQueen, a rookie racecar looking to win fame and fortune at the Piston Cup Championship, in the video game adaptation of Disney•Pixar's Cars.

name: Cars
summary: Nintendo DS port of Cars.

name: Cars
summary: Cars is a racing game based on the animated movie of the same name. The player takes the role of Lightning McQueen in his quest to win the Piston Cup.

name: Cars
summary: Cars is a racing game based on the animated movie of the same name. The player takes the role of Lightning McQueen in his quest to win the Piston Cup.

name: Cars
summary: Cars is a racing game based on the animated movie of the same name. The player takes the role of Lightning McQueen in his quest to win the Piston Cup.

name: Cars
summary: The Games on Demand version supports English, Spanish. A fun filled racing adventure with Lightning McQueen and all of his friends!

name: Catgotchi: Virtual Pet
summary: Welcome to Catgotchi: Virtual Pet, the ultimate game for all cat lovers! Raise and care for your virtual pet. These adorable pixel-art cats are sure to steal your heart!

name: Car
summary: Demonstrate your strong control ability in the game, allowing players to release their pressure through the game, and the wide track allows you to freely play driving.

name: Casino Heist
summary: Casino Heist is a Romantic Comedy Heist Visual Novel and Dating Sim where you play as ex-Formula One driver Enrique Roca as he charms his way around the Las Vegas Strip to help his crew get away with the Heist of the Century.

name: Cards and Guns
summary: Cards and Guns is a top-down arena shooter roguelite, where you’ll have to defeat hordes of creatures. Choose from a variety of cards and upgrades to create unique builds and survive to the end.

name: Cartel Tycoon: Lieutenants Pack - La Familia
summary: The "Lieutenants Pack - La Familia" DLC unlocks access to a set of 5 Lieutenants and their unique abilities that will aid you in your conquest.

name: Canal Control
summary: A game preloaded on some Nokia mobile phones, this game consist on build the longest pipe you can with the pieces provided before the water reaches the other end. The longer it is, the more points you earn.

name: Cafe Maid
summary:
Have you ever dreamed about being indulged by a maid? How about by a harem of them? In Cafe Maid you can live that dream to the fullest. You take on the role of a maid cafe owner and your task is to manage the place and services. Upgrade and customize the cafe and turn it into the perfect lewd establishment. Gather the cutest talent you can possibly imagine around yourself. Hire a sex maniac streamer, an orally fixated cakegirl, a kinky dominatrix, a bisexual singer, an innocent student, and many more. All of these beauties are dying to get to know you. They are very receptive to your flirting and just love everything you can provide, especially if it involves one of your special private trainings.

Tap the maids to collect money, upgrade their service spots so that they can entertain the guests even more and earn more money. After a time you will be able to automatize this process, freeing up your hands to do something else... for example to hire new maids to do new functions in the cafe, or to help them to provide special services to the customers in one of the back rooms.

When your current cafe is successful enough you can decide to sell it to another investor and get a big profit in return that you can spend on the maids or on managing your brand. Your decisions determine how much more efficiently will your next company earn money.

Don't foget, in Cafe Maid your cafe makes money even while you are AFK (eg. while you are shaving or watching your favorite movies IRL), and when you come back you can spend all that to make your cafe the biggest success around the globe.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 03
summary:
Weapons hot vaqueros.
Alejandro and Valeria face off in Season 03

name: Car Delivery Man
summary: Immerse yourself in the era of the 90s, driving cars of those years. Become a driver who delivers cars to different countries.

name: Cat Rescue
summary: Cat Rescue is a casual 2D Platformer game about a cat finding it's way back home. Can YOU complete the journey?

name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker
summary: Nintendo 3DS port of Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker.

name: Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker
summary: Captain Toad stars in his own puzzling quest on the Nintendo Switch system! Our stubby hero must dodge dangers and track treasures across many trap-filled courses. Survive smoldering volcanoes, hazardous steam engines, haunted houses, and even new courses based on the Super Mario Odyssey game! Luckily, a second player can join in by tossing turnips at enemies.

name: Cat Souls
summary: Will your 7 lives be enough? Use your lives and souls wisely to finish the levels and save your friend! Ruby and her friend went on an adventure and successfully found the mythical Hourglass of time! Sadly the end of that adventure is the beginning of a new one.

name: Catch & Cook
summary: Catch & Cook is a fishing adventure game in which you are not only a fisherman, but also a restaurant owner. Explore the ocean, catch fish and cook them in your own restaurant. A wide variety of fish, recipes and gameplay mechanics await you. So, what are you waiting for?

name: Cat Pipes
summary: Rotate the pieces to create paths of energy and light up the charming scenario with adorable cats. Challenge your mind with the cozy puzzle game of connecting pipes.

name: Cannonfire
summary: Cannonfire is a single-player action roguelite set on the high seas. Set sail to fight off hordes of undead pirates, discover gold and treasure chests, unlock powerful upgrades, upgrade your weapons and wear cool hats!

name: Call of Boba
summary: A cozy pixel art adventure about saving a struggling Boba Tea shop. Brew up tasty drinks, battle enemies for inspiration, make friends with customers, and much much more, on your quest to serve up the best tea in town!

name: Cats Hidden in Bali
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in Bali in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game

name: Car Dealer's Life
summary: Can you succeed as a car dealer? If your answer is yes, start your business by purchasing cars in the city. Remember that you can repair, rent, customize, and have them evaluated by an expert before selling your vehicles.

name: Captain Contraption's Chocolate Factory
summary: An open ended puzzle game. Design and build your own machines to combine ingredients to make chocolates. Automate production using simple components to create ingenious contraptions, which are as satisfying to watch as they are to optimise.

name: Cards We're Dealt
summary: Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and save the office from being dragged to hell in this horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.

name: Cat Needs
summary: Cats are adorable beings but they can be temperamental, some like one thing and some like another. Find the purrfect way to organize the cats so that everyone is happy. Be careful for them don't fight each other.... or eat each other's food by mistake. ΦωΦ

name: Captain Pawsome
summary: Humanity destroyed the climate and left for Mars. Cats are now running the World. Catch rare fishes and find hidden treasures. Clean the environment and craft with recycled resources. Rebuild your Town and Run your own Post-Apo Oceanarium!

name: Castle War
summary: In this real time strategy game, defeat your friends by destroying their castle. The last player with their castle still standing wins! Players must manage their economy, build their base and defenses, while producing and upgrading their units.

name: Camera Birds
summary: Camera Birds is the first free bird watching game for iOS ever. Use your iPhone, iPad, or iTouch to take pictures of birds in a virtual forest. Score points for how good your photos are. Stay on your toes and you might catch a glimpse of a rare bird!

name: Car Rush II
summary:
Car Rush II is action racing game. You must move left or right to avoid other cars.
if you hit other cars your speed is down. Drive as far as you can and break the you or friend's record in limited time.

name: Cadence Cuties
summary: Rock out with one hand in this stunning rhythm game! Choose from exciting J-pop songs or groove to your own imported beat. Feast your eyes on exquisite girls and animations while the music takes you away.

name: Calling Home
summary: Calling Home is an exciting sci-fi simulation resource management game that draws heavily from games in the factory-building and exploration genres, providing a thrilling mix of building your base, researching, factory management, puzzle solving, exploration, and resource gathering.

name: Candy Lattice
summary: Candy Lattice is a fun and addictive puzzle game that challenges your ability to strategize and think on your feet.

name: Captain Moviestar 3D
summary: An FPS starring your favorite platformer character Captain Moviestar… now in full three-dimensions. Early 90’s 2.5D-raycaster-style shooter for the proto-boomer set.

name: Caveman Ransom
summary: A fun 16-bit style platformer where you play a caveman fighting against bandits and dinosaurs. It is perfect for carefree gaming and a must for kids as well as for those who want to experience that 1990s nostalgia!

name: Castle of the Underdogs
summary: Find a castle, recruit friends and try to restore the peace in the Bestann Federation while spreading chaos to most places you step on in this comedy JRPG.

name: Cactus Venture
summary: A platformer about the adventure of a cactus: where it goes and where it ends remains to be seen. You have to play as a cute cactus on a classic platform game. An adventure and arcade game. Also in the game are saws, thorns, doors, and elevators.

name: Cats Hidden Around the World
summary: Find 1500 cats hiding in over 15 iconic locations such as Rio de Janeiro, Istanbul or Tokyo in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Catch Fish
summary: Fishing game. The game offers three options each for various fishing equipment, including bait and hooks, with the latter options for each being locked at the beginning.

name: Caddie
summary: A clone of Dharma Dojo for the Super Famicom, with unique visuals.

name: Campaign
summary: The player controls a bear, and must jump across very small platforms to collect bananas.

name: Cards Survivors
summary: Cards Survivors is a unique mix of card games, action games and roguelikes. Craft a unique deck, slay hordes of enemies, discover cards of immense power and survive as long as you can.

name: Carmageddon 64
summary: The version of Carmageddon 64 released in Germany has the pedestrians changed to dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals as a censorship measure.

name: Carmageddon
summary: Due to being very controversial at the time, Carmageddon was censored in many countries, changing pedestrians for zombies with green blood. An official mod which changed the game back to its original state was later uploaded online by the developers.

name: Carmageddon
summary: The German version of Carmageddon was the most censored version, with the pedestrians changed to robots which spilled black oil.

name: Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now
summary: In many regions, the game was censored, changing the pedestrians to zombies with green blood.

name: Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now
summary: The German version of Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now had the pedestrian changed to aliens as a censorship measure.

name: Carmageddon
summary: Game Boy Color port of Carmageddon II: Carpocalypse Now.

name: Catacomb Master
summary:
Catacomb Master is a 2d platform game in which you have to play as a treasure hunter cat. Go down into the depths of the catacombs for treasures, use your bow and arrows, test your ingenuity.

Find treasures to become a true Catacomb Master.

name: Cat Search in Medieval Times
summary: Can you find all the hidden cats in this medieval city? More than 100 cats needs to be found! Sit back, relax, and explore this beautifully hand-drawn city.

name: Car Parkour
summary: Are you bored of doing the same thing? Take a break and try this racing game of Car Parkour!

name: Carmageddon
summary:
Carmageddon for Sony PlayStation - is a unique version of the first game from the Carmageddon series.

Due to the serious PlayStation's hardware limitations nearly everything was done from scratch for this release. That is why all the levels are completely different from what was created for the original game. Also, the zombies were made as 3D models instead of sprites (by the way, there is no possibility to turn on pedestrians as an alternative to zombies, but their blood is still red).

name: Carmageddon: TDR 2000
summary: Cancelled port for the Game Boy Color.

name: Camper Van: Make it Home
summary: Decorate and organize the camper van of your dreams! Embark on a journey of self-discovery as you build your own home-on-wheels, using a combination of creative block organization puzzles and relaxing interior design. Make your heart feel at ease and your camper van feel like home.

name: Cards of the Realm
summary: A lightweight deck builder. Explore over a dozen unique zones and collect heroes for your deck.

name: Category Challenge
summary: Category Challenge is a quiz game. The game will ask questions randomly, and there will be four answers below. The correct answer will enter the next question.

name: Cave Crawler
summary: Cave Crawler is a short horror game where you pilot a drone into a cave and discover something horrible.

name: Cat Escape! Infinity！
summary: Do you like the game of cat and mouse? Are you ready to challenge the squid game and win the final victory to survive? The most popular hide and seek endless version of the game is back again, which adds a lot of Kawaii's cat image and a lot of little girl's skin for you to choose from. look out! The furry cat has begun to look for your trace. Hide and win!

name: Car Cops
summary: It is up to you to make sure everyone has no contraband!

name: Cat Gamer
summary:
If you need to relax and your pet is bored, then this application will help you.
Open the world of games for your pet and go about your business or watch your cat get achievements.
In our collection of mini games, your pet will be able to find their favorite game for themselves.

name: Caona
summary: In Caona, you take part in an Action Adventure Game set in a fictional world based on South American mythology.

name: Castle of Dracula
summary: Castle of Dracula is a puzzle game, developed and released by Yun Sung in 1994.

name: Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Fight 2001
summary: Capcom vs SNK: Millennium Fight 2001 is an unlicensed port of Capcom vs. SNK: Millennium Fight 2000. Presumably based on the work done on the Game Boy Color port of Street Heroes, there are possibilities that Ei-How Yang was the main programmer of this game as well, despite unproven and incorrect assumptions of Makon Soft being involved.

name: Cafe Venus Flytrap
summary: You're a fly. A fly whose hobbies consist of writing novels and eating sweets. One day you decide to check out a new cute cafe that promises an abundance of pastries, sweets and drinks. A cafe that is run by adorable froggos.

name: Catch The Fox
summary: It's a massive game of tag, who will win?

name: Cartoon Universe
summary:
Cartoon Universe was a browser-based game developed by WB Games Montreal featuring Looney Tunes and Scooby-Doo characters. It was described as a free-to-play online world that will provide a safe, social environment for young kids to go on adventures, solve puzzles and play games with their favorite Looney Tunes and Scooby-Doo! characters

The game was free-to-play with micro-transactions and a subscription option. It had an open beta in 2012 and was released for browsers in May 2013 with an iOS version available soon after.

After the game was shutdown its mini-games were re-released in Cartoon Universe: Arcade and Wayforward reworked the story elements into Cartoon Universe: Adventure, though the animated cutscenes were replaced with character cutouts during text sections.

name: Captive Audience
summary: A first person Narrative Thriller set in the confines of the Dark Web TV show "Captive Audience", a sadistic sitcom.

name: Cattle Hyperdrive
summary: Cattle Hyperdrive is a space trucking open world game that takes place across the solar system.

name: Camelot 2: The Holy Grail
summary: A terrible disease has struck Queen Guinevere! The only thing that can save her is the Holy Grail. But the ancient artefact has long been lost somewhere in the expanses of Avalon. Can you manage to overcome all obstacles, find the Grail, and save the queen?

name: Candlelight: Lament
summary: Ed broke the curfew to visit his friends in order to find out the truth of his granddaughter's disappearance, but the truth was far more terrible than he thought.

name: CargoSpace
summary: Deliver packages in a world torn by goddesses. Working for Cargon they guarantee your package will arrive no matter what hazards!

name: Cast Out Colony
summary: Cast Out Colony combines roguelite and bullet-heaven action with robust town-building elements. Choose from various characters, fight hordes of foes, and grow your colony, which in return grows your stats, offering a unique twist on the survival genre.

name: Cabin Rush
summary: Explore and gather resources to build traps, towers, and walls to protect your cabin from increasingly difficult waves of monsters.

name: Castlewatch
summary: Castlewatch is a classical Tower Defense Game

name: Castle of Blackwater
summary: Castle of Blackwater is a multiplayer social deduction game where 10 players navigate a magical 2D castle while completing tasks and uncovering hidden allegiances. Players are assigned to three different factions, each equipped with unique abilities that support their role in the game. While alive, participants use various tools to gather information and identify threats, while eliminated players can influence the outcome by collecting souls to purchase power-ups for their team. Through alliance-building, deception, and strategic ability usage, players work to ensure their faction's survival and ultimate control of the castle.

name: Cards, Universe & Everything
summary: Cards, the Universe and Everything (CUE) is the ultimate CCG where you collect and trade thousands of cards and battle them in epic games.

name: Call of the Sea VR
summary:
Call of the Sea VR is an otherworldly tale of mystery and love, set in the 1930s South Pacific. You’ll explore a lush island paradise, solve puzzles and unlock secrets in refreshing new ways with Meta Quest.

Go on the hunt for your husband’s missing expedition as Norah Everhart, fully voice-acted by Cissy Jones (Firewatch, The Walking Dead: Season 1), and take in the beautiful sights of a cryptic land, uncovering occult mysteries and venturing through forgotten ruins. What will you find among the remnants of a lost civilization?

name: Caveman Birdminton
summary:
Easy to play yet difficult to master, Caveman Birdminton fast and fluid gameplay and a huge range of unique player styles and characteristics to unlock and play.
With just a simple one-fingered swipe you’ll soon be thumping crosscourt winners, yet at the core of Caveman Birdminton is a highly sophisticated physics engine that rewards tactical play.

name: Can Your Talking?
summary: Teach your talking to your pet.

name: Castlevania: Maria of Sorrow
summary: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow mod that replaces Soma with Maria Renard, with many other changes to go with it.

name: Catwoman
summary: The Game Boy Advance version of the Catwoman movie license video game. The look of the graphics aims toward a comic-book feel instead of the more realistic-looking 3D of the console and PC versions.

name: Captain America: Super Soldier
summary: The Nintendo 3DS port of Captain America: Super Soldier.

name: Captain America: Super Soldier
summary: The Wii port of Captain America: Super Soldier.

name: Catan
