summary: There is hardly a board game award that the "Settlers of Catan" game, created by Klaus Teuber, has not won. This classic has a global fan community and has been translated into 25 languages over its last 13 successful years. Catan, the legendary strategy game for Nintendo DS provides gaming fun any time, anywhere. True to the original game, you can compete with up to four players for the most settlements, the longest roads and the largest army. You can trade with each other and claim the precious land with all its resources. If there are no other players available, various Catanians, each with their own individual characteristics, will prove themselves worthy competitors: the pirate Jean, who knows no compromise, Vincent the merchant, who never allows himself to be cheated, Sean the knight, who takes what is rightfully his... Find out if you really are a secret colonialist, confront your rivals and become Lord of Catan! Includes: The Settlers of Catan Seafarers Game Expansion Embark on a quest to settle the island, build ships, and chart the nearby waters. Discover far-off mines and use gold and combinations of resources grain, wool, ore, brick and timber to develop your ever expanding empire.

name: Caged
summary:
An English Yume Nikki fangame created by MichaelaGlass.

Keiji is a young boy stuck in his small, unkept room; unwilling to leave it for a reason he doesn't want to think about. The only way he can escape the room is by going to bed and exploring his dreams. Explore his unconscious to uncover effects and help him escape his reality...

name: CarRage
summary: CarRage is an addictive arcade racing game, that reveals a post-apocalyptic universe, ruled by mad and desperate drivers. Experience mind blowing races on a number of tough-looking vehicles: starting with a dusty rust-bucket and a van armed with a circular saw and ending with an indestructible truck blasting away everything in its way!

name: Cassette Boy
summary: All you see is all there is - Cassette Boy: an RPG where what exists depends on you.

name: Carrot: The First Seed
summary: A tiny visual novel about a tiny coastal town.

name: Cars and Girls
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts.

name: Car Dealer Simulator
summary: Uncover a goldmine in the used car market! Sniff out deals, buy low, modify, and sell high. Your journey from amateur grease monkey to car dealer magnate awaits. How fast will you rise in this lucrative venture?

name: Capytopia
summary: Embrace the vibrant world of Capytopia, your new puzzle paradise! Unravel delightful puzzles featuring funny animals, adorable girls, and capybaras! Can you master the challenge? Capytopia awaits you! Dive into a world of colorful delight and challenge your wits with a lot of levels.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Shin Neon
summary:
Calmed by the Dark Shin Neon is an action RPG set in a future where creatures, known as Biomorphics, live between humans. Being a danger to mankind, an organization of hunters was created to terminate them...

In this action-packed game, you'll take on the role of Tommy, a hunter tasked with protecting the city and stopping the Biomorphic threat. With a mission-based structure, you'll embark on thrilling missions to uncover the truth behind the Biomorphics.

name: Cargo Truck Racer
summary: Race through challenging tracks with automatic movement and fragile cargo management. Collect stars, climb the leaderboards, and unlock achievements in this fast-paced, truck racing game with an energetic drum n bass soundtrack and low-poly graphics.

name: Camping Park Simulator
summary: Become a campsite owner to bring people joy and unforgettable experiences! Be the first who dared to buy an abandoned park near Route 66. You're not afraid to get in the spirit of the story and decide to make sure the campsite is filled with lively, unusual tourists.

name: Candy Zero
summary: 200 levels in one world. Complete one level, you can find a sweet cat and get coin. You can unlock more worlds.

name: Camelot: Wrath of the Green Knight - Collector's Edition
summary: Camelot: Home of King Arthur’s court… and intrigue! When the Lady of the Lake goes missing, her husband the Green Knight blames King Arthur, threatening the peace of Camelot for all…

name: Cartuchito World
summary: A Super Mario World ROM hack based on the web show Cartuchito.

name: Catgotchi: Virtual Pet - Deluxe Edition
summary: Welcome to Catgotchi: Virtual Pet, the ultimate game for all cat lovers! Raise and care for your virtual pet. These adorable pixel-art cats are sure to steal your heart!

name: Carry Onward
summary: Carry Onward is a narrative gameplay short that follows a grieving man as he packs up his home. Immerse yourself in his thoughts and emotions by interacting with items, which shape his internal state. Experience the transformative power of memories and the hope that arises from embracing change.

name: Caved-in
summary: Welcome to Caved-in, a crazy, cute, and colorful parallel universe full of exploration and combat. Interact with cute and funny NPC's that will help you in your effort to escape the caverns of Quarry-135.

name: Capt Crabs a Slimy Adventure
summary: Capt Crabs, the pirate crab, was out with his crew searching for treasure on a mysterious island when suddenly his ship was taken by some mischievous slimes! Now he's on a mission to retrieve his ship and treasure and get back to the pirate life he loves!

name: Camplandia
summary: Build and manage a thriving summer camp. Hire staff and provide activities for campers as you grow your revenue and reputation. Unlock new facilities and camp activities to bring your dream camp to life in this immersive simulation.

name: Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe
summary: Experience the challenges and triumphs of leading a tribe in Cavemen: The Rise of Tribe. Explore, mine, hunt, and build your way to success. Customizable buildings, resource management, and population growth make every playthrough unique.

name: Cargo Delivery
summary: In the game, you become a driver of a car that carries various goods to remote villages, located in snowy areas.

name: Catchup
summary: An original board game from a design by game designer Nick Bentley. Players try to build the largest contiguous region of their color by filling spaces on a hexagon grid. Players alternate filling tiles, usually two at a time, but the trailing player can place an extra tile.

name: Cataclismo
summary: The Cataclismo left us broken. Construct fortresses and defend against waves of Horrors in this mix of tower defense and real-time strategy. Lead an expedition beyond the gates of the last city, and reclaim mist-shrouded ruins as you rebuild humanity—stone by stone.

name: Canvas Menagerie
summary: A slice of life boys love romance about a group of TV actors going through their mid-20s together.

name: Castle Craft
summary: Castle Craft is a game where players build huge castles in an ancient war-torn world and defend them against hordes of enemies in chaotic siege battles of epic proportions. Castle Craft is a unique blend of voxel sandbox, action, and horde defence.

name: Candyhouse
summary: Throw candy at your enemy but try not to get hit!

name: Cahoots
summary: A digital implementation of the cooperative board game.

name: Call of Duty 4: Promod
summary: The official competition mod for CoD4, notably removing perks and Create-a-Class level restrictions, adding several QoL features and bridging the game closer to its contemporaries and past games in the series.

name: Campfire Cat Cafe
summary: A purrfectly relaxing game! Start your cafe in the forest. Hire adorable cat staff. Cook delicious authentic foods from around the world! Attract and serve cute animal customers and laugh at their furry funny stories. Relax and earn tips as your kitten staff works while you're idle.

name: Cave Chaos
summary: Cave Chaos is a platforming game created by Nitrome. You're a miner whose goal is to escape a collapsing cave. Start running immediately and pick up the loot on your way before reaching the end of the level. Jump over the boxes swiftly but carefully to avoid falling alongside the rocks. Don't forget to make use of the power-ups such as double-jump, invincibility and bombs. There is so much to explore in Starfish Cove. Play Cave Chaos with a friend to maximize the fun!

name: Cat Quest III
summary: In Cat Quest III you play as a purrivateer in a freely explorable 2.5D open-world swarming with Pi-rats. You can sail the seas in your ship for treasures galore! But prepare for peril, as the Pirate King aims to hunt you down...

name: Cataclysm
summary: Breach the Sinner's Paradise as the Aztec god of death, Mictian, and kill all angels.

name: Cavera: The Island of Apes
summary: Cavera - Island of Apes: top vacation spot for Apes and degens. Socialize, dance with up to 99 others. Explore, swim, chill on this multiplayer game.

name: CapybaRun
summary: We're trying to find the items we need in a dark and scary maze and fighting against a giant creature that is chasing us!

name: Cabernet
summary: Cabernet is a 2D narrative RPG set in 19th century Eastern Europe. Guide Liza, a young vampire struggling with her morality and the supernatural world she has been pulled into. Beware, the taste of Cabernet is not for the faint of heart - prepare to explore themes of social conflict, alcoholism, and corruption.

name: Casting Whispers
summary: Sound is your only hope for survival in this first-person psychological horror game. Investigate the mysteries of an apartment block in 1960s America terrorized by a cosmic horror, as you try to save your lost mentor… and yourself.

name: Castaway Station
summary: An anomaly has destroyed your cruiser, stranding you alone on a hostile planet. Castaway Station is a roguelike deck-builder game with limited-use cards and permanent death. Complete dangerous missions to locate other survivors and gather the resources you need to live another day.

name: Catography
summary: Catography is a collectathon platformer, with a cute and cosy aesthetic, and most importantly… Filled with kittens!!! Your main and only goal consists on exploring and creating a map for this island you've just discovered. That's right, you are a cartographer cat!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 06: Taizo Kiyokura
summary: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Cassette Beasts: Deluxe Edition
summary: This edition contains everything you need for the complete Cassette Beasts experience. Set out to explore the world of New Wirral with max expression, unique apparel, and accessories in the Cosplay Pack!

name: Card Lords
summary: Construct your dream deck from an amazing hoard of magical Creatures and Heroes in trading card game (TGC). Dozens of cards to collect with various qualities and abilities. Easy to pick gameplay with deep strategy ensured! Challenge yourself and other players in PvP Arena and try to be the best TCG card collector!

name: Casca a Cobra
summary: Casca a Cobra is a strategy game where you need to chase a snake and eat its body up to the head.

name: Candy Crush Saga
summary: An Adobe Flash port of Candy Crush Saga that was playable on Facebook until it was replaced by a HTML5 version when Flash was discontinued.

name: Cat Ping Pong
summary: Cat Ping Pong is an arcade style ping pong game. The user controls a cat paddle to bat a yarn ball back and forth against its opponent. Use the meddling rat in the middle of the field to gain speed, and change trajectory of the ball to score on the opposing cat!

name: Carved Out
summary: Carved Out is an inn building and management game with classic cRPG inspired visuals. Carve your place to a mountain far from settlements, near to dungeons among adventurers to attract heroes travelling through the area! Rent out rooms, create amazing stone works, provide creative services.

name: Carnival in the Hut
summary: There are ingredients on the level that you have to drag into the pot. Drag into the pot: eggs, oil, water in a bucket, flour in a bag, and dough.

name: Catcha Snatcha
summary: In this VIC-20 game from 1983, busy store detective Barney Bootlace must appease the shop manager by running around the shop floor dealing with various problems, from dealing with lost property and children, to apprehending shoplifters and even dealing with planted bombs!

name: Caislean: Paranormal
summary: A dynamic survival-horror game featuring gadget setup and point-and-click sequences. Investigate the castle during the day and place cameras, sensors, and snares throughout the explored environment. Locate paranormal hotspots and read clues about countering enemies.

name: Calcium Contract
summary: Calcium Contract is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you're on a mission to finish a contract that got out of hand. Learn to swiftly move around your enemies and master your arsenal as you fight your way toward the grand finale.

name: Camping
summary: Survive and RUN... Survive a massacre at the camp as you grab keys and logs to get out and increase the explorable area Can you Beat the game in the hardest difficulty and unlock 100% of all the achivements

name: Cat-aclysm
summary: A 3D isometric action-adventure game where the player must use different abilities throughout the game to defeat enemies and solve puzzles.

name: Cartel Tycoon: San Rafaela
summary: San Rafaela is a vast new map featuring ferry routes, stunning landmarks, and an immersive storyline! The destiny of San Rafaela lies in your hands!

name: Call of Zombie
summary: Call of Zombie is a survival shooting game set in the World War II era. As waves of zombies approach, your task is to protect the armory. By skillfully utilizing the remains of zombies, you can achieve unexpected effects and outcomes.

name: Cave of Past Sorrows
summary: Rush straight into the action. Embrace the fast-paced bullet hell, hidden within the Cave of Past Sorrows. Watch your past, present, and future collide in a surreal spectacle.

name: Carrom Slam!
summary: The classic tabletop game Carrom is brought to you in a true to life 3D simulation. Play the turn-based coin-flicker your way with customizable rules, boards, and strikers. All games modes available to play with 4+ friends, strangers, or variable difficulty bots.

name: Carrot Cake Jinkaku Shuffle Jiken
summary:
The Fata Morgana no Yakata's whole gang is gathered for a last tea party around a carrot cake. The cake is so delicious that, to everybody displeasure, their souls got shuffled!
Let's begin the Carrot Cake Soul-Shuffling Incident!

2015 April Fools' game by Novectacle.

name: Call of Dooty
summary: Call of Dooty is a remake of the classic E1M1: Hangar level, parodying contemporary first-person shooters with their features like linear level design, disrupting cutscenes, and regenerating health.

name: Call of Dooty II: Green Ops
summary: Call of Dooty II: Green Ops is a five-level jokewad for Doom II and the GZDoom source port by Matthew Christian (Chubzdoomer). It was released on November 13, 2012, and received the Mockaward at that year's Cacowards.

name: Call of Dooty III: Spectres
summary: If you've already seen and/or played the first two parts, you'll know exactly what to expect from the third.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 04
summary:
Al Mazrah, Urzikstan, Ashika Island, Las Almas . . . and now, Vondel.
The waterfront district of a Baroque European city where centuries of old-world history blends with modern architectural developments, Vondel saw a complete evacuation due to an imminent attack threat, right as Operators descended into the darkness of the Al Mazrah Koschei Complex during a fierce sandstorm at the culmination of Season 03.
While Vondel is a brand-new locale for Operators to explore, the ensuing chaos is part of a plan activated by a familiar and infamous masked figure, whose forces are operating in both Al Mazrah and Vondel. Peer through the dust clouds, and you’ll recognize the apparent leader of these unknown forces:
His name is Nikto. And he’s ready to Run This Town.

name: Cart Life
summary: An expanded game of Cart Life (2010) which shares the same name with the originally released game.

name: California Waves
summary: Amped to surf the biggest waves? Ride the tube like never before, no ankle busters here!

name: Cat and Ladder Climb
summary: Cat and Ladder Climb is a 2D pixel vertical scrolling action game. Jump over scaffolding, use "ladders", and aim for the top goal!There are various modes such as Default mode aiming for the top, Endless mode competing to see how high you can climb, and offline PvP mode!

name: Can't Be Touched
summary: Don't let the evil spirit touch your soul.

name: Cambrian Dawn: Biceratopsidae DLC
summary: Welcome 11 brand new species from the Family Biceratopsidae into your game!

name: Castle Crafter
summary: A Craft online battle game in a voxel world with many single and online game modes like deathmatch and capture the flag.

name: Cat Lobster Simulator
summary: Beautiful simple and cute game where you raise a Cat Lobster. Feed, play, wash and rest your cat lobster in real time. Earn gold coins in minigames, and customise the lobster's tank! If you raise your cat lobster well, it will moult its shell and evolve into an adult cat lobster.

name: Cannon Target
summary: Cannon Target - A simple puzzle game, the only goal of the player is to choose the firing direction of the cannon and hit the target.

name: Card Detective
summary: "Card Detective" is a unique single-player card game that combines card gameplay, deduction, collection, and educational elements. The game features an engaging storyline and innovative gameplay.

name: Carreta Furacão: The Legend
summary: Carreta Furacão: The Legend is an endless runner based on a group of costume characters who dance and do stunts around the streets that became popular in Brazil at that time, being developed by students of Amazonas State University's Game Lab.

name: CarLife Simulator
summary: CarLife Simulator is a realistic car driving simulator with fun and challenges for the driver. Ideal for learning how to drive a car in different conditions, off-road cities, racing tracks for every taste, all this is available in CarLife Simulator.

name: Cannibal Tales
summary: Horror thriller visual novel written by cult director Ruggero Deodato. A cannibal story in three episodes. Embark on a challenging journey, where every choice has a price and consequences. Will you be able to reach the end without getting your soul devoured? Dare to decide!

name: Cabin of Souls
summary: Cabin of Souls is a mix between a horde-based rogue-lite and a tower defense game, where the player is one of the towers. The player has the choice of either upgrading their defenses, or upgrading their weapons, leading to very different gameplay depending on the player's upgrading strategy.

name: Castle Burn
summary:
Welcome to Castle Burn, the mobile fantasy RTS game with competitive PvP battles!
Fire Pillars, Cannon Towers, Vikings, Dragons, use whatever you want to fight alongside great Heroes to burn down your enemy's castle!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Dodge, Plymouth, Chrysler Remastered
summary: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Dodge | Plymouth | Chrysler Remastered includes 8 licensed cars from 3 manufacturers!

name: Call of Mini: Sniper
summary:
Call of Mini-Sniper is a first-person action game where you play as an expert sniper who's trying to survive the zombie apocalypse and save as many civilians as possible along the way. Thankfully, you have your faithful sniper rifle by your side.

In Call of Mini-Sniper, you don't have to move your character; all you have to do is focus on your aim. By tapping the screen, you can use the sniper's viewfinder for more precise shots. To pull the trigger, just tap the button on the bottom right corner of the screen.

name: Canadian Higurashi
summary: Keiichi Maebara has just moved to the quiet little village of Hinamizawa in the winter of 2006 and quickly becomes inseparable friends with schoolmates Rena Ryuguu, Mion Sonozaki, Satoko Houjou, and Rika Furude. One of Keiichi's classmate start to act strange and ask him all sort of weird question. While trying to help her, he unearth the darkness that lurks over seemingly idyllic life they lead.

name: Cartoon Network: Battle Crashers
summary: A cancelled DS port of Cartoon Network: Battle Crashers.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 07 - Chrono Shindou
summary: Set including Fighter "Chrono Shindou" and sleeves.

name: Car Rush I
summary:
Car Rush is a simple driving game. Avoid other cars, and survive as long as possible.
Also do not forget to watch the fuel gauge. When make it run out of fuel, the game is over.

name: Castle of Heart + Jet Kave Adventure Bundle
summary: Experience two thrilling adventures in this action packed bundle.

name: Cat Named Spirit
summary: The game follows a cat asking about the developer's life.

name: Cate P
summary:
Cate P is a fast-paced one-button game.

You score points by destroying the caterpillars crawling around you. When you press a button you will rotate clockwise and shoot in the direction you were looking at before. Try to hit the caterpillars and avoid being hit by them. You score points by shooting the segments of a caterpillar.

The game is over when any caterpillar touches you.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Additional Card Set Vol. 4 D-SS03: Stride Deckset - Chronojet
summary: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 07: Chrono Shindou
summary: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Catass
summary: In Catass, you'll be a cat and show your great superiority to your human through fun and short adventures, puzzles, achievements, and lots of humor.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Griffin: Pro Pack
summary: Get Call of Duty Points and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Warzone.

name: Café Enchanté: Limited Edition
summary: When Kotone inherits her grandfather's Tokyo café, she discovers the shop holds more secrets than anyone could imagine. The café is a meeting spot for beings from multiple, mystical worlds. You’ll meet the king of demons, a humanoid beast, a fallen angel, and more. And when government agents monitoring non-human activities show up at your door, your new café is about to become a lot more colorful.

name: Capsman 3D
summary:
Capsman 3D! The new battle of the coffee bean can start now!

Capsman now has to save the coffee beans from its enemies but once again the biodegradable capsules will give him more energy for reaching the goal. Who plays with Capsman 3D must overcome many obstacles and enemies even more insidious.

name: Cars
summary: Arcade Port of Cars 2.

name: Cafe ma Cherie: Otome of Ikemen Cafe
summary:
Otome game by Dearead, originally released in 2017.

Now available in the Otome games Romance Box app.

name: Cardania: Epoch Wars
summary: Epoch Wars is a live multiplayer strategy game with hundreds of players from around the world. Battle for strategic resources, explore mysterious anomalies, earn EXP and Victory Points for yourself and one of 7 unique Factions, all vying for control of Cardania! Experience a dynamic, shifting map which provides players with a totally fresh experience every 5 days (called an Epoch). Epoch wars utilizes the latest in fast and secure blockchain + NFT technology, so players truly own their lands, cards, and battle units!

name: Cat Raid
summary:
Defend the Earth from the attack of huge cats from outer space!
Bounce the flying cats by using a trampoline.

name: Casino Resort
summary: Casino Resort is a mobile social online multiplayer casino game from the Japanese game developer and publishing giant, Colopl. Have fun building and managing your own casino resort while checking out the casino games!

name: Castle Tintagel
summary: Embark on a epic quest of revenge in this nostalgic retro action platformer. Exclusively built for the playdate. Play as Gawain, the last remaining knight of the round table and fight your way through the evil that Morgana has unleashed onto this world. Take down epic bosses with the aid of Merlin and Gwenevere in the fight to reclaim Tintagel Castle from the evil Sorceress Morgana.

name: CatxBlock
summary: Cute browser-based board strategy game for 2 or 4 players. Grab more land than your rivals. Change cute cat skins and hats, use magic, play on different maps and modes. Don't forget that CATmentator is watching you!

name: Cats Hidden in Paris: Extra Level
summary: Play a brand new level enriched with intricate details, vividly illustrating the mesmerizing city of love! 100 Cats have once again decided to hide themselves but this time it will prove to be a much greater challenge to find them all!

name: Call of the VoYD Genesis
summary: Top Down Action Shooter with Discord connect for competitions.

name: Castle Crashers & Pit People Bundle
summary: A kaleidoscope of colorful combat, enjoy two of The Behemoth's couch co-op adventures in one lovingly wrapped package!

name: Candleman Complete Journey Bundle with Wenjia
summary: One of our best-selling game Wenjia is now added into Candleman Definitive Edition with no additional charge!

name: Cabezurrio vs Robots
summary: Platform game in which we control Cabezurrio, a soldier who must collect all the gems and destroy all the robots in its path in several different scenarios. We have a rifle with which to shoot the robots.

name: CatJump
summary:
How high can you get?
Become a cat, use various tools, defeat monsters, complete missions and unlock themes to enjoy new costumes!

name: Cafe Master Story
summary:
Have you ever wanted to run your own coffee shop?
The smell of fresh roast beans, the gurgling of the espresso machine, the sheen of a squeaky-clean counter... All this and more await you in this quirky sim game!
Just set up your tables and counter seats, and wait for the customers to come rolling in. Add handy features like magazine racks, or chic furnishings to give your cafe a more welcoming atmosphere.

name: Castlerama
summary:
Castlerama takes you on a photorealistic walk through a beautiful, detailed and accurately lit 3D setting. Merging real and imaginary elements, it draws inspiration from the charming town of Assisi, in Italy. You are left to find your own way around by touch and sight alone. Exploring a whole world becomes a matter of lifting your fingers.
Our goal? To fool your eyes and brain considering it all real. When you go back with your memory to the day you first opened this Mentalbox, you will think it was you on the cobblestone, you in the alleys, you in the catacombs...

name: Castle Ramble
summary: Castle Ramble is an infinite Roguelite Platformer for your mobile devices from the developers of Unbroken Soul! Train your king, customize it, and recover your castle from the invader pigs!

name: CatHotel
summary:
Manage your very own cattery:
Mrs. Miller has to go on an urgent business trip and the Smith family are looking for accommodation for their house cat while they're on vacation.
Your cattery is the purrfect place for them! Care for the kitties, feed them and play with them until their owners come to pick them up again.

name: Causal Effect
summary: This is a text-based deduction game. Your choices will change the development of events, make up different timelines, and lead to different endings. Your primary task is to sort out the cause-and-effect relationships between events from textual descriptions.

name: Casting Shadows
summary: Eris has had a rough life, and to her it feels like she's just living day to day, trying to make things work. She has always had a hard time connecting with others, but soon she will learn to put her trust into an unlikely source and will discover her destiny is hiding in the shadows.

name: Call of Outlaws
summary: Explore a truly enormous Wild West frontier full of cowboys, bandits. Realistic great story.

name: Caverns of Darkness
summary:
The final rift was closed and the Hell War was over at last. The citizens of the Earth celebrated for the first time in almost six years. The forces of Hell had been beaten. Humanity had won. Now began the long process of burrying the dead and rebuilding, but the nations of Earth were united now, and they were willing to work together to usher in a golden age of peace.

However, all was not as well as it had seemed, for six months later, more Hellspawn began to appear and the air was once again heavy with cries of pain and screams of death. The war was not over yet, after all. You were stationed at the top secret military base when the source of the latest demonic invasion was pinpointed. Once again, the Marine Coprs was called upon to do battle with the damned. Your recon platoon was the first to go in.

The target location was a mining facility owned by the UAC. At least, officially, it was a mining facility, but upon investigation, it became clear that more had been going on here than mining. The place was abandoned, yet the machinery was in full operation. There simply were no people there. There seemed to be no Hellspawn, either. Once the area was secured, attention was turned to the mines. Half of the platoon went in to investigate and you were ordered with the other half to keep the area secure.

About thirty minutes later, the telemetry from the team in the mines was blocked by an energy surge, and suddenly, you and your buddies were surrounded by Hellspawn. They literally came out of nowhere, biting and snarling, and no matter how many you and the others blasted, more seemed to fill the gaps.

When ammo was running low, you and the other marines took cover. Somehow, you got separated from the others, and when all was quiet, you came out to see what had happened. Of the Hellspawn and your buddies, there was no sign, except for a trail of blood leading into the mines. With the sun setting red at your back, you stood looking at the mine entrace which under the fiery glare looked like the gaping maw of some Hellish beast waiting to devour you alive.

Screwing your courage to the sticking place, you draw your pistol, the only weapon you have left, and enter the Mine...

name: Cat Burglar
summary: In this edgy, over-the-top, interactive trivia toon, answer correctly to help Rowdy the Cat evade Peanut the Security Pup to steal some prized paintings.

name: Captain Underpants: Epic Choice-o-rama
summary: In this interactive special, Harold and George need your decision-making skills to stop Krupp from blowing their beloved treehouse to smithereens.

name: Carmen Sandiego: To Steal or Not to Steal
summary: You drive the action in this interactive adventure, helping Carmen save Ivy and Zack when V.I.L.E. captures them during a heist in Shanghai.

name: Caxy Gambá Encontra o Monstruário
summary: Caxy Gambá Encontra o Monstruário is a point-and-click adventure game that tells the story of Caxy Gambá, a marsupial who, during a stormy night, takes shelter in a mansion in the middle of nowhere. It was produced by 44 Bico Largo, idealized by Ale McHaddo, and had the special participation of José Mojica Marins, playing his trash horror film character Coffin Joe.

name: Carnage Oasis
summary: Carnage Oasis is a short episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards. This month's project lead is 40oz.

name: Capybara Quest
summary: A simple platformer about a Capybara who goes on a quest to rescue their baby.

name: Candlemass
summary: 1 medium-sized map for Boom-compatible source ports with a monochrome theme, with a second map to stop the player from progressing into the stock maps.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Graffiti Tactical: Pro Pack
summary: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Warzone.

name: Cage Fight
summary:
Cage Fight is a parody of River City Ransom that pits MMA fighters against people who abuse animals.

Take control of real MMA fighters Jake Shields, Aaron Simpson, and Georgi Karakhanyan to see if you have the moves to foil a secret underground animal testing ring in PETA's game.

name: Catan: Console Edition - Super Deluxe
summary: Play the official video game of Catan on Console! On a board that comes to life, challenge friends locally or play the AI, then take these skills online with full cross-play compatibility! The Super Deluxe edition includes The Helpers, Championship Maps, Dice Skin & Hex Frames.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Countries Mode
summary: Every capital of every country, with national flags.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Currency Mode
summary: Teach yourself the currencies of the world.

name: Capitals Quizzer: Landmarks Mode
summary: Learn the location of famous landmarks around the world!

name: Capitals Quizzer: Regions Mode
summary: Learn local regions and their capital cities.

name: Cat Park
summary: In Cat Park your city is building a park just for cats. Your goal is, of course, to stop that from happening (because who would want a park just for cats?). Using disinformation tactics like emotional language and polarization, you turn the public against the park!

name: CatWorld
summary: CatWorld is a 3D world exploration application. It's scary and lonely out there. Good luck, and may all your dreams come true.

name: Casio Mario World
summary: An extremely hard hack.

name: Cats on Duty
summary: Cats on Duty is a purr-fect blend of RTS, tower defense and match-3 mechanics. Manage two game fields at once, arm and upgrade your cat towers to defeat hordes of formidable foes. Enjoy the meow-nificent battle!

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas
summary: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Cat’s Cosmic Atlas takes you through the Southern and Northern skies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn a thing or two about the vast Universe that surrounds us.

name: Cats Game
summary: It is a cat game where you can control a kitty. Eat, drink, play with toys. Run from a dog, drop the vase. Do what usually cats do. Say meow. Explore the world. It is a cat adventure simulation.

name: Captain Buttface
summary: Captain Buttface is the superhero we all need and want, he is here, so bow down to our saviour.

name: Canopy
summary: Canopy is a non-violent exploration crafting game set in the heart of the rainforest. Gather your friends and embark on an unforgettable cooperative adventure, where camaraderie is key, and teamwork is essential.

name: Cart Legends
summary: Battle your way to being a legend in the world of carts!

name: Cabin of Shadows: Dueling Impostors
summary: You and one other survivor have escaped to an abandoned cabin in the woods after your village was attacked by a werewolf. Is the person before you truly human? Or could your sole companion be the very same monster that slaughtered everyone you know?

name: Cars, Girls and Rock 'n' Roll
summary: Sunset Racer is an immersive racing game that transports players to the golden era of automobiles, where powerful cars with full tanks of gasoline raced into the sunset.

name: Card Age
summary: "Card Age" is a casual, idle, God's perspective simulation management game. Survive and develop in an exquisite world composed of a variety of cards, gradually unlock new technologies, build industrial assembly lines and face various interesting challenges, and build your own Card Age.

name: Castlemancer
summary: How long can you last in this survival roguelite deckbuilder? Play cards to manage castle resources, defeat invaders, and damage the enemy army. Make difficult choices, cast powerful spells, and weather the siege!

name: Castaway Coalition
summary: Castaway Coalition is an immersive survival game set on a remote island. Struggle for survival, build a community, satisfy human needs, and navigate a world affected by a dynamic day-night cycle. Craft tools, erect shelters, and farm to outlive island life. Your survival story awaits!

name: Carlos Klauss: Episode Zero
summary: Carlos Klauss - Episode ZerØ is a Graphic Adventure with Visual Novel elements which introduces you to the life and history of Carlos Klauss and his misadventures.

name: Carnage Cuisine
summary: You are a banana with a gun! Blast your way through hordes of evil cooks and machines in this survivors-like, action rogue-lite. Collect loot, unlock powerful skills, rally your food allies, and lead them to victory! If you fail, upgrade your character and skills, and rise stronger for the next run!

name: Casino of Desire
summary: Casino, money, beauty girls, desire, everything is superficial, hidden behind a huge conspiracy.

name: Canvas of Kings
summary: Canvas of Kings is a minimalistic mapmaking tool that focuses on randomness and auto-generated elements on user-definable and interactive paths and plots.

name: Call of Farming
summary: A game for you to create your own farming or simulation game. It includes an inventory, craft, building, growing plants, farm animals and much more.

name: Camera Anima
summary: The Artisan, one of one of Awyr's most infamous killers, is said to walk the cloudy streets looking for his next masterpiece. Pursue the Artisan, save your sister, and uncover the past, but remember what the stories say…Meet his face, and never wake again.

name: Can Strike
summary: Your employers at Fish Co are sending in Robots to end your strike! Use your union-granted weapons to destroy the waves of robots to keep the strike going.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 05
summary:
When darkness falls, the shadows will rise.
Shadow Company and Task Force 141 face off in Season 05 of Call of Duty Warzone and MWII Which side will you choose?

Graves is alive.
Even if Task Force 141 successfully secured the warhead as part of their RAID, Farah lost her brother — and AQ asset — Hadir . . . but not before he revealed that a greater threat is on the horizon.
Unbeknownst to Price, Gaz, and the rest of 141, Farah and Alex head back into Urzikstan. A meeting has been set up with a former enemy who apparently wasn’t incinerated in his tank at the Fuerzas Especiales Headquarters in South America.
Three elite leaders pore over a map of Al Mazrah, where Graves has intel on a new ultranationalist threat now present in the AO, the same group Hadir could not speak of in his dying breaths:
The Konni Group.

name: Castle Push
summary: Castle Push is a fantasy and strategy game developed by Blue Cat Studio. Play the classic browser strategy. Complete all levels and unlock all possible achievements in this game. And listen to the best music from Haindale.

name: Car Factory
summary: Assemble vehicles on a realistic production line, from the chassis to the final assembly. Optimize your production process to work more efficiently and unlock new models.

name: Car Salon Kingdom
summary:
Overhaul your customers’ rides and turn their junkers into high-speed supercars! Do you have what it takes to run a top-of-the-line auto repair shop?
A day in the life of an auto mechanic is brimming with troubles and problems to fix; but with Wrench and the gang, it’s all about giving their customers a sweet ride. Help Wrench, Flat, Ratchet, Pliers, Socket, Lube, Torque, and Hammer keep their customers satisfied and build a business empire that will offer the best car service in town!

name: Cala a Boca, Galvão!
summary: Cala a Boca, Galvão! is a whac-a-mole game based on the internet phenomena of the same name, where you "shut up" the Brazilian sports narrator Galvão Bueno by adding tape in his mouth.

name: Camelot
summary: An early multiplayer online RPG for the PLATO system.

name: Captain Goose
summary: Captain Goose is a shoot 'em up game in the style of naval battles and the golden age of piracy. Accuracy and precision calculation will help keep your ship afloat and ensure the success of your mission. The strongest will survive at sea!

name: Cats & Castles
summary: In 'Cats & Castles', as King of the Cats, you must build, manage, and defend the greatest kingdom a cat has ever seen. Choose your cards wisely and balance your economy, food supply, and military. It's your responsibility to defend your kingdom from monsters with your mighty cat soldiers.

name: Cat City
summary: In this game you will need to explore the whole city, as well as many other rooms to find all the seals! A cat named "Ponytail" will help you figure out the game, and will fully introduce you to what is happening in this cute little cat town!

name: Cannon Block Ball
summary: Knock down blocks from the platform using balls in this physics-based game. Encounter various block types, from explosive bombs to rotating and growing blocks, adding challenge and strategy to the gameplay.

name: Cats on Broombas
summary: A wholesome MS-DOS puzzle-game about cats zooming around on Broombas collecting stars. They need your help!

name: Cavemen Tales: Collector's Edition
summary: Help Sam and Crystal and their family to find a new home in this time management strategy game! Explore, guide the tribe, build, gather resources, overcome obstacles and enjoy the tale of family, friendship and courage!

name: Cannon Fotter
summary: Cannon Fotter is a first person VR tower destruction game. Shoot yourself out of a cannon and destroy things with your body.

name: Cave of Evil
summary: Cave of Evil is a horror game in which a desperate father becomes obsessed with recovering his daughter who died in an accident through a strange ritual.

name: Cats in Heat: Convenience Coworkers
summary: Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 catgirls who work under you in a small grocery store - Enjoy comedy and animated sex scenes!

name: Cat at Home
summary: This is a 2D side-scrolling puzzle game with a cat as the main character. The game takes place in a villa, where you play as a cat that has just entered the house. You meet animals with different personalities, solve one problem after another, and finally resolve the crisis at home.

name: Cat got Lost
summary: made with flixel

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
summary:
The game brings "open combat, " offering players more choices in approaching the single-player missions. Makarov returns as the chief villain of the new campaign.

The newly introduced Carry Forward system will let players keep their progression and inventory from Modern Warfare II. Multiplayer fans can expect 16 maps at the launch and at least 12 coming later. Zombies mode will also return and should offer the largest zombie map to date.

name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Day Zero Edition
summary: This Day Zero Edition features two custom weapons, the AK-12G Assault Rifle and Crossbow-B2. Finally, the Day Zero Edition also includes the Advanced Arsenal Bullet Brass exoskeleton and EM1 Quantum directed energy weapon. Play before the rest of the world with the Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Day Zero Edition.

name: Car Park: Draw Lines Puzzle
summary: Your goal is to park your car in a safe location without hitting other cars or obstacles. You can guide your vehicles to the parking spot by drawing a line with your finger. However, some parking spaces are crowded and difficult to navigate, so plan your moves carefully.

name: Calming Lia
summary:
Help Bao to calm Lia with her nightmares and save the dream! Calming Lia is a glamorous match 3 adventure game.
Travel through fun worlds, Deep Sea, Spooky Circus and much more in this glamorous match 3 adventure of Lia’s dreams. Slide and match 3 or more to save Lia’s dreams! Beat challenging match 3 levels and relax your mind. Collect magic charms, beautiful diamonds and shiny gold!

name: Candy Land Adventure
summary: Candy Land Adventure is an adventure game developed by Realtime Associates and published by Hasbro Interactive in 1996.

name: Carrot the Cat
summary: Jump into whimsical fun with Carrot The Cat! This cartoony platformer offers vibrant stylized graphics, challenging levels, and endless charm. Purrfect for all ages!

name: Castle Secrets: Hidden Object
summary:
The ancient order of the Hildegards has been fighting the forces of Evil since the beginning of time. Is their rule almost over? The prophecy that predicts the End of Days is coming true…
The Head of the Order, Aaron Hildegard, has been betrayed and kidnapped by his own brother! The kingdom has been overrun by beasts. But the Prophecy states that one day the chosen hero will come to the rescue of the once great Order, wielding an ancient weapon of great power to turn the tides of war!

name: Caffeine Injection!
summary:
Caffeine Injection is 5 maps long episode for Doom II done between 2020-2022. It's made from various projects I couldn't finish in time or left when I changed my mind. I didn't want to waste those levels, so I compiled them in one small ep.
Pistol start is the intended experience.

name: Catch Up
summary: Welcome to the enchanting world of "Catch Up"! Get ready to embark on an exciting precision platforming adventure like you've never seen before! Join an epic journey with a brave cat where skill and precision will be your best allies.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: China
summary: Have you ever dreamed of driving classic Chinese cars? The ones that are filled with passion and fascination? Or perhaps it's a newfound desire for you? Whatever the reason, now is the perfect time to start your Chinese adventure!

name: Candles
summary: Candles is a top-down, atmospheric horror game where you collect candles scattered throughout a house to perform a sealing ritual on a demon before it gets to you first. Explore the house, find the candles, solve puzzles, and outmanoeuvre the demon to escape.

name: CaS-Puz: Camera Surface Puzzle
summary: Your perspective changes the world. In this hardcore platformer, the existence of walls depends on the angle of your camera. A seemingly impassable level will transform once you look from a different angle, and every careless jump and camera movement can turn into a flight into the void.

name: Cats Hidden in Georgia
summary: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across Georgia in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Cactus
summary: Be the cactus, become the legend! Fight to save your planet in this fast-paced single player FPS. Shoot explosive needles from your spiky body to wipe enemy hordes with timed detonations, explore the desert, solve puzzles, find artifacts, unlock special skills and battle against the sun.

name: Cashier Simulator
summary: Have you ever wondered what cashier job feels like ! Here is a simulator game for you to experience that, Sit back, relax and watch some in game TV shows while serving those customers.

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Liberation
summary: “Soldiers, Sailors, and Airmen of the Allied Expeditionary Force: you are about to embark upon the Great Crusade!” This DLC introduces the western front action in 1944, featuring the US faction, as well as German western front content.

name: Carousel
summary: Ready to start unlocking your puzzle skills? Come on, challenge and bring the beautiful image back to full display!

name: Caminho Estreito
summary: Caminho Estreito is a Christian role-playing game where you will need to prove your biblical knowledge and show that your faith is unshakable.

name: Café Mania
summary: A restaurant business simulator which was very popular in Brazil.

name: Can't Run Frm Evil
summary: These levels are the first four of them, and they are the bigger too. All maps can be finished starting with pistol only. Maps are hard, but difficult levels are implemented.

name: Candle Fire Run!
summary:
Candle Fire Run! is an exciting arcade game where players take on the role of a candle and embark on an exciting adventure, trying not to burn out and reach the finish line.

Your goal is to complete a series of levels while collecting power-ups to increase your size and extend your burning time.

name: CabbageBall
summary:
Cabbageball is a thrilling skill-based competitive handball game that incorporates magical abilities and sports.
Are you ready to test your skills and see if you have what it takes to be the champion?

name: Cash Cow DX
summary: Holy cow, it’s all about the moooney! Run, jump and slide in this udderly moo-velous adventure to reclaim your fortunes from those sneaky Pig Pockets. Tough as nails and no continues! Are you up for the challenge?

name: Cat Jigsaw Puzzle Games: Expansion Pack 8
summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Catniptic
summary: In Catniptic, you take on the role of a dynamic feline protagonist navigating through various dream worlds, unlocking eccentric abilities with magical catnip, and reclaiming stolen furniture. This psychedelic platformer never plays the same twice.

summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

summary: Step into the shoes of a young man in a fictional 1980s Latin America. Embrace your destiny navigating a world fraught with drugs, violence, and bloodshed.

summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

summary: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 20, 30, or 42 pieces.

name: Cactus Cowboy: Desert Warfare
summary: Cactus Cowboy Returns in His Most Thrilling VR Adventure Yet – "Desert Warfare"!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Wilderness Cosmetics Pack
summary: Dear Anglers, thank you for your continued support. It’s invaluable to us. As a token of appreciation, we hope you'll enjoy this free pack containing a complete outfit, three car liveries, and three boat liveries. Thanks again, we couldn’t do this without you!

name: Catlord
summary: Step into the paws of the legendary Catlord! Survive in a shrinking area, fight off hordes of enemies, and grow more powerful with each run to claim victory!

name: Call of Duty: Endowment - Protector Pack
summary: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Protector Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0.

name: California Games
summary: Introducing the gnarliest bunch of games under the sun! Games invented on the beaches by sun-baked beach bums with a fondness for ripping, grinding, and shredding. With six radically thrilling events intended to bring you to the edge and blow your mind. And make adrenaline California's most plentiful natural resource.
