name: Capybro
summary: Play as a Capybara and be a bro to your forest friends as you make your way to the spa.

name: Castle Empire
summary: Unleash your strategic prowess

name: Car Mechanic: City Driving
summary: Customize your own car and go on a serene ride through the city streets!

name: Cards of Destiny
summary: Cards of Destiny is a VR puzzle game that brings the tabletop experience to a unique interactive environment! Turn your inner child into a god as you draw one-time-use cards that can save or condemn the tiny humans on your desk – and the aliens chasing them. Adapt to different levels and situations as your randomized deck, ticking clock and looming alien threats all keep you on your feet!

name: Captain Kalani: Definitive Edition
summary: Control the captain after receiving a distress call from the biggest Factory of robots of the world. Discover the utopian world that hide a big mystery, and find out who are the Robot's Syndicate behind the truoubles.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Deluxe Edition
summary: Be free to fish where you choose in a unique and approachable open world fishing experience. Explore the great outdoors on your own or with friends and find the catch of a lifetime.

name: Cat Apartment
summary: Cat Apartment is a 2.5D, swivel, find gameplay, dynamic cat hunt game where you need to take care of all the cats in the apartment. Find cute cats hidden in a relaxing apartment.

name: Call of Sentinels
summary: Call of Sentinels is an exciting action game where you will have to challenge real evil! Epic battles await you with hordes of diverse enemies and charismatic bosses that will not leave you indifferent.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Launch Edition
summary: Be free to fish where you choose in a unique and approachable open world fishing experience. Explore the great outdoors on your own or with friends and find the catch of a lifetime.

name: Castle Fantasia: Arihato Senki
summary: A prequel to Castle Fantasia: Seima Taisen, follows Hewie and Ducis's stories during their time in the military academy.

name: Carol Vorderman's Sudoku DVD Game
summary: Play interactive Sudoku games on your DVD player.

name: Cats Spotter
summary: Welcome to "Cats Spotter"! This is a light-hearted and enjoyable casual game where your mission is to find all the hidden cats on a colorful and vibrant Meow Planet.

name: Castle of Void
summary: Your main goal is to defend the castle, because the enemies will stop at nothing. Do not let them break through the defense, as their ambition is to capture your fortress and gain power over your kingdom.

name: Cargobros
summary: Cargobros is a co-op game with chaos breeding physic mechanics. You can hook yourself, your cargo and your vehicle in this game. In a world with absolute physic chaos, use your hook to create order! Coming soon...

name: Castle Guardian
summary: Legendary action with tower defense warfare! Become a castle guard in fantastic medieval era! Destroy the enemies with your wingman Centaur. Defend your castle!

name: Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in the cozy autumnal town of Maple Hollow in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Cabal: Return of Action
summary: Enter the epic world of Nevareth in Cabal: Return of Action, the highly anticipated mobile game from the creators of Cabal Online. With over 30 million players online and an MMORPG (Multi Massively Online Role Playing Game) lineage that spans more than 15 years, Cabal: Return of Action is one of the 3D RPG pioneers to feature fast-paced combo-driven combat in an immersive stylized MMO.

name: Cave Story: The Desolate
summary: Cave Story: The Desolate is a fangame based off of the Cave Story Beta.

name: Candy Crisis
summary: Candy Crisis is an exciting combination of pure action and puzzle gaming! The game features twelve unique stages, complete with its own character and individual technique. Also, you can pair off against a friend, and even specify a handicap so that both players are evenly matched. And if you don't want to play against an opponent, Solitaire Crisis mode allows you to practice without having to compete against an opponent. A tutorial is included with the game as well, so even puzzle novices can become Candy Crisis champions in no time.

name: Carnival Survivors
summary: A musical rogue-like adventure where you lead a band of adorable cats. Feel the rhythm-based abilities to unlock new band members, levels, and songs. Each member brings unique instruments and abilities, allowing you to overcome the hordes of enemies with the power of music!

name: Campfire Stories : Episode 1
summary: Embark on an enchanting narrative-driven adventure across two worlds. Explore, solve puzzles, and save your family in this mild action platformer. Vibrant visuals inspired by classic cartoons.

name: Cadde
summary: Are you ready to let it rip in the streets of İstanbul? Cadde combines fun physics, realistic sound design and the atmospheric air of İstanbul.

name: Cat City
summary: Step into the shoes of a mayor of a growing cat town! Talk to your residents, discover their life stories, help them with their daily tasks and complete quests to improve your city.

name: Candy Rangers
summary: Go on a single player, On-Rails Shooter Adventure in Candy Rangers and match 4 colors with 4 rangers! Each ranger can take down enemies that match their color, and it's up to you to use each one accordingly! Can you match them all?

name: Candlebook Island
summary: Make friends with your coworkers, discover their lives and history, treat sick monsters, and research mysterious illnesses!

name: Cataclysm Survivors
summary: Cataclysm Survivors is an action packed roguelike in the survivors genre. With countless weapons and upgrades, play through endless waves of zombies and become INFINITELY POWERFUL. Thousands of Weapon and Upgrade combinations and TONS of enemies to slaughter with multiple classes and maps.

name: Cardia
summary: Cardia, a world of breathtaking vastness.

name: Card Collector And Card Girls
summary: Control: Keyboard arrow keys, A button = Z, B button = X This game has no story. You just have to defeat enemies and acquire skill cards to learn skills or acquire items to challenge stronger enemies. Battle is turn-based, Use your skills appropriately. Please have fun with these beauties.

name: Cave Digger 2
summary: Cave Digger 2 is an action-adventure game in wildland valleys where you explore old mines, nautical caves and ruins of ancient civilizations inspired by western, dieselpunk and Lovecraftian themes.

name: Calamari Capsize
summary:
"Calamari Capsize" is an exhilarating underwater adventure crafted for the Brackeys Jam 2023, where creators explored the theme of "Diving Deeper" with innovation and excitement. In this captivating game, you take on the role of a young kraken, wielding the immense power of the deep sea as you embark on a thrilling mission. Your objective? To plunge ships into the inky abyss within a limited timeframe.

As the mighty kraken, you'll command the sea's elements with your tentacles, relentlessly dragging ships down into the jaws of your formidable aquatic companion. The challenge lies in your ability to harness your newfound abilities to their fullest extent. Each vessel you pull beneath the waves adds to your ever-growing tally, driving your score higher and higher.

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience as you navigate treacherous waters, overcome obstacles, and race against the clock to see how many ships you can submerge in the depths. "Calamari Capsize" combines stunning visuals, engaging gameplay, and the intriguing allure of the deep ocean, making it a captivating and challenging adventure for players of all ages. Are you ready to embrace your inner kraken and master the art of ship-capsizing in this oceanic showdown? Dive in and find out!

name: Cappi: Starbound Saga
summary:
Go forth, it is you who will save the universes... from annihilation.

Cappi: Starbound Saga is a 2D platformer with gameplay styles inspired by the Kirby and Sonic series. With Cappi, use powerful abilities and maintain speed to be able to save the galaxy in record time.

name: Cassette Beasts: Pier of the Unknown
summary:
Charge your oversized flashlights and steel your nerves for "Pier of the Unknown", a new DLC for Cassette Beasts! This DLC download includes:

A new storyline to seek and unravel
A spooky new location with three carnival-themed attractions to uncover and explore
TWELVE new monsters that can only be found and collected within Brightside Pier
Five new character costume options

This new addition to Cassette Beasts brings the total monsters to 141, meaning you can now unlock 19,881 fully imagined fusions!

name: Cannibal Island: Survival
summary: A ship was violently tossed and turned until it was shipwrecked on an isolated island shrouded in mystery. The island was inhabited by a cannibalistic tribe that had long been cut off from the outside world. Patiently waiting for new prey.

name: Caravan Boomer
summary:
Caravan Boomer is a new shooter in development for MSX2, It uses PSG and MSX-MUSIC sounds.
the game has 2 modes: caravan (time attack) and normal.

name: Cactus Simulator 2
summary: Cactus Simulator 2 is a game in which you can become a cactus.

name: Caesar's Revenge
summary: Caesar’s Revenge is a single-player retro FPS set in classical antiquity. Bring retribution to the greedy senator’s that betrayed you. Become the fall of Rome.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 & Revhead
summary:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 is new production with well settled player base. Start as a fresh owner of a car garage and work your way to service empire. Get your hands dirty in highly realistic simulation game with great attention to details. Get ready to work on 4000+ unique parts and over 72 cars. Roll up your sleeves and immerse yourself into highly realistic garage environment.
Expand your range of services by investing in new work space and equipment. Repair, fix, test, paint, tune and rebuild cars. Pay a visit to a new Auction house and buy cars in various condition. If feeling lucky you can try it out at barns. Some of them may contain hidden gems - if you can find them.

Revhead is a car racing simulation game, where you have to build your own race car.
You have a friend Charlie, who is busy with building race cars. He would need some help from you and he invites you to Australia. You start your journey somewhere in a small town in Australia, where the only way to get recognised if you are able to build the fastest and best racing car around. You have Charlie, his expertise and his garage. The rest is up to you!

name: Car Parking Simulator 2024
summary: Get ready to test your precision and skill behind the wheel in the most immersive parking simulator yet - Car Parking Simulator 2024! Dive into a world where every inch matters, and every corner poses a new challenge.

name: Carrion: Greatest Time of Year
summary: In honor of the December holidays developers Phogia Game Studio released a special holiday update for the monster game Carrion called the Greatest Time of the Year. This update is free for players and features a brand new level for players to complete in-game. This DLC level tasks players with taking the monster through a base that has been decorated for the holidays.

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Digital Ultimate Edition
Caball
summary: Veronica doesn't believe in mysticism, but the unexplained events that occur after she loses her job will make her change her mind forever.

name: Cardfight!!: Rare Card Set 14 [D-BT09] - Dragontree Invasion
summary: One of set of each SP version card.

name: Cat Life Simulator
summary: Cat Life Simulator is a realistic simulation game that allows you to see the world through the eyes of a cat. Explore the world, interact with the environment, and create your own cat's story. Your adventure begins in a domestic setting, but over time, you will discover many other places.

name: Cardchery
summary: Earn Gold by shooting increasingly harder targets in a 2D Archer Minigame. Spend your Gold in the Shop to buy Booster Packs and try to collect over +200 cards which all improve the abilities of you archer!

name: CatsPots
summary:
Cats Pots is a game inspired by the mechanics of the Crackpots from Atari 2600, where the objective is to prevent mice from drilling into a fence and invading the house, earning points with each victory.

Written in MSX BASIC and compiled with MSXBAS2ROM, this is a MSX 1 compatible game.

name: Cardfight!!: Additional Card Set Vol.6 [D-BT09] - Dragontree Invasion
summary: Unlock cards from [D-BT09]: Dragontree Invasion.The booster pack will be added to the in-game shop, and included cards will be available for crafting.

name: Car Detailing Simulator VR
summary: In Car Detailing Simulator VR, you have the power to renew and restore cars to its former glory, catering to the demands of your discerning customers. Transform neglected vehicles into stunning and well-maintained machines that can be the envy of all.

name: Carball 360
summary: A game of carball where the last team to touch the ball scores the goal. An AI named Vicky is there to fill the void when friends are unavailable. Light, simple, competitive.

name: Call Sign is Magic Liner
summary: Call Sign is Magic Liner is an old school Shmup with a new twist. You can strategically draw lines and defeat your enemies.

name: Cab Driver
summary: Pick up passengers and follow the arrow to their destination. For bigger tips complete the journey in the quickest time possible!

name: Cat Attack
summary: JRPG similar to Final Fantasy/Lufia with an overworld and a variety of dungeons. Many party members with unique skills/abilities. Not early access, but will be updated in the future based on user input and other information.

name: Carachnophobia
summary: Step into a galaxy not far far away, where an alien race plotting the end of mankind discovered a spectacular creature that has the potential to create the necessary chaos. There is only one problem; it is not very intelligent and requires some training!

name: Case of the Mysterious Death of Keiko Haraeda
summary: Japan, September 12, 1999, at 8:00 p.m., Ms. Keiko Haraeda collapsed in her room and was found dead. Although the police have ruled that there is no case and closed the investigation, many puzzling points remain, and the family is still calling for information.

name: Caribbean Legend
summary: An open-world RPG set in the Golden Age of Caribbean piracy. Embark on a 200-hour-long adventure, plunder cities and ships, explore the unknown, discover treasures, forge friendships, earn bounties on your head, and charm the ladies on your path to ultimate freedom!

name: Card Crafter Genesis
summary: Card Crafter Genesis- Create your own card games with custom cards, decks, and rulesets! Then play them against other players online! Each card can be given custom backs, fronts, descriptions, and effects!

name: Cardboard Fish
summary: Dive into the captivating world of Cardboard Fish! Experience gripping gameplay as Nozzle, the heroic fish, in a physics-based adventure filled with skill challenges and mind-bending puzzles for thrilling progress and achievement.

name: Card Battle Simulator
summary: Dive into the world of customizable card games! Whether you're a player seeking new challenges or an aspiring creator, this is for you.

name: Cartel Tycoon: Anniversary Edition
summary:
About Cartel Tycoon - Anniversary Edition includes:
- Cartel Tycoon
- Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenant Pack - Guerillas DLC
- Cartel Tycoon - Lieutenant Pack - La Familia DLC
- Cartel Tycoon: San Rafaela DLC
- Artbook
- Soundtrack vol.I
- Soundtrack vol.II

name: Captain Tsubasa: Rise of New Champions - Ultimate Edition
summary:
The Ultimate Edition includes:
• Base Game
• Character Pass
• Character Mission Pass
• New Champions Uniform Set
• V Jump Accessories
• Shutetsu Uniform
• Tsubasa's Challenge Ball + Meiwa FC
• All-Japan Junior Youth Uniform
• Open Sky Uniform Set
• Hawk Uniform Set
• 2 goal performances

name: Cats Super Bundle
summary: It is a beautiful 2D pixel art game for all ages. Where you are a cat, you must avoid obstacles and beat enemies looking for the end of each stage.

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Solar System Map
summary: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn even more with Solar System Map. Travel through our Solar System or stroll along the Southern and Northern sky. Your journey into space starts now!

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Southern Sky Map
summary: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn even more with Sorthern Sky Map. Travel through our Solar System or stroll along the Southern and Northern sky. Your journey into space starts now!

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Northern Sky Map
summary: Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn even more with Northern Sky Map. Travel through our Solar System or stroll along the Southern and Northern sky. Your journey into space starts now!

name: Candy choppers
summary: The first released Heretic level for Paul Corfiatis, replaces E2M1 and is very small

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow - Magician Mode
Call of the Apostate
summary: An Episode 3 replacement for Heretic. The episode is laid out so that levels 1-3 are inspired by E1, levels 4, 9, and 5 by E2, and levels 6-8 by E3. Expect a boss fight every 3rd level.

name: Case of Dungeons
summary: This is an isometric dungeon crawl, which happens in real time.

name: Caldera
summary: Vaults was only a test. Now for the real thing. When you killed D'Sparil in Heretic, you upset the balance of power among the serpent riders. Korax gained too much power indeed. He has frozen D'Sparil's world. The Caldera is locked up tight, the power grid crystals are frozen and unreachable. Your mission: should you decide to accept it, is to restore D'Sparil's heart to its proper place, reawaken the mountain, set the machinery in working order by retrieving the banished parts from other worlds and replacing the power crystals into the power grid. Only then can you face and defeat Korax for real.

name: Cacildes Adventure
summary: A coming of age Action RPG about a boy on his journey to join the king's army.

name: Capsman
summary: Capsman is arrived, its mission is to collect as many beans and biodegradable capsules, and whoever plays with Capsman must overcome obstacles and escape from imaginary enemies, that in each level will be more tricky!

name: Car Games Bundle: Racing Driving School Police Drag Drift Taxi
summary: Get behind the wheel of your favorite cars and become the best driver in the world!

name: Cafe Lindbergh: Summer Season
summary: Cafe Lindbergh is a small restaurant famous for its tea, coffee, pastry, and sandwiches, and has become very popular by word-of-mouth for its atmosphere. The cafe is staffed by Itsuki, the master of the shop, Takumi, the cook, Tsukasa, a full-time waiter, and Shinya, a part-time waiter. A fifth employee Chihiro, is newly hired as another part-time waiter. Watching day-to-day events unfold through the eyes of these five co-workers, will they find themselves falling in love?

name: Cafe Little Wish: Mahou no Recipe
summary: An unknown and starving young man enters in a small restaurant called “Cafe Little Wish.” After gorging on everything without knowing he doesn’t have any money, he tries to escape but is thwarted by the strength of the waitresses. It’s later revealed he’s an amnesiac who doesn’t even know his own name. In a gesture of pity and generosity, the owner hires him to work off his debt. The story begins with our protagonist known furthermore as “Leon” and his life in Cafe Little Wish.

name: Cambrian QTS: Kaseki ni Natte mo
summary:
Cambrian QTS - Kaseki ni Nattemo is an adventure game that is about a strange creatures that became extinct long ago that are discovered by chance in the South Pacific last year, they were successfully commercialized as pets with the name of Cambrian QTS. The new species grows into an aquarium filled with special seawater, as they grow hatched from an egg.

During the day the player can talk to various people in the town, the school, or home. Knowledge and sometimes get training items for his QTS, but also to gather information in preparation for the training mode communication whe he returns to his room. The other part of the game is about raising the QT.

The game features japanese voice acting for all the characters and an unlockable gallery that will be avaliable once the game is completed.

name: Cart Kings
summary: This licensed racing game features characters from the comics magazines Tinkle and Amar Chitra Katha. Characters race through streets and around famous monuments in bullock carts, with gameplay similar to classic games like Super Mario Kart.

name: Canvas 2: Niji-iro no Sketch
summary: A PS2 Port of the Visual Novel Canvas 2 ~Akane iro no Palette~ that removes adult content.

name: Canvas 3: Tanshoku no Pastel
summary: A PS2 port of Canvas 3: Nanairo no Kiseki that removes adult content

name: Canary: Kono Omoi wo Uta ni Nosete
summary:
Port of the eroge Canary ~My Feelings into a Song~ without adult content.

A young man moves to Shikoku, the smallest of Japan's four main islands, to live in Kagawa prefecture with his uncle who runs a sound studio. Attending the Kotohira Middle School as a student with an ear for music, the player engages in interaction with seven female students who play in the school band. Some girls specialize in vocals and others wield instruments in the pop section.

Music provides the glue for possible friendships and amorous maneuvers. A supporting cast of other characters including classmates, teachers and your uncle also supply additional interaction and bolster the storyline. The bulk of the interaction leads up to the school festival where you and band members hope to create beautiful music together.

Mika Katagiri wants her band to perform at the upcoming local festival. However, complications arise. Their keyboardist, Jun, refuses to play, and their stage has been cancelled. Refusing to give up, Mika and her band strive to find a way to play at the festival, using any means necessary.

name: Card de Asobu! Hajimete no DS
summary: A card game video game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Card Games: The Classics
summary: A huge collection of the finest classic, solitaire and casino card games - right in your pocket!

name: Casual Classics
summary: Play Mahjong, Minesweeper, Solitaire and Sodoku on your Nintendo DS with Casual Classics.

name: Castle Master TD
summary: Fortify, Strategize, and Conquer in our dynamic tower defense game. As master of your own castle, you’ll build powerful structures, plan strategic defences, and engage in epic battles against relentless enemies. Each choice you make shapes your kingdom’s destiny.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days: Character Set 10 - Samuel Fredson
summary: Set including Fighter "SAMUEL FREDSON" and sleeves.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days: Character Set 08 - Jinki Mukae
summary: Set including Fighter "JINKI MUKAE" and sleeves.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard Dear Days - Character Set 09: Sophie Belle
summary: Set including Fighter "SOPHIE BELLE" and sleeves.

name: Candy Mountain Massacre
summary: 3D shooter Adobe Shockwave adult swim game.

name: Candy Mountain Massacre 2
summary: Violence is best when it's sugar-coated. A fun first-person 3D shooter with weird and funny twists.

name: Castlevania: Sora, Donald & Neku in Dawn of Sorrow
Captured Nightmare
summary: It follows the story of a young man who ends up involved in a dark adventure, where he will seek to unravel his family tree, during his journey he will find more questions than answers. But be careful! You only have one life, if you lose, you start from zero. Do you accept this challenge?

name: Cat Search in The Wild West
summary: 105 Cats are hiding in this old western town! Can you find them all?

name: Cat's Cosmic Atlas: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Embrace the wonders of the night sky alongside an adorable kitten named Fellie.
Gaze upon the stars and other celestial bodies. Cat’s Cosmic Atlas takes you through the Southern and Northern skies. Experience the most beautiful sights and learn a thing or two about the vast Universe that surrounds us.

name: Catch Them Sweetie
summary: Welcome to the card fishing simulator! Time to clear the pond of monsters. Pick a target, build the Deck, and try your Luck! Oh, and don't touch the duck, okay?

name: CatExpress
summary: Cat Express is a relaxing and healing game that combines running, fishing, and collection gameplay. In the game, you can play as a cat to complete express delivery tasks and earn coins to buy various furniture to decorate your cat house. In your free time, you can also go fishing to relax.

name: Capybarista
summary: Build and manage your own cozy coffee shop in this relaxing, customizable, multiplayer game. Serve unique drinks, complete daily tasks, and collaborate with friends to make your shop thrive. Get ready to sip, socialize, and unwind!

name: Carnage
summary: Medium sized Metal map.

name: Castle Kaahoo
summary: Small temple map using Kaahoo textures. A touched-up and expanded version of sock's entry from SM175.

name: Castle Zanthu
summary: Medium-sized castle using Daikatana E3 textures. Comes with a custom skybox and a poster screenshot.

name: Candles of the Damned
summary: Remake of E1M2 from Quake: a medium-sized medieval castle with many candles. The map was previously released as part of Halloween Jam 2. Among other things, this version features even more candles! Comes with a new bat model and some ambient sounds.

name: Cat Detective
summary: The plot is based on a main case linked to several unit cases. Fiona's a psychic. She spent over a decade hiding her identity. Living the daily life of a student and as a detective looking for the truth with pets.

name: Call fur Help
summary: Call for Help immerses you in the exciting world of firecat firefighters. Save the city as a brave feline firefighter! Tackle fires, clear obstacles, and showcase your courage in cooperative mode with friends. Action awaits around every corner!

name: Carvival
summary: Carvival is a top-down roguelite vehicle combat game. Mission is to destroy enemy vehicles, gather resources, and upgrade your car. Wreck bigger vehicles as you progress. Gain in-game perks. Create powerful combos with auto-trigger weapons. The mantra? Drive, shoot, drift, repeat, and power up!

name: Car Parking & Car Driving Simulator 2023
summary: It's time to become a true driver and parking master!

name: Castle of The Dark Ages
summary: Large, dark castle level with DKT3 textures.

name: Caves, Canyons & Crevices
summary: 14 SP maps set in or around canyons and caves. Two of them use custom skyboxes and a music track. The map sources are included.

name: Cappuccino: The Refill
summary: Medium sized gothic fortress with Q3A textures (second version).

name: Cataractnacon & Zeangala
summary: Two large abstract base levels, a lengthy journey through a non-linear H.R. Giger-themed flooded scrapyard. The map sources are included.

name: Castle Puzzlefort
summary: Small medieval / castle themed puzzle level with no enemies for vanilla Quake. Inspired by the Amiga game Castle Master. Also supports deathmatch. Map source is included.

name: Castle of Oblivion
summary: Large interconnected Metal castle with a sense of exploration.

name: Calm Cove
summary: Build your dream island, bring it to life and make it flourish. Create nature, establish settlements and welcome villagers while watching your own miniature world thrive before your eyes!

name: Camp Counsellor Collector
summary: Camp Counsellor Collector is a unique and challenging 2D pixel graphics, single-player game where you play as The Collector, a strong but scary Individual that lives in a mansion. Your job is to hunt and capture Camp Counsellor's, cute and sexy women that you keep in your basement.

name: Cat & Gold
summary: A 3D side-scrolling action game in which a cat retrieves stolen gold.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II - Season 06: The Haunting
summary:
Prepare for frightening thrills, the shambling undead, squad hunts to take down grotesque monsters, and those infamous jump-scares as The Haunting returns to Call of Duty! The Hellmouth has opened, spilling unearthly creatures from the underworld, and a creeping terror is slowly swallowing all souls as it infects the entirety of Al Mazrah, reaching the bloodred canals of Vondel, and beyond!

It appears a clandestine group known as the Dark Ritual Operators have located and opened a terrifying Hellmouth. After the gate’s seals were ripped apart, a cacophony of otherworldly gurgling resounded, before a veritable panoply of the grotesque poured forth from their opened prison…

All Operators should ready themselves for “Operation Nightmare” and prepare to battle and repel these aberrant threats!

Fortunately, in the ensuing chaos, the Dark Ritual Operators left the gate open in time for backup to arrive in the form of Spawn, the hellacious antihero who is now tasked with sending these monsters and their ilk back to the underworld.

The Haunting event officially begins at mid-season, bringing Halloween-themed maps, modes, events and more across both games. Prepare for spine-chilling scares and ferocious battles ahead at launch with the release of four new Multiplayer maps, a Battle Pass stocked with devilishly entertaining new Operators and Weapon Blueprints, and more.

name: Catacombs
summary: Roam around the catacombs, collect everything and avoid being found at all cost. It will see you. It will chase you.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler – Spain Reserve
summary: Write your own fishing story in Aguas Claras. With gorgeous, vibrant nature and charming, picturesque fishing spots, it’s no wonder this Andalusian paradise is cherished by anglers around the world.

name: Cavern
summary: Edit the Level as you play in Cavern, a Roguelike Puzzler. Select an object to open up the - SWAP MENU - and swap it out for another type. Turn a slime into a key. Or a rock into a bomb to clear your path. Even intercept bullets in mid air and send them back against enemies.

name: Cat Fred Evil Pet
summary: Care for a cute cat Fred. If the pet is displeased, a horror game will start!

name: Cats Hidden in China
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in China in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game

name: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 1
summary: The Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 1 expands the addictive COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Players fight through the burning streets of Berlin in “Nightfire” and take up battle positions in fortified Japanese bunkers in "Knee Deep." “Station” offers a bombed out underground train station, and the Nazi Zombies return in “Verrückt” (Zombie Asylum) featuring more weapons, new Perks-a-Cola machines and electroshock defenses.

name: Car for Sale Simulator 2023: Car Mechanic, Wash, Car Flipper
summary: Step into the fast-paced world of automotive entrepreneurship with Car for Sale!

name: Castaway of Steel
summary: The player wakes up on an enigmatic island, where he finds a coliseum and people fighting. Nothing is what it seems, can you survive this adventure full of mysteries?

name: Cats Bundle
summary: A bundle of six cat themed games on Nintendo Switch.

name: Cat Ball: Gravity Maze
summary: Help our cat ball find the fish in a gravity controlled maze.

name: Casino Conqueror
summary: Forge your ultimate card deck and unlock powerful upgrades as you confront formidable adversaries in high-stakes Poker and Blackjack showdowns. Do you possess the skills needed to carve a path to the heart of the casino and exact vengeance for your grandfather's death?

name: Carprogram
summary: An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story.

name: C.A.R.D.S. RPG: The Misty Battlefield
summary: This game combines roguelike-style deckbuilding with SRPGs to create an all-new experience! Follow Vel as she leads the Clausewitz Battalion into battle against Fahftania and the Hellmuth Brigade. Collect 50 different cards to build the strongest deck and fight enemies on a map shrouded in mist.

name: Case Files: Behind Closed Doors
summary: A real-time, police interrogation and detective simulator, where players must determine if suspects are lying or not, identify contradictions, and use evidence to successfully solve the case.

name: Cable Capers 2
summary: Cable Capers 2 is a platform game where the player helps a hero named Arnold to escape from the underground. He needs to avoid enemies and lasers.

name: Cannon Blast
summary: Arr Matey! Cannon Blast is a classic arcade shooter where you shoot down enemy ships crossing the sea, then picking up any loot you may find. But dont get hit too many times, or your crew will throw you overboard!

name: Canyon Glider
summary: Fly your glider through the treacherous canyon landscape avoiding obstacles and landing safely!!

name: CatBox
summary: In this 2D puzzle game you will have to arrange your feline friends in more than 300 levels. Gradually changing locations will add new challenges.

name: Cats Hidden in Jingle Jam
summary: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden around a festive holiday village in this FREE hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2
summary: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2 continues to expand the addictive COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Battle to control the river bridge in “Banzai” a bright jungle map featuring a waterfall and hidden caves. In “Corrosion” face down your enemy in a shattered train yard, and in “Sub Pens” wipe the monsoon rain from your eyes as you struggle over a bombed-out submarine base. The Zombies return in “Shi No Numa” (Zombie Swamp) featuring Perk machines, the deadly new Wunderwaffe DG-2, new Achievements and flaming Hell Hounds.

name: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 3
summary: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 3 further expands the COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Fight for ocean territory in "Battery," defend Russia's resources in "Revolution," and battle in the dense streets of "Breach." Zombies return in "Der Riese" (Zombie Factory), a Nazi research facility featuring a weapon upgrading Pack A Punch Machine, teleporters, and 10 Achievements.

name: Castle Defender
summary: Missile Command and Defender clone

name: Castle Nevermore
summary: Castle Nevermore is a single-level PWAD for Doom II, designed by Björn Ostmann (Vader) and released in June 2004. The map is themed on a gothic castle, with a detailed design that emphasizes layout and atmosphere. It combines small exterior areas, such as courtyards and gardens, with the deep and complex architecture of the castle.

name: Castle Golgotha
summary: Two medium sized Metal/Wizard maps and a start map.

name: Call of Duty: World at War - Zombies II
summary:
Call of Duty: World at War - Zombies II is the follow up to Call of Duty: World at War - Zombies. It is the same app as the original but instead comes with the map Shi No Numa instead of Nacht der Untoten, featuring new weapons and characters.

Nacht Der Untoten is downloadable through Call of Duty: World at War: Zombies II but buying this map would make the two apps the same.

name: Call of Duty: Roman Wars
summary: Call of Duty: Roman Wars (referred to internally as Fireteam) is a scrapped Call of Duty game that was in development in 2008 by Vicarious Visions. Unlike other titles, the game would have been played from a top-down perspective rather than a first person one.

name: CapsuleMan
summary: This is a cartoon style top view shooting game that supports single or local multiplayer gameplay, Players can use weapons with diverse styles to fight against a large number of monsters. It is also crucial to build together a variety of strange mechanisms and traps in advance.

name: Cattie
summary: Cattie is a platform game with retro graphics.

name: Cat's Vote
summary:
Cat's Vote is a resource management and decision-making simulation where every choice counts. As the head of a feline household, you must ensure your family's happiness by meeting their needs—whether it's electricity/water bills, food, or entertainment. But there's a twist: the price of resources fluctuates based on the decisions of a cat government, and you get to cast your vote in the elections!

Every election season, you'll hear promises from candidates claiming they will reduce costs or improve living conditions, but can you trust them? Choose wisely, as the wrong decision could send prices soaring and your family into disarray.

Balance your limited budget, make strategic votes, and keep your family satisfied, all while navigating the unpredictable landscape of feline politics. Will you thrive, or will the promises made by smooth-talking candidates lead your family into ruin?

name: Call of Dookie
summary: Imagine you went to the crapper, and emerged an hour later to a monster apocalypse! Retro first-person shooter action inspired by 90's classics! Old-school local deathmatch & co-op for up to 4 players!

name: Catast
summary: This game is a puzzle game in which you destroy blocks with simple controls! Find a route to destroy many blocks at once and enjoy the pleasure of destroying them all at once!

name: Cat Legend
summary: The countless backyard gardens managed by Meow were simultaneously invaded by Mutant Lords. The situation was urgent, and the lively and kind-hearted Hakimi rushed out to defeat the Mutant Invaders, counterattack the Mutant Lords, and end the Source of Mutation.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - T-Shirt Pack
summary: Fish in style! This pack is part of the Reserve Pass and gives access to three stylish t-shirts. Not available for separate purchase.

name: Cataclysm Upon Us
summary: Cataclysm Upon Us is an open world survival RPG. Craft, fight, and build in a world overrun by mutants, zombies and other abominations. Uncover secrets, embrace mutations and cybernetic enhancements. Every decision shapes your journey in this haunting cataclysm. Can you survive the chaos?

name: Casting Plz
summary: CastingPlz is a 2-player cooperative roguelike game where you take on different roles to explore the labyrinth of the Archmage. You can either be a wizard or a soldier, working together and trusting your partner to achieve your dreams, or utilize each other's abilities.

name: Cake Game
summary: Strategize, combine cakes, and bake your way to victory!

name: Call of FireWork
summary: Just Play the Fireworks. Use fireworks to defeat your enemies, resist the Creator of FWM, or... join him? A first person shooting game.

name: Car Parking Real Driving Sim
summary: Build the vehicle of your dreams in this parking game full of realistic details and challenging missions! Complete missions now, earn rewards and get your dream vehicle.

name: Captain America and the Avengers
summary: The Captain America and the Avengers port for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Captain America and the Avengers
summary: The Captain America and the Avengers port for the Sega Game Gear.

name: Captain America and the Avengers
summary: The Captain America and the Avengers for Game Boy.

name: Cats on Streets
summary: Cats on Streets invites players to spot and uncover hidden feline friends in cities like Tokyo, Paris, and London. Unleash your inner detective and embark on this charming cat-hunting adventure!

name: Catacomb Chase
summary: Embark on an intense, underground adventure. As you maneuver through intricate mazes, avoiding obstacles, discovering hidden riches, and staying ahead of relentless foes, will you secure your spot at the top of the leaderboards?

name: Call of Toys: Tower Defense!
summary:
Embark on an exhilarating journey to protect Santa's Valley in this epic Tower Defense game, a 2D strategic Tower Defense game inspired by classic TD games.

Explore an arsenal of 13 unique towers, each equipped with magical spells and exclusive abilities. Customize your towers with numerous upgrades that enhance their strength and unlock new magical powers.

But that's not all! Your towers can be equipped with a variety of items, including armor, helmets, shields, amulets, rings, and an impressive selection of weapons such as swords, axes, hammers, magic wands, and bows.

name: Carnaval Simulator
summary: Carnaval Simulator is an indie game where you build, design and manage spectacular parade floats. Inspired by the magic of real-world celebrations like Mardi Gras, Carnival of Venice, and more. This parade tycoon lets you truly immerse yourself in Carnival.

name: Car For Sale Simulator 2023: Super Sports DLC
summary: This new DLC offers players an exciting experience because it includes a total of 10 super sports cars. Fans of the game will experience a gameplay filled with speed and adrenaline with this DLC. Each car comes with detailed models, powerful engines, and unique driving features.

name: Cats and Seek: Osaka
summary: Hey, do you have 5 minutes to spare? Let's play hide and seek with 100 cats in Osaka! Can you find them all?

name: Camping Vlog Simulator 2024
summary: Witness breathtaking sunsets and pitch your tent under starry skies. Record your camping adventures and share them with the world!

name: Campfire
summary: Campfire is a cozy game featuring AI powered NPCs that players can interact with and have a completely non-linear experience.

name: Cartuchito World: Canella Edition
summary:
Cartuchito World is a Super Mario World rom hack based on a web show called Cartuchito.

The Canella Edition is a later edition of the rom hack that replaces the character Ronaldo with Canella (putting Ronaldo in place of the character, Guitarrinha) and follows the cast replacement that took place on the YouTube channel.

name: Cats and Seek: Extra Level
summary: 100 more cats for you to find!

name: Cards of Clotho
summary: Cards of Clotho is a roguelite autobattler where you summon legendary heroes and conquer mythical realms! Weave your strategy and hold the Fates of Gods in your hands!

name: Cave Chaos 2
summary: Escape the caves in our second installment of the Cave Chaos series!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Vault Edition
summary:
The Vault Edition includes:

- Cross Gen Bundle of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
- Available in Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II and Call of Duty: Warzone:
-- Soap Operator Pack*
-- Zombie Ghost Operator Skin*
-- Soul Harvester Tracer Weapon Blueprint*
- Nemesis Operator Pack
- 2 Weapon Vaults**
- BlackCell (1 Season) + 30 additional Tier Skips***

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: BMW DLC
summary: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - DLC includes 5 licensed BMW cars: - 1974 BMW 2002 Turbo (E10T) - 1979 BMW M1 Procar (E26) - 1988 BMW 635 CSi (E24) - 2002 BMW M3 (E46) - 2016 BMW M4 GTS Special Edition (F82) - R4 M31 - R6 M88 - R6 M30 - R6 S54 - R6 S55

name: Cassiel
summary: Cassiel is a casual roguelite game where you fight against hordes of creatures. Combine unique items and weapons to become the strongest on a satisfying and wave based gameplay

name: Call of Duty: Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack
summary: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Warrior Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Reserve Pass
summary: Expand your fishing journey with the Reserve Pass!

name: Captivity Horror Multiplayer
summary:
Captivity is a multiplayer horror game in which you play the role of a patient who was being used as a guinea pig for multiple terrible experiments carried out by a corporation that was working on a top-secret government project for a long time until something went wrong.

Your mission is to ally with other patients to get out of the facility, but it won't be easy since the place is full of hostile patients, good luck!

name: Caleb's Dream
summary:
Caleb fell into a deep sleep and...
Well, find out what happened next yourself!

name: Caleb Will Have His Revenge On Toronto
summary: Caleb Will Have His Revenge on Toronto is a Blood fan add-on by members of the Russian Blood Community which released its first episode, "Scum of Dallas", on July 29, 2013. A sequel, "Run Like a Villain", was begun, but is now not certain to ever be finished. This includes new animated cutscenes, having the Flag of Canada as the menu background, and replacing the Sawed-Off Shotgun and Aerosol Can with their darker versions from the game's development.

name: Candlelight
summary: Another map salvaged and completed from Tekedon

name: Castlevania 2
summary: This is inspired by the NES game Castlevania 2, and kind of a parody of it at the same time.

name: Castle of Horrors: The Awful Tortures
summary: A huge and disgusting path down to the chamber of horrors. See also the cemetery of the zombies and their ceremonial death party.

name: Call of Duty Tactics
summary: Call of Duty Tactics was a strategy game being developed by Vicarious Visions.

name: Caverns of Mars
summary: A port of the Atari 8-bit game Caverns of Mars, released first inside the Atari Flashback 2.

name: Call of Sniper Combat: WW2
summary: Crush the rebels, restore peace, and make the world a safer place. Will you answer the call?

name: Canter Crossing
summary: Saddle up and ride away on an daring adventure!

name: Carsick Carventure
summary: Carsic Carventure is a simple hyper-casual game where you drive your 2D car as far as possible. Discover new places, set new records, and beat your friends! Enjoy infinite levels and different game modes!

name: Catechesis
summary: Embrace the darkness as a demon-possessed altar boy in this Horror RPG. Explore the city, battle demons, upgrade your weapons, and embark on an unforgettable journey with unique characters and anime-style cutscenes.

name: Cat-Like Concentration
summary: Cat themed game of Concentration! A fun memory card game for the Playdate!

name: Car Race
summary: Car Race is a simple racing game. The objective of the game is to race on a single track, evading other cars and collecting fuel on the ground. The longer the player can last, the higher the score.

name: Cardboard Hero
summary: Play as the hero of a young child’s imagination and fight your way through a fantasy cardboard adventure in this 3rd person action-adventure. Fight wacky enemies and find treasure to help you as you explore the vast worlds.

name: Catrina's Halloween Nightmare
summary:
It's been three years since the Halloween Party massacre tragedy. Catrina wants nothing to do with Halloween, but her best friend Hope convinces her to attend a small reunion, she can't keep avoiding this night forever. Besides, what are the odds of the same thing happening twice? Grin Pumpkin is back.

The sequel to Jake's Halloween Night, a game inspired by old slasher movies.

name: Castle Defense
summary: Defend the castle by buying different types of tanks to shoot the enemy. This is a game of strategy. It's not as easy as it looks! Check out other great tower defense games on our Tower Defense Games page!

name: Carnival
summary: In this adaptation of the original arcade game by Sega, try to prove your skill at hitting targets in a carnival shooting gallery. Shoot rabbits, ducks, and owls, but look out! Ducks can swoop down and eat your ammo Get extra ammo by shooting one of the "8"s. You'll have to hit all of the pipes spinning around then clear the board of animals before you can move on to the next level. The game ends when you're out of bullets.

name: Carnival
summary: The goal of the game is to shoot at targets, while carefully avoiding running out of bullets. Three rows of targets scroll across the screen in alternating directions; these include rabbits, ducks, owls, and bonus items. If a duck target crosses the bottom row without being shot, it will come to life and begin flying down toward the player. Any ducks that reach the bottom of the screen in this manner will eat some of the player's bullets. Objects also periodically appear among the targets that will give the player extra bullets or points when hit. A spinning wheel with eight pipes sits above the rows of moving targets; these pipes and all targets must be shot in order to complete the round. At the end of each round, the player receives bonus points for all bullets remaining in his supply. He then plays a bonus round, where a large white bear with a target walks across the screen. Each time the bear is shot, it rears up for a second, then begins walking more quickly in the other direction. The object is to shoot the bear as many times as possible until it escapes off the screen. Following the bonus round, the next wave begins. Later bonus rounds add more bears to the screen. In higher levels, there are more duck targets and fewer extra bullet targets, putting a premium on accurate shooting. The game ends when the player runs out of bullets.

In higher levels, there are more duck targets and fewer extra bullet targets, putting a premium on accurate shooting. The game ends when the player runs out of bullets.

name: Catting Over It
summary: Challenge your jumping skills and immerse yourself in the world of real jumping tactics. The stakes are high, remember, the higher you climb, the harder you fall, every mistake can teach you a valuable lesson, or not, but it will be fun!

name: Calamity Mod: Infernum Mode
summary:
An extension mod for Calamity that adds an extra difficulty - Infernum

This difficulty is harder than Death mode and can be activated with the difficulty selection UI in Calamity.
The primary focus of the mod is expansive reworking of boss AIs.

Some bosses gain extra phases for maximum "It's not over yet!" energy.

name: Car Hunt
summary: Car Hunt is a clone of Head-On.

name: Cave Dweller
summary: You wake up in the depths of a cave. Can you unravel all the mysteries of this place and find a way to freedom? This is an adventure where every decision could be the key to success.

name: Cat Sandbox
summary: Save pixel cats in this physics puzzle game!

name: Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens
summary: In this 2D puzzle game you have to mix different colored cats together. "Cat Palette: Merging Colorful Kittens" has 150 handcrafted levels with tons of different and unique fluffy friends!

name: Cats Huddled Together
summary: There are many cats here, come and take a look!

name: Case Guardians
summary: Case Guardians, a thrilling multiplayer co-op experience that puts you in the heart of the action! In this fast-paced game, you and your friends embark on an exciting mission to protect a precious briefcase from waves of enemies cleverly crafted from everyday items!

name: Card Fuse
summary: A deck building roguelike where you will combine your cards with new ones you find, obliterating enemies with the cards that you make and becoming more powerful with each card you fuse.

name: Castle Crashing the Beard
summary:
Tom Fulp, creator of Newgrounds.com and programmer for "The Behemoth" has vowed not to shave his face until the release of his next console game "Castle Crashers" for the X-Box 360 live-arcade.

Newgrounds office workers have noticed Tom's behavior and sanity steadily declining as his beard grows.

Will Tom win his battle to finish Castle Crashers, or will "The Beard" win in the end? Play this game to find out.

name: Cave Runner
summary: Ultimate High Speed Running Wire Action

name: Captain Hardcore
summary: Board your ship and explore the darkest reaches of the universe in search of the Ultimate Pleasure Device, all in the name of science! Build your crew, customize their looks, and conduct sexual research and experiments on them. Become the most outstanding sexual explorer in the cosmos!

name: Casino Boss Simulator
summary: Casino Boss Simulator is a casino management simulation game that turns your dream of building a casino empire from scratch into reality. Manage, expand, and lead your own casino empire in the competitive world of gambling.

name: Cannot Contain
summary: Cannot Contain is a horror game set in an underground containment facility with point-and-click style elements combined with free-roam. As a new security guard, you must maintain the facility and ensure the containment of all residents, while also trying not to die in the process...

name: Call of Farming: Together
summary: Call of Farming: Together is a farming simulation where you can create your own farm online with your friends.

name: Captain & Company
summary: Find fortune, foes, and friends for life in Captain & Company: the ultimate swashbuckling adventure game. Set sail with friends into epic naval battles with massive multiplayer crews, and pillage your way to becoming the wealthiest pirates on the high seas.

name: Castrol Honda World Superbike Team VTR
summary: The only way to experience the latest in Superbike technology, Castrol Honda VTR gives you control of the Castrol Honda World Superbike teams VTR 1000. Almost 1000 ccs of power are yours to control over a range of tournaments spanning 22 international tracks. The game features the new VTR 1000 SP-1 and the new Castrol Honda World Superbike Team Livery. There are 23 computer opponents all with full animated riders so lets see if you can become the next Castrol Honda World Champion.

name: Cartridge Monsters: Rebirth
summary: Embark on your quest to hunt and capture over 100 powerful Ammons. Uncover your half-ammon, half-human abilities, challenge the Belmonte family's reign, and shape the destiny of the Phantom Island.

name: Campfire Cozy Friends
summary: Campfire Cozy Friends is a new & different type of game, built around a cast of colorful AI characters who you can talk to about... anything! With a completely open ended dialog experience, players can sculpt the story & gameplay in unique ways!

name: CarsFuckingDragons
summary: This game has a character named cars --- and these are his adventures trying to bang some Dragons! I mean, you fight other enemies too!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Fiskespro Gear Pack
summary: Make a statement with the Fiskespro Gear Pack! This pack contains the stained-glass Vredesbringaren Rod and the lavish Härskaren Reel, available in three color variations each, as well as three spinner lures.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Winter Blast Style Pack
summary: Stay warm all year round with the Winter Blast Style Pack! This pack contains a cosy mix of clothing, off-road vehicle and boat liveries, and emotes, so that you can brave the cold - in style!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Rushy Gear Pack
summary: Admired for their traditional wooden fishing gear, Rushy has become the go-to brand for many anglers. This pack contains the exotic Tribal Rod and the quirky yet classic Helm Reel, available in three color variations each, as well as three frog lures.

name: Cats, Coffee, and Love
summary:
You’ve always loved cats. That’s why when you come across a stray, your first thought is to take it to the nearby cat café! The workers seem friendly enough, but you soon learn that the business isn’t doing well, and they’re at risk of closing.

You decide to start helping out at the café and quickly you find out that the workers are actually cats themselves! Seeing this to be a brilliant marketing opportunity, the shop is rebranded as a cat boy cafe. Now if only you could get the workers to snuggle up to the customers instead of you. Can you save this failing café and your handsome coworkers?

name: Castle of Lord Velimir
summary: Epic battle against encroaching darkness. It is a baby from Warcraft 3, Dark Souls and Super Mario bros. Don't ask, it was wild party.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 1
summary: Prepare for an incredible Season 1, bringing a massive drop of free and premium content, including five free weapons, four new Multiplayer maps, multiple modes, the next Zombies story mission, the arrival and integration of Call of Duty: Warzone and the new Urzikstan map, an all-new 100+ Tiers of Battle Pass content to earn, BlackCell, and more.

name: Captain A-Hole's Guide To Getting Old(er)
summary: Experience what it's like getting old(er) with Captain A-Hole. Purchase the comic to learn how to age the "Captain" way, as well as enter VR to undergo this new hand tracking storytelling experience.

name: Casio Handheld Games CG-5X emulator for ZX Spectrum
summary:
This game is an emulator for 3 of Casio's CG-5X series of solar handheld games from the years 1983-84:

* Marine Hunter CG-50

* Dandy Cowboy CG-51

* Mole Hunter CG-53

name: Caim
summary:
Caim is a top-down action-adventure game for the C64. It balances action, exploration and puzzles with an emphasis on the narrative.

You, an unnamed player, wake up in a strange place without any recollection of how you got there. Explore the facility, avoid deadly hazards and uncover mysteries. As you learn more about the place, the world and yourself, you get ever closer to putting together all the clues and reaching the exit.

The music tracks are by unknown composers from HVSC. The story was inspired by The Talos Principle. Use joystick in port 2 to play

name: Cannon Master: Military Sport
summary: In this unusual game you will shoot with cannons at many types of targets, and you will also find arcade and logical elements. Each subsequent level is a new challenge.

name: Catch Flex: AI Dance Game
summary: Dive into "Catch Flex," the dance game where professional choreography meets advanced AI motion tracking. Just use your iPhone or Android camera – no extra gear needed! Mimic our dance coach's moves for scoring and calorie counting. Perfect for solo fun or group enjoyment with friends and family.

name: CandyVenture: Rebaked
summary: Berry and his friends count on you! Evil monsters invaded the candy world and stole all the candies. But you and our heroes are here to save their candy world! Use their powers to destroy the monsters in this cozy 2D adventure game!

name: Castle Corp
summary: Castle Corp, full name Castle Corp - Castleware for All Occasions, is a strategy game released on June 25, 2009[1], three days after the release of Double Edged. The player's goal is to save the Castle Corp company, a group made up of knights that sell medieval-related weapons, from a rival company.

name: Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure
summary: Grab a friend and blast your way through Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure! Assemble the perfect robot. Slay strange aliens. Narrowly weave through barrages of bullets, lasers and ...tentacles? Test your teamwork with this heart-pumping teeth-clenching action-packed odyssey!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Additional Card Set Vol.8 D-SS04: Stride Deckset Messiah
summary: *This DLC is also included in "Additional Card Pass Vol.2" which is on sale. It is possible to purchase both individual "Additional Card Sets" and "Additional Card Pass Vol.2", but the acquisition of included contents will only be reflected once.

name: Castlevania: The Adventure DX
summary: Castlevania: The Adventure is a fan favorite Game Boy game that was included in Konami GB Collection Vol. 1. That compilation did provide a much needed color injection, however it was full of weird color choices and incorrect overlays on backgrounds resulting in a marred experience. This release intends to correct as many of those flaws as possible, increase the quality overall, and make the game a dedicated stand-alone experience.

name: Castlevania: The Adventure
summary: A remaster of Castlevania: The Adventure released as part of Konami GB Collection.

name: Castlevania II: Belmont's Revenge
summary: A remaster of Castlevania II: Belmont's Revenge.

name: Cape's Escape Game 6th Room
summary: Solve the mystery and escape from the room

name: Cats Hidden in Japan
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in Japan in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Catgirl Chainsaw Massacre
summary:
A cute story about a girl and her sister living in a small village.
What mischief will they get up to next? Find out!!

name: Cat Fantasy
summary: A cyberpunk, anime-style 3D turn-based RPG, where cats transform into anime girls.

name: Cave Escape With FNIA Chica
summary: Chica was having a stroll in the forest until a rock slide happened you then walk in a cave and it starts to collapse now you must escape.

name: Carriers at War
summary:
Naval wargame, a remake of the 1984 Carriers at War. It is based on World War II naval warfare and focuses on the Pacific Theater.

Exactly like the original game, this remake contains 6 scenarios based on the Attack on Pearl Harbor, the Battle of the Coral Sea, the Battle of Midway, the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, the Battle of the Santa Cruz Islands, and the Battle of the Philippine Sea.

name: Carriers at War: Construction Kit
summary:
Carriers at War: Construction Kit is an expansion for the strategy game Carriers at War (1992).

It includes tools that allow users to create custom maps and in-game assets like planes and warships. This expansion also enhances artificial intelligence in the scenarios in the original game.

name: Capture
summary: Capture is a strategy game clone of Reversi or Othello, Capture has players taking turns placing black and red game pieces on a green 64-space grid. The objective is to trap the other player's pieces and several pieces can be trapped at once. When a piece gets trapped, it changes to the colour of the trapping player's pieces. When the board gets full, the player occupying the most spaces wins the game. Games can be timed, and players can give or take a time handicap. There are six different skill levels from which to choose.

name: Carl the Caveman
summary: In this arcade game you have to help a caveman find all the mushrooms and collect all the jewels in the maze. This needs to be done as carefully as possible - some levels are inhabited by both monsters and poisonous toadstools, who themselves are not averse to trying to eat a gaping mushroom picker.

name: Carl the Caveman: Christmas Adventures
summary:
Every year on Christmas Eve, Santa Claus leaves his house with gifts addressed to all children. But a great misfortune happened: the snowman decided to ruin the holiday and stole every single gift! And to make it more difficult to find them, he scattered them across ice caves and snow-covered rocks.

Now saving the holiday depends only on you. You will control a smiling and cute troglodyte, hit the road and collect all the scattered gifts of Santa Claus. But be extremely careful! You can crash on sharp ice, get caught in a stone bag and a bunch of other troubles.

name: Carrot Clicker
summary: Carrot Clicker is an incremental clicker game about farming carrots.

name: Car Town Streets
summary: Build and race with all your favorite cars on Vehicle District Street. Rule the streets with your car and bring back the town's former glory in its quest for Roxy. Form teams and compete in head-to-head racing battles for the ultimate victory. Build your car empire in Town today!

name: Cadenza: Fame, Theft and Murder - Collector's Edition
summary: It's the height of the Fabulous Fifties in your hometown of Las Vegas, and life is good! Rock n' roll is king, and you're the new king of rock n' roll. You’re on top of the world! But you come tumbling down hard when a stranger crashes your concert and swaps places with you. Trapped in a strange body, wanted for murder, and on the run from the police, you're in a race against time to get your life back before the clock runs out! Can you reclaim your rock n' roll throne, or will this be your final encore?

name: Carbrix
summary: Carbrix is a sci-fi inspired multiplayer vehicle-building sandbox game where creativity meets action. Design and construct anything you can imagine—from sleek cars and powerful trucks to futuristic planes, bikes, and rockets.

name: Cars Mater-National Championship
summary: Game Boy Advance port of Cars Mater-National Championship.

name: Cars Mater-National Championship
summary: Nintendo DS port of Cars Mater-National Championship.

name: Cars Mater-National Championship
summary: Nintendo Wii and PlayStation 2 port of Cars Mater-National Championship.

name: Carthanc
summary: You play as an astronaut sent to the planet Carthanc on a top secret mission, hidden from the public. Is there life on Carthanc? If so, is it friendly? Can Carthanc sustain human life? Is it a viable candidate to terraform? Time for you to find out! You are tasked with collecting samples, filming footage, deploying tech, and determining if any life exists.

name: Call of Duty: League - Atlanta FaZe Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Atlanta FaZe Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Los Angeles Thieves Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Boston Breach Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.
