summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Miami Heretics Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - Minnesota ROKKR Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Minnesota ROKKR Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - New York Subliners Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 New York Subliners Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - OpTic Texas Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 OpTic Texas Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - Seattle Surge Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Seattle Surge Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - Toronto Ultra Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Toronto Ultra Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - Vegas Legion Team Pack 2024
summary: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Vegas Legion Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Cats vs. Ghosts
summary: Tower Defense: Cats are towers, ghosts are enemies and humans are target. You must put the correct cat to destroy the ghosts.

name: Catty Cathy
summary: This is the story of Cathy. She is very catty and always wants to look pretty, but she always says mean things. When she walks she poops and it may turn to gold. She needs the gold to buy fillers for her face to look pretty.

name: Cat Warrior
summary: Cat Warrior is an action-platformer of retro and cute style about a cat knight on his way to recapture his stolen treasure. Deep into the dangerous fantasy world,defeat the challenging big boss with your slash, dash, jump, walljump and other skills to find the treasure back!

name: Cavy Chronicles
summary: Command an adorable army of guinea pigs in fast-paced tactical combat. Strategically attack to manipulate the flow of battle and outwit clever crab combatants. Develop your forces without tedious grinding. Will you daringly rescue your captured allies or abandon them for the greater good?

name: Caillou
summary: Caillou is a Flash game published by PBS on their website in 2007. The game was an interactive minigame collection based on various activities within Caillou's house.

name: Campus Shock Night
summary: This game is a psychological horror decryption game, where players need to use a series of props such as lighters, mobile phones, basketball, etc. to find key evidence from the game and piece together a complete storyline.

name: Calmed by the Dark
summary: Discover a parallel dimension to ours in Calmed by the Dark, a dimension filled with mysteries, monsters, and survivors. Learn how to master your powers and join a group that will shape your destiny.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Complete Edition
summary: An update to Calmed by the Dark that brings new features and some changes to the overall experience, such as the new campaign: Episode 0 Otherside, where you take another look at the story of Calmed by the Dark, with a new campaign and a different protagonist, the player must once again venture into the mysterious world of Zeitlos to return home; as well as new social events, new constructor mode, and five new endings for the game.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Neon
summary:
Set in 2046, you play as Tommy Hunter, who works hunting monsters and dealing with problems in the city. His biggest battle is waiting for him!

Calmed by the Dark: Neon is an open-world action RPG where you do missions usually related to hunting monsters. The combat consists of using a sword for melee attacks and dual pistols for range attacks. It is also possible to dodge enemy attacks by dashing.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Aftermath
summary: Set 4 years after a catastrophic event, Calmed by the Dark: Aftermath is an open-world action RPG where, in a city corrupted by power, Kadmos has the mission to rescue a girl and fight a horde of vampires that control the city. Looking for redemption, Kadmos must grow strong and obtain more powers as the player decides his fate.

name: Calmed by the Dark: Purgatorium
summary: Calmed by the Dark: Purgatorium is a dark-action roguelite dungeon crawler where your objective is to head to the top floor. Defeat the Gods of Infinity to acquire more power and progress further through the tower.

name: Calmed by the Dark RE:iterate
summary: Across the city, people are being mysteriously kidnapped and they are never seen again. Eve, the protagonist, was just looking for a job and somehow ended up discovering a strange world where she awakens her powers and learns the truth behind the kidnappings...

name: Calmed by the Dark In:Finity
summary:
Set XXXX years in the future, a woman wakes up in a cyber world with no humans in sight, she begins her quest to search for other survivors and understand what is happening in this new reality.

Explore dungeons, collect monsters, and uncover what happened to mankind in In:Finity.

name: Calmed by the Dark Re:Boot
summary: Experience a brand new storyline in Calmed by the Dark Re:Boot, set 20 years after the events of Calmed by the Dark Leviathan. Play as AJ, a new protagonist, and face new enemies and bosses, and explore new areas. With updated weapons and enhanced gameplay, Re:Boot takes the Calmed by the Dark experience to the next level!

name: Cave Dude
summary: Cave Dude is an action platformer, which was supposed to be published by Innovation in November, 1993 but was later cancelled.

name: Cat Game
summary:
Your cat has run away and is nowhere to be found, whatever will you do?

A game about cats (which also contains many cats)

name: Care Bears
summary: The game concept in Care Bears revolves around grabbing the "Tummy Icon" from each of the Care Bears as they slowly fell down the screen. Once all the icons were collected the player would have to arrange them in a certain order before time ran out. Although this may sound rather easy, one has to keep in mind that the game was geared toward young children, so things had to be kept simplistic. Care Bears made it to the beta testing stage before the marketing department decided to stop work on the game citing that the market for childrens games was diminishing, and the gameplay was too dull. Therefore it was decided that all further development on the game was to be stopped. According to programmer Laura Nikolich, part of the reason Care Bears was killed off, was that the marketing department really didn't know what they wanted. The Care Bears product line was aimed at the 8 and under age group, but marketing wanted a more action oriented game designed for older kids. Although Nikolich described the game as being almost finished, the only known prototype to surface is nothing more than a graphics demo.

name: Capcom Tabi Quiz 100
summary: Capcom Travel Quiz 100 is a mobile browser-based quiz game made as a part of the JR Tokai x Capcom collaboration event. The game is a quiz featuring 100 questions ranging from easy ones all the way to harder ones, all themed about older Capcom games.

name: Carros Rebaixados Online
summary: Carros Rebaixados Online is the multiplayer version of Rebaixados Elite Brasil, where you can customize and show off your car to your friends.

name: Cats Hidden in Germany
summary: Find 100 cats hiding in the cozy medieval Germany in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Car Racing: Highway Driving Simulator - Premium Edition
Cat Simulator
summary: A cat has never been so mischievous on a farm.

name: Candy Shake Cup
summary: Candy elimination casual game with unique and interesting gameplay, hundreds of levels, and more fun in multiplayer games

name: Casual Fight
summary:
What is she so desperately searching for?
Begin your adventure now. Begin your adventure now.

name: Candy Stripe: Minarai Tenshi
summary: Candy Stripe: Minarai Tenshi is an dating sim adventure game for the Sega Dreamcast. The game takes place in the fictional Holy Angels Hospital. The player is a medical intern, and the game's objective is to establish personal relationships with one of three incoming nurses over a one-year period.

name: Card of Destiny: Hikari to Yami no Tougousha
summary: Card of Destiny: Hikari to Yami no Tougousha is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Abel Software, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Castle Fantasia: Seima Taisen
summary: "Seimadaisen" is a prequel to the first Castle Fantasia. The events of the game takes place 500 years before those of "Castle Fantasia", and tells the story of a two hundred year long religious war between the Inshiera Empire and the Ruushiera Republic. The Empire worships the God of Light and considers the republicans followers of an evil god. The army of the empire has seven holy squads, and you command a knight named Hyuui, the leader of one of them. "Seimadaisen" is a strategy RPG with erotic content. You fight on large battle screens, navigating your party in turn-based mode, attacking when enemies are in range. Enemies drop hearts when defeated, and collecting those hearts can heal you and raise your parameters. Between battles, there are parts in which you'll have conversations with girls and will be able to choose different answers, leading to different endings.

name: Cardio Quest
summary: Cardio Quest is a fantasy role-playing video game that challenges players to get active and improve their health. By tracking heart rate during exercise, players do battle while they work out in real life.

name: Captain Laserhawk: The G.A.M.E.
summary: Captain Laserhawk is a frenetic arcade Multiplayer Arena Shooter. Dominate in fast-paced, 8-player epic battles and unlock hundreds of unique cosmetics to stand out as you become the ultimate Niji Warrior!

name: Candy Puzzle
summary: Candy Puzzle is a puzzle video game for Arcade, created and published by CD Express in 1995. The game is basically a Puzzle Bubble clone.

name: Capital Dilemma
summary: Navigate corporate chaos in this minimalist management game. Swipe to make decisions, increase your stock price, and balance metrics to stay in power.

name: Carnival Games
summary: Step right up to Carnival Games. Each game is designed from the ground up to take full advantage of the Nintendo DS control mechanism. A frenzied combination of tapping, blowing, speaking and stylus maneuvering brings the now-famous midway to life!

name: Castlevania: The Seal Of The Curse
summary: The Seal of the Curse is a fan-made sequel to Konami's Castlevania: Simon's Quest.

name: Cats and Seek: Dino Park
summary: John and Emily are on a date to Dino Park. Turns out, not only are there lots of dinosaurs, but there are also many cats playing and hiding there ! Let's play hide and seek with the cats in Dino Park! Can you find them all?

name: Cameo: CCTV Detective
summary: Play as CCTV Detective Lopez as he solves crimes through the ever faithful lens of a security camera. The crime rate in the small City of ChurchView is rising, and it is up to Lopez to lower it.

name: Can You Make It Man
summary: Embark on an exciting challenge as you ascend Mighty Oak Mountain in this 3D platformer. Get ready to face tough obstacles, jumping, climbing, and flying your way through a visually impressive world made of wooden blocks. Your goal? Reach the top to meet the Oak King. Show off your skills, courage, and determination in this thrilling adventure. Can you conquer the mountain and become a true champion? The decision is yours.

name: Carrot Buds
summary: Embark on a heartwarming adventure as a courageous carrot risking his life to rescue one of the captured friends. Explore a vibrant farming world overcoming challenges, all in a bid to reunite with your friend.

name: Carrot Rescue
summary: Carrot Rescue is a 2D pixel linear game, where you play the role of a farmer who must harvest his carrot crop before winter comes. However, there are various obstacles on your way: wild animals that are trying to eat your crops and evil farmers who want to steal it.

name: Carrot Survivors
summary: Protect your factory from the wrath of nature and the greed of pacifying forces with the help of your coworkers and the strength of your professional skills. Fight against waves of enemies before the end of your work day: Extra hours will not be compensated.

name: Case 32
summary: A series of mysterious murders takes place in a small provincial town. Detective Cooper must unravel a tangle of mystical, chilling events to get to the bottom of the mystery.

name: Castles on Clouds
summary: A Roguelike Tower Defense game set on a user controlled procedurally generated island. Select unique cards and relics that enhance your towers abilities, crafting powerful builds to defend against the growing hordes of enemies.

name: Catacomb Rogue Clawsaders
summary: Welcome to Catacomb Rogue Clawsaders! In this deckbuilding roguelite you'll embark on an dark journey alongside a fearless band of kitties as they claw their way through hordes of monstrous adversaries lurking within the corridors of a strange catacomb.

name: Candy & Clyde
summary:
In this flash game game, you must help Candy & Clyde through a variety of different tasks, chores and games. For each task, you can choose to play as either Candy or Clyde and the task will be slightly different depending on who you choose. Candy is nice and sweet and is always trying to help others. Clyde is mean and is always trying to hurt others. Your goal is to complete each task as quickly as possible and score as many stars as you can. The games start out very easy, but get harder and harder as you go on.

Like in the WarioWare series, Candy & Clyde the player must do 15 different microgames as ether Candy or Clyde as quickly as possible. Players get to choose Candy or Clyde at the start of each microgame with the rules changing slightly depending on the chosen player. The player will get 1 to 5 stars depending on how quickly the task is done and if too much time is taken the player will lose a life. Once the 15 games are done they are repeated in the same order at a harder difficulty level (more items, greater distance etc) and continue to get more difficult until all lives are lost.

name: Cat Bang
summary: If fighting and adventure make you tired, come and try some casual and puzzle. Catch the falling kitten with open box, so easy.

name: Cat Billiards
summary: This is a simple casual game, bring home cats by playing billiards, the cats you bring home can be clicked with the mouse to make cute sounds, will you be able to collect all 50 cats?

name: CatCat Save The World
summary: This is RTS puzzle game. One holy girl in other world who call Yuna just complete the Hero Summon, but there has no hero coming from this summon, a cat just show up. That white cat call him as "CatCat" and his name is "GiFi", He steers up the mobile-human armor, and start to save the world.

name: Catnip Dreams
summary: Leap into this Catnip-induced Dream, a whimsical 2.5D platformer where you guide an auto-jumping cat through a dreamy world, mastering lateral movement and timing to overcome imaginative challenges and playful obstacles. BEWARE, this game will break you! Play at your own risk >:D

name: Cats in Boxes
summary: Dive into 'Cats in Boxes' for an atmospheric adventure with captivating puzzles, cozy vibes, and cats—LOTS OF CATS. Meet unique felines, each with an interesting story, and the handcrafted levels. Find the best spot on your chair, couch, or bed, just like the cats, and enjoy!

name: Cats Everywhere
summary: Find cats in a relaxing hidden object game for cat´s lovers. Can you find them all?

name: Cat Search in Feudal Japan
summary: The cats are hiding all over this Japanese city! Can you find them all? Sit back, relax, and explore this beautiful hand drawn Japanese city.

name: Cat's Cafeteria
summary: Um jogo de Visual Novel, com histórias interessantes e personagens cativantes.

name: Cat & Onion
summary: A warm and whimsical cat adventure game where you climb, talk, fly and smack your way to places where no cat has ever gone before! Go on a short yet cosmic journey packed with curious characters, imaginative environments and good vibes.

name: Caught On Camera
summary: Survive 6 hours as a night guard, monitoring for anomalies. Act fast, or risk losing your mind to the unexplained horrors that lurk beyond the screens.

name: Cauldron
summary: Cauldron is an upgrade-heavy, minigame-centric, turn-based RPG. Play minigames to strengthen your party, then fight battles to uncover more map, more heroes, more minigames, more everything! If your favorite plant is an upgrade tree, then this game is for you!

name: Caustic Bloom
summary: In this top-down Metroidvania, descend into the belly of Sarcophagus II, an underground laboratory overrun by mutated creatures. Blast your way through this labyrinth of chaos, facing overwhelming odds in an effort to rescue your friends and recover your humanity.

name: Cave of Illusions: Twistyland
summary: A surreal, atmospheric and vivid horror game about a mysterious board game and the little Sophie trapped inside it.

name: Caviar
summary: Photograph fish, watch the ecosystem thrive.

name: Card Fencer
summary: Journey through distant lands, collect cards to defeat your enemies, and discover other powerful treasures along the way in Card Fencer, a deck building turn-based RPG.

name: Cards and Creatures
summary: Enhance your strategy and strengthen bonds with your creatures in this card battling, creature collecting roguelike. Cards and Creatures skilfully blends different genres into one addictive package!

name: CardyHeim
summary: CardyHeim is a 2D platformer adventure side view game. Collect Cards and build a deck that will suit your unique way of playing CardyHeim

name: Cargo Duty
summary: Your crew is on a mission to collect cargo. As you are going from moon to moon, there are creatures who will try and stop you. How long will you survive ?

name: Capital Fire
summary: An action RPG that combines exploration with dynamic combat. Estrela is a young defender of democracy who searches for the Book of the Greater Law to put an end to a terrible threat from patriotic zombies.

name: Captain Willie
summary: Ahoy there! Welcome to Captain Willie's crew! Join us on a maritime adventure as his trusty deckhand. Your job? Tend to routine ship tasks—chop potatoes, stoke the furnace, and keep the deck shipshape.

name: Caution Ahead: Part 1
summary: This is the first installment of a three-part series featuring a hide-and-seek type horror experience, with each part consisting of three chapters.

name: Cangaço Wargame
summary:
Originally conceived as a board game, the developers realized during the development process that it was gaining many elements that are closely related to the dynamics of social games. That's precisely why the game was developed for Facebook.

In this multiplayer-focused game, you must lead a group of cangaceiros (bandits) in turn-based battles, navigating through farms, towns, and swamps of the caatinga (Brazilian northeastern region). The battles occur turn by turn, and a single combat can last from a few minutes to several weeks: you make your move and then wait for your opponent (who might be offline at the moment). There are two distinct groups in the game: the cangaceiros and the volante (police force). As you challenge and defeat your enemies, you climb the ranks, getting closer to the title of the cangaço king.

name: Call of Duty: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The New Leader in World War II action - Now available in this Deluxe Edition Box Set.

Experience the cinematic intensity of World War II's epic battles, fighting on foot, in tanks, jeeps, motorcycles and even a bomber. Work with your squad through snow and rain, using authentic weapons including flamethrowers and deployable machine guns, or by calling in artillery strikes.

Plan your attack with the Call of Duty and United Offensive Official Strategy Guides. Relive the music with the Call of Duty official soundtrack.

name: Cavephobia
summary: Cavephobia is a 90s VHS Found Footage Survival Horror title with focus on realistic situations, claustrophobia, speluncaphobia and a deep atmosphere. Inspired by cave exploration in real life and movies such as "The Descent".

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 2
summary:
Survive the decay: After Konni Group infiltrated a Mediterranean island, conducting nefarious experiments that have recently — and catastrophically — changed Fortune’s Keep forever, it’s up to you and your squad to survive the decay, battling and hunting down the undead infiltrating every part of Season 2’s colossal content offering! Help is at hand, as Sheriff Deputy Rick Grimes from AMC’s The Walking Dead and CIA Station Chief Kate Laswell headline the Season 2 Battle Pass.

Expect a truly immense content offering, including new Multiplayer maps, four new weapons, Aftermarket Parts (including your own underbarrel chainsaw!), Ranked Play for both Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone, new Zombies Dark Aether Rift investigations, events, challenges, secrets, and a skeletal theme to BlackCell, led by the mysterious John Doe Operator.

CONTENT SUMMARY:

- A massive Multiplayer map offering! Four new Core 6v6 maps arrive across Season 2, including three brand-new 6v6 maps and a fan-favorite remaster.
- Two map variants: Ready up for Hordepoint and the Vortex Mid-Season Playlist, explore two otherworldly themed map variants based on Skidrow and Terminal.
- New War map: Assault a downtown Urzikstan skyscraper from the skies. Welcome to Operation Tin Man.
- Five game modes and a Vortex Playlist: Bring home a win in Team Gun Game; quickscope your way to victory in Snipers Only; enjoy the return of Hordepoint and Bounty; and battle rival Juggernauts in the Juggermosh pit!
- Season 2 Ranked Play: Claim the Ranked Play rewards you unlocked in Season 1, then continue the grind with a full season and all-new rewards to earn.
- New Ninja Vest: Favoring those knives only? Equip the Ninja Vest for silent running, as well as a bonus knife and throwing star ammo.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Rims
summary: Rims DLC is a pack of 80 unique brand new rims with some color variations.

name: Captain Stu
summary: Captain Stu is a 2.5d platformer set in the bright and beautiful Caribbean. Defeat enemies with sword or pistol and navigate through the dangerous world.

name: Calrivar Cluster
summary: An Accessibility First Real Time Strategy Game, built from the ground up to work with only one hand and limited sight. Entirely single player all movement and control is preformed via keyboard, the camera system was designed around the physical layout of the number pad on keyboards.

name: Captain Edward
summary: Want to play as a time traveling pirate? Now is your chance with Captain Edward. Hours of cutscenes, jokes, and other oddities to make you and your friends laugh.

name: Calm Down, Stalin VR
summary: Best Stalin simulator on the Internet is now in VR! Sign important papers, answer phone calls, avoid foreign spies, and don't forget to smoke your pipe to relieve stress in this Stalin simulator!

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare - Limited Collector's Edition
summary:
Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare differs from previous installments of the Call of Duty series. Previous Call of Duty games have a distinct three country-specific campaign style, while Call of Duty 4 has a more film-like plot with interlaced story lines from the perspectives of Sgt. Paul Jackson of the Marines 1st Force Recon and Sgt. 'Soap' MacTavish of the British 22nd SAS Regiment.

This limited collector's edition includes:

- Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
- Bonus DVD with making-of scenes, a documentary of the British S.A.S., a level walk-through by the developer, and some campaign trailers. (Europe-only)
- Poster featuring the cover art of the game.
- Hardcover art book narrated by the developers and artists, with concept, development and final in-game artwork. (Xbox 360 & European Windows-only)
- Digital copy of the Brady Games official strategy guide (Windows-only)

name: Capcom Coin-Op Classics Series 1
summary: Capcom's Coin-op Collection Volume 1 is a compilation of 14 arcade games.

name: Catch Me
summary: Catch Me is a game released built-in some models of televisions by the Philco company in the 90s. It is a memory game, in which the player has to remember the order and position of 4 symbols (the logo of the company), according to a sequence, while a timer counts down.

name: Cards Against Formality
summary: Click the play button above. Play anonymously, or sign in with your favourite social media account. Then proceed to play with your friends and family. Works great on mobile, desktop or tablet!

name: Cargo Simulator 2019: Turkey
summary: Cargo Simulator 2019: Turkey is the first truck driving simulation game that contains the real Turkey map and cities with scaled roads.

name: Cape's Escape Game 7th Room
summary: Solve the mystery and escape from the room

name: Call Center
summary: Every wonder what it's like to work at a real call center? Well, here you go I guess. Don't get this game. It's really boring. Even if there are two endings, it's not worth it.

name: Castles of Darkness
summary: You have to defeat the evil wizard Grimnacht in order to rescue the princess in this animated text adventure.

name: Carnival of Shadows
summary: Carnival of Shadows is an English carnival-themed romance visual novel.

name: Caiobá
summary: A short story, inspired by family trips I took to Matinhos-PR in my childhood. My first game made with lots of love and care is GameMaker!

name: CapitalismCraft
summary: Welcome to the wonderful world of capitalism! Exploit your workers to earn money! Hire managers to crush their spirits and drive them harder, then fire them once you’ve achieved your ends! Be agile, ruthless, merciless, become the richest CEO in the world, winning in rapid clicker management!

name: Call of Heroes: Tower Defense
summary: Embark on a magical and exciting journey to protect the fairy kingdom in this epic TD game. Recruit unique heroes with powerful magic. Craft exclusive weapons for each hero. Defend the fairy kingdom!

name: Call of Honor: Duty of Warfare
summary: Answer the Call, Honor your Duty, and Dive into Tactical Warfare. Navigate Intense 5v5 Skirmishes, Decimate Your Foes, and Uncover the True Duty of Warfare!

name: Car Racing Game
summary: The player switches between lanes to avoid other cars and obstacles passing through. The player loses if the car hits one of them. Some versions have the speed/level increase gradually over time. A less common variant allows the car to freely move instead of switching lanes and the speed automatically set to maximum number (with the option to slow down using the down button). It is typically featured as a first or second game (on either "A" or B" on letter-based selection, and "1" or "2" on older numbered selection).

name: Car Racing Ice: Classic
summary: Get ready for heart-pounding races and strategic showdowns in this frosty, action-packed racing experience!

name: Car Detailing Cleaner Simulator
summary: Become the ultimate car detailing expert! Meet customers with dirty cars and transform their vehicles into sparkling clean havens. Are you ready to make every ride shine? Take on the role of a car cleaning guru! Dive into a realistic car salon cleaning simulation on Steam.

name: Car Racing Master: Car Game 3D
summary:
Race Master 3D Car Racing is a furious, fast and fast racing game. If you love playing car racing games and are familiar with car driving games, try this car game and immerse yourself in the fun of car games in 3D. Play car racing games 3D for the car racing adventure. Enjoy an exciting experience of car driving simulator games with interesting gameplay and stunning graphics in this racing master game.

In this car racing master 3D racing game, this addition to car racing games can give you the feel of a real car simulator like no other racing game. The amazing fast driving experience on different racing tracks can provide a real car driving experience that is more engaging than other racing simulator games. This new car racing 3D game has different racing cars that you can drive at ultimate speed on multiple racing tracks that are comparable to the best car games.

name: Capoo Pals for MAC
summary: Completely stress-free desktop games, heal your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer

name: Cafe Rosa
summary: Cafe Rosa is a cafe management simulator. Serve food to unique customers and earn coins. Manage your own cafe by upgrading the facilities and changing the interior. Dive into the world of cafe ownership and watch your business flourish!

name: Cat Simulator: Kitty Conundrums
summary: Cat Simulator: Kitty Conundrums invites you to dive into the world of feline cunning! Playing as a crafty cat, your mission is to outsmart the unsuspecting neighbor below. Descend the stairs, unleash chaos – spoil food, drown phones, even detonate the microwave.

name: Captain CoinCoin
summary: Help CoinCoin, the farm duck, defend the old farm where he and his friends were born. Construct buildings, harvest resources, train fighters and plan tricks to repel, in turn-based battles, the strange machines that want your land.

name: Cat Survivors
summary: You have 20 minutes

name: Caldera
summary: Caldera is set in 1849 at the very beginning of the American Gold Rush, where Players have the opportunity to seek their fortunes and learn about the various Mineralization's responsible for Gold-Bearing Ore! Pan for Gold, Mine for Gold, Dig for Gold, Process Minerals, and more!

name: Catch Me If You Can
summary: Catch Me If You Can is a multiplayer hide & seek game that immerses you into the world of Slavic mythology. Pick the role and play as one of the heroes, each having unique abilities.

name: Capoo Pals for MAC Expansion Set
summary: Completely stress-free desktop games, heal your boredom at work and school Let the cute and funny Capoo accompany you every moment of using the computer

name: Call of Duty Endowment: Direct Action Pack
summary: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Direct Action Pack Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: CastingPlz
summary: CastingPlz is a 2-player cooperative roguelike game where players take on the roles of two characters with distinct responsibilities: one for attacking and the other for movement.

name: Catacombs
summary: Catacombs was a team shooter RPG, planned to develop by Cavia after NieR with Square Enix publishing.

name: Caleuche
summary: You are on a fishing boat, capturing your last game for the night. As you hear a distant noise, you watch as a ship is rushing at your small vessel. This ship will test, attack and call you to action; your decisions have consequences, make them wisely.

name: Cats of the Ming Dynasty
summary: Explore the ancient city of Suzhou during the Ming Dynasty and find the delightful cats!

name: California Swingers Club: Season 1 - Sea Swap
summary: Two couples rent a spacious sailboat for the perfect vacation, but as they venture out onto the water, their journey takes an unexpected turn.

name: Cavemount
summary:
We decided to take a break from all those block-pushing games and make a hack'n'slash game instead.

Hold on for a bit, our programmer is trying to say something urgent

Eleventh in a series of short sokoban browser games by the developer of Baba Is You.

name: Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia - Zero Collection
Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Season Pass
summary: The Season Pass for Call of Duty: Black Ops III gets players access to four epic DLC packs. Each DLC pack contains four all-new multiplayer maps and one episode of the Zombies storyline.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Zombies Chronicles Deluxe Edition
summary:
Call of Duty: Black Ops III Zombies Chronicles Deluxe includes the full base game, Season Pass, Zombies Chronicles & additional bonus digital content including:

The Giant Bonus Map: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with "The Giant". Re-live the chaos of Treyarch's classic "Der Riese" Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.

3 Personalization Packs: Fan favorite Cyborg & Weaponized 115 packs along with a new Black Ops 3 pack. Each pack comes with a weapon camo, reticles, and calling card.

The Zombies Chronicles content expansion which delivers 8 remastered classic maps from Call of Duty: World at War, Call of Duty: Black Ops and Call of Duty: Black Ops II.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - The Giant
summary: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with 'The Giant,' a research facility featuring the weapon-upgrading Pack-a-Punch Machine. Re-live the chaos of Treyarch's classic 'Der Riese' Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III Game of the Year + Zombie Chronicles Bundle
summary: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Game of the Year + Zombie Chronicles Bundle released only in Japan.

name: Cathode Ray Sunshine
summary:
This is a short horror game that I developed for Fantasy Console Game Jam #3 using the Pico-8 fantasy console. This game is not suited for children or those who are easily disturbed.

The objective of this game is to move around a desolated town and touch certain magic pillars. When you touch the pillars (it's a little finicky, so try to move around them a bit), a streetlight will come on near a lighthouse to signify your progress. You must light all six streetlights, at which point the lighthouse will light up. Touch the light of the lighthouse to complete the game.

name: Cazzarion: Astro Bouncer
summary: Jump around bouncing off walls and collecting stars, but avoid the spikes!

name: Call Hating 2000
summary: A "mildly infuriating" first person adventure game with humorous narration where you use 90s tech to overcome an evil AI and make it to work on time.

name: Candyland: Sweet Survival
summary: Uncover the ominous mysteries of an abandoned chocolate factory. Navigate eerie levels, solve sinister puzzles, and outwit malevolent entities. Collect precious candies, unveil the factory's secrets, and confront the darkness. Are you brave enough to explore Candyland's dark secrets?

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare - Game of the Year Edition
summary:
Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare differs from previous installments of the Call of Duty series. Previous Call of Duty games have a distinct three country-specific campaign style, while Call of Duty 4 has a more film-like plot with interlaced story lines from the perspectives of Sgt. Paul Jackson of the Marines 1st Force Recon and Sgt. 'Soap' MacTavish of the British 22nd SAS Regiment.

The Game of the Year Edition includes a code for the Variety Map Pack, adding 4 new multiplayer maps: Broadcast, Creek, Chinatown and Killhouse.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - South Africa Reserve
summary: Explore South Africa and catch unique new fish species with your friends. Complete missions at Fishing Hubs for rewards and discover breathtaking landmarks.

name: Cabbage Crop
summary: Plant and grow fresh crops to wield them as swinging or throwing weapons in this simple tower defense game! Protect your house and magic pet chicken from invading animals, and unlock new types of crops each stage to give your opponents a varying taste of cultivated pain!

name: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest
summary: Card Survival: Fantasy Forest is a card-based deep survival simulator and the next installment in the Card Survival Series. Carve yourself a home in a primordial forest that has a will of its own. A day-to-day life simulator in a world where nature reigns with mystery, beauty and sometimes cruelty.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Tech Luxe Pro Pack
summary: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Cat Survivors
summary: This bullet hell roguelite pits you against waves of ferocious demons, where strategic upgrades and dynamic builds are your keys to survival. Can you outlast the demonic onslaught and emerge as the ultimate Cat Survivor?

name: Cabral's Quest
summary: A puzzle game set in a hidden world. Recover each fragment of the sacred deed to help Cabral the capybara and his community recover their land. Use different runes to change the elements of the world around you to solve each puzzle.

name: Call from the Abyss
summary: This is an exploration action game in which you travel around the vast underwater world wearing manta-shaped diving suit, defeating the enemies that stand in your way. Dig up lost technology sunk by the rising sea level and proceed to the deep sea where the truth of the world awaits you.

name: Cat and Mouse
summary: "Cat and Mouse" is roguelike game which contain backpackage manage and auto-chess element.Player can expand the backpackage to place more stone,summon stronger army.Upgrade the hero and learn more skill.Defead the mouse army.

name: Caden's Climb
summary: A fast-paced 2D platformer.

name: Cats and Seek: Kyoto
summary: Hi folks! In this third series, we will explore Kyoto and greet the cats there Let's play hide and seek with the cats in Kyoto!

name: Capoeira Fighter
summary: Flash game inspired by the Brazilian sport Capoeira, made by indie producer Spiritonin, founded by artists who had previously worked for Shockwave Software, Disney Interactive and other publishers. First game in what became a series.

name: Camera Lens
summary: This is a maze game with simple graphics but equally rich content.

name: Capybara: The Story of Sisyphus
summary: Capybara: The Story of Sisyphus is a game about a very lazy capybara who wants to take a bath at the top of the mountain. To do this, the capybara must gain speed and cling to the obstacles with a rope with a barrel so as not to fall!

name: Canyon Rush
summary: Navigate treacherous canyons in this thrilling trap runner game, Canyon Rush! Test your reflexes, master the traps, and climb the leaderboards in an adrenaline-pumping adventure. Are you ready to conquer the canyon?

name: Cards with Personalities Classic
summary:
In Cards with Personalities Classic, players take on the role of a humble hero trying to assemble a team of great personalities to defeat the weird bosses that roam the lands.

Each turn, you will play cards from your hand to gain Gold, Attack or other effects (like converting monsters to your side). You can spend Gold to acquire new cards from your deck. Attack is used to slay monsters, which earns you Gold and other cool effects. The battlefield is always changing so you have to adapt and come up with new strategies to defeat all eight bosses!

name: Capybara, Ducks, Rats and Bananas Bundle
summary: This bundle contains lots of Capybara, Duck, Mouse and Banana! Get Ducky Quacky + Capybara Madness + Ratyboy Adventures + Revenge of Banana in one bundle with good price!

name: Cartel Tycoon: Deluxe Edition
summary: Cartel Tycoon is a survival business sim inspired by the ‘80s narco trade.

name: Careful Gardeners
summary: Fight pests and insects to protect your garden!

name: Cave Hikers
summary: A relaxing and humorous 2D interactive cartoon mockumentary that follows three characters through a cavernous world, on a quest to find the mystical “cave with an infinite ceiling”.

name: Card Racer
summary: Unleash the ultimate adrenaline rush with Card Racer — a fusion of exciting car combat and intricate card tactics!

name: Carrier 2: The Next Mutation
summary: An unreleased sequel to the Dreamcast game Carrier. Why it got cancelled is believed to do with Jaleco's financial troubles at the time.

name: Cavern Adventurers
summary: Build an underground network of caves in this fantasy-themed management sim.

name: Cakefoot
summary: Cakefoot is an ultra-hard, single-button, minimalist avoid ’em up with natural physics that is simple to learn and difficult to master. The cake moves on a rail – hold to go forward, let go to fall back. If you can navigate the most challenging enemy patterns you’ve ever seen all the way to the end, you’ll be rewarded with – a new, harder difficulty.

name: Call Center Tycoon
summary: Call Center Tycoon is a business management simulation game where the goal is to get the best out of your employees. Keep your employees stress level's low and they will perform better increasing your profits and your market share. Make key decisions and watch the action unfold.

name: Cat Secretary
summary: Keep your job by day. At night, sneak around the office and solve your colleagues' problems. Who's a good Cat Secretary? You are!

name: Cats of the Qing Dynasty
summary: Embark on a journey through the ancient city of the Qing Dynasty, and search for adorable cats! Experience the delightful collision between cats and historical settings and characters.

name: Category 6
summary: Brace yourself for the ultimate open-world survival craft experience. Welcome to a world shattered by the relentless fury of the most colossal hurricane in history. You are thrust into the eye of the storm, tasked with not just enduring, but thriving in the aftermath of nature's wrath.

name: Cathexis
summary: Ancient pillars crumble into the sea. Cathexis, the power to remake this broken world, will be nothing more than scattered shards. Scale the towers. Unlock their secret chambers and awaken the relics within. Do what you must…before it all comes crashing down.

name: Casino Management Simulator
summary: Run your own casino in "Casino Management Simulator"! Manage staff, games, and finances to build your gambling empire. Compete with rivals and keep guests entertained to become the ultimate casino tycoon!

name: Cave Command
summary: Intrude the enemy cave, collect fuel, aviod mines and heat seeking missles.

name: Call of Interview
summary: The is a 2.5D pixel-style turn-based grid-tile tactical game designed by Joshua Rabbit (solo), which is a 3-month final major project for MA Game Design. Players can customise the map using the given map clip, creating advantages for their skills and the plants to fight against HR.

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare - Variety Map Pack
summary:
The Variety Map Pack includes four new multiplayer maps featuring a variety of locations.

“Creek,” a wide-open village ravaged by combat where concealment is the difference between life and death; “Broadcast,” fight throughout an enemy communications building with confined corridors and wide-open parking lots; “Chinatown,” a foggy downtown district, lit only by a full moon and the neon glow of the city; and “Killhouse,” featuring a desolate training warehouse filled with a variety of building mock-ups and soft and hard cover points.

name: Call of Duty: Game of the Year Edition
summary: Call of Duty: Game of the Year Edition was a re-release of Call of Duty that included the latest updates and multiplayer content.

name: Call of Duty 2: Game of the Year Edition
summary: Call of Duty 2: Game of the Year Edition includes material from the Special Edition, plus a token to download the Skirmish Map Pack.

name: Call of Duty 2: Collector's Edition
summary: A special edition of the second entry into the fray of WWII. Featured in addition to the game are bonuses such as game trailers and concept art, mission walkthroughs and DVD-style developer commentary (with notes on the historical accuracy as well as game play tips), a narration by veteran Ranger Len Lomell about the assault on Pointe du Hoc, interviews and recording footage with the voice-over cast, and behind-the scenes footage with the developer.

name: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack Bundle
summary:
Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack Bundle features the nine multiplayer maps and three co-op Zombie maps from Map Packs 1, 2, & 3.

Fight through war-torn Berlin in “Nightfire,” battle through the waterfalls of “Banzai,” and defend an armored island in “Battery,” plus much more. Zombies and Hell Hounds attack in “Verrückt” (Zombie Asylum), “Shi No Numa” (Zombie Swamp), and “Der Riese” (Zombie Factory). Survive against the Zombie horde with the help of Perks-a-Cola machines, Monkey Bombs, and the powerful Wunderwaffe DG-2. This bundle features the 20 Achievements from Map Packs 1, 2 & 3.

name: Call of Duty: World at War - Limited Collector's Edition
summary:
The Call of Duty: World at War Limited Collector's Edition is a package containing Call of Duty: World at War, a canteen, which has its lid stuck on as the inside is lead, a metal tin in which to store all Call of Duty games, a week of double XP, a golden clan tag to promote the player's VIP status, and a code for unlocking the FG42 early.

When the code is redeemed, the first heavy gunner slot for Create-A-Class will have an FG42. If the customer pre-ordered the game at Gamestop then the M1A1 Carbine will be put in the first slot of the rifleman class.

name: Card-en-Ciel
summary: Card-en-Ciel is a deckbuilding, roguelite RPG adventure featuring over 300 characters and 50 vocal songs. Earn a chance to recruit a new ally with each victory, opening up new strategies and combos.

name: Call of Duty: The War Collection
summary: Call of Duty: The War Collection is a bundle pack of the games Call of Duty 2, Call of Duty 3, and Call of Duty: World at War. The bundle pack is only available for the Xbox 360.

name: Call of Duty 4: Spec-Ops
summary: Call of Duty 4: Spec-Ops is a Call of Duty 4 custom single player mod heavily inspired by the spec-ops mode from Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2. The mod provides a good collection of short spec-ops levels full of fun objectives and cool mission concepts. The levels are based on custom levels found in the mod Rooftops.

name: Candy Shop Simulator
summary: Dive into a sugary world of sweetness in Candy Shop Simulator! Open your shop, create delectable pastries, manage sales, and expand your candy empire. Satisfy your sweet tooth and build your confectionery legacy now!

name: Carlson's Ticker Simulator
summary: With love from Mother Russia!

name: Calamity Angels: Special Delivery
summary: A rag-tag group of kooky carriers protect and trek packages through treacherous terrains in this delivery service RPG!

name: Caracolino
summary: Caracolino is an educational adventure game where our hero Caracolino decides to save the planet from the clutches of Dr. Cubix, otherwise, everything will turn into geometric figures. Can you imagine a square bird or a round elephant? Only you can help Caracolino take on the dreaded Dr. Cubix! So, shall we go?

name: Canaan Online
summary: Canaan is a free-to-play browser Flash MMORPG set in a fantasy world with Manga-styled graphics. Players choose among 4 unique classes to explore and adventure with, accepting and completing quests, battling creatures, collecting pets, learning and increasing skills, engaging in PvP combat, and even getting married.

name: CavEX
summary: CavEX, short for Cave Explorer, is a Wii homebrew game with the goal to recreate most of the core survival aspects up until Beta 1.7.3. Any features beyond will not be added. The game has been dubbed by players and fans online as "Minecraft: Wii Edition".

name: Cartel Tycoon: Content Pack - Diva's Hotel
summary: Hire a charming Camila, adorn your empire with unique emblems, and elevate your operations with an exclusive hotel skin!

name: Camps
summary: CAMPS is an immersive, tactical sandbox where every detail matters.

name: Casual Mahjong
summary: A single-player Japanese Riichi Mahjong game. After intense battles with real players, why not enjoy a relaxed and delightful match?

name: Cauldron Tale
summary: After mysteriously losing your magic, you move to Charmroot, a mystical village of witches, wizards and other fantasy townsfolk. Build your farm, solve the mystery, and get to know the world and characters of Charmroot all at your own pace in this cozy, story-driven fantasy farm-life adventure!

name: Cazzarion: Ghost Frenzy
summary: Collect Gems in a mine but avoid the ghosts and the bombs!

name: Cazzarion: Space Ace
summary: Face off against swarms of enemies, as you try to avoid them while collecting power ups and weapons.

name: Cazzarion: Space Shooter
summary:
If you like space shooter and space invader games, you should try this version of a galaxy shoot 'em up.
Galactic war in space and endless waves of alien spaceships are waiting for you!

name: Card Bard
summary: Roguelike deckbuilder with global leaderboards.

name: Case Records: Fear of Abduction
summary: Psychological horror, which is part of the games CASE: Animatronics and CASE 2: Animatronics Survival.

name: Candy House in the Dark Forest
summary: The abandoned Hansel and Gretel, guided by the sweet and tempting aroma, arrived at a candy house filled with sweets. They encounter dolls with vacant eyes, ruthless teddy bears, enigmatic gingerbread twins, and a mysterious witch... Can they reveal the hidden dark truths beneath the sweet cover?

name: Cardboard Chronicles
summary: Welcome to Doodleburg! You play Doodle, a child who has been transported into a cardboard world of their own creation. Not all is well in the Burg of Doodle. An ancient, extradimensional evil has awoken and it's up to you to save this idyllic town from its ravenous rampage.

name: Cave Escape
summary: An indie 2D top-down maze escape puzzler. Get out of each maze before your light runs out and try get the highscore for each level!

name: Case: Online
summary: Case: Online is a fangame based of Case 2: Animatronics Survival Multiplayer.

name: Caracoles
summary: Hilarious like a fart... but longer! In Caracoles you compete against your pals in the fastest outrageously slow racing multiplayer battles ever.

name: Cats in the Ancient City of Gu Su
summary: In the ancient city of Gu Su during the Qing Dynasty, embark on a quest to find adorable cats! Let the cats collide with historical scenes and characters in amusing ways."

name: Call of Duty: Legacy
summary: Call of Duty: Legacy is a bundle pack consisting of Call of Duty: Finest Hour and Call of Duty 2: Big Red One.

name: Call of Duty 2: Big Red One - Collector's Edition
summary:
Call of Duty 2: Big Red One also has a Collector's Edition that contains a bonus DVD with:

- Four exclusive character skins for multiplayer gameplay – using Elite soldier models.

- Interviews, MoCap/VO session footage of the in-game voice actors from the cast of Band of Brothers.

- Interviews with WWII veterans of the Big Red One, including memories of in-game events.

- Multiplayer map fly-through's with DVD-style developer commentary (tips, interesting facts, etc.).

- Behind the scenes with Treyarch, discussing the development of Call of Duty 2: Big Red One.

- Concept and production art gallery (art, sketches, storyboards, renders, etc.).

name: Call of Duty 3: Special Edition
summary: This special edition is a re-release of the original game for PlayStation 2 that includes a bonus disc with video interviews.

name: Call of Duty 2: Bonus Map Pack
summary: Bonus Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 2 featuring two new maps: Vossenack and Wallendar. The map pack was free and like all the DLC released for Call of Duty 2 it was only available on Xbox 360.

name: Call of Duty 2: Skirmish Map Pack
summary: Skirmish Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 2 featuring two new maps: Beaumont-Hague and Kalach. Like all the DLC released for Call of Duty 2 it was only available on Xbox 360.

name: Call of Duty 2 - Invasion Map Pack
summary: Invasion Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 2 featuring five new maps: Crossroads, Newvillers, Normandy, Decoytown, and Rostov. Like all the DLC released for Call of Duty 2 it was only available on Xbox 360.

name: Call of Duty 3: Valor Map Pack
summary: Valor Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 3 featuring five new maps. The maps included are Stalag 23, Crossing, Ironclad, La Bourgade, and Wildwood.

name: Call of Duty 3: Bravo Map Pack
summary: Bravo Map Pack is a downloadable map pack for Call of Duty 3 featuring three new maps and two returning maps from Call of Duty, and Call of Duty: United Offensive. The new maps are Rimling, Aller Haut, and Seine River. Gare Centrale returns from Call of Duty, and Marseilles from Call of Duty: United Offensive.

name: Call of Duty 2
summary:
The mobile version of "Call of Duty 2" brings the intense World War II action of the acclaimed series to handheld devices. Developed to capture the essence of its console counterpart, this version offers players a chance to experience iconic battles on the go.

In this mobile adaptation, players can engage in key missions from the American, British, and Soviet campaigns, battling through historic locations such as the beaches of Normandy, the deserts of North Africa, and the streets of Stalingrad. The game features streamlined controls and optimized graphics to deliver a smooth and engaging gameplay experience on mobile platforms.

Despite the portable format, the mobile version of "Call of Duty 2" maintains the series' commitment to realistic sound design, atmospheric environments, and intense combat scenarios. This adaptation provides a compelling way for fans to enjoy the thrill of World War II warfare anytime, anywhere, making it a standout entry in the mobile gaming landscape.

name: Call of Duty 3
summary: The mobile port of Call of Duty 3 by Hands-On Mobile (formerly MFORMA) which is played from a top-down perspective.

name: Cat Mart
summary:
Join the Purrfect Adventure at Cat Mart: Your Cozy Grocery Shop!

Welcome to Cat Mart, a world of cuddly kitties and bustling aisles! Here, our feline friends aren't just customers, they're part of the family.
Embark on an adventure in this unique grocery shop where every day is a joyous animal jam.

name: Captain Beeble
summary: You dive through underwater caves and collect crystals while keeping watch on your oxygen supplies.

name: Call of Duty: Future Warfare
summary:
Call of Duty: Future Warfare (internally called NX1) was a cancelled Call of Duty game worked on between 2011-2012 by Neversoft Entertainment, with a release window for around 2013.

In January 2024, video footage of an early build (dated December 2011) was leaked online.

name: CarprogramVR
summary: An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story. *This is a VR-only app that runs on SteamVR.

name: Carbón Heart
summary: Banished to another world, Alawn is absolutely alone in a new world that he does not know at the mercy of this one... or so it should have been if he had not stumbled upon her. Opening up this world and maybe something more.

name: Can't Stand The Heat
summary: Congratulations, you own a restaurant! Now just chat with customers, take orders, cook, serve, clean, design your interior and menu, order ingredients...so much to do! Earn enough cash and hire some help to make life easier. Or is it? Try to balance customer needs, employee quirks and your cashflow.

name: Carrera
summary: A cancelled slot car racing game featuring the titular brand.

name: Card Toons
summary: Battle against toons in this cartoony roguelike deckbuilder where each run is different. Improve your deck with various creatures and spells, collect powerful relics, and defeat your enemies to win the Card Toons game show!

name: Cars
summary: BEEP BEEP!!
developers: Playables, Mario von Rickenbach, Michael Frei

name: Castle Conquest: Medieval Strategy
summary: A simple strategy about capturing castles. Build up your forces, manage armies and capture enemy fortresses. Build buildings in castles and use strategic tricks. Capture all the fortresses to win.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II - Nuketown Zombies
summary:
Nuketown Zombies, also known as Nuketown in-game, is a Zombies map that is featured in Call of Duty: Black Ops II. It is based on Nuketown, a multiplayer map from Call of Duty: Black Ops and Call of Duty: Black Ops II.

The map was previously only available to players who purchased the Hardened, Care Package, or Digital Deluxe editions but was later made available to purchase in the system's digital marketplace.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II - Nuketown 2025
summary:
Nuketown 2025 is a downloadable map released for Call of Duty: Black Ops II. It is a remake of Nuketown which first appeared in Call of Duty: Black Ops. While the original Nuketown went for more of a traditional 1950s theme, the new map is now in a 1960s retro-futuristic Mid-Century modern style meant to represent the "Home of the Future" for 2025.

It was available for free to anyone who pre-ordered the game, purchased a launch copy, or purchased the Hardened edition or the "Care Package" limited special edition of the game. It was later made available to download for free to everyone as well as being included in an update for Call of Duty: Black Ops II on Wii U.

name: Catarsis: Catventure
summary: Step into an exciting journey in Catarsis, a rogue-like action game where you are the last hope for the world. In this outlaw-like action game, surviving enemy attacks in each room will require careful choices of upgrading your character's abilities and the features of the weapons in your inventory.

name: Car Wash
summary: The ultimate cars game for kids and preschool children. Featuring a lot of different cars and vehicles and lots of tools to choose from for cleaning cars and even make cars dirty again. A perfect family friendly game for all children, kids, toddlers. Very cute car wash!

name: Catch My Color
summary: Catch My Color is a game that find objects by applying the appropriate colors to the sights of Korea in black and white. Have fun coloring various landmarks in different colors and discovering hidden elements!

name: Cassette
summary: Cassette – Analog Horror, where you have to conduct a mysterious and little-known in its circles investigation, which is covered with a huge layer of dust and secrets. No one in the late 20th century has yet discovered the truth in the investigation.

name: Catarsis
summary: Catarsis unfolds in a future environment and people share this place with AI robots. In the midst of chaos scientists developed a revolutionary technology which will enable cats’ intelligence to inhabit a robotic body, allowing it to liberate the world from the ruthless rule of humans.

name: Castaway
summary: Dive into the short and sweet adventure of Castaway, where the allure of pixel art blends with accessibility for all ages, offering a delightful visual and musical experience, sprinkled with challenges and mysteries waiting to be explored.

name: Casino Simulator
summary: Become the boss of the casino and lead your way to wealth and success with your strategic decisions. Casino Simulator offers an exciting experience full of realistic graphics, discover the intricacies of casino operation.

name: Cats vs. Aliens
summary: Aliens have come to The Planet! Fight, gather, build, recruit, and conquer in this casually fresh take on familiar base building and bullet heaven mechanics. WARNING: Animal pun quantity may exceed the daily recommended limit.

name: Catlists
summary: The word-based, multiplayer, party game that doesn't require internet!

name: Card Miner
summary: Card Miner is the ultimate fusion of collecting, strategy, and anime allure. In this clicker game, you embark on a quest to collect rare cards, each featuring a stunningly illustrated woman with unique stats and sets of abilities.

name: Cat Girl Survivor
summary: "Cat Girl Survivor" is a dot graphic berserker-like game featuring a variety of unique characters and colorful skills. Defend the world of cat girls with a variety of charming characters!

name: Cat Purrtrol: Find All 100!
summary: Cat Purrtrol: Find All 100! is a relaxing, short game where you find 100 cats hidden in a drawing. It is completely free to play and is a fun quick game to spend a few minutes on!

name: Cards of Heart
summary: Cards of Heart is a narrative-focused cozy digital card game mixed with a fantasy top-down RPG about a young woman’s daily mental health struggles against her inner Shadows.

name: Casino League
summary: Casino League is a full tournament-style game with different tournament tiers where players can fight for Bronze, Silver, and Gold placings in each tier. The game features tournament-style live Texas Hold ‘Em with either 2-player head-to-head battle or 4-player gameplay.

name: Cartoon Cartoon Food Bash
summary: A Flash game formerly featured on the Cartoon Network website featuring characters from Johnny Bravo, Ed, Edd n Eddy, The Powerpuff Girls, and Samurai Jack.

name: Caixa Mágica de Estórias
summary: The Caixa Mágica de Estórias brings you four wonderful stories, written by Lúcia Pimental and Alice Góes, with animated illustrations, soundtrack and narrated text. You'll also have fun with memory games, puzzles, crosswords, and coloring.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Jeep RAM Remastered
summary: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Jeep | RAM Remastered DLC includes 6 cars: 2016 Ram 1500 Yellow Sport - 2013 Ram 3500 - 2012 Jeep Grand Cherokee SRT8 - 2012 Jeep Wrangler - 1949 Jeep Willys Civilian - 1942 Jeep Willys Military - V8 HEMI 345 - V8 HEMI 392 - V6 Pentastar G - I4 WIlys L134

name: Carnival
summary: Carnival is a first-person horror game that immerses you in a cursed amusement park. Explore eerie attractions, solve puzzles, confront bosses, and upgrade your arsenal. Uncover the secrets of the Sterling family amidst relentless darkness.

name: Cats Balance
summary: Balance the cats and don't let them fall into the water in this 2D physics puzzler.

name: Cats Around Us: Giant Cat
summary: We've hidden numerous cats in a silent comic about a giant cat causing chaos in a village. Can you find all those cats?

name: Cashier Sim
summary: Do you want to start making your first money and no one accepts you without experience?

name: Cat Short Way
summary: Join the brave cat in his exciting adventure and help him save the old factory from our mice and crows in the game "Cat Shortcut". You are captivated by the waiting and dangerous moments, many riddles that need to be solved! Good luck, hero!

name: Cat God Ranch
summary: Keep your ranch running in this roguelite deckbuilder where you must please the fabled Cat God, or risk being shut down! Breed & feed your animals to pay tribute... or else!

name: Capitals Quizzer: Globe Mode
summary: Name countries from their map position.

name: Capitals Quizzer: People Mode
summary: Where were they born?

name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare - Jackal Assault VR Experience
summary: The Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare - Jackal Assault VR Experience is a PlayStation VR experience that immerses fans in the cockpit and puts them in control of a Jackal, a personal multi-role fighter jet in Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare.

name: Calm Down Princess
summary: The fairy tale land is distorted! Deliver the item to calm the angry princess! Will you be able to calm the princess and save the fairyland?!! #platformer game #action #adventure #a trap game #a trick game

name: Cafe Owner Simulator: Farm DLC
summary: Have you opened your restaurant yet? Now you have the opportunity to supplement your menu with organic products, increase the profit of your restaurant and simply enjoy the nature and atmosphere of the farm. Grow, water, feed, get resources. Animals, beds and greenhouses are waiting for you!

name: Can Bullet
summary: BANG BANG BANG! CAN BULLET has come to your PC! Just shoot the cans and get rid of yesterday's, today's, and tomorrow's frustrations. A simple roguelike shooter, also good for a mid-afternoon coffee break.

name: Cargo Master Transporter
summary: Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey as you assume the role of a seasoned Cargo Master Transporter in this pulse-pounding gaming adventure.

name: Call of Duty: Siege
summary:
Conquer the galaxy in Call of Duty: Siege, the real-time strategy & collectible card game set in the Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare universe! From the team behind the hit strategy game, Call of Duty: Heroes, comes a new way to wage war.

Command your warship, the “Retribution,” to form offensive strike teams and reclaim planets from enemy factions that have seized power from the United Nations Space Alliance. To strengthen your position, you’ll need to build up strong defenses to maintain your grasp on hard won territories.

name: Cape's Escape Game 8th Room
summary: Solve the mystery and escape from the room

name: Caribbean Crashers
summary: Embark on a thrilling and strategic adventure in "Caribbean Crashers," a captivating game that combines tactical prowess with explosive action. Set in the sun-soaked, pirate-infested waters of the Caribbean!

name: Candy Ship
summary: You will control a candy spaceship in the shape of a whale as it navigates through the Candy Universe. Its goal is to reach the distant Candy Planet! Your spaceship will collect candy meteorites in space and convert them into fuel, enabling a journey lasting over 400 years.

name: Calling Card
summary: A kinetic visual novel in which you play as a henchperson tasked with helping out their boss. Listen closely and read between the lines, and you might just find out something new about him.

name: Calum
summary: A rhythmic action gameplay inspired by souls-like and beat-in-ups games with a top-down view.

name: Carnival
summary: Carnival is an atmospheric folk horror point-&-click featuring atmospheric low-resolution pixel art graphics, multiple locations drawn from Venice itself, and developing relationships with NPCs, allowing the player to influence events in the game and achieve multiple different endings.

name: Cats Hidden in Christmas
summary: Cats Hidden in Christmas is a FREE hidden object game in which you must find 100 cats hidden in a festive, hand-drawn scene. Can you find them all?

name: Café Manager
summary: Design your dream cafe, manage staff, serve a variety of coffees and desserts, and grow your business. Are you ready to brew your way to success?

name: Card Cultivation: Nine Palaces Illusory Realm
summary: "Card Cultivation: Nine Palaces Illusory Realm" is a card-based cultivation survival game. Experience unique cultivation methods like the Nine Palace Flying Stars and the Five Elements within traditional cultural elements. Confront harsh climates and malevolent spirits from ancient texts.

name: Card Clash Chronicles
summary: Embark on a journey across a cool little world, mastering the art of the Card Clash card game. You'll face off against six legendary opponents to earn your ticket to the World Card Game Tournament!

name: Cash Cleaner Simulator
summary: Start your money laundering business in this chill simulator! Use various not-so-powerful tools to restore dirty money bills and some unusual items to their full, crisp potential! Spend your hard-earned crypto to upgrade and cozy up your lab! The cash is in your hands!

name: Casino Simulator
summary: Casino Simulator Expand Your Casino From Scratch, Hire Employees, Customize It, Gamble, Enjoy Your Own Casino

name: CatMelon: Suika Game
summary: Combine several adorable cats dressed as fruits inside their favorite playing space: the cardboard box! Match two identical cats to create an increasingly larger cat until you reach the CatMelon. Develop your best strategy to remain at the top of the ranking!

name: Cats Hidden in England
summary: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden across England in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Cats in Heat: Sunshine Resort
summary: Adult-Only Casual Adventure game with animations, minigames, a funny story, and 3 cute catgirls!

name: Car-Toon Chaos
summary: Car-toon Chaos is an action-packed game where high-speed chases and combat converge. Play as a vigilante driver with fully loaded automatic weapons, pursuing criminals by day and evading colossal dinosaurs by night. Playable on both PC and VR.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Cyberjunkie: Pro Pack
summary: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Catch the Vandal
summary: Catch the Vandal is an multiplayer game where players take on the roles of both police officers and vandals. Police officers must identify the vandals among the citizens, while the vandals try to disguise themselves and vandalize the city. Have fun competing to achieve objectives and win the game.

name: Cafe Maid Girls: Cute Kemono Lifeguard DLC
Card Master
summary: Design your own unique card and play online with friends

name: Carnage
summary: A love letter to the top-down racing games of yore. Race and shoot your way through a varied dystopian world to collect and upgrade your vehicles to survive and prosper in the CARnage.

name: Cat Got Your Tongue
summary: Cat Got Your Tongue is a horror point-and-click game where you have to escape from the Cat by exploring the darkest corners of the house.

name: Call of the Void
summary: "Call of the Void" picks up where "Call of the Machine" leaves off. With our protagonist trapped in the void, suddenly, they hear a voice in their mind. The entity speaking identifies itself as one of the ancient gods Vadrigar, who proposes to the protagonist to escape the void by sending them on a new mission for revenge against the Stroggs. This is in response to the Stroggs transforming the fallen Vadrigars (Chton and Shub Niggurath) and their followers into partially mechanical creatures in the service of the Strogg leader Makron.

name: Casa dos Ossos
summary:
In a not too distant future...

Robin Chavez is an astronaut on a mission. She is tasked with mapping and cataloging the planets of a newly discovered galaxy, a fact that has shaken life on Earth. To tell you the truth, her mission has been a success. There's only one planet left, named TauCeti-75.

..but not everything works out. As it approaches the planet, Robin's ship short circuits and slowly loses power, until crash-landing on the unknown planet. With her ship out of operation, Robin finds herself alone with Nieborg, her little robot helper. What will she do now? Well, find out playing the game!

name: Capslock
summary:
Capslock is a casual game focused on design and testing your imagination. Choose between 100 skins, 195+ custom keys, 220+ symbols and more (so far) to test your designs and make unique keyboards. Relax as you listen to the 'clicky' sounds, chosen to help you unwind and immerse into a keyboard building environment.

Start from scratch - solve the puzzle of dragging and dropping each key into its' slot to build out your keyboard, or dive straight into designing and auto-fill all your keys with the press of a button! You can edit one key at a time, or make changes to your whole board - we hope Capslock moves at a pace which suits you.

"Do you have what it takes to face me?!"

name: Cat Rescue Story
summary:
It's up to you to create the most welcoming cat rescue centre around! When you move into the house left to you by your great-aunt, all you find is a cardboard box with a stray cat inside, which needs your help. Your mission is to take care of it and rescue other cats along the way! Feed them and play with them until you can find a new family to take them in.

Rescue more than 50 different breeds, from the most common to the rarest. Take care of the cats by feeding them and playing with them in several mini-games. Discover each cat's different personality as you bond with them, and find them a family suitable to their character and needs. Customize, decorate, and furnish your house, and team up with your new neighbors to get them to help along the way. Protect your rescue centre from those seeking to replace it with a luxury hotel. Uncover the secret of your great-aunt's house and the mysterious forest surrounding it.

name: Calorie-kun vs. Moguranian
summary:
Calorie-kun vs. Moguranian is a 1986 arcade game by Graphic Techno EW (a partnership between VIC Tokai and Seibu Lease) and released by Sega in Japan.

You play as an egg-shaped being (presumably Calorie-kun) who must navigate through a maze, eating everything on screen. The first button causes the character to attack by blowing or spitting(?) something out of its mouth; this can be used to knock enemies back, set of bombs, destroy enemies by knocking them into bombs, etc. The only mode of vertical movement is with ladders. You can also drop bombs with the second button; exactly when is unknown.

A similarly designed mole creature would later appear as the boss of Level 5 in Decap Attack.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
summary:
Developed by Treyarch and Raven, Black Ops 6 is a spy action thriller set in the early 90s, a period of transition and upheaval in global politics, characterized by the end of the Cold War and the rise of the United States as a single superpower. With a mind-bending narrative, and unbound by the rules of engagement, this is signature Black Ops.

The Black Ops 6 Campaign provides dynamic moment-to-moment gameplay that includes a variety of play spaces with blockbuster set pieces and action-packed moments, high-stakes heists, and cloak-and-dagger spy activity.

In a best-in-class Multiplayer experience, players will test their skills across 16 new maps at launch, including 12 core 6v6 maps and 4 Strike maps that can be played 2v2 or 6v6.

Black Ops 6 also marks the epic return of Round-Based Zombies, the fan-favorite mode where players will take down hordes of the undead in two brand-new maps at launch. Post-launch, players can look forward to even more exciting maps and groundbreaking experiences dropping into both Multiplayer and Zombies.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Warhammer 40K Crossover Pack
summary:
As part of the Season 2 Reloaded update for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III, three new Warhammer 40,000 Store Bundles are on the way. The first pack is inspired by the Space Marines, and includes Scout armour Operator Skins from the Ultramarines and Blood Angels 10th Companies, along with melee weapons inspired by the iconic chainsword as well as Weapon Blueprints with unique Warhammer tracers.

Tracer Pack: Warhammer 40,000 Sisters of Battle lets you armour up in the regalia of the Adepta Sororitas, complete with two Warhammer-themed Weapon Blueprints, custom tracers, and a host of other customisation items for your profile. Lastly, don the distinctive green-and-tan camouflaged armour of the Kasrkin with the final pack, including a Munitorum-issued blade, tracers that make your weapons look like they’re firing las bolts, and more.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 4
summary:
A disturbing discovery can change everything. A mysterious DNA bomb has been found at Popov Power in Urzikstan, and it’s up to you and your squadmates to unlock the mystery behind this potentially devastating weapon and prevent catastrophe. While you obtain various DNA samples during the ominous Critical Countdown Event, you can also further explore the multitude of bunkers across Urzikstan, potentially unearthing new ways to exit.

The potential outbreak seeps into Multiplayer, with a worldwide assortment of core 6v6 maps, plenty of exhilarating modes, revered weapons, new perks, destructive killstreaks, and battle-ready recon and hazmat inspired gear throughout the Battle Pass, so you can stay protected while remaining deadly calm and effective. One slip-up could alter everything, so suit up, drop in, uncover the truth, and stop the threat!

* Chapter 4: The search.
* Chapter 5: Run for your life.
* Chapter 6: Almost there.

name: Call of Duty: Warzone - Combat Pack: Shogun
summary:
PlayStation Plus members, prepare to unleash devastation in Call of Duty: Warzone and Modern Warfare II with the exclusive Combat Pack (Shogun)! This free in-game bundle is your key to tactical advantage and supreme style, providing essential gear to conquer the battlefield. Step into Season Six with a powerful arsenal and intimidate your enemies with a unique, fierce aesthetic.

What's Included in the Shogun Combat Pack?
Gear up for intense first-person shooter (FPS) action and dominate the battle royale with these premium items:

- Operator Skin for Oni: Intimidate your opponents with a brand-new, visually stunning Operator Skin for Oni, designed for silent and deadly tactical combat.

- 2x Weapon Blueprints: Wield the power of destruction with two exclusive Weapon Blueprints, expertly crafted for enhanced performance in every Warzone encounter. Fine-tuned for optimal gunplay and strategic advantage. Available for instant use in your favorite loadouts.

- Charm: Personalize your weapons with a unique Charm, showcasing your prowess as a seasoned Call of Duty warrior.

- Sticker: Make your mark with a custom Sticker, adding a touch of personalized flair to your arsenal.

- Animated Calling Card: Stand out in the pre-game lobby with an animated Calling Card that reflects your dedication to the fight.

- Animated Emblem: Show off your allegiance with a dynamic Animated Emblem, a true sign of a battle-hardened veteran.

summary: Canyons is a third-person extraction shooter set in a procedurally generated post-apocalyptic world. Fight for your existence in 4 player co-op or solo, control massive Crawlers, build a settlement for survivors, and conquer this savage world!

name: Cat Simulator 2
summary: Experience life as an actual cat, embark on adventures through expansive residences and breathtaking gardens. Select from a variety of cats and personalize their appearance to your liking. Test your skills in time-based challenges and, of course, revel in annoying humans. Engage in playful interactions with fellow kittens through the exciting new multiplayer mode, inviting friends or competing against individuals from across the globe!

name: Cart To The End
summary: Cart To The End is a First-Person Multiplayer Game where you must ride all the way to the end avoiding different kinds of obstacles and escaping other players which can kill you and make you suffer.

name: Capture the Intelligence
summary: A relaxing night of Capture the Flag turns into a night of terror for the BLU Spy. Crawl through five levels of familiar Source Engine environments and avoid the twisted RED team as you try to, of course, capture the intelligence. Can you survive? Will you capture the fabled intelligence?

name: Catalina's Horror Adventure
summary: Catalina's Horror Adventure it's a game of terror, shooting, adventure and humor. Our mother shows us a treasured place from her childhood, an abandoned arcade. After trying to turn on the light, our protagonist appears in a totally unknown place; "The World".
