name: Cattle Country
summary: Howdy partner! Welcome to Cattle Country, the only Cozy Cowboy Adventure Life Sim. Become a determined pioneer traveling west to start a new life. Make a home in the mountains, take on bandits, discover dastardly plots, build a farm, develop your town, and make friends with fellow residents.

name: Castle Come
summary: Castle Come is a walking fortress roguelike. Scout a strange land full of bandits in search of new parts, defeat enemy castles and scavenge the wreckage, recruit crew to man your growing arsenal of weapons and build your way from an agile fortling into a deadly, hulking, monster machine.

name: Camera
summary: A Yume Nikki fangame for the Dream Diary Jam 8.

name: Cambo: Webbed Fist
summary:
There comes a time in every capybara's life when they must set peace aside and don the red headband of strength to become the Capybarbarian, protector of the waterways.

For Cambo, this is that time.

Use your webbed fists, foraging, and digging skills to defeat the invaders and reunite with Capybarbara. Keep fighting: In the end, either they die, or you do.

name: Cataclysm: Even Angels Sin
summary: Breach the Sinner's Paradise as the Heaven Breaker and reclaim the divine realm.

name: Cats and Mice
summary: Online PvP and Battle Royal Experience with Cats and Mice characters.

name: Cats Spotter
summary: Welcome to "Cats Spotter"! This is a light-hearted and enjoyable casual game where your mission is to find all the hidden cats on a colorful and vibrant Meow Planet.

name: Cadbury Creme Egg: Goo the Egg
summary: Advergame situated on British bus stops

name: C.A.P.I
summary: This game was created using Unity for a Jam with the theme of Intellectual Property (IP), with the aim of teaching about the different types of IPs, as well as teaching how to identify problems involving them and how to act against them. In a fun and dynamic way, you will take on the role of a lawyer at a small firm specialized in evaluating these intellectual property issues.

name: Cards of Prophecy
summary: Cards of Prophecy is a Tower Defense, Deckbuilder, Roguelike game, in which instead of using crossbows, mortars, etc., you will use your deck of cards to summon monsters or cast spells, which you will acquire during the game. Each game is different because the map is random (the cards interact with the map), and the cards you get during the game are also random, generating different strategies for each occasion. In addition, the cards and spells have synergies with each other, as well as upgrades that you acquire and that change the way you play the game. At the end of a game, you earn gold to buy card packs and thus improve your cards for the next game, and acquire new cards.

name: Cakey's Twisted Bakery
summary: It's bake or die at Cakey's Bakery, where human children are the secret ingredient to strange monsters' delicious pastries. Find the recipe for survival to escape the bakery and it's sweet and scary staff!

name: Candy Factory TD
summary:
Build a candy factory to defend against waves of candy creatures!
A first-person tower defense factory building automation game.
Manage productions, build candy turrets, expand the island, and beat the waves!

name: Castaway Coconuts
summary: FPS Stealth action game starring the Hanks. Eliminate pirates that have invaded the island and also happen to look like Tom Hanks.

name: Capy Spa
summary: In this game, you play as the manager of a newly purchased onsen for Capybaras. As a Capybara yourself, it's up to you to bring joy and happiness to your adorable customers and gain financial success!

name: Cataclysm
summary: A very small map based around the detailing of e2m1 and other episode 2 maps.

name: Canyon
summary: A medium sized canyon-themed map

name: Castle Karthenfrost
summary: A Medium-to-large Knave map which uses Arcane Dimensions, set in the cold wasteland realm of Karthenfrost. Has a moderate amount of monsters.

name: Casino Tycoon Simulator
summary: Ever wondered what it feels like to be a millionaire business magnate managing a thriving casino empire?

name: Cargo Manager: Forklift Simulator
summary: Deliver various cargoes across the industrial zone and complete all tasks in a realistic fork lift simulator!

name: Cats Hidden in Cozy Places
summary: Cats Hidden in Cozy Places invites players to discover hidden felines in the cutest and coziest places known to mankind, embarking on a charming and relaxing cat-hunting adventure!

name: Cats Baseball
summary:
A baseball game where the outcome is decided by dice.
Even if you don't know the rules of baseball, anyone can enjoy it easily!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 5
summary: Be a champion in Season 5 with two brand-new Core 6v6 maps and the arrival of wrestling royalty with WWE stars Rhea Ripley, “The American Nightmare” Cody Rhodes, and Rey Mysterio. Complete the final story mission for Modern Warfare Zombies and prepare for a clean up on aisle five in Call of Duty: Warzone with the return of the Superstore in Urzikstan.

name: Cardinal Sins
summary: The game features three difficulty modes, Trial, Normal and Marathon. The ship has two weapon shot types. A standard forward shot, which I believe seems to be more powerful in a head on situation, and a spread shot that creates a cone-shaped pattern. This comes in useful when you have a barrage of enemies on both sides of the screen. There is also a shield which becomes vital (if you remember you have it) in tight situations. This replaces the more traditional 'bomb' usually found in the genre. You pass from stage to stage with increased waves of enemies and harder bullet patterns, and given an overall hit percentage at the end of each stage, amounting to higher scores.

name: Cats Hidden in Magic Places
summary: Discover hidden cats in enchanting cities, mystical schools, and diverse villages in Cats Hidden in Magic Places. Embark on a delightful adventure to find felines in these magical realms!

name: Cartenstein
summary: A short story about being a master Card Collector.

name: Campaign Trail
summary: Do you have what it takes to win a Presidential Election? Select a year and a candidate to find out. You will answer questions about your platform and positions, and also about your campaign strategy. The answers will affect your popularity for better or worse, both nationally and in individual states. Walk the fine line between appealing to your base and winning a majority of the votes.

name: Catatonic Fits of Despair
summary: Medium-sized spacious metal/runic-style fortress.

name: Cave Girl Clair
summary: You play as Clair, a girl who has to survive in the Stone Age.

name: Carpe Noctem
summary: A yuri visual novel about a vampiress and a monster hunter falling in love in Victorian England.

name: Card Summoner
summary: Card Summoner is a CCG, where you journey to various villages and engage in local clan tournaments to elevate your rank. Duel villagers and collect unique cards while fulfilling your summoner duties by battling monsters in the void dungeons.

name: Catastrophic Cat Command
summary: Command thousands of cats on their journey to find a new home! Catastrophic Cat Command is an arcade-style game where you manage multiple mini-games at once! It’s the perfect game for a quick 5-minute break from work!

name: Cat
summary: Cat is a fun little clicker game where you can rest and click some cats. You can earn 2 drops to your inventory every 4h

name: Carnival of Souls
summary: Embark on Carnival of Souls, a first-person roguelite shooter where strategic weapon choices and upgrades are key to uncovering chilling secrets across otherworldly dimensions.

name: Cauldron Caution
summary: Cauldron Caution is a Point & Click adventure centered on Card battles ! Fight against cartoony monsters with your Magic Creatures & Ingredients ! Find hidden Booster Packs by exploring this wild world to improve your collection ! Meet quirky characters and solve diverse puzzles along the way !

name: Cat Good Work
summary: Cat Good Work is a simple bullet shooting Rogue game that can be operated with one hand. As the most beautiful kitten in the Cat Village, you need to recruit multiple partners and combine their unique skills and attributes to pass the most difficult trials in the village.

name: Cat Journey
summary: Cat Journey is a third person game that explores an underground city with a cat as the protagonist. There are many robot residents here, and it is necessary to find a way to communicate and understand the city with them.

name: Carpocalypse RC Racing
summary: The World may be over, but the fun is just about to begin! Get ready to race in this post apocalyptic racing game. Visit abandoned warehouse, shop, restaurant or someone's home. Become the champion in Championship Mode or try to survive in Mayhem mode. Warning! Versus mode can ruin your friendship!

name: Can't Revert
summary: Can't revert is a first-person psychological horror game. You repeatedly find yourself in a house where your wife and son are dead. Discover hidden clues in the house and uncover the secrets of their deaths. Experience the constant tension and fear in the repetitive space.

name: Carl und Cari: Trubel in Tierstadt
summary: Jump into Carl and Cari: Trubel in Tierstadt, an interactive educational game in which you have to help Tierstadt and its animal inhabitants with their jobs in order to save the big town festival. Get to know different training jobs and their training opportunities in a playful way.

name: Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Knight Recon: Tracer Pack
summary: Support U.S. and U.K. military veterans by purchasing the Call of Duty Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Knight Recon: Tracer Pack for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Carts Battle
summary: Race and battle in Сarts Battle! Equip your car with weapons, outmaneuver rivals in thrilling drifts, and dominate the explosive racing arena. Ready, set, smash!

name: Call of the Grave
summary: You find yourself in an ancient graveyard, where mysterious statues and forgotten tombs hide ancient secrets. Under the moonlight, you solve puzzles, revealing a portal to dark caves. Inside, dark corridors await you, littered with bodies but no living souls.

name: Catgirl Aim Trainer
summary: Train your aim with a beautiful selection of Catgirls! Shoot the Catgirls with various weapons, and have a fun time while practicing!

name: Cam
summary: CAM is a fps that has PvP action and a cooperative zombie survival mode, featuring a body camera perspective and realistic graphics. Wishlist and share CAM with friends! Send us proof of wishlist to apply for a exclusive beta access and to test upcoming updates!

name: Caribbean Pirates
summary: A tactical board game about the battles of sailboats in the Caribbean Sea. Spaniards, Englishmen, pirates, privateers, corsairs and the ringing of piastres and doubloons.

name: Cat Bait
summary: Cat Bait is a casual game with cute pixel graphics. Control the Cat Bait, dodge enemies, and use the unique abilities of helper cats.

name: Carlos and the Dark Order Mystery
Castle Crashers: Painter Boss Paradise
summary:
We used to be enemies. We used to destroy the world around us. Now, we create!
The DLC will include:
Steam workshop capabilities – create your own knight skins, choose your magic, and share with the world!
New official character: play as Paint Junior, use your imagination, and unleash powerful art to vanquish your foes!
New player and weapon artwork for all official playable characters (with an option to toggle on or off).
Endless knightly possibilities – if you aren’t feeling creative, choose from thousands of community characters or preloaded characters created by our team!

name: Carpathian Skies
summary: A downloadable visual novel for Windows, macOS, and Linux

name: Cape Fathom
summary: In Cape Fathom you have been tasked with restoring an abandoned restaurant in an effort to return prosperity to a once bustling region. Utilize various, but limited, resources to source the highest quality ingredients for your patrons. Use your influence to shape the local economy and environment.

name: Causality!
summary: The game's primary objective is to kill every stick figure without having other stick figures witness the death.

name: Capybaradise
summary:
Capybaradise is an endless 3D stacking game for mobile and web in which you have to stack as many capybaras as possible with the help of a friendly goose.

Await the right moment and tap on the screen to let the capybara land safely ontop!

name: Capybara Quest
summary:
The human roads and messy lawns are at a strange duality with the rural wetlands the capybara belongs to.

As more and more houses are constructed on wetlands in Argentina, capybaras are being driven from their homes and have found themselves living in peoples lawns. Trawl though the streets to find the woods, and follow the trail downstream towards the wetlands that are safe and full of friends.

name: Capy Island
summary: Capy Island is a party game where players, who are capybaras, play minigames on an island to collect hats. These hats will give them a step up in the final showdown where they will all battle it out. The capybara with the most hats wins!

name: Call To Summon
summary: A short game where you can use an old phone to summon objects by simply calling them. Use it to advance through the old complex, reminiscent of liminal spaces.

name: Cast Away: The Oddysee
summary: "Cast Away - The Oddysee" is an RPG Maker XP game developed by TheLuigiplayer and LamaZ Game Studio (formerly JS RPG's), which has been in development since 2011. The game is based on the concept of a classic dungeon crawler and follows the story of the sailor "John Maynard," who is named after the ballad by Theodor Fontane. John finds himself stranded on what initially appears to be a deserted island. However, events soon start to unfold, revealing what mysterious occurrences are taking place on that island!

name: Call to Strike
summary: Call to Strike is a Top-Down Helicopter-Based Shooter. Pilot the world’s most lethal aircraft in multiple countries to search, destroy, rescue, and survive.

name: Carrot Paradise
summary: You are a rabbit! Play with the farmer and bring back lots of carrots to the nest!

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Mountain Range Pack
summary: Channel your inner cowboy with gear and cosmetics inspired by life on the range. This pack includes apparel, fishing gear, vehicle and boat skins, and an emote.

name: Cafe Maid: Hentai Edition - Medic
summary: This DLC unlocks Makoto the Sharp-tongued Medic as a fully playable character for Cafe Maid - Hentai Edition.

name: Catbo
summary: This is a cute, casual, and fast-paced arcade pinball game .Using Combo to increase feelings with cats.

name: Capital
summary: A non-linear action-adventure heist game with destructible buildings, use stolen loot to buy bigger explosives and access higher value loot. Buy and customize cars. Invest in military equipment such as helicopters and tanks. Get your mansion!

name: Cascadia
summary: Compete to create the most perfect ecosystem in the award-winning board game journey!

name: Call of The Deep
summary: A short first-person retro sci-fi horror game where you traverse to the bottom of the ocean on foot, in 1985.

name: California Escapades
summary: In this simulation and adventure game, explore 19th-century Gold Rush California. Join Jim and Emma to build and manage your farm and city. Plant crops, raise animals, construct buildings, complete missions, uncover secrets, and collect treasures. Start your adventure now!

name: CardScrawl
summary: Enter the Chaotic Tower and take part in the Tower Lord's gambit in this Auto Battler, Roguelike Deckbuilder. Wielding the power of your Creature and Enchantment decks, the limits of your strategy will be tested. The Tower Lord awaits a worthy opponent. Are you ready?

name: Campgrounds Adventures
summary: Campgrounds Adventures: The Big Oopsie is a captivating time management and strategy game where you build and manage thriving campsites. ️ Balance tasks, develop strategies, and progress through levels filled with lush landscapes and bustling campsites. Dive in and start your adventure today!

name: Cats-Shaped
summary: Cats-Shape is a clicker game, in which you click on a cat shape!Earn random cat shapes to grow your collection!Come hang out with us and let's become the kings of cat shapes!

name: CatClick
summary: CATCLICK is an exciting adventure game where you help a mother cat find her lost kittens. Play in Relax Mode, simply enjoying the search process with pleasant music, or choose the Bad Cats Mode where you save the world from mutant cats. Explore levels, enjoy beautiful effects, and intuitive controls

name: Casketball Queen
summary: Cleo plays Casketball

name: Card Rogue
summary: A roguelike RPG that you can play in 2-3 minutes! You get three randomly dealt cards, but you can only choose one! This is what happens when you distill the essence of a roguelike RPG!

name: Cardinal Descent
summary: Cardinal Descent is a card building roguelike where you craft elemental synergies and find game breaking sticker combos.

name: Camille and Laura
summary: Camille and Laura is a point and click about the greatest adventure of all: parenting.

name: Cats Hidden Timeline
summary: Cats Hidden Timeline is an exploration game in which you go back and forth between the past, present, and future to find cute cats and pet them a lot.

name: Capybara Park
summary: Manage your own capybara park in this cozy relaxing management game. Improve the well-being of your capybaras, build new enclosures, unlock new species and much more!

name: Captured
summary: Trapped in what appears to be an endless hallway in your home, rooms begin to feel unfamiliar. Spot the differences, capture the anomalies, and stay away from any sinister entities.

name: Can You See What I See?: Dream Machine
Card Chronicles: Devious Deck
summary: Card Chronicles: Devious Deck merges roguelite gameplay with deckbuilding strategy, where every card played comes at the cost of the player's health points. Collect cards, build unique decks, battle fierce monsters and prove yourself worthy, while carefully managing your health. Uncover the truth, immerse in a gripping adventure as you ascend the Tower of Legends, where every decision matters and defines your path forward.

name: Cartel Simulator
summary: As a cartel leader, expand your criminal empire by researching drugs, recruiting loyal employees, and upgrading facilities. Make tough moral choices, engage in combat, and conduct illegal experiments. Betray rivals, raid enemies, and uncover spies. Torture traitors, investigate threats!

name: Casino Island Simulator
summary: Run your own casino. Buy new gambling games, take payments, hire employees, expand and design your casino. Slots, blackjack, roulette, poker, baccarat, craps and more...

name: Cargo
summary: Cargo is a space shooter where you collect packages from planets and try to deliver them to other planets without being killed.

name: Capybara Fighters!
summary: Capybara Fighters! is a 2D/3D hybrid beat-em up set in modern Tokyo. You play as the star capybara of a cafe, whose life is disrupted when the Yakuza abduct your friend. To rescue them, you'll battle through enemies, earn money, and ultimately secure a plane ticket to Brazil for the final battle.

name: Capybara
summary: An idle game about Capybaras! You click in a capybara to increase your herd of capybaras! Every 3 and 24 hours, you get dropped a Skin. Collect all of them!

name: Capybara
summary: "Capybara" is the perfect game for anyone who loves relaxing yet captivating clicker games. With its adorable mascot and endless opportunities for growth, this game will entertain you for hours. Download "Capybara" now and start your adventure!

name: Cast Cats
summary: Welcome to the exciting world of cute cartoon cats! Get ready for an exciting adventure in the 'Find the Differences' genre, where 42 levels of exciting challenges await you.

name: Castleyard
summary: Step into the role of a medieval Lord in Castleyard, a captivating castle management game where your strategic decisions shape the fate of your realm. Manage resources, train knights, and navigate the intricate politics of your court to lead your people to prosperity.

name: Cat Fusion Quest
summary: Dive into the enchanting world of Cat Fusion Quest, a delightful and addictive puzzle game where the goal is to combine adorable cats to create even more charming and powerful feline friends!

name: Canto I
summary: Face the Dark Forest of the Divine Comedy in this action platformer inspired by the Sommo Poeta’s masterpiece! Help Dante avoid pitfalls, spikes & specters using double jumps, magical attacks and dashes. Find the scrolls containing the triplets of the Canto exploring this gloomy, pixelart forest!

name: CasualMuyu
summary: Peace comes from nature and regularity Tap the screen to knock the "Muyu" and advance the time while enjoying the neglected daily nature, and you will find peace. Suitable for relieving anxiety and insomnia symptoms.

name: Cathy and The Others
summary: The sound of a pickup truck starting. A hammering headache. And this locked room. What happened to Cathy? Cathy And The Others offers a narrative experience where the player must escape a strange house.

name: Castle Duels
summary: Merge units, crush enemies, and dominate in PvP battles!

name: Cat Quest: The Fur-tastic Trilogy
summary: Cat Quest: The Fur-tastic Trilogy contains three meow-nificent catventures!

name: Cake Master
summary: It's time to open your own bakery in the Cake Master game! Follow the recipe, decorate the sweets with icing and fruit, and learn all about desserts!

name: Cad Cam Warrior
summary: Shooter

name: Cargo Hunters
summary: A third person shooter and extraction looter shooter which involves robots trying to survive rather than humans. A PVE and PVP shooter game with looting mechanism to build/craft gears in your Outpost. Gears and items can also be sold or bought from the market in your Outpost.

name: Calamity
summary:
Welcome to Calamity, a free-to-play action-RPG set in a vibrant 2D top-down world.
Inspired by legendary games such as World of Warcraft, Lineage, Diablo, and Albion Online, Calamity offers a rich and engaging experience where you can conquer challenging dungeons or battle against other players.

name: Cat Cafe Manager 2: Big City Bliss
summary: In this cozy management lifesim, care for cute cats & customers while exploring a bustling folkloric city. Build the cat cafe of your dreams and fill hearts with delight using the power of cats, coffee and community

name: Cave Halls
summary: A single level for vanilla Hexen with about 25 minutes of gameplay. Both combat and puzzles (not switch hunting) included.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow - Definitive Edition+
summary:
Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow - Definitive Edition+ is ROM hack that serves as a vastly improved version of the original Definitive Edition hack.

This hack has a myriad of improvements, such as bug fixes, Quality of Life, and rebalancing changes to create the best way to play Dawn of Sorrow.

name: Camp Lazlo: Jumping Jelly Beans
summary: Help the Bean scouts of Jelly Cabin, Lazlo, Raj and Clam hunt for fireflies.

name: Cage: Story of Lust
summary: The story of the love of a fallen angel with a beloved angel. You have to make him love you and make this world colorful again!!

name: Car Clicker
summary: Car Clicker is a clicker Game, in which you click a Car! In Car you click the Car to gain even more Cars! Every 1 and 18 hours, you get dropped a car. Each cars is also made by the community in discord. Come hang out with us and let's grow into something awesome !

name: Cactiverse
summary: The world of Cactiverse, where gardening meets dragon-fueled fun! Grow your cacti, unleash fireballs, and join a vibrant community on Discord. With weekly tournaments and hilarious gameplay, Cactiverse is your next obsession. Fun, challenging, and social—what more could you ask for?

name: Car!
summary:
CAR! is a simple game set against a mountain backdrop under a nice blue sky. With the player controlling the car, traverse down the road, whilst trying not to fall off and avoiding obstacles along the way.

CAR was nominated for the BAFTA YGD (Young Game Designers) Game Making 10-14 Award Too!

name: Cat Astro Phi
summary:
Created in the style of a Gameboy Classic title, this is a space-action pixel-art adventure!

There is much planet exploring, bot shooting, bomb exploding, lazer wall hacking, sentry gun evading, cat finding fun to be had.

name: Cannon Fighter
summary: You are the last surviving member of an artillery regiment fighting in the desert. Using your cannon you are trying to destroy a wave of advancing tanks ans stop them reaching a supply dump. When the first wave is destroyed you are attacked by super thanks that are more difficult to hit. You have 4 defensive positions and if the thanks reach your last defensive position or you receive 3 direct hits the game ends.

name: Cannon Fighter
summary: An unofficial browser port.

name: Capcom Fighting Collection 2
summary:
Capcom's newest fighting collection hits the stage!

Choose from fan-favorite games like Capcom vs. SNK 2: Mark of the Millennium 2001 and Project Justice to 3D action games like Power Stone and Power Stone 2 in this collection of eight classic fighting games!

Each game in the collection can be played online or co-op!

Get back in the ring and duke it out in battles that everyone rumored, but no one believed!
Whether it's with a rival new or old, give it your all and strive for victory!

name: Castlevania Dominus Collection
summary: Three incredible action adventure games from the Castlevania series have finally returned, for the first time! But wait, there's more! Haunted Castle Revisited, a redesigned version of the very first Castlevania arcade game, makes its debut!

name: Candle Wood
summary: A brutal and gorgeous hand-drawn 2D platformer in a world of candle folks!

name: CarX Street: Sunset Speedway
summary: The Sunset Speedway DLC offers you new horizons for speed and luxury. The Sunset Speedway racetrack awaits with picturesque views and difficult turns, along with three unique new supercars.

name: Carpathian Survival
summary: Can You Survive the Wilderness? Step into a brutal, untamed world where survival is your only mission. Scavenge, craft, and hunt as you face the dangers of nature. Explore at your own pace, build shelter, chop down trees, mine for valuable resources, and fight to stay alive against the elements and wildlife. With every choice impacting your survival, can you rise above the odds?

name: Cats and Seek: Tokyo
summary: The 4th Cats and Seek series is here! We're off to Tokyo to find cats playing all around the city . Can you spot them all?

name: Cats of the Song Dynasty
summary: Explore the enchanting world imagined by a Southern Song Dynasty painter and find the adorable cats!

name: Catcelona
summary: A nice, cozy and entertaining video game that mixes Barcelona's architecture and hidden cats. Find them all!

name: Cats in the Forbidden City
summary: Explore the Forbidden City, where Emperor Qianlong resided, and find the adorable cats!

name: Caco Bell
summary: Short boom compatible slaughtermap inspired by Garbage's wad, McDoomalds.

name: Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow
summary:
A port of Castlevania: Dawn of Sorrow included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Draw the correct magic seal quickly, or your enemies will never die! Fight and explore through one of the largest castles ever seen in the series! Race another player through custom-made castle rooms in versus mode!

A year has passed since Soma Cruz discovered the evil of Dracula hidden inside his body. Now, a mysterious cult wants to release the power of the Lord of Darkness. As Soma, you must do everything in your power to stop them before it's too late.

name: Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin
summary:
A port of Castlevania: Portrait of Ruin included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Explore exotic locales through portals created by the lord of the castle! Switch characters in the heat of action or fight side-by-side using the abilities of both heroes! Battle hordes of enemies and huge bosses in the quest to vanquish evil!

An ancient vampire threatens the fate of the world by utilizing Dracula's accursed castle and mystical paintings to open portals of Death. Battle together as Jonathan Morris, a young man who wields the legendary whip Vampire Killer, and Charlotte Aulin, a spellcaster with tremendous magical abilities. It's time to conquer evil in man's darkest hour.

name: Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia
summary:
A port of Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia included in "Castlevania Dominus Collection."

Use the brand new Glyph system with over 100 different attack combinations to battle Dracula and his minions throughout 20 explorable areas! Take part in side quests and collect items to power up! Experience a gripping storyline featuring new characters!

In the absence of the Holy Whip, those who live in fear of Dracula seek a replacement, which takes the form of the Order of Ecclesia, an organization that holds the secret to manipulating Glyphs. Shanoa, a young woman possessed with a unique ability to channel Glyphs, is chosen as our protector. This is her destiny and the story of the sacred Order of Ecclesia.

name: Caring & Chilling
summary: A game made for Enchant Jam 1.

name: Castle of Asleep
summary:
One-way non-field RPG.

Released in Japan in 2015, this released version in 2022 is fully translated into English.
Proceed while defeating enemies that appear in your path, picking up items, and investigating. Reach the sleeping castle in less than 3 minutes.

name: Caila Raven: And The Black Book
Caila Raven And The Temple of The Order
Caila Raven: And The Ancient Scroll
Cazzarion: Treasure Diver
summary: Collect a coin treasure underwater, but avoid the sea mines and the fish.

name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Memory Key
summary:
The official licensed anime adaptation of "Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card" invites you to embark on an adorable journey to collect little Sakura's treasures.

Chibi 3D Sakura is here with cuteness overload, experience the joy of collecting mystery boxes right on your mobile device!

name: Call Of War: Frontlines
summary:
From the Frontlines, raise an army and overpower other players!

The world is on the brink of war. You can play in real-time. Show your skills with tank clashes, naval battles, air combat and nuclear weapons! In Call of War you influence the fate of many nations.

Play as the leader of one nation when a worldwide conflict seems inevitable. It all boils down to one question: What is your strategy? Find your allies, build up your economy and conquer enemy territory. Research new technologies and secret weapons. Be the first to develop the ultimate bomb and even rockets to become the one true superpower! It is up to you to end the war and bring balance to the world!

Call of War offers a one of a kind gameplay environment to simulate worldwide conflicts on many different multiplayer maps all over the world. Control and develop a huge real-time army roster and jump into synchronic multiplayer matches. Battle it out over several weeks until victory conditions are met and the true world dominating superpowers are revealed!

name: Catacomb Towers
summary: This is the author's very first level made with the level editor. It took him 2 months to build. Although some people found the level too dark he did not change the lighting values nor the ambient settings. The level recieved very good ratings and reached the number 5 position in the top 10 chart at that time on the famous review site of Michael Prager. It has now vanished into the hall of fame on December 2002 and has become a classic title in the tomb raider custom levelworld.

name: Cain & Iddo: Break Week
summary:
Cain the dog and Iddo the hyena are two plucky 24-year-olds navigating life alone in the East Coast American metropolis of Westside City. Their zany misadventures don't turn out exactly as planned, wacky unforeseen circumstances arise, and hijinx ensues...

Cain works as a barista at the local mall's Starbuzz franchisee. Due to requirements from higher Starbuzz management, his boss Sergio has to give Cain a week off work for the summer. Cain and Iddo have decided to get some bucket list activities done over this week-long break... but you can probably guess that finishing that list is not going to be as simple as it seems.

name: Canvas Intruder
summary: Canvas Intruder is a game about an artist named Pix who got sucked into the canvas world unfortunately thanks to her apprentice's black magic. goofy. But now its up to Pix to navigate through these canvas levels!

name: Canis Major Alpha
summary: This is a story about finding courage. You will play and control two elves exploring the inner world of a girl named Ming, who suffers from depression. As you collect items to find the courage, the story of Ming gradually unfolds...

name: Carmen Sandiego
summary: The scarlet super thief Carmen Sandiego is back! Adorn Carmen’s signature red hat and play as the vigilante herself to navigate a world of espionage, utilizing high-tech gadgets, and ultimately capturing VILE. Rookie gumshoes and seasoned detectives are invited to put their sleuthing skills to the test whether it’s in the narrative driven main campaign or the classic mode ‘The Acme Files’.

name: CalorieMate Liquid for Game Creators
summary: Transform into a can of Calorie Mate LIQUID that jumps out of the fridge and deliver nutrition to a game creator hard at work. This action-adventure takes you on a journey through an apartment room.

name: Calm Before The Storm
summary:
It's Caleb's Sixth birthday.

It's time to cut the cake but Caleb isn't there.

Your mission is to find Caleb and protect him from the storm.

name: Cavescape
summary: Escape a procedurally generated cave by grappling and swinging. Explore the depths of the ecosystem, fight foreign creatures, and upgrade your tools. Destructible environments, deep mechanics, and tough bosses!

name: Card of Legend: Awaken Angels
summary:
Angels, Cards, Battle! Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces!
A fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.

Unite the legends to prevent the resurrection of the evil forces! A competitive Anime TCG game featuring fantastic story of heroes joining forces with angels to stop the evil forces.This game features PvP, PvE, Roguelike, Single Player Missions, and others. Play your cards right!

name: Car Turning Simulator
summary: Simulator Specialized in Turns for Cars

name: Calculate It
summary: We've made a calculator roguelike! Yes, it's not a joke. A boring device has turned into an interesting strategy, where each calculator you collect sets its own style of play. Can you count all the numbers and prove who's the king of calculations here?

name: Cazzarion: Drone Flight
summary: Fly through gates in a landscape with a drone and increase your high score

name: Castlevania: The Seal Of The Curse X
summary: TSOTC Version X is a 10 Years Anniversary edition of The Seal of The Curse, a fan-made sequel to Castlevania: Simon's Quest.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Tracer Pack: Nuptial Nightmare Ultra Skin Pro Pack
summary:
Get Call of Duty Points and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

Pack includes:

- 2400 Call of Duty Points
- Operator Skin
- 2x Weapon Blueprints
- Emblem
- Weapon Sticker
- Large Decal
- Loading Screen

name: Cats and Seek: Kyoto - Extra Level & Jigsaw
summary: Extra content for Cats and Seek : Kyoto Thank you for your support - 1 more level - Find and collect jigsaw puzzles

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Tracer Pack: Custom Molded Ultra Skin Pro Pack
summary: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Cadence
summary: Immerse yourself in a unique blend of rhythmic combat and challenging boss fights. In this top-down action game, each of the 10 bosses move, attack, and change patterns in sync with the music, demanding precise timing and quick reactions. You'll need to read their rhythmic cues, dodge, and strike in harmony with the beat to survive. With every encounter, the music guides the flow of battle, creating an intense, immersive experience where combat feels like part of the soundtrack. Master the rhythm, adapt to dynamic patterns, and overcome difficult fights in this distinctive rhythmic boss-rush.

name: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest Revamped
summary: Castlevania II: Simon's Quest Revamped is a fan reimagining of the NES original in a 16-bit style with added subweapons, new music, an in-game map and more!

name: Cats Hidden in Spooky Places
summary: Cats Hidden in Spooky Places takes you on a spooky adventure! Explore 11 eerie scenes filled with witches, ghosts, and more. Find all 440 hidden cats and complete your collection!

name: Carbox
summary: Carbox is an arcade racer with an ever-growing collection of tracks and challenges. Unlock cars, win cups, and explore user-generated maps. Build and share your own worlds and circuits with the powerful, easy-to-use World Editor, and prove your skills on our global leaderboards!

name: Calvar: The Darkest Gate
summary: First-person horror survival game that plunges players into a dark and disturbing world. As Leonard Valentin, you must fight against supernatural threats while uncovering the mystery behind the cursed piano and the sinister plans of a dark cult.

name: Cat-Astrophy
summary: Guide Polo, a brave abducted cat, through a vast universe of exotic planets. Face challenging combats, customize your abilities, and choose your own path in this epic space odyssey to uncover Polo’s lost memories.

name: Cargo-Bot
summary: The puzzle game that challenges your brain and helps you learn programming concepts. Give instructions to a robot arm which moves crates to the right place. Have full control in 36 levels. Be logical, play Cargo-Bot.

name: Cats Hiding in 3D
summary: Explore the coastal town and find cats in this cute and relaxing searching game. Can you find all 100 of the hiding cats?

name: Cave Crawler 2
summary: Cave Crawler 2 is a retro-inspired 2D side-scroller. Escape a series of winding caves full of strange creatures and treacherous platforming challenges.

name: Casting Away
summary:
You are a successful movie star, on a private jet flying to a vacation destination. Suddenly, the jet was struck by lightning.
You crash-landed onto an uninhabited island that isn't even on the map.
You wake up on a beach alone.
You find a bizarre altar, strange gems from dead fish, and feel a strange aura spread across the whole island…
Is this really an ordinary deserted island?
Start fishing to survive on a lonely, desolate island.

name: Calm Skies
summary: Experience the thrill and tranquility of flying in Calm Skies. Perfect your wingsuit skills as you explore diverse biomes, dodge obstacles, and perform daring tricks to complete skill-testing challenges. Customize your character and enjoy a unique blend of excitement and serenity in the skies.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - LakePal Bait Boat Pack
summary: Take your bait game to the next level with the LakePal Bait Boat! This remote-controlled device lets you deploy bait further from the shore with pin-point precision and control.

name: Capybara Go!
summary:
Love capybaras so much you want to play as one? Get ready to embark on a whimsical adventure with a bunch of furry, feathery, fantastic friends!
Introducing the craziest capybara roguelike adventure RPG!
Dive into the world of capybaras with "CAPYBARA GO"!

name: Campanella
summary: Fly the Campanella through five challenging worlds! And don't forget to stop for coffee!

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Season 6
summary: The Haunting returns and it’s more terrifying than ever! Introducing a horrific cast of Operators alongside the new "Drive Thru" Multiplayer map and six new map variants, the anything-goes Purgatory Limited Time mode, free Rift Runs in Zombies, plus new weapons, Aftermarket Parts, a frighteningly epic Battle Pass, and more.

name: Career Fantasy
summary: Career Fantasy is a turn-based JRPG that takes place in a college town in the modern American South. Choose a major, build a party, and save the world from the mysterious force that is seeking world domination!

name: Cast 'n' Blast
summary: Cast'N'Blast. It's a magical, action-packed vermin extermination.

name: Camp Buddy: Scoutmasters Season
summary: Two Character Routes With multiple character choices and endings, you are in charge of the story! And all the choices you make in the game will affect how Yoshinori’s adventure will unfold! Each character route has an average of 25 full hours of gameplay! And that’s only for achieving one kind of ending! Unlock all endings to get the most out of the game! Get engaged with over 60+ unlockable CG Sets in the gallery for your own viewing pleasure! And that’s not to mention the more than 60+ mini images and background art! The game features 32 original compositions and fully-voiced cutscenes by various talented actors who help the player feel more connected to the characters and the story! Enjoy more than 30 hand-picked sex scenes throughout the game. See your favorite characters come to life in these intimate moments! Help Yoshinori recall events from his past alongside Hyunjin, and view special memories! You can also earn badges that you can use to unlock exciting content in the gallery! Finish the game once and unlock a secret room that lets you dress up the characters, view the opening video, and listen to in-game music! (Hint: The tent looks roomy)

name: Cal & Bomba
summary: Join the pyromaniac gnome Cal and the troll Bomba on an explosive math adventure, in this award winning game. They travel through different worlds with their cannon. You must use percentage calculations to change the range of the cannon.

name: Campanella 2
summary:
Pilot's gone missing on a giant spacestation and his sister Isabell is determined to find him!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Campanella 3
summary:
It's time for Pilot to return to what he does best -- flying the Campanella through deep space!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Camouflage
summary:
Blend in with your surroundings to evade predators and fulfill your destiny.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Caramel Caramel
summary:
Melon got a new camera and is going on a galactic adventure to try it out!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Callous
summary: 1 large map for vanilla Doom 2 using alpha textures.

name: Carnage Kart X
summary: Carnage Kart X is a retro-inspired hack n' slash experience combining the feel of classic karting games from the early 90s with Vampire Survivors-like gameplay, combining hand-drawn 2D pixel art and low-poly 3D models for a new perspective on the Survivors-like genre. It's style is reminiscent of something you'd play at the arcade down to the rockin' over-the-top music and over-sized blood spurts/body parts flying off of enemies.

name: Camelbirds
summary: Saddle up a giant bird and race to victory. Overtake your rivals, use various tools, and overcome obstacles on thrilling tracks. Prove you're the best rider in these wild races!

name: Castaway Samurai
summary: Inspired by the real story of Manjirō Nakahama, live the experience of a lone samurai survivor struggling for their life using everything at their disposal.

name: Cat Guardian
summary: Cat Guardian is a flexible card game blending tower defense and survival. Manage resources, build, and strategize to protect the Tree of Hope from zombies. Can the cats of Meowx Planet succeed in their mission and survive?

name: Calypso's Calamity
summary: Calypso's Calamity is a ruthless magical rogue-lite platformer where you play as a courageous dog on a quest to rescue her princess, battling enemies, gathering randomized items, and unlocking new abilities in beautifully crafted levels.

name: Casual Sport Series: Hockey
summary: Grab a controller, jump on the ice and score goals to prove you're a hockey champion. Play in campaign mode against teams from around the world, alone, or with three additional players in couch mode!

name: Castlevania Collections Bundle
summary: A bundle that contains Castlevania Dominus Collection, Castlevania Advance Collection and Castlevania Anniversary Collection.

name: Cats & Dice
summary: A roguelike dice-building game where the goal is to overcome an ever-increasing target score each round. Assemble a synergistic set of Cats and dice, go for crazy combos and try to attain as high a score as you possibly can. Master the synergy between cats and dice to win!

name: Carry The Glass
summary:
Team up as two quirky construction workers in this fun 2-player co-op platformer!
Carry a fragile glass window through colorful levels filled with challenges.
Communicate and coordinate to dodge obstacles and solve puzzles.
Can you finish the job without breaking the glass?

name: Carol Coral's: Open the Door
summary: Pixel point-and-click game for nostalgic.

name: Canary: Kono Omoi wo Uta ni Nosete
summary: A young man moves to Shikoku, the smallest of Japan's four main islands, to live in Kagawa prefecture with his uncle who runs a sound studio. Attending the Kotohira Middle School as a student with an ear for music, the player engages in interaction with seven female students who play in the school band. Some girls specialize in vocals and others wield instruments in the pop section. Music provides the glue for possible friendships and amorous maneuvers. A supporting cast of other characters including classmates, teachers and your uncle also supply additional interaction and bolster the storyline. The bulk of the interaction leads up to the school festival where you and band members hope to create beautiful music together.

name: Cardaire
summary: Explore, collect, and build sweet decks. Cardaire is a single-player collectible card RPG. Adventure awaits in the Duelist Frontier, so crack some packs and bring your best deck to take on the challenge.

name: Carnival Massacre
summary: Drawing heavily from classic survival horror tropes, Carnival Massacre takes players on a haunting quest in a cursed theme park. Explore your surroundings, manage your messy inventory, solve puzzles and kill the four ringleaders of the park.

name: Catch the Sperm
summary: Catch the Sperm is a promotional game to raise awareness for HIV. The game was developed for the Stop AIDS campaign in 2001 (a joint prevention campaign by the Swiss Federal Ministry of Health and Swiss Aids Federation) in Switzerland. The player has to protect a couple having sex by shooting condoms at sperm cells and HIV viruses to catch them. The condom gun is located at the right side of the screen and can be moved up and down with the mouse, while sperm cells and HIV viruses are entering the screen on the left side. The goal is to catch as many sperm cells and HIV viruses as possible within 90 seconds. The game is immediately lost if a HIV virus reaches the other side of the screen. For each catch the player gets points, while each shot costs points.

name: Captain of the Guard
summary: You have been charged with the defense of a new settlement in a hostile land. Prepare your guards and send them into battle against the horde of creatures that stalk the wilderness. As time passes and the settlement grows, so do the threats that you face.

name: Castle Rain
summary: Castle Rain is a 3D top-down action game where you control Billy, a mushroom whose island was devastated by a villain who turned his friends and everyone around into manipulated zombies.

name: Candy Golf
summary: Minigolf game. 3 different levels with totally 42 holes. Play alone or against bots

name: Carsh
summary: Carsh is a battle royale game where you drive a car and play a puzzle game at the same time. Enjoy the most heated battles you have ever experienced.

name: Carrying Carrots
summary: Help a cute bunny delivering carrots to his lovely wife on his journey across the floating lands of Unblemished. Brave dozens of hand-crafted challenges, carry delicious carrots, and be the household provider.

name: Caravanners
summary: Design your dream caravan in detail, roam freely with your mobile home, set up your camp with friends, and enjoy music by the campfire in a vast open world!

name: Case Hunter
summary:
A succession of detective cases to make the city was plunged into chaos… Under the glamorous surface, the city hiding all kinds of evil.

In order to help people restore the peace life, as a great detective you are obliged to do it!

Find out the truth, find the hidden clues, it's time to show your true wisdom!

name: Carpet Gallery
summary: An endless walker with procedural scenery and objects.

name: Call Me Master
summary:
Slip into the future and turn into a slave to love?

"Call Me Master" is an otome dating game that will transport you to the future, where you will meet an enigmatic, attractive man!

name: Captain Barrel
summary: Collect all treasure and get the highest score in this pirate platorfming epic though the seven seas!

name: Cape Hideous
summary: Amongst the motliest of all crews, an enigmatic woman prepares the ship to enter an intense thunderstorm that rages in the middle of the ocean. What otherworldly mysteries lie within?

name: CatClimber
summary: Adventurous 2D platformer, Smash bricks and climb up the floors of the dungeon to find the treasures of the dragon

name: Captain of Space
summary: Become a Galactic LegendStart as a space captain with a small ship, mine asteroids, hunt pirates, and build your space empire. Upgrade your ship, hire crew, and conquer sectors. Your goal: become the most powerful in the galaxy!

name: CatTrio
summary: A physics puzzle game in which you have to put cats in a pot and match them! Aim for a high score!

name: Cat in Rain
summary: Dive into the whimsical and challenging world of Cat in Rain, a captivating 2D precision platformer that combines classic gameplay with pixel-art graphics. Prepare for an adventure where every step matters, and every jump counts! Whether you're a seasoned platformer veteran or a curious newcomer, Cat in Rain has something for everyone. Choose between Easy and Hardcore modes to tailor the challenge to your skill level.

name: Can You Get Off Work on Time?
summary: This is an independent role-playing puzzle game. You will play as a worker who is about to get off work at six o'clock, but encounters a series of workplace troubles that prevent you from getting off work on time. Is it really just a luxury to get off work on time?

name: Cat Drift
summary: A cat racing + development game. Here, you can play up to 10+ new and unusual racing game modes (e.g., Snake Cat); Give your cat a funny superpower through a breeding system (e.g. a tail helicopter); Race with a friend's cat and prank it; Get a digital clone of your real-life cat in the game.

name: Call the Tune
summary:
You'll be following Neo, a young idol dissatisfied with her life. After suddenly moving to a new school for one week, she finds herself wrapped up in the school's student council and its (unofficial) idol group.

But all takes an unexpected turn once a simple accident causes our cast to delve deeper into the school's lower floor. During a series of investigations done by the astute Detective Emilia Ruth, your actions will determine the conclusion of the case as well as the story as a whole.

name: Cat Clean Ocean
summary: In Cat Cleans Ocean, play as a cat in an astronaut suit on a serene mission to clean a polluted ocean. Explore six unique regions, using tools like the Trash Magnet and Doddy the Drone to collect trash and upgrade your equipment. Relax, strategize, and restore the ocean’s beauty.

name: Cards of Eternity: The Wheel of Time
summary: Cards of Eternity: The Wheel of Time is a strategic card game where players harness iconic characters, creatures, and the mystical forces of the One Power from the legendary fantasy world. Build decks, master unique abilities, and outplay opponents in dynamic, lore-rich battles.

name: Caillou Bowling
summary: We are glad to present you a brand new game of Caillou. At the game of Caillou Bowling you have 10 shots to get the most points and finish the game successfully. Click on your mouse to stop the arrow in front of the pins and mark the position of the ball. After you mark the position of the ball left-click on your mouse and set the desired strength on the strength bar.

name: Carved In Stone
summary: A mysterious regular at your potion shop comes to relieve you of your recent turmoil.

name: Cardfight Area
summary: Cardfight Area is a third-party software used to play Cardfight!! Vanguard online for free, receiving updates regularly as new cards release. The game provides an alternative method for people to playtest new units, connect with other players, and play Cardfight!! Vanguard when in-person cardfights are not available.

name: Call of Elyndra
summary:
CALL OF ELYNDRA, where farming meets adventure! Grow crops, battle monsters in real-time combat, upgrade your village and solve ancient quests across five epic realms.

Play as you want--cozy or action-driven. In Elyndra, farming meets fantasy!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2
summary: "Cardfight!! Vanguard," has newly come to digital game! Over 3,000 cards for the Standard format! A brand-new original story shares the world of anime series unfolds! Enjoy your own cardfight experience!!

name: Cat Trip
summary: Our cute cats have lost their treasures and need you to recover them. It's a magical world of cats and picturesque lands with unique sights. Help cats find lost items in Ice World, Sandtown, and many more places. Enjoy the delightful combination of discovery and destressing.

name: Cats are Cute: Pop Time!
summary: Have you ever found something so cute you just wanted to squeeze it until it popped! Well now you can, with Cats are Cute: Pop Time!. Combine the cats to make an even bigger cat! How many new cats will appear? Blow off steam by pop pop popping cats and aim for the high score!

name: Castlevania
summary: An enhanced J2ME version for mobile phones.

name: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator
summary: Car Mechanic Shop Simulator is a simulation game that offers a comprehensive, in-depth experience combining strategic business management with the technical nuances of car maintenance, making it a must download for enthusiasts and novices alike.

name: Car Parking Legends: Drive & Park Adventure
summary: The art of parking.

name: Caveheart: Legacy of The Depths
summary: Embark on an Epic Quest Beneath the Surface!

name: Catch Beshi!! Scooping Game
summary: Beshi the frog, a famous character by Fujio Akatsuka, the king of Japanese gag manga of the Showa era, has been made into a game.

name: Call of Duty
summary:
The mobile port of Call of duty plays as a top down shooter where you play as a crew of 3 units that you select, each with their own unique abilities, there are enemies to shoot, obstacles to destroy and pickups to help you along the way.

The goal of the game is to reach the end of each level with at least one of your 3 units still alive in each of the 9 levels.

name: CarX Street
summary: Conquer mountain roads, highways, and city streets. Build your dream car with detailed tuning that unleashes the potential of “CarX Technology” physics. Take part in thrilling races, enjoying realistic gameplay and dynamic driving.

name: Caesars Slots
summary: A story of collectibles that helps you reach amazing bonuses as you strive to complete the collection and solve the mysteries as you spin, spin, and win!

name: Car Parking 2
summary: During the rush hour there are too many cars in the parking area. Your task is to unblock the red car and move it out of the traffic chaos. You can simply move the cars and trucks by sliding them. There are many game puzzles from very easy to extremely difficult.You will get gold, silver and bronze cups for each solved puzzle. Also you can challenge with your friends via global high score system.

name: Cannoneer
summary: Cannoneer is a 2-dimensional, top down shooter game. You bomb planes to earn treasure and get new high scores. You can use that treasure to purchase skins and use those in game. The main gimmick of your cannon is that you only have one bomb. Every time the bomb leaves the screen you get it back. The cannon is stationary, but you can rotate in place at a set speed. The game mechanics include 30-second waves of planes that change direction and location every wave, speed increases per each wave, an explosive grenade that spawns after you shoot 15 times, and intense situations coupled with high-speed gameplay. You can track your best scores with the scores tab in the menu, and compete with your friends to get the best score. Good luck!

name: Carderia
summary:
Rebuild and defend the fallen medieval town of Carderia where all is represented through cards. Stack your cards together and end your turn, to create buildings, mine ore, grow food and more!

But be careful to not run out of food throughout the nasty cold winters, live, survive and you may prosper during the verdant summers. Carderia is full of predictable and unpredictable events alike that spices up the gameplay in every run.

name: Car Guy Soundboard
summary: Car Guy meets his new friend Blobinko and the two get into a debate. Car Guy is a short animation I released on April 6, 2022. Year later on November 27, 2024, I woke up with a vivid dream of me creating a Car Guy soundboard. I saw this as a vision and took it upon myself to make my dream into a reality.

name: Catherna's Destiny
summary: Embark on a journey through a surreal, postmodern world in our quirky RPG. Navigate a twisted, alternate reality where the laws of physics and reality are constantly in flux. Explore a beautifully rendered, hand-drawn landscape, filled with unexpected surprises and mind-bending vistas. Meet a cast of eccentric and offbeat characters, each with their own story to tell. With a mix of dark humor and a hint of nostalgia, this RPG will take you on a trip you won't soon forget.

name: Catwifhat
summary: Catwifhat is a clicker game where, by clicking on an adorable cat in a hat, you earn even more cats in various styles! Every 3 hours in the game, you receive a unique cat. Join us, have fun, and help us create something amazing!

name: Cat Lines
summary: Cat Lines is a minimalist puzzle game where you help a cute kitten explore every block on the grid. With simple graphics and engaging challenges, it’s perfect for cat lovers and puzzle fans alike!

name: Caramel Performance
summary: Caramel Performance - Game about circus, magic and personal troubles of the girl Evelyn Vozui. Where will the fate take her? Only you decide!

name: Car Wash
summary: Car Wash is a cozy experience where you transform dirty, old cars into gleaming masterpieces. Enjoy the relaxing process of scrubbing, polishing, and adding the perfect finishing touch with the power of fresh soap and a hint of clean perfume!

name: Case
summary: Expand by producing and defending through tiles against other players, conquer your enemies. Use the various cards you find, each with different mechanics, on your enemies or allies, and become the victor of the battle. The battlefield awaits you.

name: Castlevania
summary: A cancelled Castlevania project by Koji Igarashi was announced at E3 2008 by Konami. At the Tokyo Game Show 2008, a short teaser was shown. It was intended to feature Alucard as the main character, and the game was supposed to be in 3D, similar to Lords of Shadow, which came later. There has been no official word on the status of the project since, and Koji Igarashi left the company.

name: Castle 3D
summary:
Personally gave you the order; in 24 hours you are to get into the Castle at any price and fake Hitler's suicide. You are a colonel of Soviet foreign intelligence and clearly understand that this 'punitive operation' could be your last mission, but you are ready to fulfill your duty to the motherland and the Party without hesitation or delay.

Ominous Castle is guarded by the most experienced and pitiless fighters of SS riot, craving for unleashing their incinerating wrath on anyone who dares to set a foot on their territory. But your impressive arsenal will shed a dense shower of lead on the enemy. You will be armed with the most fatal weapon, which will make your enemies draw back step after another. Fury against will for victory… tyranny against courage… You are to fight with the genetic creation of German scientists – superman and supersoldier.

name: Caravan Racers
summary: Race on four challenging tracks and make your caravan the first across the line.

name: Castle Evalon
summary: The thought to be abandoned mysterious Castle Evalon has recently been emitting strange lights and sounds. The most concerning being rumbles from deep underground. Ranger steps through the front doors, only to have them shut tight behind him. Donning his trusty boomstick, he has no choice but to push through.

name: Cat vs. Dog
summary: The player controls a dog, and must strategically aim to throw bones at a cat; taking turns, the cat will throw rocks back at the dog. It is somewhat similar to Worms or Microsoft's Gorillas. Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a rendition of the Winnie the Pooh theme.

name: Candivity
summary:
Don't let the sweets get outside the dome. Merge them together, and make the biggest candy!
You're about to dive into a sugary adventure! Combine sweets, and prepare yourself for a sugar overload!

Gather extraordinary powers that can save you from any sticky situation. Mix them up, and you might create something even more powerful!

Journey through worlds full of surprises. Each has its own set of challenges. Can you master them all and merge the largest sweet?

name: Card Guesser: Red or Black
summary: Card Guesser: Red or Black is a simple and exciting guessing game. Players try to guess if the next card will be a red or a black card. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for testing your luck in a quick, engaging format! Are you feeling lucky?

name: Cats vs. Dogs: Military Mission
summary: Unleash Tactical Furry Fury!

name: Cartoon Party Collection: 3 in 1
summary: This bundle contains: - The Smurfs - Village Party - Inspector Gadget - Mad Time Party - Garfield Lasagna Party

name: Cats Hidden in USA
summary: Find hundreds of cats cats hiding in the good 'ol United States of America in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Cast or Pass
summary: Battle your friends in a real time card game where wizards sling spells at each other. Has a unique spot as something in between a card game and a fighting game. Games usually take 1-5 minutes, depending on the characters that get picked.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III - Tracer Pack: Zodiac - Cancer Pro Pack
summary: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Carl's Alien Shooting
summary: A skirmish with bizarre alien races in space! A massive tide of enemies will surge towards you! You need to choose your own build from various equipment and weapons! 20 Stages! When rogue game meets 2D vertical bullet hell shooting, experience the clash of classic and modern!

name: Candivity: Deep Mines DLC
summary: Merge sweets together and make the biggest candy in the mines!

name: Candivity: Outer Space DLC
summary: Merge sweets together and make the biggest candy in space!

name: CandyCraft
summary: You want to have a journey to a peaceful and sweet country ? Too bad, if you want Candylands to be peaceful, you will have to be strong and defeat all those dangerous creatures. Explore many biomes, tame pets and dragons, fight monsters and bosses, trade with the gingerbreads villagers and travel throught massive dungeons

name: Categories
summary:
Discover the challenge of "Categories", a word association game that tests your ability to find links between seemingly unrelated words.

In each round, you are presented with a grid of 16 words and your task is to form four groups of four connected words. Each group must share a unique link, be it a common theme, category, or relationship. As you explore possible categories, keep in mind that the game allows for only four mistakes before ending. Play alone or compete with friends to see who can master the art of making categories!

name: Care Bears: Unlock the Magic
summary: Dive into a world of fun and adventure with the Care Bears in "Care Bears: Unlock the Magic" Play as Cheer Bear and her friends in a variety of arcade games!

name: Castle Doombad: Free To Slay
summary:
Embrace your inner villain in Castle Doombad: Free To Slay, the thrilling blend of strategy, tower defense TD, and trap-based puzzling!

Take on the role of the ultimate Big Boss Bad Guy, building traps and defenses for your sinister lair to thwart the relentless onslaught of pesky heroes.

name: Castle Doombad Classic
summary: Become the villain and slay any hero who dares enter your evil domain! Deploy traps and minions as the ultimate diabolical dungeon keeper in this Tower Defense puzzler. Includes the 2014 Castle Doombad game plus new improvements and content.

name: Caretaker: The Bureau
summary:
You are the caretaker.
Today is your first day on the job in organization called The Bureau. Your task is to carefully observe and report all anomalies or deviations.

If you do well - a promotion awaits you.
If you don't - The Bureau breaks the contract.

Can you handle this task?

name: Cast Dice Away
summary: A board game-style survival adventure on a deserted island! In Cast Dice Away, roll dice to explore the island, gather resources, and survive. Each roll triggers unpredictable events, challenging you to strategically navigate diverse environments as you seek escape.

name: Call of Duty Black Ops 6: Season 1
summary: Ready to wreak havoc? The Black Ops 6 era is here. Prepare for a vast new season of content with five Multiplayer maps plus a festive Nuketown variant, seven new weapons, a brand-new Zombies map, and full Call of Duty: Warzone integration along with a new Resurgence map.

name: Care
summary: Care is an atmospheric first person horror game where your choices have consequences. Be observant with your surroundings and unravel the horrific secrets that hide within these walls.

name: CatDog on Parade
summary: Help the handlers move the CatDog balloon from Main Street to 25th Street.

name: Cards and Dungeons
summary: Cards and Dungeons is a roguelike dungeon crawler that blends strategic card play with fast-paced action. Choose your hero, equip your deck, and descend through ever-changing dungeons filled with monsters, traps, and brutal bosses. Every run is a test of survival, strategy, and risk management.

name: Capy Castaway
summary: Embark on a whimsical adventure with a capybara pup and a clever crow as they set off to find their way home! Sniff, dig, and fly as you explore a vibrant world brimming with wonder, challenges, and heartwarming friendships at every turn.

name: CatCat
summary: Take on a journey with a brave cat! In each level of this adventure, spikes and traps demand insane precision to be overcome. You only have one chance, so if you fail, start over.

name: Cannon Bird 3
summary: Compilation of 3 bootleg Angry Birds games.

name: Catly
summary: An open-world adventure filled with surprises and joy, side by side with Cats! Build your dream island, meet various characters, and enjoy caring for your cats, dressing up, building, farming, racing, skiing, and much more! Explore freely and have endless fun with your furry companions!

name: Cartas de Coisas
summary:
A game within a game, Cartas de Coisas (Cards of Things) invites players to wager on a gacha simulator to win cards representing animals, games, cultural icons, and literary figures. These cards contribute to your Fighting Power, a resource essential for facing and hunting down hordes of aliens within the Liturgy. Each opened Gate reveals a new epistle—fragmented stories that unveil the creation of every layer of the game's universe.

On its official page, Cards of Things (Cartas de Coisas) describes itself this way:

"There is a game called Cards of Things, which some people believe can replace the weariness of life with a terrible feeling known as Agony.
Of course, you don't want to live in Agony: just stay away from these cards.
After all, you should be working.
You like your job.
Staring at the wall.
You don't need the torment of Agony."

name: Cargo 19
summary: Play as a brave pilot navigating a spaceship through the wastelands. Explore diverse locations, gathering resources to fulfill contracts while carefully planning your routes and avoiding damage to your ship.

name: Cats Visiting Christmas Town
summary: Embark on a Christmas quest to uncover hidden cats in charming holiday scenes filled with snowmen, festive shops, and a grand tree adorned with gifts.

name: Captain Midnight
summary: The tide always wins

name: Cat's Dream
summary: Cat's Dream is a pixel-style puzzle game in which players take on the role of Cat Meow that turns into a human, on a fantasy one-day adventure. The reason for all this seems to have something to do with her owner Song...

name: Caustic Industry
summary: DBP69: Caustic Industry is a new limit-removing (cl2) megawad designed for Doom 2, with maps made by the Doomer Boards over the course of two months, led by @BiZ. The project theme was 'Industrial facilities made of rusted metal and concrete, rivers of neon nukage, and hazardous crushers.'

name: Castaway Hand
summary: A relaxing vacation, a leisurely journey - that's how it was supposed to be, but due to a cruise ship crash, you are stranded on a tropical desert island. With its vast sandy beaches, dense woods, and possibly less dangerous animals - do you, by any chance, have what it takes to survive?

name: Cavalry Charge
summary: Cavalry Charge·Three Kingdoms is a game that combines the historical theme of the Three Kingdoms with strategic elements. The game features a connected large-scale map design, supporting national wars with up to ten thousand players on the same map.

name: Casino Manager Simulator
summary: Step into the mesmerizing world of slot machines and elevate your casino to the top! "Casino Manager Simulator" is a comprehensive simulation game that allows you to meticulously manage the operations of your casino.

name: Car Carrier Simulator
summary: Transport vehicles across cities while managing your time efficiently. Carefully load and unload cars and navigate through challenging routes. Earn money, hire employees, upgrade your truck, tackle increasingly complex missions. Experience realistic driving mechanics and dynamic weather conditions!

name: CamGirl Simulator
summary: Step into the tantalizing world of online entertainment with "CamGirl Simulator"! This immersive simulation game puts you in control of your own virtual cam model career. Experience the highs and lows of the industry as you navigate the challenges and rewards of being a popular camgirl.

name: Cam Op Simulator
summary: Cam Op Simulator allows real world camera operators to learn and practice operating a virtual camera using a gamepad (joystick), Nodo Inertia Wheels, or several supported "Mouse Wheels" like Rexy Wheels, Hammerhead Wheels, Blacktek, and Kino Wheels.

name: Car Service Simulator
summary: Car Service Simulator is a car service business simulation game where you start from scratch and work your way up. Take the chance to successfully run your own service center, offering a wide range of services from car repair to painting and modification.

name: Cat Town Valley
summary: Welcome to Cat Town Valley! Get ready for a purrfectly adorable adventure in a charming little dreamy farm game village full of cute and loving cats. Join our furry friends to grow your cozy farm, build your town, and have lots of fun!

name: Canvas
summary: An exploration game with the core mechanic of painting the environment to alter the world. You must gain upgrades, abilities, and solve puzzles to eventually defeat the mad wizard that trapped you.

name: Cat Tree
summary: Cat Tree is a relaxing indie game. Collect cats, watch them grow on your tree, and unlock new sections of it. Gather rare, epic, and legendary cats to create a unique collection and uncover all the secrets of the tree!

name: Catfall
summary: A lone astronaut cat survives a spaceship crash and now embarks on a journey to find the crew: his feline friends and his dearest human.

name: Cats of Mona Lisa: A Hidden Object Game
summary: Step into the world of timeless art with a playful twist! Cats of Mona Lisa is a relaxing hidden-object game where you explore beautifully reimagined classical paintings in search of ten mischievous cats cleverly hidden within each masterpiece.

name: Cadeau
summary: Cadeau is an RPG Horror game about a lonely, yet stubborn, young woman named Charlotte– who finds herself in a world unknown to man, wearing clothes that do not belong to her. Wonderful and tragic events are to follow suit, as all of her greatest wishes come true. However, as these things often go, her happiness does not come without consequence…

name: Cabbie!
summary: Buckle up and blast through vibrant bite-sized cartoon worlds. Drive, drift & deliver your way to victory solo or with up to 3 friends in co-op, or clash in competitive Taxi Tag mayhem!

name: Cat’s Catch
summary: Keep the bird safe for as long as you can while a rogue housecat is trying to catch it! The longer you hold out, the more desperate the cat becomes. He’ll take extreme measures like throwing bombs, slashing with scythes and transforming into a wild tornado-frenzy! Increase your highscore, collect feathers and unlock new birds and themes! Do you think you have what it takes to keep the bird from becoming the Cat’s next Catch?

name: Cantaloupe Chronicle
summary:
You've arrived in the cozy roadside town of Cantaloupe to begin your internship at your aunt's newspaper. Here, you'll not only learn how to craft compelling articles but also uncover the big mystery hidden in the town's past.

Explore Cantaloupe by collecting items, engaging with locals, and solving puzzles to uncover a series of smaller stories to write about. Keep your eyes peeled for clues related to the big mystery—the key to your final, front-page article.

The game offers a variety of topics for you to explore and write about using a custom text editor. Don't worry, you don't have to write all the text yourself—you'll find clues that unlock text blocks, which you can easily insert into your articles with a simple click. Your ultimate goal is to piece together the story behind a mysterious body found years ago and uncover the truth.

Discover the charming locations in and around Cantaloupe, filled with atmosphere and intriguing characters to meet. Immerse yourself in this laid-back experience and soak in the soothing ambiance of a small, roadside town.

name: Catcha
summary: Catcha is a catching game where you shoot bombs and bosses, not your average catching game...

name: Castle Hero
summary: Castle Hero is a sequel of Age of Defense, defend your castle from 4 new bosses and use 8 new spells!

name: Casino Heist: Aruba
summary: *Casino Heist: Aruba* is a comedic heist Visual Novel and dating sim where every choice counts. Assemble a team, craft the perfect plan, and tackle a high-stakes robbery targeting a shady casino. Can you outsmart the odds, secure a fortune, and maybe even find love? The score of a lifetime awaits!

name: C.A.S.T
summary: C.A.S.T is a third-person PvE extraction shooter playable solo or in co-op. Select your character and loadout to battle enemy hordes, evade anomalies, and complete objectives across handcrafted maps with dynamic procedural elements.

name: Can We Still Get High
summary: Embark on an exciting journey with your friends or on your own! To reach the top, you'll have to solve challenging puzzles, overcome dangerous obstacles, and coordinate with each other. Laser communication is both a blessing and a challenge!

name: Cat Syndicate: Istanbul
summary: Get ready for a mix of chaos, strategy, and cuteness in the heart of Istanbul. Run your own cat business among the city's legendary street cats, grow your lira income. It may look adorable... but underneath lies a game that rewards careful planning, just like navigating the Grand Bazaar itself.

name: Candy Box
summary: Embark on an unforgettable journey in Candy Box, where a simple candy-collecting game turns into an epic adventure! Start with a handful of candies and discover a world filled with mysteries, quests, and battles. This text-based incremental game will surprise you at every turn with its depth and charm.

name: Cataclysm Wars
summary: The Empire is under attack, and only its mighty armies can save it! Shame you aren't in charge of those, then. Lead an outmatched militia through overwhelming odds in this turn-based strategy game, and save your nation from collapse. Or, lead the dogged Syrinx foe and crush the Empire!

name: Cats vs Cthulhu
summary: Cats vs Cthulhu is a casual survivor-like where you play as a cat the Destroyer of the Great Old Ones. Arm yourself with yarns, fruits and other delicacies. Dress up in the most stylish outfit possible. Find a way to become the ultimate weapon.

name: Card Coder
summary: Card Coder is a card-building roguelike: A novel mix of tactical card battles, inventory management and roguelike deckbuilding, where YOU create custom cards during play. Loot, shop & collect modular ability components to make truly unique cards out of 10 billion possibilities.

name: Call of Honor: Shooter of Warfare
Cash Guardian: Collector Operation "Capital Defense"
summary: Defend your cash, outsmart the heist!

name: Capri Care
summary: Capri Care lets you care for and interact with adorable Capri creatures. Compete in fun minigames, breed new colors and traits, and explore a vibrant island. Feed, train, and bond with your Capri to unlock new adventures and surprises in this magical world!

name: Call The Abyss
summary: 2D Survival Arcade Game packed with Action and Dark Magic. You cannot survive the relentless Forces of Good alone. Better call allies from the Abyss!! Gather Resources and Summon them from your Cauldron. Conquer the worldwide Leaderboard. Completely FREE TO PLAY!! For now...

name: Cavern Sweeper
summary: Use your knowledge of detecting landmines to instead detect monsters in a cave. Monsters are like landmines except different, you know?

name: Call of Ponchy: Mahjong Warfare
summary: Mahjong TPS. It's a mahjong game with unusual rules, using guns and bats.

name: Cake Shop 2
summary: Cake Shop 2 is a time management game and the successor of Cake Shop. Open a street café and serve your customers cakes and pastries. With satisfied customers you earn money, which can then be reinvested in better equipment.

name: Cats and Seek: Toge Land
summary: Celebrating the 16th anniversary of Toge Productions, we will explore Toge Land and greet the cats there.

name: Cat Veterinary: Emergency Hospital Close to Me
summary: Get ready to care for and play in Your Kitten Veterinary!
