name: Cats Visiting Underwater World
summary: Dive into a hidden-cat adventure! Explore vibrant coral reefs, sunken temples, and ancient shipwrecks to uncover cats and collect rare treasures.

name: Candy Puzzles
summary: Stack, Match, and Munch!

name: Car Heist Simulator: Thief Mechanic
summary: The city’s most prized cars, waiting for the perfect thief.

name: Caring Critter Bundle
summary: Loddlenaut is an ocean cleanup adventure set on a vibrant alien planet. Play as an interstellar custodian who is tasked with cleaning up the pollution left behind by a spacefaring mega-corporation.

name: Cats Visiting Lunar New Year
summary: Celebrate Chinese New Year! Find 100 hidden cats in 5 festive drawings and collect all 12 zodiac animals.

name: Cat MeowMart: Supermarket Simulator
summary:
For cats,
by cats,
and all about cats!

name: Car Wash Tycoon Business Simulator
summary: Transform a simple wash into a car cleaning empire!

name: Car Detailing & Wash Simulator: Luxury Car Cleaner
summary: Luxury Cars, Flawless Shine – Master the Art of Detailing!

name: Castillo: Shattered Mirrors
summary: Castillo Shattered Mirrors is a Gothic FPS and Collectathon. Battle legions of the undead in your quest to defeat Dracula with an arsenal of mythical weaponry. Enter dimensional gates through Dracula's castle and decide which worlds to enter, shards to collect, and bosses to defeat.

name: Cannonball Crew
summary: Cannonball Crew is a chaotic online party game where two teams face off in intense matches full of treasure hunting, sword showdowns, and cannon-fueled mayhem.

name: Call of Clans
summary: Call of Clans is an online turn-based strategy card game set in a magical world. Build a versatile deck with minion and skill cards to challenge equally matched opponents in a world of swords and magic. Team up with others to conquer challenging co-op dungeons

name: Cats With Guns
summary:
Cats with Guns is a 2D casual game with rogue-lite elements, where you can make strategic decisions on the middle of the battle and go from a small kitten to a powerful and intimidating feline. Evolve your cat and overwhelm the enemy forces with powerful abilities. Fight sheer enemy numbers with a huge firepower and defeat the generals until you reach Meowstopia.

The game is set in the outskirts of Meowstopia, where cats once lived happily until it was invaded by rats, forcing them to flee. Now, a determined group of cats, known as The Nine Lives Brigade, is fighting to reclaim their city from the rat hordes. The game's premise revolves around the cats battling through waves of enemies to eventually face the leader of the rat invasion.

name: Cake Platformer
summary: Be a Ninja character in this 3rd person platformer. Avoid traps, enemies, solve puzzles and finish maps

name: Campus Fantasy
summary: Start with one billion! You will transform into the male protagonist of Shuangwen and go to school. Sports cars and airplanes are just your means of transportation. Villa beauties are also your standard equipment. With the ability to make money, you are the Veyron for school!

name: CarX Drift Racing 3
summary:
Assemble your very own unique drift car, adjust every part, and conquer iconic tracks! Burn rubber, tune your car, and win. Become a legend in the world of drifting!

Welcome to the world of drift, now in your pocket!

CarX Drift Racing 3 is the long-awaited sequel in the legendary game series from developer CarX Technologies. Assemble your very own unique drift car from scratch and compete in tandem races with players all over the world!

name: Card Collector Trading Shop
summary: Play the role of a collector turned business owner. Open a card market and become rich.

name: Casual Sport Series: Tennis
summary: Ready your racket, find your rhythm, and dominate the court!

name: Cat Rescue
summary: A desperate woman fights to rescue her cat from a paranoid streamer’s lair of twisted experiments, puzzles, and lurking horrors in this psychological thriller.

name: Can No One Hear Me?
summary: All you have to do is press a key and speak into your microphone... But which key?

name: Carnal Sins: Malum Incarnatum + Carne Vescens
summary: Dive into the twisted perceptions of love from two lost souls: Unravel a life torn apart by the desire to love and be loved, and help a mother feed her insatiable child by paying the ultimate price.

name: Calcification
summary: Calcification is a short exploration of waiting, losing faith, and watching all around you turn to dust. After the failure of the villain’s plan, you play as a boss in a dungeon. Abandoned by the interest of heroes you languish awaiting a fate that will never come. Made in RPG Maker MZ.

name: Candleholder
summary:
You play as Spamton, who has fallen in a Neo Dark Fountain inside Kris's pocket, and now explores a strange, dreamy place called the Cluttersphere.

With your perspective shifted, having Jevil as your ally (?) and being tasked with protecting Kris's lifeforce in the form of a candlelight, you must use the SOUL to guide Spamton into making it back to the Dark World safely.

name: Castlevania: The Adventure - Masque of Retribution
summary:
Battle against Dracula's forces once more as Christopher Belmont in Castlevania The Adventure - Masque of Retribution!
Enhanced Visuals, smoother controls and gameplay, remixed and remastered OST, a completely overhauled set of bosses; Castlevania The Adventure - Masque of Retribution is the definitive way to play this reimagined classic by Konami!
As with the previous WarMachine Studios releases, this is a NON-PROFIT FAN REMAKE. No monies were exchanged in any way for the creation of this game. Like the others, it was done out of fun and love for a forgotten game series.

name: Cat Me If You Can
summary: Cat Me If You Can is a charming and cozy game where you explore beautifully handcrafted black-and-white worlds, searching for hidden cats to photograph and bring their colours back into the world.

name: Card Attack: Gabee's Roads
summary: Card Attack is a Card Deck Building based roguelike game. Collect cards, enhance them with relics and skills, and defeat your enemies!

name: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 2
summary: Season 02 is here, upending the new order of Avalon. Engage with a massive amount of new content, including five Multiplayer maps, more than six new weapons, a new Zombies map, limited time Valentine’s Day-themed modes, and more. Gear up and deploy to Season 02.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition
Carmen Sandiego: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Celebrate 40 years of Carmen Sandiego with the Deluxe Edition, featuring an exclusive caper that turns the tables—this time, you’re the detective chasing Carmen and her crew, just like in the original 1985 game.

Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition includes:

• Exclusive 40th Anniversary Caper – Where in the World? (The ACME Files)
• Cosmetic Skin: Classic Carmen – Before the iconic red coat, there was brown.
• Cosmetic Skin - Motorcycle Carmen outfit
• Digital Official Soundtrack
• Digital Official Artbook.

name: Carpathian Night Starring Bela Lugosi
summary:
Bela Lugosi returns as Prince Dracula in this classicvania horror platformer! Battle your way through the monster plagued countryside, evade deadly traps and pitfalls, overcome Dracula’s commanders in single combat, and discover the secret history of your monstrous foes. The night awaits you!

Carpathian Night is a tribute to retro horror side-scrollers and the classic monster films that inspired them. Battle your way through legions of iconic monsters, avoid deadly traps, uncover the secret history of your monstrous foes, and face the legendary Lord of the Vampires within his own ancestral home! Answer the call, mighty hunter, and drive the wickedness back from whence it came!

In partnership with Lugosi Enterprises, Tezcatek is honored to bring Bela Lugosi into the video game realm for the first time in an officially licensed release, in a style of game that has long been associated with the horror classics.

name: Cats the Commander for Nintendo Switch
summary:
Too cute Cats "Bump! Bump!" adventure RPG!
"Cats the Commander", popular tower defense game,
is now available on Nintendo Switch!

name: Cardtographer
summary:
Cardtographer is a stylized 3D-Graphics Roguelike Deckbuilder, in which you choose one or more Champions to fight the evil, which has overcome the lands.

During your adventure your chosen champions gain gold and experience during the fights and enhance their deck to overcome their opposing enemy finally.

You also can ally with your frineds in online coop.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD 2: Additional Card Unlock Pass
summary: The "Additional Card Unlock Pass" includes the following content: ※Cards will be unlocked progressively as the corresponding DLC is released.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Character Sleeve Set 01
Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Character Sleeve Set 02
Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 01- 08
Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 01 "D-BT 1"
summary: A set of four copies each of C, R, RR, and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2: Complete Playset 02 "D-BT 2"
summary: A set of four copies each of C, R, RR, and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 03 "D-BT 3"
summary: A set of four copies each of C, R, RR, and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 04 "D-BT 4"
summary: A set of four copies each of C, R, RR, and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 05 "D-BT 5"
Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 06 "DZ-BT 1"
summary: A set of four copies each of C, R, RR, and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 07 "DZ-BT 2"
summary: A set of four copies each of C, R, RR, and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2: Complete Playset 08 "VG-BT"
summary: A set of four copies each of C, R, RR, and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.

name: Carmen Sandiego: Deluxe Edition DLC
summary:
Celebrate 40 years of Carmen Sandiego with the Deluxe Edition, crafted for devoted fans and new sleuths alike! Greet some familiar faces in the exclusive anniversary caper and become a master of disguise with some exclusive in-game outfits.

Carmen Sandiego Deluxe Edition includes:

- Anniversary Caper "Where in the World"
- Cosmetic Skin - Classic outfit
- Cosmetic Skin - Motorcycle outfit
- Digital Official Soundtrack
- Digital Official Art Book

name: Cannon Island
summary: Cannon Island is a roguelike city builder, where you colonize procedurally generated islands and fight rivals. Wise building placement and resource management are the key to victory.

name: Calico: Neat Things
summary:
There's even more to explore in the world of Calico with the Neat Things DLC, including:
New Quest
New Area and NPC
New Animal Companions
Two New Mini-Games
New Café Decorations

name: Cast n Chill
summary: Cast n Chill is a cozy idle (and active) fishing game where you explore serene lakes, rivers, and oceans. Catch rare fish, upgrade your gear and reel in legendary catches - all with your loyal companion by your side.

name: Can you finish it?
summary: A game of great difficulty

name: Capitale
summary: Guess the hidden capital every day. Use the clues to guess it with the fewest attempts possible.

name: Caught by a Spider
summary:
You've fallen into the spider's web.

Caught by a Spider is a short yandere Visual Novel where you talk to a Spider!

name: Castlequest
summary: The NES port of Castlequest. The object of the game is to navigate through Groken Castle to rescue Princess Margarita. The player can push certain objects throughout the game to accomplish progress. In some rooms, the prince can only advance to the next room by aligning cement blocks, Honey Jars, Candle Cakes, and Elevator Controlling Block.

name: Cafemart Simulator
summary: Create and decorate your cozy cafe, where guests can enjoy delicious food and drinks. Expand your service with a supermarket offering a wide selection of fresh products, so visitors can not only have a tasty meal but also do some shopping. Play solo or with friends in cooperative mode!

name: Calyx
summary: A strategy game with a new kind of enemy, Calyx puts you in charge of a space mining outpost, locked in battle with an overwhelming alien organism. Build your base, gather resources, assemble your forces, and take on the Calyx. With only an out-of-date AI for company, can you survive?

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Vault Edition
summary: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 is signature Black Ops across a cinematic single-player Campaign, a best-in-class Multiplayer experience and with the epic return of Round-Based Zombies.

name: Castle of Shikigami 3
summary: ・A culmination of character shooting games set in a unique worldview! ・A wide variety of newly added playable characters and attack methods, as well as a 2P scenario that is different from 1P play. ・Features a high-tension MAX system that will satisfy your insatiable passion for shooting games!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Mazda Remastered DLC
summary:
Mazda Remastered DLC includes 2 licensed cars:
- 1977 Mazda RX-3
- 1992 Mazda RX-7

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Ford Remastered DLC
summary:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 - Ford Remastered DLC includes 4 licensed cars:
- 1965 Ford GT40
- 1971 Ford Mustang Mach1
- 2017 Ford F350 Super Duty
- 2017 Ford Mustang GT

Engines:
- V8 Ford Small Block 302 (Windsor)
- V8 Ford Small Block 289 (Windsor)
- V8 Ford Cobra Jet 429
- V8 Ford COYOTE
- V8 Ford BOSS

DLC includes Engine tuning parts.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Japan Fishing Reserve
summary: Welcome to Kamuibetsu National Park in Japan! Find the perfect spot to reel in unique new species, explore the untouched landscapes in Hokkaido, and tackle new story missions and challenges.

name: Catch the Clown II
summary:
A parody puzzle game made for the GMC Jam #3, where the author interpreted the theme "Live" as "the legend will live on."

After completing the first level (modelled after the infamous Catch the Clown tutorial for Game Maker 7), you slide around to defeat all the noobs posting CTC clones on the YoYo Games portal.

name: Castle V Castle
summary: Castle V Castle is a stylish 1v1 card game inspired by browser classics like Castle Wars & Wordle. Grow your castle and reduce your opponent to rubble in a magic-fueled duel of wits and bricks. Earn rewards, unlock new modes, and complete randomized daily challenges to cement your winning streak!

name: CanvasCraft
summary:
Fun and addictive puzzle game! Mix and Match Colors! Infinite Gameplay!

ARCADE MODE:
Race against the time to match your canvas with an automatically generated one. Complete the canvas as fast as you can to earn more points!

PRACTICE MODE:
Play casually and take all the time you need when mixing and matching your colors on your canvas.

name: Castillon
summary:
Defend your Kingdom

As a renoun wizard you lay claim to a new land and build your castle! But beware, for demon invaders roam the wilds. Grow your kingdom during the day then fight off waves of enemies at night!

Castillon is a bite sized strategy game about building and defending your growing castle realm.

name: Cats 'n Blocks
summary: Cats 'n Blocks is a chaotic action game where you control a cat that attacks enemies by picking up pieces of the ground. Raise your paws and prepare yourself to fight, mess around, explore and unlock hidden items in this fast-paced adventure.

name: Cauldron's Rift
summary: A chaotic platform arena brawler where you can use rifts to gain new weapons or unlock quirky abilities, all while using the environment to your advantage.

name: Cashier Simulator
summary: Grocery Store Manager

name: Caball: Sunset Hour
summary: Veronica has made a deal with a strange being, and now every shadow seems to follow her with its gaze. Or is it all merely an illusion?

name: Call of Warzone
summary: Fight with strategy, dominate the battlefield, claim your victory

name: Cargo Delivery Simulator
summary: Build your cargo company from scratch. Start as a worker and grow your office by serving customers. Manage shelves, deliver packages, and handle residential deliveries. Expand your operations with employees and automation systems to become your own boss.

name: CatTris
summary: You’ve been ambushed by five adorable kittens! Take them home, solve fun 3D puzzles to help them settle in, and enjoy their playful tricks. Share both the joyful moments and the challenges with your new furry friends.

name: Cats Contrast
summary: Dive into the fascinating world of a feline family, where every frame is filled with amusing details and unexpected nuances. Find 10 differences between the two images to uncover all the secrets of these fluffy heroes! ???

name: Cat Slaps
summary: A physics-based arcade platformer where you play as a mischievous cat in a world of infinite tables! Slap objects off the edge and craft wild combos! With a unique mix of procedural generation and deck-building mechanics, every run is a fresh journey to master the art of tabletop devastation!

A custom mission for Halo: Combat Evovled, set in the Resistance universe.

The objective is simple: get in, grab the tech, and get out. However, with heavy Chimeran forces, this is no easy feat.

Get ready to lead your team, infiltrate the British base, and secure the Gray Tech.

Good luck Specter.

You have many options for how to destroy your enemies, and the arena changes from explosions. Create your own team of three unique fighters and choose the weapon you want to fight with. Weapons differ in their capabilities and mechanics, which makes the...

Teamwork is the recipe for success!
If you want to be successful, you can't do it alone! Hire and manage your staff and make sure you find the right cats for the job!

Now's your chance to open your own special restaurant

In this game you're about to destroy the grandma's house. Knock over priceless vases, shred curtains mid-nap, and bat heirlooms into oblivion! Whether it's eating the fish from the aquarium, breaking flower pots, or throwing random items across the room, a cat simulator lets you do it all.

Scratch carpets, couches, and any furniture in sight as you explore different rooms filled with destructible objects. Every scratched sofa and shattered plate fuels Granny’s escalating rage. How much havoc can you unleash before she snaps?

Capy's Quest

summary: A perfect fit for savvy collectors is Cassette Beasts' New Wirral Edition! Includes the base game and all DLCs.

Solve intricate puzzles by using the unique “echo” mechanic to record, replay, and interact with up to three versions of your past self. Can you break the loop?

name: Can You Reach 60 Seconds

name: Call of Duty: Spain at War
summary:
Call Of Duty: Spain At War is a mod for Call of Duty: World At War, set in the war that devastated Spain in the 30s, the Spanish Civil War,offering a vision as closely as possible about what happened historically.
Call Of Duty: Spain At War aims to teach and entertain all those lovers of history and war games like Call of Duty, through a campaign mode, multiplayer and zombies mode.

name: Cat Golf

The golf course is an Japanese town. Set off on a laid-back, carefree adventure as you and your cat zip freely through the city!

name: Cannoneer Girls
summary:
"1·Shot·1·Reload" High school girls in pixel art battle in a chaotic 3-on-3 cannon brawl! Drive opponents to the brink and blast them away with a cannon shot!

Hougeki Shoujo is a 3-vs-3 competitive 2.5D shooting action game where high school girls battle it out with their trusty cannons! The game features a single-reload, single-shot system—you only have one chance to dodge an enemy shot to avoid immediate elimination! Win a round by wiping out the opposing team. The first team to win three rounds claims victory! Encircle your opponents and seize victory with a decisive shot! The game features simple, intuitive controls. You can tell when your shot is ready by the ammo icon that appears next to your character’s username. Use cute emotes and chat with your allies and opponents!

name: Cave of Cards
summary: In Cave of Cards, you clear dungeons by making poker hands.

name: Captured 2

name: Catastrophe: Earthquake
summary: Trapped in a condemned building, you must escape before the earthquakes and collapses bring a tragic end. Survive the tremors, find essential items, and flee. Each tremor is a new challenge in this fight for survival. Time is running out...

name: Carrot Cake
summary: Compete in the Easter games, solve puzzles, and escape the Easter Bunny in this PS1 style survival horror game!

name: Car Parking: Garage Simulator

name: CatchaDiablos

name: Campfire Legends: The Last Act - Premium Edition
Cases of Stolen Beauty

name: Call of the Ages: Collector's Edition

name: Cat & Farm Pals
summary: Cat & Farm Pals is a simple and fun pull & throw game that you can enjoy playing at your own pace. Spend fun moments with cats and farm animals, compete in weekly tournaments, and collect trophies!"

name: Catch Pokémon

A hint about a random Pokémon is also given, and Master Balls are unlocked under certain conditions for the Legendaries and Mythical ones. Only the first generation of Pokémon is available (the first 151).

name: Candles
summary: Candles is a short first-person horror game developed by TheUnbeholden. Set in a remote and shadowy home, players must navigate through unsettling interiors while managing limited interactions that shape their path forward. The game emphasizes atmosphere, using dynamic lighting, eerie sound design, and a compact, claustrophobic environment to build tension. Its minimalist mechanics focus attention on exploration and environmental storytelling, creating a suspenseful and immersive experience.

name: Care(taking)
summary:
You are the caretaker of a graveyard at world's end. Each day, five spirits show at a random grave on the plot. Only two may be freed from this world.

Your choices in this world do not matter.

name: Catacombs

Venture deep into the catacombs, pouncing to assume control over his minions, all to foil the will of the gods!

name: Captain Edward Continues
summary: Want to continue playing as a time traveling pirate? Now is your chance with Captain Edward Continues. 100s of cutscenes, jokes, and other oddities to make you and your friends laugh. Want to just shoot robots, goblins, and gang members? You can do that, too!

name: Catherine Ragnor and the Cursed Island
Canvasmount
summary: We return to our usual schedule of actually making our games. Let's see how that goes??

name: Cat Evolution
summary: Cat Evolution is the cat game for those who simply love evolution games. You just need to drag to cats with the same species to merge cats into a new, different, mysterious kitty.

name: Call of Duty: World at War - Spain at War
summary:
SPAIN AT WAR is a mod for Call of Duty: World At War, set in the war that devastated Spain in the 30s, the Spanish Civil War.

A different view of our history. Far from the polemics of good and evil, red or blue, SPAIN AT WAR aims to teach and entertain all those lovers of history and war games like Call of Duty, through a campaign mode and a multiplayer mode.

name: Catjinni Survivors
summary: Catjinni is a single-player survivors-like auto-shooter. Battle endless monster hordes, upgrade abilities, and unlock powerful customizations. Face the sinister Jinn Ifrit and break free from the darkness. Survive. Customize. Conquer!

name: Call of Yucatán
summary: Call of Yucatan is a mod that adds 2 dungeons appearing in the jungles. These dungeons reference Maya and Aztec mythology and culture. Puzzles, traps, monsters, and gods like Kukulkan await you. The mod features numerous construction blocks, ruthless mystical fauna, and resources that will allow you to craft advanced equipment useful in your survival

name: Catena
summary: Catena is a deck-building roguelite where the freedom to customize your allies feels as powerful as programming. Dive into strategic, grid-based battles and create tactics uniquely your own to conquer the mysterious island and defeat the formidable enemies that await.

name: Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse 2020
summary: Dracula's Curse 2020 is a remake of the NES classic Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse. Its creators make a couple of key updates and enhancements: improved character control, newly drawn graphics, and a rearranged soundtrack. Familiar Dracula's Curse enemies appear, of course, but the cast also includes directly ripped and modified versions of characters that have appeared in other classic series games (Super Castlevania IV, Symphony of the Night, and the like).

name: Castle Combat
summary: RTS, but the soldiers will act automatically: Each soldier has different characteristics/attribute values/action methods. Choose the appropriate soldiers and buildings according to the battlefield situation, and destroy the opponent's castle only through your strategy rather than operation!

name: Car Combine Mania
summary:
Rotate, merge, and strategize your way to victory in Car Combine Mania!

Welcome to Car Combine Mania, a thrilling puzzle game that challenges your strategic thinking and creativity! In this game, you’ll rotate digital cars and drag them onto grid. Your mission is to strategically place these cars horizontally or vertically, matching three or more of the same value to merge them into a higher value. Start from level 1 and work your way up to level 7 by combining cars efficiently. Each successful merge allows a little character to hop into a car, adding a fun and rewarding twist to the gameplay. But beware—when the grid fills up with no more space for new cars, the game ends! With visually stunning designs, strategic merging mechanics, and power-ups to clear the board, Car Combine Mania offers an addictive and immersive experience for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages.
developers: Legal Services Of The Hudson Valley
publishers: Legal Services Of The Hudson Valley

name: Cat & Rabbit Pizza Farming
summary: Welcome to your new life as the only pizza farmer-baker around!

name: Cats Defense Robots: Meow Legends
summary: Unleash the purrfect power: defend, conquer, and rule with Meow Legends!

name: Cats Visiting Historical Times
summary: A cat & owner are lost in time! Journey through ancient Egypt, Viking ships & pirate coves to find hidden cats—some helpful, some sneaky. Collect clues, unlock history, & race the clock in this charming adventure!

name: Car Racing & Drift & Driving & Drag Bundle
summary: Drift, Drag & Dominate – 10 Games, One Legendary Collection!

name: .CatMilk 2
summary: The highly successful adventure of the cat who needs to drink milk continues, now the game .catMilk receives its return: .catMilk 2

name: Can I Crash At Your Place? Oshikakene-chin
summary: Two sisters arrive, bringing trouble along!? A thrilling life surrounded by beautiful sisters begins!

name: Capital Kings
summary: Build your empire and dominate the world in Capital Kings! Start as an ambitious entrepreneur, buy lucrative businesses, expand your influence, and outmaneuver rivals in this thrilling, location-based monopoly game. Make critical strategic decisions, accumulate wealth, and shape your destiny. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate tycoon? Your rise to power starts now!

name: Candy Storm Bunny Catcher
summary: Candy Storm Bunny Catcher puts you in the paws of a speedy bunny racing to collect falling candies while dodging bombs from the sky! Rack up points as the sugary storm intensifies, with everything falling faster and faster. Move left and right to avoid danger, catch as much candy as you can, and aim for the highest score. How many points can you earn before the storm overwhelms you?

name: Cat Named Mojave
summary: Stranded in the desert, your only hope of escaping rests in a strange Catman. His one request: hunt down surreal creatures, skin them, and chop them up so he can keep them as trophies. In this uncanny place, Death will become all too familiar.

name: Casual Sport Series: Badminton
summary: Casual Sport Series: Badminton delivers fast-paced, energetic gameplay that captures the thrill of this lightning-quick sport.

name: Castle Kellmore
summary: Traverse through the bloody courtyard, gloomy halls, dank dungeons, and hellish realms of Castle Kellmore, fighting waves of demonic monsters, in order to save they world from unimaginable horrors.

name: Capcom Fighting Collection 1 & 2 Bundle
summary:
Experience 18 legendary games from Capcom's storied fighting game history!

Included:

- Capcom Fighting Collection (10 games)
- Capcom Fighting Collection 2 (8 games)

name: Cappy & Tappy: Temples of Peril
summary: Cappy & Tappy is a block-stacking platforming adventure! Help the famous adventuring duo Cappy and Tappy escape the crumbling Temples of Peril! Cappy will leap, bound, and climb to escape the temple, while Tappy stacks blocks to aid in the escape.

name: Catpillar
summary: “CATpillAr” is a horror-themed VR mini-game that requires you to collect big, juicy, hairy, creepy caterpillars crawling around an empty hospital. In VR, you can grab harmless giant caterpillars by the neck and throw them inside the bucket. Replay and see how many you can collect!

name: Catacomb Abyss 3D
summary: Following the publication of the Catacomb series on GOG, Flat Rock Software decided to open-source these games under the GPL license in 2014. This enabled programmers to port the source code of Catacomb Abyss to other operating systems. The source port Reflection Keen, later renamed to ReflectionHLE, allows gamers to play Catacomb Abyss on Microsoft Windows, Linux, MacOS, AmigaOS and Android.

name: Card Streamer Simulator
summary: You will play as a live broadcasting room to open card packs anchor, according to customer orders to open card packs live. The profit and loss gain of the live broadcast all depends on your choice and luck, in addition, you can also participate in it yourself to collect the full set of card books.

name: Cave Crusade
summary: Classic roguelike deckbuilder designed for quick runs. Upgrade your cards, discover powerful artifacts, and master the Wheel of Fortune to maximize your rewards.

name: Canyon of Outlaws
summary: Step into the boots of a wild west sheriff and blast your way through a cursed frontier!

name: Car Games Bundle & Stimulator: Car Parking, Offroad Car, Offroad Truck, Car Racing, Taxi
Captive
summary: You wake up in a bright, but mysterious room. You don't know what is happening or how you got there.

name: Catgirls From My Sweet Dream: Neko Girls 18+
summary: ♡Catgirls From My Sweet Dream - Neko Girls 18+♡[/b] adds new 20 levels!

name: Can Knockdown
summary:
Can Knockdown includes many astonishing features which will amaze your friends and make you come back for more! Online Facebook leaderboards, absolutely gorgeous graphics, unique and realistic physics engine, multipliers, explosive action and so much more! Can Knockdown is like a miraculous carnival fun fair - only better!

Start playing and you just won't put down this marvelous title till you drain your battery empty! You have been warned!

name: Castle of the Countess
summary:
Felix the Cat is somehow back in Black and White. Wha' happened???

The Countess, played by Xena Princess Warrior, has trapped other past characters in the year 1922. Travel with Kitt to her fancy Castle and solve the puzzle of how to get back to 2022!

This classic-style platformer started as a puzzle adventure, then turned into a arcade action game. Enjoy 15 levels of unique arcade adventure! Lovingly crafted by 5 appreciators of old school game design.

name: Cats Visiting Fairy Tales
summary: Spot clever felines tucked into fairy tale scenes! Hunt for 100 cats in each magical zone, plus discover all special hidden treasures. A purrfect puzzle adventure!

name: Car Wash Simulator
summary: Car Wash Simulator is racing-simulator game which includes the next jobs: taxi driver & washing sports cars.

name: Call of Duty: World at War
Carlos Haunted House
summary: Carlos Haunted House is a 2D Top-Down survival horror game based on the story of a haunted house where you have been invited by your friend, the current owner, to experience the paranormal activities and to help him deal with them.

name: Can't You Run?
summary: An endless torment

name: Cast & Spell
summary: Cast & Spell is an action-packed multiplayer game where wizards battle using elemental magic. Fight in PvP duels or team up with friends in co-op modes to defeat monsters. Master different elements and enjoy intense, strategic combat across various game modes.

name: Car Park Capital
summary: The car industry needs you to design and build the greatest car parks that simple town life hasn't seen before. Introduce the need for car commuting and turn neighborhoods into car parks! Use propaganda to convince people to pay you for it. Fight people that see through your oily business.

name: Cap'n Magneto
summary: Cap'n Magneto is a sci-fi graphical adventure game designed and developed by Al Evans. The player assumes the role of spaceship captain Lance Magneto, who has crash landed on a planet populated with aliens and robots. Some are friendly or neutral toward the player, while others are hostile and will attack on sight. The captain can only understand their language with the assistance of a tricorder device found near the crash site. Exploring the map reveals numerous objects to acquire: mundane items such as apples and oil cans; weapons and armor; and ultimately the Crown of Control, a mind-control device vital to escaping the planet.

name: Cambria
summary: Cambria is a risk-to-earn MMO with massive onchain stakes.

name: Carnival Happy Day
summary: ( Carnival Happy Day ) This is a casual and Joyous carnival game, There are 18 different game stages in the game! And there will be 5 different ways to play in each game stage! There are 90 ways to play in total.

name: Cargo King
summary: Cargo King is a relaxing physics-based balance game of quick decision and royal precision. Stack your cargo boxes as high as you can to build a splendidly balanced and elegant tower, worthy of its skillful master. Bring your reflexes to perfection, reach greater heights and get your well-earned rewards.

name: Castle of Heart: Retold
summary: Introducing Castle of Heart: Retold, a completely reworked version of the challenging action platformer that had been exclusive to the Nintendo Switch. The tweaks include rewritten dialog, reworked cutscenes, remixed music, graphics and animation changes, improved gameplay and UI, changed endings, and more.

name: Cat Lab!
summary:
The scientist cat is trying to mutate the mice to make them smarter. But something goes wrong and many mice escape. You have to find all the mice to complete the mutation.
This game is suitable for people of all ages. It has more than 70 levels and frequently updated content. We have many new updates planned!

name: Cave Maze
summary: Cave Maze is a text adventure of the classic "cave crawl" genre, intended especially for a younger audience. It features colorful static image for each location, and a baby dragon character that acts as a companion, occasionally commenting on things or intervening (for example, if the player tries to do something dangerous). Most of the puzzles involve finding the right item that allows passage through a location, such as food to give to a hungry animal that won't let you pass. The game seems to have some amount of randomization, both in where objects are found, and also the layout of the cave itself.

name: Car Racing
summary: Reflex and obstacle course game with a racing theme. Marketed in the 1990s in Latin America, built into a handheld console.

name: Castle Champions
summary:
Build your *ultimate* castle to train an army of mages, paladins, archers, and other warriors to battle against other kingdoms.

Manage your castle by housing civilians who must run the restaurants, banks, etc and protect them against monstrous invaders.

name: Catgirl
summary: Catgirl is a silly rpg about rescuing your dog from a demon princess. Filled with quirky characters and mini-games, players can explore the world and experience its many odd events. Short and sweet, Catgirl seeks to provide harmless fun, funky tunes, and a heart-warming tale of friendship.

name: Captain Rocket
summary: Jump on rockets and go as far right as you can!

name: Caren and the Tangled Tentacles
summary:
Caren and the Tangled Tentacles" is a classical point & click adventure in the style of Maniac Mansion and Zak McKracken and the Alien Mindbenders. You take over the role of Caren, a young woman who works as chemist in the neighbouring institute. On a usual working day she makes a disturbing discovery there. So she starts to uncover the background of the heinous events with investigative work. The aim of the game is to reconstruct the events as far as possible and finally uncover a baleful secret in the deep.

The game was created by the team Prior Art, consisting of the in the scene well-known Enthusi, Veto and Jammer. Originally, the game was created as an entrance to the Forum 64 Adventure Compo 2015 and won an outstanding first place in all categories: best game, best graphics and best sound.

The game is designed for two languages and it is possible at any time during the game to switch between German and English. Furthermore, it can run on PAL and NTSC systems, whereby the fastloader can only be chosen with PAL. On NTSC you are limited to the non-accelerated kernal load.

name: Cappu Dungeon
summary: Cappu Dungeon is a skill-building 3D action roguelite where you equip skills to wipe out hordes of enemies. Players buy and combine skills to create a powerful combat style. Activate skills at the right moment to overwhelm enemies, clear stages, and conquer challenging dungeons to claim victory.

name: Cardstronaut
summary: A unique spin on the deckbuilding genre, where you must play cards and use strategy and tactics to activate ceiling mounted flame throwers to defeat the aliens and find out the truth

name: Canjin
summary: A Marxist vigilante racing against curfew in the Badlands, trying to smuggle out a document that could liberate the people.

name: CallMara
summary: CallMara is a psychological thriller with elements of horror, set in a gloomy medieval village. The protagonist, waking up in the forest, discovers a devastated village and explores its secrets, gradually realizing that he has become the cause of the evil that has engulfed his village.

name: Cartel Kings
summary:
Meet Max Muscles, Donnie Dollars and the rest of the Cartel Kings! They have really itchy trigger fingers, terrible dress sense and love stealing stuff. Guide them as they blast their way through the city, taking out the bad guys and blowing stuff up in the hunt for cash, treasure and even bigger guns! If you're feeling lonely - or just want to show off - join a Cartel with friends and compete against enemy Cartels in the hunt for amazing rewards! Or visit Battle Bay and attack other players bases to steal their loot and upgrade your own millionaires mansion - solid gold toilets don't buy themselves you know!

So what are you waiting for? Following the rules is boring and earning nice things is hard. Join the exclusive club of Cartel Kings and bring a little law breaking into your life instead!

name: Cage Girl
summary: After opening a mysterious email, beautiful office lady Aiko is pulled into a bizarre, endless maze. Filled with unknown magic and dangers, she must stay calm, search for clues, and solve puzzles to escape this invisible prison.

name: Car Guys
summary: Experience the thrill of Car Guys, a high-octane multiplayer racing game! Represent your nation, compete in explosive races, and climb the global leaderboard. Customize your ride, engage in daily and weekly championships, and enjoy seamless online play with Photon Quantum. Join the race today!

name: Cat Rescue Inc.
summary: Rescue your customers’ lost feline friends! Explore endless, randomly generated jobs. Be stealthy because the cats are watching! And beware... dangers lurk in the woods!

name: Caveman Jump Jump
summary: Jump, climb, and survive! Help a brave caveman rescue a frozen cavewoman in this challenging prehistoric platformer. Time your jumps, explore 3 unique worlds, and avoid extinction! Do you have what it takes to reach the top?

name: Call of Glory: Critical Warfare
summary: Defeat is not an option—only victory or glory.

name: Catch It
summary: "Dusk to Dawn, Strategy Drawn" In this blighted realm, daylight grants but fleeting respite— While darkness unleashes the reaper's carnival. As the Last Nightwatch, you must wield more than steel: To orchestrate the symphony of survival.

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow
summary: A scaled down version of Aria of Sorrow for cell phones, released exclusively in Europe in 2008.

name: CatCat
summary: "CatCat" is a relaxing cat simulation game. Raise different breeds, feed them, and pet them. You can freely change the layout, arrange furniture, and alter wall colors to create a cozy space for you and your cats. There are no goals or pressure; just enjoy a peaceful time together with your cats.

name: Candivity: Under Water DLC
summary: Merge coins together and get the biggest treasure under the sea!

name: Cargo Simulator
summary: Manage your own warehouse. Fit and pack products into boxes of the right size. Deliver them to the correct addresses—safely and on time. Hire staff, train them, and speed up your operations. Partner with brands to expand your warehouse and grow your logistics network by purchasing more vehicles.

name: Card'em All!
summary: Trapped in ages-long slumber, fight trough timelines of nightmares to defeat your fears and assemble a mighty deck to face your ultimate challenge and finally awake! Surviving through each defeat, your deck grows stronger and stronger, bringing you one step closer to victory.

name: Capybara's Happytime
summary: Build Your Dream Resort with Furry Friends! Team up with adorable animal buddies to create a one-of-a-kind vacation paradise! Attract all kinds of capybaras to chill, expand your resort, and grow it into a thriving empire.

name: Cardburners
summary: CardBurners is a chaotic fast-paced solo or online versus card game. You must play you cards quickly before they burn in your hand! Mix and match completely different sets of cards and rules to create unique action packed games,

name: Cafe New York 9/11
summary: In Café New York, Step into the life of Sameer, a Pakistani American living in NYC during the week of 9/11. Sameer must navigate rising tensions, protect his family, and make impossible choices. Decisions that will shape his future and the fate of those around him in a city forever changed.

name: Cats are Money
summary: Cats are Money is a cozy idle game in the "Tamagotchi" genre where you manage a farm and collect unique cats into your inventory. Take care of your pets, feed them, and play with them. Upgrade your farm, unlock new breeds and businesses.

name: Cattle Crisis!
summary: Cattle Crisis is an arcade shoot 'em up game (Shmup). Pilot your fighter jet to defeat evil aliens and save our precious cows! Cattle Crisis is a short game and currently features one level.

name: Calix
summary: Calix is a frenetic platform game where you control two characters with unique powers and gameplay styles. Delve into the story of Gilda and Viola and decide who will complete their objective.

name: Candy Shop Simulator: Sweet Start
summary: Sweet Start is the perfect introduction to the world of Candy Shop Simulator, designed for players who want to dive into the sweet universe of the game and get familiar with its foundations before experiencing the full version

name: Card Shop Simulator Multiplayer
summary: You and your friends are going to compete to see whose card shop can earn more money! Starting from a humble little shop, decorate your store, hire staff, formulate marketing strategies. Finally, use the coolest cards to engage in card battles, and win away your friend's precious cards!

name: Capsoul
summary: Capsy - a cheeky capsule with a moustache and stylish shower cap - faces ruthless Thornark in a fateful showdown. In this hardcore platformer with scarce lives, master diverse weapons and slick abilities to overcome relentless challenges.

name: Castle Cab
summary: Castle Cab is a hilariously chaotic action sandbox game that puts you in the horseshoes of a majestic, yet slightly unhinged, steed. Hitched to your trusty cart, you’ll gallop, drift, and crash your way through a bustling medieval world where rules are more of a suggestion.

name: Cardrottini
summary: Cardrottini is a chaotic Italian meme-fueled card battler where brainrot meets strategy. Build absurd decks, outwit your opponents, and embrace the madness. No context needed. If you know, you know.

name: CatTerror: The Abandoned House
summary: Dive into this horror and survival experience.

name: Cat Cosmic Puzzle
summary: A purrfect puzzle among the stars!

name: Can't Stop Rory
summary: By day, grow and decorate your cozy post-apocalyptic farm to meet government quotas, unlock new decorations and scale your farm. But beware, when night falls, the Unfed will try to take away everything that you've built. Lay traps, build turrets and deploy mechs to defend the last sustainable haven.

name: Cave Crave
summary:
Step into the underground world of caves in the most realistic VR spelunking game, where the entire environment is your map, just waiting to be discovered!
️‍Beat environmental challenges: steep climbs, narrow tunnels and water!
Mark your own clues on cave walls with chalk
Clear your path of obstacles with a hammer
Climb walls and ceilings (!) using ice axes
‍Maintain your gear to ensure its reliability
No cheap horror tricks – just a mysterious and immersive cave atmosphere

name: Catch Flex: Quest
summary: Use your body instead of a gamepad! Jump into an exciting adventure and help Vi on her journey. Track your movements with your phone’s camera and overcome challenges using full-body motion control. Controller apps available on iOS and Android.

name: Cats Around Us: Black Cat
summary: We've hidden a bunch of cats in a silent comic about a black cat that always blends into the shadows. Can you find them all?

name: Call of the Elder Gods
summary: Journey to the far corners of the Earth and unearth ancient horrors in this Lovecraftian narrative puzzle adventure and sequel to 2020’s critically acclaimed Call of the Sea.

name: Cats Catching Mice: The Black and White World
summary: In the black-and-white world, it's all up to you whether to explore the map, solve puzzles or catch mice. You can freely choose your route and obtain props. Give play to your wild imagination and combine the props. As long as you can catch the mice, you will be the coolest cat in the night.

name: Cardrunners
summary: Cardrunners is a fast-paced roguelike card deck-building game set in a gritty cyberpunk world. Build your deck, equip powerful trinkets, and engage in tactical grid-based combat to outwit your enemies.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7
summary:
Embrace the madness.

In Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Treyarch and Raven Software are bringing players the most mind-bending Black Ops ever. The year is 2035 and the world is on the brink of chaos, ravaged by violent conflict and psychological warfare following the events of the fan-favorite titles Black Ops 2 and Black Ops 6. Wielding cutting-edge technology, the Black Ops team led by David Mason must fight back against a manipulative enemy who weaponizes fear above all else.

name: Catch The Rabbit
summary: A mischievous rabbit has stolen all the golden fruits, try to catch the rabbit by jumping from platform to platform without falling! Collect fruits to unlock new animals.

name: Castaside
summary: Slash and Dash across a mysterious continent in this one-of-a-kind Action Adventure RPG experience!

name: Catch the Balls
summary: Catch as many balls as you can and collect all the stars.

name: Cardcaster
summary: Cardcaster is a small roguelike dungeon crawler. Dive into monster-filled depths, wielding ability cards as your weapon. Slash through enemies and bosses as you descend, building your deck and unleashing powerful combinations. Craft a new path to victory with each run by mastering card synergies.

name: Cards and Fables
summary: Cards and Fables is a deck-builder with a strong roguelite component: strengthen your deck, create synergies, and face powerful enemies.

name: Camp Keepalive: Endless Summer
summary: Camp Keepalive: Endless Summer is a turn-based strategy game set in a camp straight out of an 80's horror movie. Save the helpless and dull-witted campers from an onslaught of monsters with a team of counselors, each with their own unique abilities.

name: Case Closed
summary: Unravel the mystery in a city full of AI-driven citizens in this immersive first-person detective game. Interrogate, gather clues, and manipulate your reputation to solve a unique murder case every time you play.

name: Call of Mini: Double Shot
summary:
The small town of Lakeside is suffering from something even scarier than economic crisis: Zombies. You are an unwitting truck driver stranded in the middle of it all, forced to kill for your survival. In the face of deadly new breeds of bioengineered zombies, you and one buddy are the only two left to hunt down the source of the infection.

With super high-tech weapons and totally unique armor, how long can you hold off the zombie hordes?

name: Call of Mini Dino Hunter
summary:
Dinosaurs emerge from the ancient forest after hiding for decades. As a descendant from a great hunter family, you continuously hone skills towards your desired goal in order to stand up to your father's expectation. Now it's time to prove yourself.

Fight your way through hordes of giant lizards and collect items to craft and upgrade various weapons.

name: Call of Mini: Brawlers
summary: A radiation leak at a nuclear power plant has the locals acting strange, eating brains and suchlike. You’re not the type to believe in stories about zombies, but you’re not gonna let some shambling freak snack on your brain, either! Grab a gun (or chainsaw or rocket launcher) and take back what’s left of your town!

name: Carefully Stamped
summary: Craft and sell charming postcards to your customers in a relaxing sandbox full of color and creativity. Carefully Stamped is a cozy job simulator where you are a postcard designer. Take on new orders, craft the cutest mail, write a wholesome note and collect stamps to send your postcards ️

name: Car Dealership Simulator 2
summary: Take charge of the car trade with Car Dealership Simulator 2! Buy, modify, and grow your dealership with strategic sales. Every opportunity will take you closer to the top of the automotive market!

name: Caller of the Crows
summary: A horror survival game where you roam cornfields with a flamethrower, burning scarecrows to claim the land for your crows. Set everything on fire, stay one step ahead, and clear the way so your crows can enjoy the sweet corn. The scarecrows: guardians of the field, won’t go down easy.

name: Castle on Crimson Rock
summary: Build your team and vibe in this PSX-inspired dungeon crawler. First, customize your team's loadout, then see your strategy play out in real-time auto battles while you clear the grid-based map in first person. Experiment with different classes, unlock shortcuts on each floor, and reach the bottom.

name: Car Service Together
summary: Car Service Together is a 1-4 co-op & single player simulation game where you and/or with your friends start from scratch and build your way up. Work together to successfully run your own service center. Team up, manage your business, and create the ultimate car service !

name: Cameraman: The Pilot Episode
summary: Cameraman: The Pilot Episode is a psychological horror game. Manipulate time and gravity to solve puzzles in ever-changing, twisted spaces. With only a VHS camcorder, uncover dark secrets, face unseen anomalies, and navigate an uncharted dimension where reality unravels.

name: Capybara Hot Tub
summary: Become an internet star in Capybara Hot Tub by playing as a cute, fluffy streamer! Soak in a hot bath, groom your fur, and set up your studio around the capybara to gain fame!

name: Cat Home
summary: You run both a cattery and a cat café. In the morning, you take care of breeding cats at the cattery, and in the afternoon and evening, you bring the cats to manage the cat café. You can decorate your own cattery and café, and freely interact with cats of different breeds.

name: Cascada
summary: Cascade marbles and watch them plink and plonk down serene waterfall scenes in this relaxing Pachinko game for Playdate.

name: Candy Crawler
summary: Candy Crawler is a rougelite dungeon crawler where you also manage a cosy pastry shop. Journey through candy-themed realms, gather rare ingredients and craft mouth-watering desserts to sell in your cosy bakery, all while balancing the pressures of a greedy landlord constantly increasing your rent.

name: Castle Rodok
summary: Castle Rodok is an action-RPG game with heavy emphasis on adventure and PSX style retro graphics. In Castle Rodok, you create your own character from five different races, and try to survive at least 8 levels of it's procedurally generated dungeons. There are three levels which the dungeons can occur in: Wintery forest, castle dungeons and the castle itself. After the 8 levels, you have a chance to find the final bossfight...

name: Cats Visiting Wild West
summary: Explore charming Wild West scenes and find hidden cats hiding in saloons, canyons, and steam trains. Relax, search, and collect them all!

name: Cat Tricks
summary: A fun and practical guide to help you bond with your cat through 20 easy and entertaining tricks.

name: Cards n' Varmints
summary: Turn-based auto-battlin' roguelike deckbuilder with over 50 unique and unexpected unit classes. Use cards to turn the tide of battle; pick promotions for yer valiant varmints; round up a posse for maximum power, sneakiness, or just plain wackiness; and send them interlopers packin'.

name: Cattlieb
summary: Pinball meets roguelike. A mysterious adventure of strategy and luck, where the path of the ball changes the battle and board events with both risks and rewards shake the player’s choices.

name: Care of Gongon
summary:
Enter Gongon’s Daycare in search of your missing child. As the child's mother, you must explore the abandoned establishment and uncover the secrets within. But be wary, as you are not alone, and you are not safe.

Gongon and Friends:

Gongon’s Daycare is one of the best daycares in the world thanks to Gongon and Friends. They ensure that every child who attends this daycare is safe and sound, and that nobody ever feels lonely!

Gongon’s Daycare, the best daycare ever built:

Gongon’s Daycare was once an immensely popular daycare for children, filled to the brim with children from all over… until one fateful day. Everyone within the place vanished on what seemed to be a normal day, and you must find out what happened

name: Candy Crush Solitaire
summary:
Welcome to Candy Crush Solitaire, the new TriPeaks solitaire game from the creators of Candy Crush Saga.

Candy Crush Solitaire is a fun and challenging card game for players of all levels, adding a delightful twist to the classic TriPeaks solitaire experience. Join iconic Candy Crush Saga characters in a delicious journey around the world, creating a lovely postcard collection on the way. Relax and immerse yourself in Candy Crush Solitaire's beautiful graphics, animations, and design!

Discover the unique “Hold Slot” feature — set cards aside and unlock new strategies to complete tricky solitaire levels. Candy Crush Solitaire blends the best of classic TriPeaks with playful, Candy Crush Saga-inspired blockers and boosters that add just the right amount of challenge.

name: Care of Gongon: Chapter 2
summary: After the events of Chapter 1, you are stuck below the surface of Gongon's Daycare. You must continue through the dark corridors in search of your missing child. This time, however, the monsters are even more dangerous than before...

name: Calm the Storm
summary: A free narrative experiment in accessible gaming.

name: Catnip & Coffee
summary: Catnip & Coffee is a cozy idle game where you pick a cat, buy your dream café, and grow a relaxing business empire. Upgrade shops, collect items, play minigames, and chat with frogs—all while your feline friend keeps things running in the background.

name: Capote
summary:
Capote is an online card game for 2 to 6 players that mixes classic trick-taking rules with bold bets and chaotic special cards. Each match is set around a casual card table full of colorful characters—and in Capote, no win is guaranteed, and any card can flip the game.

Players bet how many tricks they think they’ll win, then play their cards round by round to hit that number exactly. If you win more or fewer tricks than you bet, you’ll take a virtual shot for each one off. Hit four shots and… you’re out. Capotado!

If the cards aren’t in your favor, don’t worry—messing with your friends is also a valid strategy. Play your special cards at the right time to twist the odds, sabotage their bets, or turn a sure win into chaos.

name: California Gold Rush 2
summary: Dig your way deep underground to seek your fortune in the exciting gold mines of 19th century California in this addicting action puzzler!

name: CarsWheels
summary: Wreck the house in some seriously mad racing!

name: CashGrab: Refunded
summary: An online co-op horror game with up to 6 players. Use fully physics-based objects and fluid movement to grab some cash and escape The Grind. Use cash to buy items and equipment and fund community goals. Create your Grabba and get rich or die trying.

name: Camp Wombo
summary: Co-op survival horror game. Four friends must gather resources and repair their vehicle while surviving deadly creatures in a constantly changing forest.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Card Unlock Vol.2 DZ-BT05 Omniscient Awakening
summary: ※This additional content is also available as part of the "Additional Card Unlock Pass." Please be aware that the content will only be applied once, so avoid duplicate purchases. ・Adds cards from 【DZ-BT05】 "Omniscient Awakening"

name: Cargogo
summary: Each time you press a key, your vehicle gains movement power. Every destination reached unlocks a new car. Whether working, studying, or gaming... every keystroke you make will help the girls unlock new maps and continue their journey. Ready to ride? Let's go!!!

name: Cataclysm: The Last Generation
summary: A post-apocalyptic roguelike set in modern-day New England. Scavenge tools to craft an arsenal capable of dealing with the ever-evolving hordes of zombies, mutants, aliens, and robots in one of the deepest survival sims around.

name: Cattopia
summary: Cattopia is an energetic momentum-based 2D platformer where you use a fishing line to swing around! Help Catto swing through many branching paths while catching fish and helping out his friends along the way.

name: Camel Keeper
summary: Embark on a delightful desert adventure in Camel Keeper, a charming Tamagotchi-inspired simulation where you become the ultimate camel caretaker!

name: Cats Hidden in Chang'an
summary: Travel back to Chang'an in the Tang Dynasty of China and find 100 hidden adorable kittens  in a captivating hand-drawn art scene. Do you want to challenge yourself?

name: Cats Away
summary: A nautical adventure featuring beautiful pirates, adorable talking cats and nail-biting sea battles, Cats Away brings real-time strategy to the high seas! Give orders to your ever-expanding cat crew and save the world from the reawakening of an ancient evil!

name: Catalyst
summary: Catalyst fuses elements of deckbuilding CCGs with roguelike action in a world ruled by 8 elemental forces. Discover hundreds of cards, evolve your strategy, and survive relentless encounters to uncover the power of the Catalyst.

name: Caves of Rigel
summary: VIC 20 collect-em-up game

name: Cascade
summary: CASCADE is a stylish first-person roguelite with a focus on blazingly fast movement. Slide from surface to surface, unlock and upgrade abilities and face otherworldly enemies and bosses, all while exploring a corrupted digital space. But don't forget: Always keep on moving!

name: Cathedral: Crow's Curse
summary: Set in the same universe as Cathedral, but with its own story and style, Cathedral: Crow's Curse is an action-adventure with tight combat and a focus on exploration. Parry, dodge and fight your way through numerous enemies in a rich detailed world as you uncover the events leading up to Cathedral.

name: Call to Arms: Panzer Elite
summary: Lead a platoon of WWII tanks in this immersive TPP and FPP game. Engage in realistic, tactical combat across historic battlefields. Play through campaign or challenge yourself in skirmish mode as either German or US forces.

name: Call of Brothers: The Backrooms Zombie Survival
Capsule Hero
summary: This is a minimalist challenge game based on a physics engine. Players control a capsule-shaped character, keep balance on a narrow wooden board, and rely on skills and patience to gradually walk out of the dark room. Every step is a challenge, and every failure will bring great frustration.

name: Cafe Nocturn
summary: Run a cafe in coastal Japan during the 90s. It's all cozy until you realize the place is cursed. Every time you go outside, a dark presence begins to hunt you, will you be brave enough to keep the cafe running and solve the curse?

name: CastleOn
summary: Build a castle! Grow economy, recruit troops from Europe and the Holy Land, man the walls and towers! Place traps and defeat attackers with arrows, wood and stone, fire, disease and cold steel! Survive the Third Crusade and conquer enemy lands in this turn-based strategy!

name: Casey Noir and Carved Pumpkin's Latte
summary: What's this? A Point and Click, "Who Done It?", Murder Mystery Visual Novel, set in a Gothic Hotel on top of a lonely hill, during the Night of Halloween?

name: Catacomb Chess
summary:
The city of Chessfield is being menaced by bloodthirsty monsters crawling out of the ancient catacombs. Together King, Queen, bishops, knights, rooks, and pawns embark to end the evil menace deep down below.

The lawful chess pieces follow the chess rules, HOWEVER THE CHAOTIC MONSTERS FIGHT WITHOUT HONOR.

name: Castlevania Harmony of Despair Unity
summary: A fanmade remake of Castlevania Harmony of Despair in the Unity engine for PC

name: Capsule Guy
summary: Capsule Guy is a challenging platforming game where you shoot lasers at things and win sometimes.

name: Cat-a-strophic
summary:
CAT-A-STROPHIC is a goofy arcade 3D city destruction game with rogue-like elements where you play as Bluu, a colossal kaiju cat, rampaging through different cities to rescue your precious kittens! Embrace the purr-fect blend of chaos and relaxation as you level multiple towns and cities.

Unleash havoc by swiping at buildings, pouncing on structures, and hurling objects with telekinesis. As the chaos unfolds, enemies will continuously spawn to capture Bluu and stop her destruction spree. Once the level is cleared, you can rescue a kitten that supercharges Bluu’s powers, enhancing her abilities with unique effects like summoning lightning storms or turning invisible. Embrace the carnage, adapt your playstyle, and lead Bluu to victory!

name: Canasta HD
summary: Make your melds in Canasta HD, the classic multiplayer online card game with retro flair.

name: Card Scramble
summary: An innovative card game like no other. Strategic board play, challenging puzzles, and a heartwarming story to restore the family diner.

name: Catharage
summary: A space tactics extraction roguelite. Explore space, pick fights, collect loot, then escape. Upgrade and unlock new ships to strengthen your fleet and face tougher foes.

name: Call of Clans: Optional Elite Card Pack
summary: A purple card gift pack for the tribe to summon. After purchasing, you can get purple quality followers in the game.

name: Call of Clans: Random Legend Card Pack
summary: A random gift pack of orange cards summoned by the tribe. After purchasing, you can get orange-quality followers in the game.

name: Casa Caballero
summary: Casa Caballero is a single-player, first-person survival horror game set in a fictional area in the Philippines.

name: Cannibals and Missionaries
summary: An old Flash Puzzle Game

name: Call of Atlantis: Treasures of Poseidon - Collector's Edition
Cadence Point
summary: Welcome to Cadence Point- Our Marketplace, Your Time. There's something on offer for every shopper with our array of vendors and store fronts, with modern facilities to take the stress out of shopping with included food court and welcome centre should you need a helping hand...

name: Candylands Journey
summary: There is a trouble at the Magic University. The heart of magic has been stolen by Pastry Witches. Adventure across on a journey through a beautiful world drawn in pixel art style, buy magic wands, collect jewels and fight monsters to return the Magic Crystal.

name: Cat Gunner
summary: Claw your way through 5 action-packed worlds in this fast-paced 2D platformer-shooter! Upgrade your feline hero, battle bosses, and unlock minigames like Coconut Catch and Ice Climb. Master every level and top the leaderboards!

name: Castaway Trails
summary: Explore, fight, and survive in a turn-based RPG with resource management and emotionally evolving characters throughout the journey.

name: Cats Visiting the Cinema
summary:
It’s movie night, and the cats are out!
Find all the hidden kitties in lively cinema settings — from popcorn stands to cosy theatre seats and movies with cats.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Police DLC
summary: The Police DLC for Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 adds 6 police cars inspired by real models, unique liveries – no new missions or glowing police lights.

name: Cake Sort
summary: A challenging and relaxing game to exercise your brain! Sort cakes and pies now to relax after a stressful day!

name: Cageling
summary: Here, you are just a 'player' trapped in the game world. Faced with various challenges from 'developers', do you want to be willing to be a bird in a cage or choose to break the rules and escape from this game world.

name: Cartoon Survivor
summary: Survive the wildest adventure of your life in Cartoon Survivor! Run, jump, and glide through a vibrant prehistoric world filled with dangerous creatures and crazy obstacles. Can you outlast the chaos and save the show? It’s time to prove you’ve got what it takes!

name: Carnage Cliff
summary: In this battle game you won't shoot a single bullet. Your job will be to heal your teammates and upgrade them so that together you reach the end of a level and rescue a captured general.A great game to spend a couple of minutes on every day.

name: Catacomb 3-D
summary: Amiga Homebrew release of "Catacomb 3-D".

name: Cat's Showdown
summary: A casual card battle game where mischievous cat brothers fight using poker-based rules. Designed for quick and fun singleplayer matches.

name: Capybara and Friends Cozy Bundle
summary: Meet the adorable capybara and all her friends!

name: Calice
summary: Calice is a card strategy deck building game. It's a game in which Alice who falls into a strange country escapes from a strange country with the help of various people. It is a game that uses various cards to defeat enemies and experience various events in the process of escaping.

name: Cactus
summary: Welcome to Cactus, an addictive clicker game where every click on a cactus icon can bring random items for your collection! Unlock achievements and contribute your ideas via our Discord. Join us and become part of the Cactus world!

name: Care for your Horse
summary: The scrawny, flimsy, pathetic thistles of your brush glide through the horse's black hair. They're weak, but plentiful enough to make a difference. This horse requires your care, more than you think relies on it.

name: Cat Summoner: Block Puzzle
summary: A thoughtful puzzle game with 135 stages, where clever ideas open the path. Move ice blocks with the help of adorable cats and solve each puzzle at your own pace.

name: Case Blind: Stolen Route
summary: A horror game about escaping from a mysterious place after a chilling encounter in the woods. Explore, stay quiet, and make tough choices as you search for a way out.

name: Capitalist Misadventures
summary: Get ready for a bizarre capitalist challenge in this labor exploitation simulator, where your goal is to turn your tiny shack into a mega-corporation with megalomaniac capital. Hire beggars, stray kittens, and even TikTokers—and monetize their services!

name: Captain Toad: Prism Star Quest
summary: Captain Toad: Prism Star Quest is a new fanmade adventure starring Captain Toad, carrying over the gameplay mechanics of Super Mario 3D World's Captain Toad levels and Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker into a completely 2D setting, with new gimmicks, levels and bosses to boot!

name: Can I Buy You a Cheeseburger?
summary: "Can I Buy You A Cheeseburger?" is a reality-bending puzzle game. Explore a fractured mindscape, solve subconscious riddles, and experience surreal storytelling through figurative expressionism. Uncover hidden truths and reconstruct your reality.

name: Castle Hearts
summary: As the lord and commander of your village, you'll defend it from incoming enemies, grow your buildings, and train soldiers. Engage in events triggered by conversations with NPCs in your village, acquire diverse heroes, and unify the continent.

name: Cave of the Skinwalker
summary: Journey through Elsana as a wizard, warrior, and archer in this fantasy 2D top down action-adventure game. Explore diverse environments, fight enemies, solve puzzles, and save the many regions of the world from hidden dangers. Can you discover the secrets of the Cave of the Skinwalker?

name: Cat Hostel
summary: Open a cat hotel where you can pet cats!

name: Candy Trail
summary: Sweet Paths, Big Challenges

name: Cat God Ranch:​​ Age of Dinosaurs​
summary:
First DLC for Cat God Ranch: Age of Dinosaurs​​ includes:
9 difficulty-tiered rainforest maps
20+ new dinosaur family animals
20+ brand new items
2 new Cat Gods
10+ new achievements
One-click unlock all content feature
Leaderboard reset
And much more!

name: Can you clear up to 100 stages?
summary: Don't be fooled by the cute appearance. This game ruthlessly tests your reflexes, concentration, and patience. Jump, dodge, and try again. How far can you go?

name: Car For Sale Simulator 2023: PickUp & SUV
Capture Catcoffee
summary: You will play the role of a cat cafe operator and go through the mysterious door to adventure in the cat kingdom. You can meet various cats, defeat them and hire them as your own cat employees! Bring your own cat, build your own cat cafe, and enjoy delicious food from another world!

name: Car Factory Empire
summary: Create a car company from scratch! Go from the first mechanical carriages to luxurious racing cars! Design cars, sell them, participate in races, expand your company and lead it to market dominance!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Taxi DLC
summary:
Available Models in the Taxi DLC:
Liner Navigator – an American street legend and an enduring symbol of New York taxis.
CAB Roamer – a classic British taxi with iconic styling and unmatched maneuverability.
Olsen Pramie Club – a luxurious German taxi that combines elegance with reliability.
Lacroix Marseille – available in two versions: classic French model with sleek lines and a comfortable interior, perfect for city streets and a unique special edition!
Sakura Tiara– an icon of Japanese taxis, celebrated for its dependability and comfort.
Bolt Escapade Mk IV – a popular choice in the USA, known for its spaciousness and comfortable ride.

DLC also includes a selection of 8 customizable taxi roof lights for you to choose from! Select from a range of modern and classic styles inspired by different regions around the world, including the USA, Germany, the UK, Japan and France.
Tailor each taxi to suit your style and bring a touch of international flair!

name: Cats Ritual
summary: Lights out - cats out! Catch them before it's too late!

name: Cats & Cups
summary: Play as a barista in a cat-inspired coffee shop, where your customers are cats! Brew coffee and various drinks. Wholesome and cozy hand-drawn art, various mini-games and a lot of cats & coffee! Learn to craft complex orders, keep your catstomers happy.

name: Cats Go!
summary: Cats Go! is a defense game blending strategy, cooperation, and direct combat. Grow mutant plants to protect your village! Whether you prefer to play solo as a brave defender or team up with friends online. Not feeling cooperative? Slip into the role of a devil cat and secretly sabotage the village!

name: Car Drift Racing Game Pro
summary: Drift hard race fast rule the streets Unlock pro cars master every corner Experience drifting at its finest

name: Casualties: Unknown
summary:
Descend into the depths of the Target Planet's cave network to retrieve a critical piece of cargo, encountering many horrifying obstacles and problems on the way, to your character's dismay. Survival chances are near 0%—expect to die a lot along the way.

Caution and patience are greatly rewarded in the depths. Any mistake can spiral into an ugly, permanent death.

name: Carnaval Marbles
summary: A tactical billiards roguelike inspired by French carom. Activate magical balls, tweak the rules by choosing talismans, and chase ever-higher scores. Each round is a challenge of physics and strategy. Find the balance between skill and luck…

name: Cauldron Chaos
summary: Your master’s gone. You’re in charge. What could go wrong? Brew potions, bottle them up, and desperately try to keep magical customers happy while chaos rains down every other day. Stir fast. Don’t explode. You’ve got 14 days to not burn the place down.

name: Cat Got Your Tongue
summary: Cat Got Your Tongue is a vertical platformer where you play a mischievous black cat, jumping and attacking across a tongue to stop the protagonist from speaking, with quirky art, playful interactions, and fast-paced, challenging yet casual gameplay.

name: Cards of Fortune
summary: A co-op rogue-like where strategy and chaos meet ! Battle monsters and gods in a magical universe, upgrade your deck, and survive hellish rooms in this tactical multiplayer bullet hell.

name: Captain Firat
summary: The world is a vast, beautiful and dangerous place, especially if you're stranded on an island full of cursed skeletons. Find ways to escape from this island together with the villagers on the island.

name: Catatonic Game
summary: Catatonic Game is a hand-drawn, 1930s-inspired puzzle-platformer adventure set in the mysterious New Marilyn City. Developed by a passionate indie team of four cousins from Bahrain under the company Fred Da Dead Productions, the game explores a world of anthropomorphic animals, hidden secrets, and surreal environments. Players will follow Katrina, a lost cat, as she embarks on a pacifist quest to uncover her true identity and return to her reality, solving puzzles and interacting with eccentric characters along the way.

name: Cake or Bomb?
summary: Cake or Bomb? is an Adobe Flash game available from the official Mario Party 6 website. The game acts as a simplified version of the minigame Strawberry Shortfuse.

name: Carpool: Attack of the Disco Mob
summary: Disco-ver an alien mothership from the disco era! Drive your carpool past cops, blast through barriers, and save Earth from evil dancing invaders!

name: Castella
summary: Castella is a Tower Defense Rogue-like, where you will build a fortress to defend yourself from hordes of monsters besieging your castle. During the game you will unlock and upgrade towers and buildings. You will build walls to block the path and defend your resources and town hall.

name: Cardamom
summary: Cardamom is a visual novel set in a Broadway musical. Play as a cartoon cat and befriend the cat loving residents of the building. Make decisions and listen to their outcomes in song.

name: Cazzarion: Raccoon Valley
summary: "Cazzarion: Raccoon Valley" is a relaxing nature adventure where you play as a curious raccoon exploring a lush valley filled with rivers, a serene lake, dense trees, and open meadows. Roam freely through the landscape in search of tasty critters like snails, worms, frogs, and more. With no enemies, it's all about foraging, exploring, and enjoying the peaceful rhythm of the wild.

name: Calc+-
summary: Calc+- is a fun and brain-teasing puzzle game where you work with numbers. Each level gives you a set of number blocks. Using your controller, you can add, subtract, multiply, or divide them. Your goal? Make the final number match the target number. The more levels you beat, the harder it gets. How far can your brain take you?

name: Cards and Castles Ultimate
summary: Collectible cards meets tactical strategy! Build decks, uncover crazy combos, and battle friends and rivals in TACTICAL CARD-BOARD COMBAT. Bring your cards to life and dominate the grid!

name: Captain Puff MacFly
summary: Shmup Roguelite – Dodge Hell, Power Up, Repeat, Conquer Netunia’s Sky with Captain Puff MacFly!

name: Can't Even See the Sky
summary: Your character is a man with a troubled past who finds himself trapped in a city on the brink of civil war. Look for ways to get out of the city and make peace with the past. Will you pull yourself together or drown in the abyss of despair?

name: Castle Forbidden
summary: You came to explore an old castle with your friends. But you ended up trapped inside alone. In this horror game, you must explore the shadows, hide from paranormal creatures, and solve strange puzzles as you search for your friends. Unravel the castle's sinister past and escape…before it's too late.

name: Caretaker
summary: Tasked with investigating mysterious disappearances of local children, you are pulled into another world. In this horror/puzzle game, work your way through a mysterious playland dimension using toys to navigate and solve puzzles to uncover secrets. Be careful, something might be waiting for you...

name: Camp Life: Wilderness Survival 2025
summary: Survive the wild, enjoy the quiet, fear the squirrels.

name: Car Tycoon
summary: Welcome to "Car Tycoon", running your car company, hire employees to develop and produce cars, sell your cars, and become the best car company!

name: Car Racing & Driving Bundle: Drag Racing, Highway Racer, Drift Japan, Toon Cars
Cargo: Co-Op Delivery Simulator in Post Apocalyptic World
summary: The world as we know it has ended. In this post-apocalyptic offroad sim, you're the last lifeline between the scattered remains of civilization. Embark on deliveries, brave hostile terrain, fight raiders, and build your own settlement, solo or with friends in co-op. People of Wasteland need you.
