name: Cannoneer
summary: Bang bang! Cannoneer puts you in control of massive cannons, blasting thru several campaigns of fully destructible environments! VR and Flatscreen supported, as well as full crossplay between Meta Quest and Android Mobile users.

name: Cave Diver
summary: Based on the board game Diamant. The name of the game is to find as many diamonds in the cave as you can, but be careful! Traps are in the cave as well, getting two of any trap will end your game and you'll lose all your diamonds.

name: Cauldron Forager
summary: Step into the pixelated woods in this retro-inspired arcade adventure where you play as the Witch of the Forest. Collect magical ingredients, battle enemies with fiery spells, and brew the potion throughout endless levels. Simple, nostalgic, and endlessly replayable - perfect for fans of classic 80’s arcade fun!

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 3
summary: Season Three, stylized as S03, is the third batch of post-launch content for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 that was released on April 2nd, 2025 and ended on May 29th, 2025.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 4
summary: Season Four, stylized as S04, is the fourth batch of post-launch content for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 that was released on May 29th, 2025 and ended on August 7th, 2025.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 5
summary: Season Five, stylized as S05, is the fifth batch of post-launch content for Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 that was released on August 7th, 2025.

name: Cardio
summary: Cardio is a roguelike card game that challenges you to push your limits! In this strategic game, each run is a new adventure where you earn powerful cards and valuable currency.

name: Catolonizer
summary: Catolonizer is an online social deduction game for up to 15 players. Complete tasks to earn coins, buy items from the Merchant, and use your secret ability at night. Outsmart the others and fulfill your unique win condition!

name: Cat With Gun
summary: A top down 2D game about a cat who kills starfish with a gun.

name: Call of Thief
summary: An arcade action plateforme game

name: Cards Mod Prime
summary: Multiplayer math-inspired card game. Basic understanding of modular multiplication is advised.

name: Catharsis
summary: Take the role of an unnamed scientist and make your attempt to escape from the Black Mesa incident.

name: Can't buy me love!
summary:
November 1963, a turbulent time for the United Kingdom and the world itself. Four Mop Top lads from Liverpool, in their full digital glory, just waiting to make your acquaintance!

Lots of historical fun facts, era accurate sets and sprites, japes, blatant disrespect and MORE! Can YOU get all four endings?

name: Cat Clinic Simulator: Vet Hospital
summary: Love and care for every pet.

name: Calamity
summary: The world’s first hyper clicker game with challenging controls. An ambitious solo-developed title packed with strategy and boss battles! Challenge yourself with infinite leveling and extreme difficulty!

name: Car Tuning Garage Simulator
summary: Build your dream garage, customize every detail, and tune high-performance machines. Restore classics, fulfill client orders, and race your creations on streets and tracks. Car Tuning Simulator is your ultimate playground for creativity and car culture.

name: Castlevania II English Re-Translation (+Map)
summary:
This is a re-translation of Castlevania II: Simon's Quest. The author took special care to convey the meaning from the original Japanese text in this new version, having the script make sense but also remain loyal to the intentions of the source.

There is also a map available and other QoL improvements.

name: Cats of the Yuan Dynasty
summary: Embark on a relaxing search for hidden cats in the majestic ancient scroll Autumn Hunting in the Plains of the Yuan Dynasty!

name: Castle Travel
summary: Castle Travel is a challenging pixelated 2D platformer in which you'll have to pass levels that become increasingly difficult and varied. Will you make it to the end? How will this adventure end?

name: Caw Across Time
summary: Ring ring, it's your future cawing! You play as a curious crow attempting to solve the mystery of a strange ancient clocktower. Request items from your future self to solve puzzles, but be sure to close each time loop to maintain the law of caw-sality.

name: Cadmium Red
summary: You're stuck in some kind of facility, and you don't remember anything. Your goal is to figure out what's going on.

name: Canvas: The Board Game
summary: Create stunning paintings, layer cards strategically, and score ribbons in Canvas - a digital board game where art meets strategy. Choose and combine Art Cards to create beautiful paintings and enjoy a mix of artistic expression and tactical gameplay.

name: Cards of the Abyss
summary: Cards of the Abyss is a movement based roguelike deckbuilder between Slay the Spire and Dofus. Move on a grid, dodge enemy attacks, and unleash explosive card combos to explore the Abyss and uncover the secrets of a lost civilization.

name: Cascadou
summary: A satisfying solitaire roguelike where you find and create cascading, exploding poker hands. Stickers, special cards and badges turn your deck into a rule-breaking machine. Will your deck crumble, or cascade to victory?

name: Card World
summary: Card World is a card game entirely under your control. You can adventure in this card world, create new cards, new themes, new BGM, new backgrounds, and even make a completely new game.

name: Casino Casualty
summary:
Welcome to the Crimson Casino.

You are the owner and manager of the Crimson Casino, a place once popular for its advanced robotic entertainment and high-tech games; now, feared for it, following an incident in which patrons were brutally attacked by the robotic workers. This incident has forever tainted the Crimson Casino's name, and its doors are set to close for good at the end of the day. After seeing the last of your patrons out, you lock the doors, only to be struck in the back of the head.

You wake up around an hour later, surrounded by your robotic employees. You've been locked in, and you're being forced to earn your way out using the games that you rigged.

name: Cause to Exist
summary: Cause to Exist is a Narrative First-person Combat Platformer set in the mindscape of Yuno. Traverse and fight your way through Yuno’s anxieties, fears, and insecurities in this corrupted and organic environment as you uncover her heartbreaking story.

name: Calamity Black Dragon and the Princess of Lies
summary:
This is the tale of a human princess who teaches a powerful and cold-hearted black dragon the meaning of "love".

In this world of swords and magic, the God of Creation had left behind a prophecy:
"This year, the dragon of darkness will capture the princess of the kingdom and perform a blood sacrifice in three years."

As the king's illegitimate daughter, you were chosen as the scapegoat, forced into the role of princess in this time of crisis.

For three years, the evil dragon and the human criminal live together. Will the princess be able to warm the dragon's heart and bring a ray of hope for herself?

Friendship, affection, important people. Danger, conflict, dragons and humans.

The optimistic, strong-willed, and lively Princess Sacrifice;
With the lonely, cold and powerful Dragon of Calamity—destined to exist in solitude.
Between the cheerful and radiant older sister x the lonely and paralysed black dragon, an absurd yet extraordinary life unfolds! This winter shall no longer be cold!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Complete Playset 05 "D-BT⑤"
summary:
A set of four copies each of C,R,RR and RRR rarities. The acquired cards will be added to your collection.
Note: Any cards exceeding the possession limit will be converted to CP.

・D-BT01 ""Genesis of the Five Greats""
・D-BT02 ""A Brush with the Legends""
・D-BT03 ""Advance of Intertwined Stars""
・D-BT04 ""Awakening of Chakrabarthi""
・D-BT05 ""Triumphant Return of the Brave,Heroes""

name: CatPuncher
summary: CrazyCatPunchGame

name: Cats and Seek: Zoo
summary: Let’s roam the zoo, meet the animals, and spot those sneaky cats hiding among them.

name: Cats vs. Dogs
summary: Run, jump, and claw your way to victory in the ultimate battle of cats vs dogs

name: Cash Laundry Simulator
summary: Turn stacks of chaos into spotless profit. Count it, clean it, cash it out.

name: Cassette Beasts: Wing Pack
summary:
Take flight in the new Wings Pack cosmetic items for Cassette Beasts! This pack include 8 new fanciful wing skins to have you looking your best in the skies of New Wirral.

This Fashion Pack includes the following wing skins:

- Jetpack #1
- Jetpack #2
- Boosters
- Da Vinci
- Fairy
- Devil
- Glider
- Cape

name: Cassette Beasts: Fashion Pack
summary:
For those looking to impress, we introduce the Fashion Pack! Including 14 new outfits and hairstyles to level up your fit, this cosmetic DLC will have you looking slick in New Wirral!

This Fashion Pack includes:
• Baseball Cap
• Flat Cap
• Twin Tails
• Bow & Bangs
• Foxy Cut
• Windswept
• Spikes & Goggles
• Swept Mohawk
• Flower & Fringe
• Beret
• Round Specs
• Trench Coat
• Crop Top
• Tall Boots

name: Capital Cities Trivia
summary: See if you can name the capital city of every country in the world! Choose from the most popular geographical categories including Europe, North America, The 50 States, and World Capitals.

name: Catch Sunlight Museum
summary: High-class virtual museum where every piece of art is given the space and respect it deserves.

name: Card Artisan
summary: Card Artisan is a card battler with RPG and roguelike elements and an emphasis in random generation that allows you to not only create your own deck but also create and use your own custom cards!

name: Catto Boi Collection
summary: Play as Catto Boi, a small, cute cat who slowly begins to realise that the world he lives in is more sick and twisted than it seems to be on the surface. The choices you make will matter in the end... right?

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Winter Vehicle Cosmetics Pack
summary: Jazz up the winter season with a frosty new collection of vehicle cosmetics, available for free for all players. Happy holidays from the team at Expansive Worlds!

name: Catto Chateau
summary: An exploration based platformer where you can explore a Chateau full of a variety of unique levels. Find upgrades, spells and save your new friends who have become twisted by The Dutchess's curse!

name: Calico
summary: Leap, climb, and explore as a nimble cat in a tough yet charming platformer. With tight controls, handcrafted pixel art levels, and simple mechanics, this game offers a pure platforming challenge across 60+ colorful stages — no fluff, just gameplay and discovery.

name: Cat's Rage
summary:
Have you ever wondered what it would be like to become a little cat chasing a ball of yarn in a dream?

Now you can experience it for yourself.
In this maddening journey, you control a determined little cat, pushing the yarn all the way up toward the clouds. Sounds simple, right? Wrong. Every step is a struggle, every collision matters, and even the smallest mistake will send the yarn rolling back to the starting point. The only things you can rely on are your paws—left, right, or both together.

You’ll need to traverse semi-realistic, complex paths: squeeze through narrow obstacles, balance on constantly shifting terrain, and struggle in the water, where controlling the cat becomes nearly impossible. Though there are safe zones in each stage, reaching them is a battle of its own.

name: Captain Commander's Conquest
summary: Players take on the role of the titular Captain Commander, piloting a spaceship to combat hordes of enemy ships in SHMUP mode. When boarding or being boarded, the gameplay shifts to FPS mode, where players must defend against or take over enemy vessels.

name: Candlelight
summary: Candlelight is a puzzle game where each shape you place onto the grid inverts the color of the space it occupies. Every inversion offers the opportunity to alchemize a gem and advance.

name: Calmie Dots
summary: Calmie Dots is a new take on the classic puzzle game. Relax, don't rush anywhere and just put all the spheres in the right places to pleasant, relaxing music!

name: Car Stunt Hero Simulator 2025
summary: Race, jump, and become the ultimate stunt legend!

name: Capoeira Origins
summary: Capoeira Origins is an action-adventure experience set in colonial Brazil during the period of slavery. Experience history from the perspective of those who resisted, taking on the role of capoeiristas determined to fight for freedom, justice, and survival.

name: Cat Karting
summary: Now you are a catloaf and you are racing along the track.

name: Cattle Admission Challenge
summary: The year is 2087, the Technotron rules the world. All biological creatures have been exiled to the wasteland. In a remote section of the Grasslandia border Sentry 49-42 must protect the zone from bovine scourge! The sacred grass must be protected. All moo cows must be exterminated.

name: Casting Clicker
summary: Build your own casting empire! Interview unique anime-style girls, view their spicy uncensored photos, and shoot stylish films. Manage your studio, follow trends, and grow your fame. Flirty, strategic, and full of personality — no pressure, just pleasure.

name: Cave of Gurg
summary: "Dark. Silent. Waiting." This is a text-based, turn-based strategy mini-game that runs on the command line. You play as a hunter exploring a mysterious cave in pursuit of the terrifying, man-eating creature known as the "Gurg."

name: Call of Hentai Neko
summary: Dive into a unique puzzle game where your goal is to match pairs of images to unveil the full picture. Experience the satisfaction of completing each lewd puzzle and unlocking stunning visuals. Call of Hentai Neko offers a leisurely and rewarding match-two game experience.

name: Cardygon
summary: Cardygon is a 100% single-player strategic deckbuilder. Collect 80+ cards from the Batpolygon universe crossover. Devise powerful strategies, customize your profile, and build the ultimate deck!

name: Cave No. 6
summary: Cave 6 "is a pixel style 2D action adventure game where you will freely explore dangerous underground caves, engage in battles with monsters, collect materials and clues, and find the true way out of the legendary cave world.

name: Castle of Lust: Hentai Fantasy Game
summary:
An Evil Spirit has invaded the biggest Guild House of the Kingdom, killing everyone who tried to stop it. Now it's up to a young warrior to find out what happened to the Heroes.

In a castle with 6 different types of room, each one with a unique hero, complete the levels to unlock adults uncensored scenes.

name: Catatattack!
summary: A High Octane Side Scrolling Beat-Em-Up in Development! By Cats, For Cats!

name: Caverns and Dryads
summary: Guide Tamzyn, the dryad warrioress —deadly and beautiful— and Sioul, the wizard —tenacious and powerful— to explore together forgotten cities of mysterious beauty and dungeons filled with dangerous monsters. Action, magic, and romance!

name: Cargo Shop Simulator
summary: Discover the excitement of commerce with Cargo Shop Simulator! Manage your own cargo shop and grow by meeting customer demands. In the evening, load your shipments onto vehicles and plan deliveries to build a successful business empire. Are you ready?

name: Campus Legends College Basketball
summary: Experience the ultimate college basketball management game. Take charge as a coach, recruit top talent, develop your team, and compete for national championships. Manage one of 192 teams (or up to 384 when using custom leagues), making strategic decisions to build your basketball dynasty

name: Cat & Capy
summary: Cat & Capy is a heartwarming 3D platformer where you play as the cat and capybara from the viral Matato Games video series on TikTok and Instagram. Embark on an adventurous journey to rescue dogs, explore diverse worlds, and battle the nefarious bird army!

name: CastleGuard
summary: CastleGuard is a independent FPS game. The objective if you accept it is to pass cities and country sides full of enemies ready to kill you at any moments. If you die, you restart. Good luck soldier !

name: .Cat 2
summary: The renowned game .cat returns, completely reimagined in this reboot edition.

name: Cave Ghost
summary: A dark and eerie basement holds hidden fruits that grant power, but also ghosts that test your skills. There is no ultimate winner, only a constant struggle for survival against the ghosts and the basement's secrets.

name: Cauldron Chaos
summary: Cauldron Chaos is a multiplayer party game where you control a jelly-boned wizard in chaotic deathmatches. Use magic wands, explosive potions, and quick thinking to outlast your opponents and claim the crown as the ultimate wizard!

name: Catch Royale
summary: Remember playing tag? We spiced it up a little bit: Immerse yourself in Catch Royale: A stylized free-to-play Battle-Royale game with up to 250 players.

name: Cats Visiting El Dorado
summary: Discover El Dorado’s golden wonders while finding hidden cats in relaxing, hand-drawn scenes.

name: Cat Island Petrichor
summary: "Cat Island Petricolor" is an exploration adventure game set on Japan's summer "Cat Island." Become a cat, explore the island, and uncover the mysteries of Cat Island together with the heroine!

name: CarX Drift Racing Online 2
summary: A drifting simulator featuring an authentic competition format and a judging system inspired by modern drift championships. Enhanced and updated physics, developed in collaboration with the CarX Motorsport team.

name: Cat Girl Survivor 2: Beyond the Veil
summary: Demon invasion has shattered the dimensions, filling the world with corrupted souls. Cat girls with unique stories unite through friendship to restore balance by purifying souls and facing fierce bosses. An exciting and adorable side-scrolling action adventure!

name: Catio Simulator
summary: Catio Simulator is a relaxing idle game in which you decorate a catio to attract cats. Pet your cats to get them ready for adoption, collect adoption fees, and buy new decorations and petting abilities!

name: Card Cultivation
summary: Card Cultivation is a card management game that visualizes the process of cultivating immortality through cards. In the game, you will play as a cultivation practitioner: cultivate techniques, explore treasures, and craft weapons, Throughout re-cultivation, you will recover memory.

name: Captain Corgi: Planetary Problem Solver
summary: Mr Wolf is up to no good and Lil Red might be in trouble! It's up to Captain Corgi to investigate and figure out what's really going on.

name: Cat's Wars
summary: Cat's Wars is a turn-based cooperative third-person tactical game. Choose one of the sides, the Kotnaz or the Koterists, and prove who the real cat is.

name: Carpieces
summary:
"Carpieces is a fun and quirky arcade game where you control a tiny car that grows over time. The bigger you get, the more points you earn!

Crash into smaller trees to split your car in two and keep going — each new piece keeps scoring! But be careful: hit a tree that's bigger than you, and it's game over.

How far can you go before the forest stops you?"

name: Capybara Village
summary: A cozy little game with capybaras, set in a Japanese village.

name: Capybara Achievement Clicker
summary: Capybara Achievement Clicker is a simple incremental and idle game. It features over a hundred easy-to-acquire achievements and a Capybara to click on.

name: Call to Arms: Panzer Elite - Deluxe Edition
summary: Step into the battlefields of 1944 with a new set of missions and iconic German camouflage. The Deluxe Edition expands your experience with three missions and three exclusive tank skins.

name: Castle Dark
summary: Brand Warcford must track down the evil force plaguing the land in this single player ACTION RPG.

name: Camilla
summary: Pac-Man-type running simulation Camilla is the story of a girl who confronts fear. Check the number of acquired goods for clearance for each stage and acquire all the goods and move on to the next stage. You can clear all the stages consisting of three stages and check the final ending.

name: Casino Roulette: Roulettist
summary: Test your luck! Play casino roulette with stunning, realistic 3D graphics! Feel the risk as you dive into the casino atmosphere and hit the big time!

name: Captain America GG2SMS
summary: Captain America GG2SMS refers to a hack that converts the Sega Game Gear (GG) game Captain America and The Avengers to run on the Sega Master System (SMS).

name: Caveman Caravan
summary: A land bridge has appeared that leads to a new land! Guide a caravan of cavemen on a journey to a new continent by using map tiles and invented tools together in powerful combinations to collect resources that help them to survive.

name: Cat Sudoku
summary: Cat Sudoku is an extremely cute game where you play a little sudoku with cats.

name: Card Heroes of Millford
summary: A roguelike deck-building RPG where you battle the creatures of the Millford Woods in strategic card combat. Level up your character gaining strength and new ability cards for your deck. Discovering new creatures and ultimately freeing the village of Millford.

name: Carambola
summary: A VR educational puzzle game where players explore constellations from different cultures, solve escape room-style riddles, and apply real-world knowledge to progress. Designed to promote cultural awareness through immersive, hands-on learning.

name: Castle Siege
summary: An army of knights clashes to reclaim their stolen kingdom, fearing their enemy has made a terrible discovery. Immerse yourself into thrilling, action-packed medieval warfare, set in a breathtakingly epic world!

name: Cactus Simulator Remake
summary: Cactus Simulator Remake is a game in which you can become a cactus.

name: Case 42: The Redwood Files
summary: A Narrative Horror Adventure game where you play as a Detective and unravel the bizarre mysteries of a seemingly Ordinary Hilly Town.

name: Carcassonne
summary: Master strategy in the medieval world! In the classic board game Carcassonne, the medieval countryside thrives as you and your opponents place tiles and complete towns, roads, and farms while competing to amass the most points. Own the largest towns, longest roads, and biggest farms.

name: Case No.1: Rose Academy
summary: Rose Academy is a detective visual novel about a young special agent sent to an elite girls' school to investigate the mysterious death of one of its top students. As you uncover the dark secrets hidden behind the academy’s flawless facade, you'll be drawn into a world of intrigue, temptation, and romance.

name: Castle Solitaire
summary:
Castle Solitaire is a free and fun new card game from MobilityWare, the maker of all your favorite solitaire games. In this fast and easy to learn game, you can build your castles and fly your banner high!

To win at Castle Solitaire, fill the four castles from Ace to King. Tap to arrange cards of the same suit in descending order below the castles. If you get stuck, just tap the stockpile to reveal more cards to use. Castle Solitaire is similar to Vanishing Cross or King’s Corner, but with it’s own special twist.

name: Candy Harvest Blast
summary:
Play Candy Harvest Blast today – the mobile puzzle game where you can satisfy your sweet tooth while using your green thumb! Solve fun puzzles to grow and harvest your candy farm.

Get your sugar fix through hundreds of fun levels! You are in for a treat! Dive into the candy farm puzzles by beating levels and unlocking rewards to expand your farm. You will begin your journey at the farm and use different boosters to earn stars, which go towards unlocking rewards and new farm locations.

Candy Harvest Blast is a perfect fit for fans who enjoy match 3, merge, and blast puzzle games. Not to mention all the gorgeous, sweet landscapes you can visit to relax yourself! Join us for this delightful game, Candy Harvest Blast, and satisfy your sweet tooth!

name: Cannabis Shop Simulator
summary: Step into the budding world of entrepreneurship with Cannabis Shop Simulator, the ultimate business management game where your dreams of running a thriving cannabis shop become reality. From a humble start to dominating the green market, every decision you make will shape the future of your empire.

name: Canal Street Goblin
summary: In this interactive narrative, you (a goblin custodian) fix up the neighborhood, help solve eccentric neighbors' problems, and uncover a dark and dangerous mystery, all while untangling the occasional drag & drop image puzzle!

name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare + Destiny - The Collection
Cavesleeper
summary:
Cavesleeper is a short survival horror game where you are stuck on a lift, trying to reach the surface, while dealing with the monsters that are roaming inside.

It is known that the sleepy monster hates lights, that's why you have a Flare Gun at your disposal to scare the monster away in case of an emergency.

It is also believed the monster dislikes eye contact, so if possible, try staring down the tunnel you believe the monster is hiding inside, however this may only get you so far, so hope that the monster won't get too upset.

It is also worth noting that in case the lift system crashes for any reason and needs to be restarted, the computer may or may not occasionally require manual intervention.

name: Cat Isle
summary: Cat Isle is a cozy pixel art management game inspired by Japan’s famous Cat Islands. You’ll build and expand a tiny train platform island in the middle of the sea, turning it into lively town for cats. Decorate each building with unique and cozy elements and upgrade it to boost your residents happiness. Manage shops, restaurants, and vending machines, optimizing your offerings to match each cat’s unique tastes and preferences

name: Campfire of Oasis 2
summary: The desert night is calm, the fire flickers, and your loyal dog is by your side. In Campfire Oasis 2, you embark on a cozy adventure. Your companion searches the surroundings for wood, and you gather what is found. Every bundle strengthens the fire at the heart of your camp, turning a quiet night into a safe haven of warmth.

name: Cardboard Battle Tanks: Desk Division
summary: Battle your friends in thrilling, top-down, cardboard tank-on-tank combat! Annihilate your friends with sick bank-shots, dominate the battlefield with a tank loadout tailored to your playstyle, and unlock new parts to expand your arsenal! With Steam Workshop support, theres so many maps to play!

name: Carteado
summary: Defeat monsters and climb the floors! Carteado is a casual top-down roguelite where you use your cards to defeat enemies while building your deck and unlocking new cards!

name: Casino Mega Collection
summary: Casino Mega Collection features 60+ casino table games and video slot variations.

name: Castle Climb Obby
summary: Can you conquer the castle?

name: Cats vs. Rats
summary: A chaotic roguelite bullet hell where you play as a cute turret-wielding cat blasting through waves of villainous rats. Choose your turret, grab powerful loot, level up, and build devastating combos to survive escalating swarms

name: Carnedge
summary: Carnedge is a dark fantasy RPG where you drag the Eternal Flame across a dying world. Build deadly decks, summon weird allies, and fight through twisted dungeons full of enemies that hate your guts and watch chaos unfold!

name: Car Dealer Simulator: Up 2 You DLC
summary: With the Up 2 You DLC, Car Dealer Simulator lets you fully customize your dealership, cars, and brand. Design interiors, tune cars, attract new clients with new Photo Mode, and even race your own ride in illegal street races.

name: Call of Duty Frontlines
summary:
3 times Winner as the Best COD mod in the World. It is simply the biggest and most complete FPS game ever made in the history of gaming, there is nothing out there that comes close to the diversity of Frontlines. To give you an idea, if you were to add up all the Call of Duty titles ever released into a single game, it wouldn’t even reach 30% of the vast features of Frontlines.

These features include hundreds of new innovative ideas not only limited to gameplay, but also to server management, such as 52 different basic game types and a smart server capable of performing live actions in real time, as a real admin was there at all times.

name: Cage Me Not
summary: Cage Me Not is a 3D brawler beat'em up where boundaries are meant to be broken! Use your unique ability to phase through everything and make objects traversable, unleashing thrilling combat and creative strategies in every battle.

name: Cats & Cakes: The Card Game
summary: Cats & Cakes: The Card Game is a cozy card-stacking bakery sim where you bake pastries, serve eccentric feline customers, and manage the chaos of your shop in real time. Build fame, decorate your bakery shop!

name: Cat Doctor
summary: Run your very own animal hospital and treat adorable, sick, and dirty cats. Give medicine, wash muddy paws, and make sure every furry friend leaves with a smile. Upgrade your clinic with new beds, helpful staff, and other improvements as you earn coins from happy patients. The more you grow, the more cats you can help!

name: Calling Depths
summary: A short horror game where you pilot a submarine to collect samples on the crushing depths of the ocean.

name: Caverna
summary: Caverna is the digital adaptation of the board game of the same name created by Uwe Rosenberg developed by "Lookout Games". It can be played with 1-7 players.

name: Campsite Hustle
summary: Build your own outdoor store and campground in the heart of Red Shore Valley. Set up your shelves, manage your stock, expand your campsite, and take care of every guest. From humble beginnings to a thriving business all in the middle of nature!

name: Casanova Simulator
summary: A romance simulation game where you play as a charismatic young man, experiencing the thrill and excitement of building romantic relationships with a variety of girls. Every choice you make shapes unique stories and emotional connections, creating a truly immersive romance adventure.

name: Catch & Defense
summary: Catch & Defense is a unique mix of tower defense and monster collection. Build your team, defend your base, and use powerful creatures in a strategic game where every decision counts. Capture monsters, unleash them in battle, and combine their abilities to create unstoppable synergies.

name: Casino Clicker: Vegas Style
summary:
Think you know how to make it rain? Step up and make it rain Vegas Style!
Experience more ways to make chips rain down even faster and pile up like never before.

name: Catsuhi and Eva
summary:
Natsuhi wakes up with cat ears. Eva's here to help.

This is a non-profit fan work based on the visual novel series ‘Umineko no naku koro ni’. It has no association with 07th Expansion or Ryukishi07.

name: Casino Tycoon: Sin & Win
summary: Rise from a broke gambler to a casino kingpin in this high-stakes sim blending management, gambling, and adult content. Win big, indulge in luxury, go bankrupt, or start a gang war—every choice writes your destiny. In this city, you either rule the tables… or end up in a ditch.

name: CarCam
summary: CarCam throws you into childhood chaos as a remote-controlled car! Race, capture zones, play car-powered billiard, or just roam free - all in a giant living room world. Play solo or with friends. Wishlist now and relive the fun!

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Season 6
summary: The Haunting returns with a vengeance in Season 06, bringing new Halloween-themed map variants and chilling LTMs across all three modes. Fight as and against iconic slashers and zombies and unlock a hearty helping of spooky rewards scattered throughout in-game events and the new seasonal Battle Pass.

name: Cam4Z: Bodycam Zombie Elevator Survivor
summary: Step inside. The elevator’s waiting. Survive, or don’t. Who cares?

name: Cat in the tomb
summary: Cat in the tomb - Challenge your reaction!

name: Cat vs. Slime
summary: The cats can stack on top of each other like human ring performers, easily reaching the flying slime in the air. As the battle progresses, you can randomly unlock new cats, enhance the cat house, and the mild roguelike elements bring new surprises to each game.

name: Catfighter, In the Lands of Sinners
summary: A fantasy Souls-like and CUTE~ top-down action game. Step into the despised Lands of Sinners as Mickesh, where lovely cats enjoy fast-paced battles, family friendly interactions, and the most adorable ?sUfF3r1nG? imaginable!

name: Cat and Shadow and Death's Four Friends
summary: Cat and Shadow and Death's Four Friends is a two-player platformer game. It consists of 4 chapters and 16 levels. Players need to take on the roles of Cat and Shadow respectively, use various skills and in-map mechanics to cooperate in collecting items, and reach the end together.

name: Camelot 10000CE
summary: Camelot 10000CE is a dark fantasy action game where you play a crippled cyborg and have to type commands to move and attack.

name: Catto Pew Pew!
summary: Send everyone flying in this over-the-top shooter where crazy physics meets hilarious proximity chat. There’s nothing like it—join the chaos for free!

name: Cairn: Stone Towers
summary: Build balance, one stone at a time. Stack stones into tranquil cairns in this meditative physics-based puzzle game. Explore serene landscapes, master gravity and patience, and create harmony through careful placement. No timers. No stress. Just you and the stones.

name: Cairns
summary: Balance. Patience. Perfection. Cairns is the quintessential Stone Stacking game. Experience diverse and atmospheric environments, and master the art of building the freestanding stone towers know as Cairns.

name: Case Files: Internal Affairs
summary: The 3rd installment in the Case Files series. An FMV murder mystery, police interrogation, detective experience.

name: Cats With Standards
summary: Horror Visual Novel where Cats claw through filth for bones and whisper lies to mirrors. Find the Hidden-Objects. Obey, smile, repeat—until the lines between rule and ruin blur, and you’re left meowing into the void.

name: Calm Before the Storm
summary: Calm Before the Storm is a retro japanese themed cleaning simulator game

name: Cafe Crew Simulator
summary: Craft coffee masterpieces, grow your dream café, and sabotage the competition in style! Coffee's hot, competition's hotter!

name: CardVenture: JustAHead!
summary: Become the revived Demon Lord and embark on a path of revenge and rebuilding. A reaction-free action roguelike where even clumsy hands can enjoy the thrill of dodging and building powerful combos!

name: Cat Carried Butterfly
summary: The story unfolds in Republican-era Shanghai. Lüpíng, a girl raised in an orphanage, receives a letter from the headmaster guiding her back to her childhood home. In the long-forgotten courtyard, amid a maze of fading traditions and new ideas, she uncovers her past and long-buried eerie secrets.

name: Cardopolis
summary: Cardopolis is card based city-builder, where you take on the role of Cardopolis' Mayor. Build up your city card by card, law by law, sector by sector and avoid meeting your investors' ire by reaching your goals in time!

name: Castle and Cursor
summary: Do you like Tower Defense and also clicking the cursor? Then defend your castle with itself and with your cursor. Each castle has its own unique upgrades. Complete stages unlock different castles and upgrade your cursor skills.

name: Cat Snap
summary: Cat Snap is a cozy puzzle game where you guide a playful cat and capture delightful photos!

name: Cave Explorers
summary: You will delve into the underground world of the mysterious desert, build your own deck, fight monsters, and dig for treasure. Every adventure is randomly generated - build powerful card combinations, collect equipment, encounter unknown creatures, and fight your way out of the dangerous caves!

name: Cat Merge
summary: CatMerge is an arcade game where you grow adorable cats by merging them. It’s easy to learn but delightful to master. With its cute visuals, relaxing atmosphere, and cats full of surprises, it offers a cozy experience at every moment. Perfect for fun, peaceful, and heartwarming times!

name: Cascade Falls
summary: A story-driven visual novel about healing, heartbreak, and second chances. Build relationships, face your past, and shape your future in a town where every choice leaves a mark. Romance, drama, and emotional chaos await in Cascade Falls.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Card Unlock Vol.8
Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Card Unlock Vol.7
Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days 2 - Card Unlock Vol.6
Cat and Isle of Stars
summary: Cat and Isle of Stars is a cozy sim adventure on a mysterious cat-inhabited island. Run a cat café, enjoy island life, and bond with locals, as whispers of an ancient mystery and an outsider threat reveal secrets from the island’s past.

name: Carambole Fireworks
summary: If two balls collide, they create fireworks. However, there are rules... Engage in a sparkling fest of this fast-paced set of billiard themed minigames. Use as little hits as possible to score more! Hunt for bonuses to get more attempts! Set up your game's difficulty to your taste.

name: Candy Killers
summary: Trick-or-treat with caution. Some candy will kill, and it’s up to you to figure out who’s handing it out.

name: Cahss Worlds
summary: The Game drops you into a vibrant, player-built universe of floating islands and portal-linked worlds. Explore blocky landscapes, gather resources, and sculpt your own structures while weather patterns and day-night cycles keep each visit fresh. Team up with friends to tend shared farms, unlock rare seeds, and trade crafted goods, or dive into competitive minigames that pop up across featured worlds. Tight controls and nimble movement make building, exploration, and friendly combat feel snappy, whether you’re expanding a communal hub or venturing through a newly discovered portal.

name: Castle Cairn
summary: Castle Cairn is a first-person psychological horror game set in 18th-century Scotland. Explore a forgotten ruin, uncover ancient Scottish folklore, and solve time-shifting puzzles to survive a curse where memory and myth twist into something real.

name: Castle Idler
summary: castle idler is a short, relaxing idle tower defense game with no waves. idly upgrade towers, collect coins, and unlock a vast skill tree to defend your castle from a slime invasion.

name: Cats in Paint
summary: A group of little kittens has quietly hidden in the painting, waiting for you to discover them!

name: Castlevania: Symphony of Horrors
summary:
This game is a fan project and is not intended for profit. All rights and ownership belong to Konami.

A love letter to the early series, Castlevania - Symphony Of Horrors is a fan made, non-profit, free to play PC game made by First Serve Gaming where you take control of Simon Belmont. The game is a recreation of Castlevania 2: Simon's Quest made by Konami in 1987. Symphony Of Horrors features an expanded world from the original, with new locations, larger areas, more enemies, more bosses, more items to collect and a larger journey then ever before!

name: Catnigma
summary: Steal fish in the most magical and sneaky way possible! Catnigma is a magical puzzle game where you control a flying cat on a quest to satisfy its endless hunger for fish.

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Airborne
summary:
A Spectacular US Airborne Operations DLC for Call to Arms - Gates of Hell: Ostfront.

This DLC brings you a superbly detailed storyline, following the US airborne operations in western Europe in an exciting and immersive new format.

It features some of the most iconic battles fought by US paratroopers from the 82nd and 101st airborne divisions in World War 2.

name: Call to Arms: Gates of Hell - Jubilee
summary:
This free DLC is a gift from the Call to Arms - Gates of Hell team to its loyal community, commemorating 10 years since the team began the journey of developing “Gates of Hell”. It contains a few missions, maps and assets for the game.

As a big thank you to the community, we have put together a fairly nostalgic package for everyone to commemorate such a special occasion.

name: Call to Arms - Gates of Hell: Supporter Pack
summary: Only for our most hardcore fans: Support us above and beyond the call to arms! Stand out as a special supporter, with accents to your in-game profile as an outstanding contributor. You also receive the official artbook, windows theme and a behind the scenes documentary about the making of the game.

name: Caverim 2
summary:
The next chapter in The Elder Coal Mines saga arrives from Badthesda Game Studios, the makers of some other jam games you have maybe played before. Caverim 2 reimagines and revolutionizes the open-world space opera, bringing to life a complete virtual world open for you to explore any way you choose. The legendary freedom of choice, storytelling, and adventure of The Elder Coal Mines is realized like never before.

Dragons, long lost to the passages of the Elder Coal Mines, have returned to the world and the future of the Empire hangs in the balance. Indebted to a dragon, you must find the prophesized hero born with the power of attorney; he is the only one who can sneak it by them. Any similarity to Starfield is completely coincidental (half the team has never even played it).

name: Car Crash Simulator: Demolition Derby Madness
summary: Race fast, jump high, and crash harder than ever. Turn chaos into fun with every wild stunt. Master the ramps, rule the derby, and enjoy the ride!

name: Catch
summary: Catch is an easy-to-play game that you, your family and friends can pick up at any time for a quick, easy laugh!

name: Cat Familiar Center
summary: Cat Familiar Center is a relaxing cat-raising game. Players will play as a witch and, with the help of fellow witches, train different cat familiars and find suitable new homes for them.

name: Campfire with Cat
summary: Campfire with Cat is a work-focus clicker game where you maintain the campfire by working in other software. Cozy sounds relax you, while the tension of the fire going out naturally drives task concentration. Gentle interactions with the cat bring comfort and focus to your work.

name: Calvin's Gallery
summary: Play as Calvin and his friends as you explore the ruins of a once thriving world. Follow the trail left behind, maybe you can unravel the mystery of what really happened in the valley. This RPG features turn based combat, large scale puzzles, a wide range of side areas, and new game+.

name: Castlevania SNES Port
summary: A straight port of Castlevania (NES) for the SNES. The game works the same, but with additional support for MSU1 enhancement for audio and the inclusion of the Easy Mode from the Family Computer cartridge version, the Hard Mode from Vs. Castlevania and the ability to change between two sub-weapons.

name: Car Screw Escape
summary: A unique puzzle adventure that combines car jam games, screw sort challenges, and 3D disassembly mechanics!

name: Cat Caravans
summary: You set off with a caravan full of cats to find a safe place to settle! Gather resources, set up a base, defenses, give your cats work to do! Manage your base, expand, defend it from monsters and make it a nice place for your fellow cats!

name: Castlevania II SNES Port
summary: A port of the ROM hack Castlevania II English Retranslation (+Map) (NES) for the SNES. It has all of the improvements that the original mod added to the game, plus additional ones like MSU1 support, SRAM saving, rumble feature, etc.

name: Capybara Against Humanity
summary: Have you ever played a Tower Defence? Well. On this one, you don't place towers; you place obstacles in which waves of silly human invaders keep crashing into! You can also get dirty and personal by pushing the invaders away yourself!. Or throw a rock at them. That could also work!

name: Can You Escape Love? A Zodiac Story
summary:
Escape an obsessed love-struck sheep's room by fighting heart pounding bullet hell boss battles and solving the mystery surrounding your captor! Armed with only your own heart, survive the psychotic efforts of a sheep unwilling to let you leave. How far will you go to escape love?

Dodge explosive presents, flaming torches, toxic hearts, and a murderous sheep in exhilarating bullet hell boss battles using an intuitive touch drag control! Experience an immersive storyline that will take you through a roller coaster of emotions and action adventure surrounding your own abduction. Interact with your environment to discover the truth under the tale of your own past.

Can you Escape Love : A Zodiac Story is a unique point and click, escape the room survival game unlike any other, from the creators of Animatronic Jumpscare Factory and Five Tries At Love!

name: Can You Escape Fate? A Zodiac Story
summary:
When your brother mysteriously goes missing in 2016, it’s your job to go back and find him, no matter what the cost! Can You Escape Fate is a trippy new bullet hell style dodge ’em up that combines fast paced combat with point & click room escape puzzles.

Avoid blood-thirsty claw machines, failed lab experiments, greedy spirits, and befriend insane yandere souls in exhilarating bullet hell boss battles! Between battles, solve tricky puzzles and creatively use items to escape the mysterious world of 2016! Will you spare the souls you meet or will you take the genocide route?

Can You Escape Fate: A Zodiac Story is the long awaited sequel to Can You Escape Love and from the creators of Animatronic Jumpscare Factory and Five Tries At Love!

Armed with only your own heart and SOUL, survive the unmerciful and cruel world of 2016 by diving under the tale of two siblings and the New Year. You are the only one who can change your life. How far will you go to change your fate? Can you escape?

Experience an immersive storyline that will take you through a roller coaster of emotions and action adventure surrounding a world past its time. Interact with your environment to discover the truth under the tale of your own past. Set time back in motion and resume the Zodiac Cycle by fighting your way to the New Year!

Note: Look forward to new characters and more endings in future updates!

name: Can You Escape Heartbreak? A Zodiac Story
summary:
Can You Escape Heartbreak: A Zodiac Story is the long awaited sequel to Can You Escape Fate and Can You Escape Love and from the creators of Animatronic Jumpscare Factory and Five Tries At Love!

New episodes will be released periodically. Look forward to new characters and more endings in future updates!
(Not said by the developer, but so far there has been no new episodes, it's just the first episode/room that's available.)

name: Caribbean Legend: Age of Pirates
summary: You are the captain and owner of your own ship—the finest fate one could hope for in the 17th century Caribbean. Unlimited sandbox experience. A unique genre blending naval combat, land exploration, and global map. Think Sid Meier's Pirates! meets Bannerlord.

name: Cats and Cows
summary: Plant, craft, farm, and build as a Cat in Cats And Cows. Paint and design your island landscape, build farms and expand your island to build your farming empire!

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - Season 1
Cazzarion: Jetpack Fighter
summary: Dive into the futuristic battle of the skies! In Cazzarion: Jetpack Fighter, you pilot a highly advanced jetpack-powered combat robot and engage in high-speed aerial duels against enemy machines. With lightning-fast maneuvers, tactical skill, and precise laser weapons, you fight for supremacy in the skies. Every battle is an explosive showdown of speed, strategy, and firepower. Are you ready to rule the skies?

name: Carmageddon: Rogue Shift
summary: Carmageddon smashes back with brutal roguelite vehicular‑combat mayhem. Adapt, upgrade, and unleash destruction on post‑apocalyptic zombie hordes. The legacy lives on, reinvented and unforgiving.

name: Card Collection Simulator
summary: Become the world's greatest Card Collector! Open packs on Stream and sell your Cards at the local Convention; growing your Collection and building your Stream Community!

name: Card Conquest
summary: Card Conquest is a Tower Defense game with Deckbuilding and Roguelite elements. Combine spells, towers and units to create a deck and defeat your enemies. Spend your resources wisely and find balance between offense and defense. Gather powerful relics that will enhance your cards.

name: Cardaire: Eternal Aces
summary: Get ready to crack packs and throw cards in Cardaire: Eternal Aces, a single-player collectible card RPG! Explore a unique world, hunt down powerful cards, and build the deck that'll make you a Cardaire legend.

name: Carrot Smash
summary: Take control of a brave carrot on a mission to protect its territory in this exciting pixel art platformer. Face challenging enemies and obstacles, using powerful punches, double jumps, and the Dash to overcome action-packed, precise levels.

name: Cat's Holidays
summary:
Cat's Holidays is a playful and action-packed multiplayer game where adorable cats take on thrilling adventures across various vibrant and holiday-themed arenas, dive into these exciting gamemodes for now:

- Chill & Play: Relax with friends in the casual mode, where you can explore interactive environments, uncover secrets, and engage in mini-games designed for pure fun.

With its charming visuals, fun physics, and easy-to-pick-up gameplay, Cat's Holidays is the purr-fect blend of competition and fun for players of all ages. Whether you're here to compete or just to enjoy some paw-sitive vibes, there’s something for every cat lover :D

The catto adventure never stops.

name: Casino Los Pixels
summary: A casino gambling game with no microtransactions or in-game purchases.

name: Capybara Journey Go
summary: Adorable capybaras racing for hidden treasures Explore new worlds with speed and teamwork Rise as the fastest hero across cozy lands

name: Cat Girl Survivor: Extra Episodes and Additional Chapters
summary: Premium Voice DLC Experience heroes' daily lives in 5 new chapters with full Japanese voice acting! S-grade equipment and Salamander drop rates are significantly increased. New character Mio can instantly freeze enemy movements. Enjoy deeper stories and powerful rewards!

name: Careening
summary: Careening is a bullet-heaven CarPG with a focus on exploration and movement. Drive across a small open world, defend yourself from the robot horde, then do it all again.

name: Cards, the Universe and Everything
summary: Cards, the Universe and Everything is a unique trading card game with almost limitless possibilities: Dinosaurs, Norse gods, blue-footed boobies, Samurai, volcanoes, even the god particle. With the universe’s thingamabobs and endless strategies, are you ready for this gloriously bonkers game?

name: Cat’s Request
summary: Cat's Request is a fantastic detective story about an extraterrestrial cat named Ash and his virtual assistant, living in a metropolis governed by artificial intelligence.

name: Campground Simulator
summary: Build, manage, and grow your very own campground store! Stock shelves, serve campers, and expand your site as you transform a quiet forest outpost into a thriving outdoor destination. Run the ultimate campground supply shop and keep campers happy as they explore the great outdoors.

name: Capyverse Odyssey
summary: A fast-paced, third-person action roguelike where you control Capy, a capybara hero, and other unique characters, battling through chaotic multiverses to restore balance. Co-Op play for 2-4 players.

name: Cafe of Roses
summary: A lowkey, low stakes yuri story about a young woman and a mysterious maid. Who is the engimatic Magdalena, and is there more to her than meets the eye?

name: Canvas City
summary: Canvas City is a turn-based tactics RPG of rebellion on rollerblades. Lead a crew of skaters and street artists rising up against an oppressive regime. Each map is a battleground and a canvas, where your actions shift control, leave your mark, and shape the city’s future.

name: Cat & Friends Memory
summary: Cosy family game with the cutesy animal friends - train yours eye and brain , and see who remembers best!

name: Cafe Simulator
summary: Build and manage your cafe business. Customize your shop with furniture and decorations, brew various beverages, serve customers efficiently, expand your space, and compete with rival cafés. Grow from a small shop to a thriving empire. Oh, and there's chicken wrestling too.

name: Cain
summary: Carrying the weight of an unforgivable sin, the murder of his brother Abel, Cain wrapped his body in bandages to hide his guilt. In a devastated world, he faces relentless obstacles, and with each step, he moves closer to a choice: seek redemption or succumb to the hatred consuming him.

name: Calm Horizon
summary: "Sea of Serenity" - Sail with friends through ever-changing seas! Fish rare species, tame magical pets, and uncover island mysteries. Build your legendary crew under dynamic day-night cycles. Adventure awaits!

name: Candy Land
summary: A sweet survival defense roguelite where sugar is life and gummy bears are out for revenge.

name: Cascade
summary: Cascade is a game which has interactive simulated fluids and landscapes you can modify while on a mission or in the level editor. Use aircraft, boats, wheeled vehicles, horses, snowmobiles, Choose a creative mode or an mission driven path with challenges that include drones, turrets, monsters etc.

name: Car Rental Simulator
summary: Run your own car rental lot in this detailed simulator. Manage reservations, clean and service vehicles, and keep customers happy. With time-based tasks, strategy elements, and high replayability, every day brings a new challenge.

name: Castle War
summary: 《Warcraft 3: The Frozen Throne》 and 《Mirage War》 are two games that I really love in my childhood, and it would be a lot of fun to mix them together with some design.....

name: Castle War
summary: Castle War is a fast-paced RTS blending card deck-building and tactical unit deployment. Build your deck, summon units, and adapt strategies in real time to outsmart your opponents in dynamic, high-tempo battles.

name: Casual Fishing
summary: Casual Fishing is a relaxing desktop idle game combining fishing simulation, codex collection, random item drops, and gear enhancement. You can enable "Easy Mode" to shrink the game and place it in a corner of the screen—perfect for fishing while working or studying.

name: Cat Burglar
summary: Cat Burglar is a Stealth game where you customize your own personal cat and have them bounce around apartments thieving from other cats. There are tense moments in the game where you will have to outrun other cats. In other moments you will have to pick the perfect time to bounce between cover.

name: Catastrophe
summary: Catastrophe is a minimalist survival experience set in the heart of hell. You wake up in a surreal arena where the monsters of hell are already hunting you down. Without weapons or allies, your only chance is to escape, outwit your enemies, and survive until time runs out.

name: Catacomb
summary: Body cam horror game beneath Paris. Navigate claustrophobic catacombs, caves and subway systems while a relentless AI-driven monster stalks you. Can you escape alive?

name: Cat Nap
summary: Casual old school tower defense game. Pay your cats with treats to defend you from all manner of threats while you sleep.

name: Cat Puzzle
summary: Rescue as many cats as you can within the time limit! Combine puzzle and roguelike elements to achieve the highest score possible.

name: Cast Outs
summary: Urban fantasy collides with true co-op as you and your crew unleash visceral, physical magic, amplifying each other’s powers, and pushing back invaders in the fight to save your city. Cast Outs mixes the weight of a brawler with the speed of a shooter, built for quick-fix fun, high-intensity co-op, and memorable sessions with friends.

name: Cannon Defender
summary: Cannon Defender is a fast-paced wave-based shooter where you control a powerful cannon to fight off endless enemies. Collect gems dropped by enemies and use them to create special boxes such as health, armor, rockets, and explosive boxes to survive longer and score higher. Face stronger waves, chain powerful attacks, and prove your skills in this challenging arcade experience.

name: Cardaver
summary: Cardaver is a tower defense, deckbuilder, with roguelike looping gameplay. Using a wide variety of monsters and spells to defend each lane, help the Dragon Queen protect her Castle Kingdom against an army of fantasy do-gooders and tyrannical princesses.

name: Carmagist
summary: Civilization vs. the Demon Lord?! Carmagist is a deck-building strategy game set in a ruined world where the Demon Lord has shattered civilization. Lead a nation on the brink of extinction and build up Tech, Funds, and Population to reclaim the future — every choice shapes your nation’s fate.

name: Cave Oasis at Shylake
summary: Move to a small cave town on a moon in this hopeful futuristic life sim. Try hydroponic farming, sustainable biomass crafting, mix-and-match cooking and decorating, and more. Befriend NPCs from other worlds, support the complex community and ecosystem, and help solve problems that arise.

name: Call of Warfare: FPS Modern Shooter
summary: Outsmart, Outgun, Outlast. The Battlefield Awaits

name: Captain Sharkbait: Voyage for Treasure
summary: Ahoy, matey! Join the famously unlucky Captain Sharkbait known far and wide for his name... and his two peg legs! Could his fortunes finally be changing when a mysterious bottle washes ashore?

name: Catana: Red Flowers
summary:
Step into the paws of a nimble ninja cat!

By day, run your chaotic Restaurant, cook dishes, serve quirky guests, and stir up playful mischief.

By night, dash through enemies, deflect bullets, gather resources to grow your Restaurant, and showcase your skills with precision, speed, and style.

name: Catch It
summary: Collect the green stars that come from top to bottom. Stay away from the red ones. And never miss a green star!

name: Cactus Clicker
summary: Cactus Clicker is a clicker game in which you click a cactus.

name: Cam Quest
summary: As Lexie's most dedicated fan, board a private spaceship for a once-in-a-lifetime chance to get up close and personal with your favorite lewd streamer!

name: Catgirl Bloodhunt
summary: Catgirl is dying and needs blood fast ʕ!!≧ᴥ≦ʔ Hunt down cute critters + steal their life-force. In this puzzle/shooter game, the only puzzle is the slippery floor ʕ ᵔ⩊ᵔ ʔ

name: CatchMaker
summary: Embark on a cozy, 3D adventure where you catch bugs... and match them for perfect romance! Explore a world abuzz with cute critters and help them find their perfect date through playful minigames. Befriend the locals, uncover your past and embrace your destiny as steward of a magical island.

name: Card Wizard
summary:
Protect the card world with magic.

Kill the boss within a limited turn.

Become a great wizard and kill the legion of evil.

Simple control! Fun to play! Great magic!

Be the best wizard!

Cool things

* Kill various patterns of bosses!

* Collect new spells!

* Upgrade to the best Staff!

* Be stronger in the dungeon!

name: Car Parkour Together
summary: A skill-based car parkour game where speed, reflexes, and chaos collide! Play solo or with a friend, use your special abilities to overcome challenging obstacles, provoke your partner, or team up for victory.

name: Cage: Along With Us
summary: Cage: Alone With You is a psychological horror game with an isometric view and retro pixel art style that combines strategic exploration, escape, and constant tension.

name: CatAway
summary: CatAway is a 2D endless runner where, after suffering a shipwreck, the player controls a raft and goes looking for dry land. While navigating, he has to dodge various obstacles and aquatic creatures, collect coins and power-ups.

name: Cataverse MVP
summary: You are a free cat, among many just like you. Listen to your instincts. | Focus | Execute | Repeat | Learn from your mistakes. This is the path to the Cataverse MVP.

name: Cadentia Farnese
summary: 12 chances to discover "the Dice"! Immerse yourself in the history of the Farnese Palace in Rome with this unique narrative video game.

name: Catmarine
summary: Catmarine is a chaotic, co-operative, typing game. Type to navigate through an ocean world with your cat submarine, the Catmarine! Use the various terminals inside of the Catmarine to maneuver it and to defend against oceanic dangers. Communicate, collaborate, and type as fast as you can!

name: Cargor
summary: A peaceful workday? Forget it! Trucks are docking, boxes are flying everywhere. There is only one rule: If a single customer leaves unhappy, you go bankrupt! Play with up to 4 friends, set up the logistics line, and keep up with the madness. No room for error—just speed and panic!

name: Cartomancy
summary: JRPG style experience with hints of team building and strategy. Uncover a metaphysical mystery from an unlikely inheritance. Cipher the code and face the powers that may be.

name: Catloaf Kart Racing
summary: Now you are a catloaf and you are racing along the track. Imagine a kart racing game where you control not cars, but catloafs. Compete with friends, outrun each other, use your skills and environment to win!

name: Cats Organized Neatly 2
summary: Snuggle up with 30 cute cats and 80 cozy puzzles! Some felines have funny moods or preferences, others just want a comfy spot. A relaxing game about thinking ahead, staying calm – and organizing cats (again)!

name: Carrot Catcher
summary: Squish, dash, jump, survive, repeat.

name: Casenology
summary: A top-down tactical shooter where you'll fight enemies, rescue hostages, and complete various missions. But it's not that simple — you'll face shortages of ammo, medkits, and all kinds of resources. So, is it worth engaging in a firefight? Think before you act!

name: Cataclysmic Bite
summary: Cataclysmic Bite is a dark fantasy horror, turn based RPG where survival means hiding, listening, and holding onto your sanity. You follow a small group of travelers Lila, Malcolm, Elias, Rowan, and Alice. They uncover the truth behind, the demon cat curse spread across the village.

name: Cargo Transport Simulator
summary:
Become a truck driver in this expansive open world truck driver simulator.
Start from the bottom and work your company to the top. You start with a classic venerable truck. Deliver trailers and earn money, upgrade your truck or buy more modern trucks.
If you are not into semi trucks, there is also a variety of Light Trucks. The choice is yours.

name: Cats & Soup: Fluffy Town
summary:
Farming and Town Building with Adorable Cats!

Grow crops on your farm and harvest a variety of goodies in this charming farming simulation.

name: Carnal Coup: Overseer's Edition
summary: Carnal Coup is a very NSFW text-based game in a sci-fi setting, in which you play a member of a species of perverted alien shapeshifters who have just had your world invaded by a puritanical space federation. By infiltrating the invasion at the top, it's time to turn it to your own ends!

name: Card Colony
summary: Card Colony is a pixel-art deckbuilding roguelike. Every turn, the cards on the board are reshuffled—build the best synergies you can and survive the endless onslaught.

name: Captcha The Flag
summary: A PvP first person shooter where every reload of your gun requires a CAPTCHA. Compete with fellow humans in games of capture the flag for the amusement of your AI overlords.

name: Caveworks
summary: Caveworks is a 1-4 player co-op action-adventure game. Explore procedurally generated lunar caves and pioneer unknown regions to fulfill your assigned missions.

name: Castlevania: Eternity of Sorrow
summary: Castlevania - Eternity of Sorrow is a full-game romhack and a sequel to the bad ending of Dawn of Sorrow. Created by WetBandAid(feels), this mod features a new story, modified tilesets, new magic seals(very hard but optional), and a new castle. Some areas of the game have been altered more more than others.

name: Candy Crush Solitare
summary: Candy Crush Solitaire is a fun and challenging classic card game for players of all levels, with a delightful twist to the classic TriPeaks solitaire experience. Join iconic Candy Crush Saga characters in a delicious journey around the world, creating a lovely postcard collection on the way. Relax and immerse yourself in Candy Crush Solitaire's beautiful graphics, animations, and design!

name: Castle
summary: Castle is a tactical FPS that combines fast-paced team combat with the strategic depth of chess. Instead of controlling a single character, you command your entire squad and switch between pieces in real time to outthink and outmaneuver your opponents.

name: Campoca
summary: Enter Campoca, where feel-good activities and delightful interactions are yours to enjoy completely for free! Collect joyful memories and turn your campsite into a charming, heartwarming retreat!

name: Candy Land: Sugary Sprint
summary: Dodge chocolate towers, crush cookies, and jump over jellies as you race to the castle - collecting coins and candy along the way.

name: Caterpillar King
summary: Return the Caterpillar King's lost child for a life-changing reward! Ant pushes for change, Beetle clings to comfort, and their hungry Caterpillar keeps pulling them into trouble in this narrative-driven light tactics-puzzle game.

name: Campus Confidential
summary: An LGBTQ slice of life/supernatural dating sim

name: Carnival Roulette
summary: Carnival Roulette is a horror game built around a deadly game of chance, similar in spirit to Buckshot Roulette, but expanded with new mechanics and strategic layers.

name: Catrun
summary: Join Philip the cat in CATRUN, an exhilarating runner game set in a bustling city. Help Philip avoid wolves, navigate tricky obstacles, and use fall acceleration to speed through challenges. Explore dynamic environments, collect power-ups, and uncover a heartfelt story of adventure and friendship.

name: Castlevania: Anniversary Collection - Ultimate Edition
summary:
Castlevania Anniversary Collection Ultimate Edition Includes:
- Castlevania Anniversary Collection Classic Edition
- Castlevania Anniversary Collection Bloodlines Edition Plastic Clamshell Case
- Physical "The History of Castlevania: Book of the Crescent Moon" Book
- Miniature Replica Box Collection featuring all eight games from the Castlevania Anniversary Collection
- Three Premium Retro Box Art Prints
- Castlevania Logo Enamel Pin
- Official G2 Blu-ray Sized SteelBook Case
- Shadow Box featuring Tom duBois' stunning new art with button activated lights and sound.
- Premium die-cut box allows you to showcase the shadowbox even if the game remains sealed.

name: Cafe Business Manager
summary: Cafe Business Manager is a cozy-yet-detailed café management sim where you start small and grow your dream coffee shop. Take orders, prepare and serve products, manage staff and daily operations, and keep your café running smoothly as customer demand increases. Optimize your layout, maintain cleanliness, and expand your menu to build a thriving business.

name: Capper
summary: Lower your expectations. Now lower them further. This is a game about flipping bottle caps. The goal is simple: pay off your bar tab by flipping bottle caps face up.

name: Capybara Dungeon
summary: Capybara Dungeon is a first-person cooperative dungeon exploration game where up to 4 players control capybaras in chaotic runs filled with dangerous creatures, unpredictable traps, and emergent humor, relying on constant communication to survive.

name: Call of the Abyss
summary:
Call of the Abyss is a short atmospheric exploration game about descending into a deep mysterious hole in the middle of nowhere.

Carefully navigate precarious platforms, use the tools you discover, and push deeper into the dark, while resisting the whispering pull of the abyss itself.

How far down will you get before the darkness envelops you whole?

Developed by The Hole Gang: Mathue24, starbi, Henpemaz, Dice
in 5 days for the 2025 Spelkolllektivet Halloween Game Jam

name: Capsule
summary: Capsule is a co-op survival and building game set in space. Build your modular spaceship, land on planets, gather resources, and try to survive together with your friends against the dangers of space while uncovering the truth behind the destruction of your world.

name: Capybound
summary: Capybound is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. You wake up as a capybara in a beautiful pixelated world. Find oranges, meet and talk to many different animals, solve puzzles, unlock skills, explore the world and it's secrets, all in a quest to find your way back home.

name: Card Chase
summary: "Card Chase" is a fast-paced deck-building game that combines strategy and resource management. You play as a "hero", gathering various resource cards to confront an uncertain fate, defeat outlaws, and fulfill your duty to protect the city—ultimately becoming its legend.

name: Car Football
summary: Car Football is high-speed football on wheels. Play 1v1, 2v2, or 3v3 matches against AI, unlock 20+ unique cars, and compete in 5 stunning stadiums with physics-driven gameplay for skillful, action-packed matches.

name: Carroñero
summary: This is a game about embodying apathy.

name: Canteen's Islander
summary: A game about managing a pirate canteen and exploring a charming island to supply it.

name: Caramel Action Micro
summary: Run N Gun Maze Action

name: Capital City Brain Training Quiz!
summary: How many world capitals can you name? Challenge your “geography brain” with a 4-choice quiz!

name: Cats Visiting Cozy Town
summary: Explore charming streets and find hundreds of feline friends in this purr-fectly relaxing hidden object adventure.

name: Cantarella: Dominion of Qualia
summary: A dark turn-based RPG where you kill, devour, and command aberrations. In a mad tower where life itself is consumed as a resource, rewrite fate through choice and sacrifice in endless looping battles.

name: Carrion: Signature Edition
summary: Special Reserve Games exclusive version of Carrion.

name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow - Special Edition
summary: The Castlevania: Lords of Shadow Japan Limited Edition features the game, a soundtrack CD, an art compendium, and uniquely, a digital code for the classic Castlevania: Symphony of the Night.

name: Candles Aren't Eternal
summary: Candles aren't eternal, and you need to light them up again to find lost objects in this casual, single player adventure rpg. Get missions, make candles, go on adventure! Those old dark dungeons and caves are waiting you.

name: Cat Captains and the Global Fishery
summary: This is a relaxing fishing-themed incremental game. You will join the Cat Captains to explore global fishing grounds, catch fish, and collect resources. Unlock permanent upgrades in a vast talent tree with your gold. Every rewarding voyage will have you shouting, "One more round!"

name: Cats Hidden in Advent Calendar
summary: Sweeten the countdown to Christmas with this fabulous advents calendar full of hidden cats for you to find in this cute HOG by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator!

name: Cat President: 3rd-Rate Candidate
summary:
In a world where pets run the government, President DJ Nibbles has spent most of his time lying in sunbeams and using his desk as a scratching post. But now his days of zoomies in the Oval Office are coming to a close, as the U.S. prepares to elect its next Cat President!

Six wildly incompetent candidates are throwing their yarn balls into the ring, each more dysfunctional than the last. You’re the human campaign manager tasked with keeping these adorable candidates out of trouble. Wrangle egos, dodge scandals, fall in love, and maybe even save the country...or make it much, much worse.

With a script that’s nearly 100,000 words long, Cat President: 3rd-Rate Candidate is a visual novel packed full of romance, humor and cute pictures of real cats. Whether you’re a campaign veteran or just here for the musical numbers and fur-flying debates, it’s the most paws-itively absurd political simulator you’ll ever play.

name: Call of Glory: Critical Warfare & AirJet Fighter: Sky Assault Bundle Collection
summary: One Warrior. Two Battlefronts. Victory on Every Horizon.

name: Cartapli: Fold Quest
summary: Cartapli is a turn-based battle game that combines a strategic roguelike with unique paper-folding puzzles. Fold the paper to shift positions and defeat all enemies!

name: CaraVanguard
summary: A rogue-lite action RPG with co-op for up to 7 players. Choose from 7 classes, master 70+ weapons and 100+ skills, and battle through a world where elemental interactions can weaken—or empower—your enemies. Inspired by traditional action RPG's and classic titles.

name: C.A.R.S: Creating A Ridiculous Shitshow
summary: A rebellious chaos sandbox where you weaponize junk, disrupt highway traffic, and engineer outrageous physics disasters to turn the morning commute into pure, glorious mayhem.

name: Captain Contraption's Safari Park
summary: Manage a safari park with a fully simulated ecosystem in a nostalgic tycoon sandbox with rewarding roguelite elements. Clone bizarre species, unlock new toys and design clever paths to guide guests through the attractions. Don't worry, there's only a small chance they'll become dinner.

name: Cardoom
summary: Cardoom is a roguelite deckbuilder where you start with a basic deck. You collect new cards and items that affect your gameplay as you go.

name: Cambell’s Oddity Box
summary: Cambell’s Oddity Box is a collection of fun little experiences. Games, experimental input methods, menu designs, and more. Think of it as an interactive, digital sketchbook.

name: Callus
summary: Callus is a short psychological horror walking simulator about cruelty and overprotection.

name: Calon Arang Nightmare of Revenge
summary: A narrative-driven horror game inspired by the Indonesian legend of Calon Arang. Explore cursed locations, uncover dark rituals, and survive psychological terror filled with jump scares, traps, and relentless enemies.

name: Capoo Stack
summary: Capoo Stack is a fun and casual stacking game that's perfect for killing time! This time, our adorable Capoo needs your help to reach new heights. Simply stack each Capoo as it jumps up—easy to play, hard to master! Test your limits and see how many layers you can build!

name: Candy Crush Crushable
summary: Candy Crush is expanding where and how people play with the launch of Candy Crush Crushable, a new daily puzzle game available exclusively on Yahoo Games in the US. Crushable celebrates the joy of daily play, rooted in the belief that small wins can lift you up no matter where you are. Developed by King, the makers of Candy Crush, today marks a significant moment with the launch of Crushable, delivering Candy Crush’s signature fun in the form of a bite-sized puzzle designed for modern routines. With a new level released daily, players are invited to put their skills to the test with a sweet candy challenge that delivers a satisfying sense of achievement and a fresh moment of play worth coming back for.

name: Campfire: Night One
summary: Experience True Survival Horror Campfire: Night One is an immersive psychological horror game where every shadow hides a threat and every bullet counts. As you navigate the suffocating darkness of the Abanda wilds, you must do more than just survive—you must find and rescue the one who matters most to you.
